story:
Whatever your preference is, Watbo can help. This is the smart way to drink water – the way that puts you in charge.

 

That isn't all, either.

 

Contribute now and let's all hydrate smarter!
story_txt: Whatever your preference is, Watbo can help. This is the smart way to drink water – the way that puts you in charge. That isn't all, either. Contribute now and let's all hydrate smarter!

story:
Vive Live is the first application to enable live streaming of any type of fitness and wellness class directly to your mobile phone.

Vive Live is here to change the way people workout for the better. 

Let Vive Live provide you the ultimate, on demand, live online fitness and wellness experience - and all through the touch of a button.

The pandemic has sped up the need for both trainers and clients to find alternatives to the old form of working out and staying fit.

Vive Live simplifies your lifestyle by being the home for every type of fitness and wellness category you can imagine. 

 

Our research indicated people are searching for a way to embed fitness and wellness routines seamlessly into their lifestyles. 

 
 
 
 

Vive Live is in Beta mode but we have trialled the application with a number of users and trainers, and the feedback has been fantastic.

We are offering you the chance to join Vive Live Day and Month - unlimited access to live classes from the trainers featured below and many more. 

Our current Beta app has the ability to create, host and promote classes but we want to offer so much more functionality for trainers.

In our pledges you see that we mention Vive Premium. This is the version of the app that we will build with the support from our pledgers. Here is our planned list below - we would love to get your feedback!

In addition to helping develop Vive Live, money from backers will go towards expanding our customer support team that services both clients and trainers. It is our goal to provide the best live streaming experience possible and a great customer service team is the backbone to that.

As a Vive Pro you will be able to join the webinars hosted by our training and tech teams to better understand the platform.

Our target is to release the newly reskinned Vive Live to a global audience by September end. This very much depends on the development and how the fundraising campaign goes. We want to build Vive Live up and ensure it is the best it can possibly be in advance of release.

If you back us you can be part of that build and get to access the application far in advance of the rest of the market. We really appreciate your support in helping us change the way people get fit and healthy for the better!

Risks and challenges

We are a team made up of people around the world who all share a common goal - make fitness and wellness accessible to everyone. Our leader, Donal Lal based in Australia, has been an entrepreneur for years and is obsessed with simply making things better. We all have our own story as to how we ended up at Vive Live, but one thing that is consistent is our understanding of just how much this product is needed.

We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and to get this app into your hands as soon as possible, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

APP DEVELOPMENT: We have a phenomenal development team who have already worked for close to one year to get the app to its current pilot stage. We are so excited for the future but from our experience to date we know app development can take time and sometimes we find challenges in the coding process that cause delays. We are committed to working through any challenge that arises and pulling this product through to the finish line as soon as we possibly can - and we appreciate your patience and understanding if/when we hit speed bumps along the road.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a website crashes, some code breaks, a pandemic hits... Those kinds of things could cause a delay. We are doing everything in our power to deliver on time. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where we are at in the development of the app and when you can expect to get access.

story:
When not close to their babies, mothers are always worried about where the baby might have gone and whether they are kept warm.

This is a longstanding natural concern because small babies are not yet capable of regulating their body temperature.

Additionally, in modern life, this worry becomes a torment because as people have fewer babies, they become even that much more precious.

If you are a mother, you might have already felt as you came back home and watched your baby that something was not as it should be. And that feeling is rather awful. Whenever you suspect that your baby might not have been kept warm and away from drafts, stay in the doubt is devastating.

With Wabbee, those concerns are gone. It lets you know exactly what happened, and you will no longer feel the anguish of staying in doubt.

Wabbee keeps record of:

1.  Drafts at the place where your child was. How strong and for how long.

2.  The room temperature everywhere your child went.

Wabbee attaches to your child’s clothes and records room temperature changes and drafts.

You download all measurements from the Wabbee with one App in your cell phone or tablet.

The user-friendly APP shows to you the occurrences where your child might actually have been vulnerable.



About Wabbee

                                       

·  Easily attached to your child clothes, looks like a clothing label

·  Sturdy and watertight

·  Stores up to 15 days of temperature and drafts records

·  Communicates using the low power Bluetooth Low Energy protocol

·  Comes with one button to activate/deactivate Bluetooth

·  Is powered by a rechargeable battery. We provide the Wabbee charger (for 110Vac and also 230Vac)

                                  





About the App

·  Easily installed in your cell phone or tablet

·  Displays room temperature and occurrence of drafts in a clock like display

·   Allows configuration of the limits that will trigger warnings



About the Instant Alert Module

The Instant Alert Module connects to the Wabbee within a range of up to ten meters, through Bluetooth protocol, and sends an email in case a defined limit is exceeded. To do that the Module has to be connected to the internet through Wifi. 

With this Module you can get an instant alert anywhere you are.



Project history

Aptinov designs and manufactures wireless systems to record temperature and humidity since 2011. Those systems are used mostly in pharmacies, drug warehouses, and distribution trucks.

Once, Francisco and Hugo were commenting on advertising, they just heard on the car radio, stating that: “a few things will never change” and showing a mother asking a grown up son not to forget his little coat. That reminded them that quite a few times they had heard from customers in the industry expressions like: “I would like to have something like this system, for my wife and the baby because she’s always so upset about the possibility that the child might not have been kept warm.”

Then, they  thought “why not!” Although they are not focused on business to consumer products, nobody could do it better.



Project people

Hugo Morais – Electronics Engineer and Aptinov co-founder. Firmware programming and testing. He loves working on a project that can actually help people.


Francisco Rodrigues - Software Developer and Aptinov co-founder. He loves being part of a project that is going to make happier, already happy mothers.


Gilberto Nunes - Industrial Designer. He works hard to make it work.



FAQs

Why crowdfunding

·  A market test before mass production

·  The results of the crowdfunding campaign will be used to size mass production

·  We count on you to let people know that this option exists already


How does theWabbee communicate with the application installed on my phone?

Communication is done through Bluetooth Low Energy Protocol. To receive the data stored in the Wabbee, just click on your Bluetooth activation button, and all the information stored in the Wabbee automatically downloads to your smartphone or tablet.


Is Wabbee’s wireless transmission harmful to my baby?

The Wabbee communicates through Bluetooth Low Energy protocol. The output power is at least 1,000 times weaker than a typical cell phone. In any case, the transmission mode can be activated only after removing the Wabbee from baby clothing. Just press the corresponding button to enable /disable Bluetooth.


Is Wabbee really sturdy?

The Wabbee is designed to resist to all common types of accidents: falls, poured over porridge, etc. The device is very sturdy and airtight. The Wabbee is made to withstand the everyday demands of your baby.


Can my baby swallow the Wabbee?

The Wabbee’ssize prevents a child up to 2 years of age from swallowing it. We are improving the Wabbee attachment to prevent your baby from being able to remove it, under any circumstances. The Wabbee will comply with applicable children’s product safety rules, and will have a Children´s Product Certificate.


How can I be sure that my baby is wearing the clothing that the Wabbee is attached to, and not an outfit kept in the closet?

You will be notified in case the clothing with the Wabbee is not put on your child. Wabbee records temperature on both sides. One side will be close to the body temperature when the clothing is on your baby. This information is handled automatically.


Can I choose the color of my Wabbee?

We have various colors available: blue, orange, yellow, green, white and pink. When you place your order, just let us know the color you prefer.


Can I install the application on any mobile phone?

Our application can run on any mobile phone or tablet, with Android, iOS or Windows Phone. Installation is very easy and user-friendly.


How is Wabbee powered?

The wabbee is powered by a rechargeable battery. Along with Wabbee, we provide a charger that can be connected to 110V or 230V. The Wabbee charges by just connecting it to our charger.


And if there is a problem?

We are here to help, and we want you to be satisfied with our product. The Wabbee is made to be simple and robust. If you still have a problem, our support team is available to solve it.

story:
Becky's BrainBook

Hi there, I'm Becky. When I was younger I had a brain haemorrhage that affected my physical and cognitive abilities. Sometimes these problems frustrated and upset me. It has taken me years to work out ways of coping with these difficulties. I decided to train as a Clinical Psychologist so that I could use my knowledge and experience to help others in a similar situation. Along the way I met Sara, who has a passion for technology. Together, we have a vision. This vision is to enable people who have experienced a head injury to access support, in their own time, with their own technology, wherever they are in the world.

Would you like to help us?

We would like to raise funds to develop a smartphone app that will provide education, coping strategies and support for those who have experienced a stroke, concussion or brain injury.

It is important to us that this technology is effective at improving people's quality of life. We need to develop and test a prototype with people who have lived experience. The money we raise will enable us to do this.

We would like to offer you the opportunity to be involved in the primary testing of this app. We would be delighted to send you the first version for your feedback. Please contact us if you are interested at beckybrainbook@gmail.com.

story:
Double Impact Protein: World's first protein shake to fight hunger  

The purest whey protein, completely clean, non-GMO and produced in Europe. Each Double Impact Protein shake will give you 23 grams of protein, 5 grams BCAA and, 3.9 grams Glutamine in one delicious shake!

And here is what makes it really unique: by choosing Double Impact Protein you help a malnourished kid to get his / her nutrition too! For every Double Impact Protein shake sold we will feed a hungry child for 2 full days!

Share the power of nutrition! 

Great nutrition gives us energy and strength. This positively impacts our relations, performance at work and overall happiness in life. 

But while we are looking to improve our quality of life, there are almost 800 million undernourished people in the world today. And every year 3.1 million children die because of hunger. This needs to change.

And now you can contribute! Share the power of nutrition by choosing Double Impact Protein. For every Double Impact Protein shake sold we will feed a hungry child for 2 full days! 

We are extremely proud to present Shelter Now as our key partner for providing the meals to children in need. Shelter Now provides there where it is needed the most and has over 30 years expertise in doing this effectively.


Great quality, taste and texture  

Double Impact Protein is available in 3 great flavors, has an exceptionally smooth texture and a complete amino acid profile. The Double Impact Protein is your ideal buddy to add lean muscle mass and recover after your workout.

BPA–Free Shaker included 

Say 'goodbye' to lumpy protein shakes and 'hello' to smooth, great-tasting drinks. We will include the patented mixing system created by BlenderBottle® in every pack.  

Available in 3 delicious flavors  

Get ready to enjoy 3 great flavors of the Double Impact Protein shake: 

  • Enjoy the pure taste of vanilla. Take your experience to the next level. 
  • Get ready to make your guilt-free chocolate protein shake! 
  • Strawberries taste like summer. So does this strawberry protein shake

Double Impact Protein: all benefits

One jar Double Impact Protein  

  • 750 gram of the purest whey protein 
  • 25 Delicious protein shakes 
  • 100% GMO Free 
  • Produced in Europe in an ISO 22000 premises
  • Double your impact! 1 jar = 2 full days of nutrient rich food for a hungry child. 

One shake Double Impact Protein 

  • 23 grams of pure whey protein 
  • 5 grams BCAA 
  • 3.9 grams Glutamine 
  • Available in three delicious flavors!

How can I join?

Choose your perk now and share this project with your gym buddies and start sharing the power of nutrition! This is just one click away! Indiegogo has some great social sharing tools and we appreciate you using them.



We are ready to go!

  1. The formula has been finalized and approved according to all EU food standards. 
  2. The flavors have been tested and marked as "super delicious" by our focus groups. 
  3. The timelines of the production process have been approved by our key manufacturer. We get that food needs to be produced safe. Production will be done in ISO 22000 certified premises. 
  4. We won't delay shipping! Unless something happens completely out of our control (earthquakes, war, zombies coming to earth), all packages will go out before the end of the year! 
  5. We know our limits and are aware which areas we are experts in and which not. Therefore, we partnered with an organization with expertise and integrity to provide the meals to the hungry children we are so compassionate about. Shelter Now is our official partner of the project to ensure that the meals are provided there where it is needed the most. Their mission is "Rebuilding Lives – Restoring Hope". Shelter Now has over 30 years of experience in providing humanitarian assistance in the Middle East and Central Asia.


Thank you for your support!  

We can't say it enough. We can't wait to get the Double Impact Protein shakes in your hands.

story:
Research tells us that women looking for short term relationships tend to be attracted to men with 'stubble', or the 'ever hip' "5 0'clock shadow", and women looking for more committed relationships (ie; the guy that you'd happily take home for the 'fam' to meet) are attracted to men with heavier stubble or full beards. 

In other words, Chicks Dig Beards ;)

But what woman wants to get near a beard that's unkept, and makes her feel like she's chillin' with a hobo? 

No one is attracted to a crusty, unruly beard, so we've vowed to rid the planet of what we like to call "Hobo Beard". 

Debbie created a beard conditioner that is not only organic, but one that utilizes a convenient, no-mess container that doesn't require men getting their hands slathered in messy balm to apply it. 

She created "The No Mess Beard Balm" and the "Chick Magnet" Beard Softening Oil, gave them to her male friends with facial hair, and to her girlfriends for their boyfriends with beards, and the response was unanimous; they loved them! When she started selling them on her website, she really had no big expectations, but her bearded customers (and their significant others) were hooked!

Why Chicks Dig Beards?

Chicks Dig Beards products;

✓ Are free of parabens, and phthalates

✓ Effectively condition the beard, and moisturize underlying skin

✓ Don't cause irritation. Perfect for even the most sensitive skin

✓ Contains skin softening organic ingredients

✓ Comes in convenient 'no mess' containers

✓ Fresh scent that doesn't make him smell like a lumberjack or a dentist's office

Use of Funds

Since launching Chicks Dig Beards, the money from every sale made has gone towards making more beard products. With no formal advertising, I've relied solely on word of mouth and organic marketing. 

At the moment, I'm making all of the product myself, and I love the product creation process, so doing it actually doesn't bother me. But with growth comes the need to make our products in larger quantities, which means contracting with a local manufacturer. But the manufacturer has a minimum order of 5,000 units. I'm confident that I can easily sell  5,000 units of Chicks Dig Beards products, but funding is needed to fill the gap.

I decided to do this crowdfunding to prove just how passionate people can get about a healthy, sexy beard that looks good and smells great!

Funds raised will be used as follows;

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any help that you can offer in the way of getting the word out about this campaign. Please use the Indiegogo share buttons to share this campaign with your friends and family to help!

Your support is genuinely appreciated :)

Peace :)

Debbie

*Please note, orders will BEGIN to ship AFTER the campaign has ended, and by early November, 2017. We will keep contributors updated on the status of all shipments.

NO MORE CRUSTY BEARD!!
story_txt:
Research tells us that women looking for short term relationships tend to be attracted to men with 'stubble', or the 'ever hip' "5 0'clock shadow", and women looking for more committed relationships (ie; the guy that you'd happily take home for the 'fam' to meet) are attracted to men with heavier stubble or full beards. 
In other words, Chicks Dig Beards ;)
But what woman wants to get near a beard that's unkept, and makes her feel like she's chillin' with a hobo? 
No one is attracted to a crusty, unruly beard, so we've vowed to rid the planet of what we like to call "Hobo Beard". 
Debbie created a beard conditioner that is not only organic, but one that utilizes a convenient, no-mess container that doesn't require men getting their hands slathered in messy balm to apply it. 
She created "The No Mess Beard Balm" and the "Chick Magnet" Beard Softening Oil, gave them to her male friends with facial hair, and to her girlfriends for their boyfriends with beards, and the response was unanimous; they loved them! When she started selling them on her website, she really had no big expectations, but her bearded customers (and their significant others) were hooked!
Why Chicks Dig Beards?

Chicks Dig Beards products;
✓ Are free of parabens, and phthalates
✓ Effectively condition the beard, and moisturize underlying skin
✓ Don't cause irritation. Perfect for even the most sensitive skin
✓ Contains skin softening organic ingredients
✓ Comes in convenient 'no mess' containers
✓ Fresh scent that doesn't make him smell like a lumberjack or a dentist's office
Use of Funds
Since launching Chicks Dig Beards, the money from every sale made has gone towards making more beard products. With no formal advertising, I've relied solely on word of mouth and organic marketing. At the moment, I'm making all of the product myself, and I love the product creation process, so doing it actually doesn't bother me. But with growth comes the need to make our products in larger quantities, which means contracting with a local manufacturer. But the manufacturer has a minimum order of 5,000 units. I'm confident that I can easily sell  5,000 units of Chicks Dig Beards products, but funding is needed to fill the gap.I decided to do this crowdfunding to prove just how passionate people can get about a healthy, sexy beard that looks good and smells great!
Funds raised will be used as follows;


Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate any help that you can offer in the way of getting the word out about this campaign. Please use the Indiegogo share buttons to share this campaign with your friends and family to help!
Your support is genuinely appreciated :)
Peace :)Debbie*Please note, orders will BEGIN to ship AFTER the campaign has ended, and by early November, 2017. We will keep contributors updated on the status of all shipments.NO MORE CRUSTY BEARD!!

story:
Have you ever found yourself in a new city, wanting to go for a run but no idea where to go? Maybe you just want to try a new route but don't know where to go or you are worried about getting lost on the way?... RunNav is the app for you! 

 

We are developing an app (initially) for iOS and Apple Watch that will allow you to easily create running routes wherever you are and run without fear of getting lost. Just tell the app how far you want to go and it will automatically create your route! Hit start and you will get turn guidance through your headphones, via vibration or on your watch. 

In addition to all the features you would expect from a running app we are adding the following:

  • Manually/automatically generate running routes near you 
  • Share routes with friends
  • Find/run routes near you
  • Get turn guidance for your run through your headphones / watch (via vibration & display)
  • Load the route to your Apple Watch 2 and run without needing your phone
  • An app for Android users after release of iOS.

In conjunction with the website:

  • Support for running clubs - share upcoming or previously run routes, push notifications to club members reminding them about upcoming runs
  • Support for personal trainers - push workouts to your clients
  • Event support - organisers can create and host events through us/runners can signup, pay for and compete in events via our app.
  • Create routes online/download .gpx files and upload them to your profile for use with the app.

Contribute to our Indiegogo campaign and support the development of this app today!

 

I spend a lot of time traveling and am always looking for running routes in new cities around the world. I already use many of the free to use planning applications to view potential routes but invariable I end up getting lost and having to resort to google maps to direct me back!  
Many running apps record the routes you run and are able to show where other runners have been recently but, as yet, there is no facility for automatic route creation with turn guidance when running a new route.


We are creating a running app like no other. Incorporating all the features you have come to expect, it will also include the ability to create a route to your specifications and then provide on the go turn guidance by either using voice commands or vibrations. Whether you want to find new routes near you or stretch your legs in a new city, our app is perfect for you!
We will begin with the basic running app, route creation and turn guidance for iPhone. Apple Watch and Android support will follow shortly after. We have some exciting ideas to support running clubs and personal trainers through the app as support grows. We are dedicated to making our app the only running app you will need to use.

We have a team of programmers working on making this app a reality. Once the basic functionality of the app with turn guidance and route planning has been released we will begin work integrating Apple Watch support and then full android support.

We have a long way to go to get this up and running but with your support we believe we can deliver an app that combines the best features from those already on the market with some exciting new features that we hope will excite you as much as us.

 

I have been in the Armed Forces for over 15 years and running is a big part of military life however my passion, until more recently, was always cycling. Modern bike computers offer turn by turn navigation and route creation technology making exploring new areas easy but nothing like that exists for runners.

 

I have tried using existing route planning software, printed maps, google maps and other aids to navigation but regularly find myself being temporarily unsure of my location when out for a run around a new city! I decided something should be done to bring turn by turn navigation to runners so that they can concentrate on the sights of the new city and not trying to find their way back to the hotel!

 

The wireframing has begun - we now need your support to really get the development off the ground!

story:
ABOUT US:

We are a group of people who keep looking for opportunities to help people around the world in living a better and healthier life. We create products so that all may benefit from them and be happier.

WHY DO PEOPLE NEED THIS ?

We all age and the first signs appear on our face/neck in the way of wrinkles, lines and sagging. No one likes to get old and many spend thousands of dollars on useless beauty products.LED photon and Micro current therapy are what liberates people from the woes. We have combined LED photon therapy and Micro current therapy in our LED PHOTON FACE  & NECK MASKS so that you don't need to go to those expensive spas anymore. The technology to help with this is not new but needs an easy to use product that can be used at home and does not cost an arm and a leg. Salons use this treatment method but most can't afford the high cost. We want to empower everyone to take care of their skin and look beautiful and feel beautiful inside.

WHAT THIS MEANS FOR YOU

Imagine the smiles on the faces and joy inside the hearts of people when they can get rid of their acne, wrinkles, fine lines, sagging skin and feel fresh and young again as this boosts the collagen levels. We all know the confidence we get from looking beautiful. A flawless skin is what we all want. With MAGIC SKIN FACE MASK this will become a reality. This is where you come in. You can make a difference and make anti aging a reality. You can’t even count or imagine the magnitude of the blessings of those who benefit from the MAGIC SKIN FACE MASK.

Your contribution will make this project come alive and together we can cure millions of people who suffer from some form of skin problem and depression as a result of this. We can do this together and spread love through the world. What better gift or higher act of kindness than to make someone feel confident and beautiful.

WHY WILL THIS BE A SUCCESS?

Thankfully the technology exists and it is just a matter of creating the right product and keeping the production costs low so that everyone can afford to benefit from this creation.

So let us do this together and make it a reality !

story:
GLOBAL MEDICAL TOURISM

According to the WHO, VISA report and Medical Tourism Association: More and more individuals are expected to travel outside their home country to seek medical treatment, 11 million medical tourists traveling annually for procedures and medications that are either not approved or not affordable in their home country.

REASONS OF MEDICAL TOURISM

PROBLEM IN MEDICAL TOURISM

Currently, When someone participate in medical tourism services often depends on the referral of medical travel agency to know a bout destination hospitals. There are many unresolved issues to help people when participate in global medical tourism.

SOLUTION OF

Hospitalsbox is a project built according to the mission and desire of our team to help people reduce medical fee and save more lives. In our country Vietnam and many other countries in the world in general, many people have given up treatment (even though they still have the opportunity to continue to live) just because they do not have enough money to participate in treatment in their home country and they do not have enough information to search for a hospital in another country.

Not only that, thousands of chronic diseases such as osteoarthritis, insomnia, hepatitis ... have made millions people more and more dependent on drugs and reduced quality of life. Meanwhile, these diseases can still be cured if treat combination with oriental medicine and western medicine.

We want to create a platform that connects hospitals across the globe, making it easy for people to find and compare the health care packages they need at a lower cost but still ensure quality and Medical ethics requirements.

On Hospitalsbox, people can:

  1. Buy medical tourism full package
  2. Blood donation
  3. Global SOS connect
  4. Travel explore new lands
  5. Insurances support

In Medical tourism we help patients consulted online with destination hospital before deciding on a medical treatment, supporting visa procedures, book hotels and more importantly, we help connect hospitals in their hometown to conveniently take care of patients after they return home. Hospitals cooperation with us is mostly meet JCI (Joint Commission International) standards in global.

We also help people participate in the global blood donation project, make it easier for people to find blood donors in the nearest area especially to support rare blood groups (RH-)... We want to help save more lives, give more people the opportunity to live.

You can view our web platform here: https://hospitalsbox.com/

Currently https://hospitalsbox.com/ has integrated with hospitals in Vietnam and you can view information in 60 languages with google translate. 

Every one is allowed to register for a free account at Hospitalsbox. In this account, User not only can connect directly to the destination hospital service system when participating in medical tourism, they can also look up and manage: Legal, Insurance.

Our platform is completely free for users and hospitals. Therefore we will help reduce intermediate medical costs and help a lot of people have the opportunity to treat the disease and to save more lives.

We expect people around the global can order medical travel packages in Vietnam on March 2020. In Thailand on 08/2020 and Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, India .. on 12/2020.

MEDICAL TOURISM FULL PACKAGES

On Hospitalsbox people will easily search for medical travel packages including:

*** Not only that, we also provide treatment packages combining traditional medicine and western medicine for chronic diseases:

YOUR IMPACT

By contributing to us as this Perk below you will join with us in performing a common mission is helping many people.

Your sponsorship will help us get more funding to invest in technology and quick develop projects globally. You will be very proud because the project is completely free access for everyone and partners are hospitals, we will minimize intermediate costs in the medical field. We want to make easier for people around the global to find good medical services at lower cost if unfortunately faced the diseases.

CORE TEAM

Our team have a lot of years of experience in technology, health care and insurance. We are people with common goals and passion. We always try our best to build the technological foundation to help the people in our country is Vietnam and many people have demand for medical services in the world at the lowest cost or free.

WHY VIETNAM?

Vietnam is the first country that you and everyone in need of global medical tourism can order online health packages from March 2020.

Then we will expand other countries like Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, India ... by the end of 2020.

We choose Vietnam as the first destination of the project because Vietnam was the country where I was born, I and my team spent many years researching the market as well as having enough legal and insurance facilities to protect the rights of medical tourism participants and understand the quality of medicine in hospitals in Vietnam.

You can watching a clip review of travelers' dental services in Vietnam.

 

Besides, Vietnam Nature is also famous for many beautiful scenes recognized by Unesco. And in the scenes below do you recognize which place is in the movie “Kong: Skull Island”

A clip of tourists introduced Vietnam

 

And more interesting! Vietnam is a very safe country for international travelers. Many heads of state have come and had extremely interesting experiences in my country.

 
Come to Vietnam, we always welcome you!
 
If you want to enjoy the delicious foods that heads of state have ever eaten. Come to Vietnam!
 
Your sponsorship will help us get more funding to invest in technology and quickly develop projects globally. You will be very proud because the project is completely free access for everyone and partners are hospitals, we will minimize intermediate costs in the medical field. We want to make it easier for people around the global to find good medical services at lower prices to treat if unfortunately faced the diseases.
 
Please share this with your friends and family to help bring the word around.  Thanks you very much.

story:
The Need

The Covid 19 pandemic has spread almost world over and will touch the lives in some way of almost everyone on our planet. Its spread has brought emergency and medical services to their knees on a worldwide basis. Certainly, the biggest problem facing them is the supply of ventilators but second to that is the global shortage of respiratory masks or Filtering Facepiece Respirators ( FFRs )

This is a global problem. You don’t have to search very far to find the horror stories of these personnel going from multiple masks per day, to using the same mask for extended periods during this ongoing pandemic! To combat this pandemic, to fight for our future, to treat the infected, these individuals are putting their lives on the line over their inability to get a sterile mask. This problem is not going to last 2 weeks but is projected to be an ongoing problem for the next 6 months!

The Technology, It's Part of the CDC's guidance for FFR Decon.

UV Sterilization is not new, it has been used in water and air purification systems for years. More recently significant advances have seen whole room sterilization being done in hospitals with UV robots. China is now even using it to sterilize whole public transportation buses!

Most of us are familiar with UV lights, we have seen them in clubs and know we get that tan from the Suns UV light. But it is UV-C, a very specialized and also the most dangerous UV light, that has been shown to kill 99.9% of germs, virus and pathogen. While NO data has yet been attained to prove its effectiveness against covid-19 it has been demonstrated to be effective against the SARS-CoV virus culture.

The CDC has  issued its guidance for "Decontamination and Reuse of Filtering Facepiece Respirators". This guidance outlines three principal techniques for FFR decontamination including UVGI! SaniBoXX exceeds the CDC recommendation of 1J/cm2 dosing of UVC on all surfaces of the FFR. For further info on the CDC guidance please click the link below!

CDC Recommendations for FFR Decontamination

UVGI Sterilization of an entire bus

The Solution

A group of engineers, technicians, researchers, friends and sponsoring corporations, have come together and in record time designed, developed and tested the SaniBoXX UV-C Personal Sanitizer Unit. Currently the only UV-C Personal Sanitizer, designed to sanitize respirator masks, FFRs, as well as your other personal items! We have done this in the hope that it will help First Responders, medical personnel and people in the emergency categories fight this pandemic with improved safety for them and their families!

Overview

SaniBoXX is a 15W, 5 lamp, UV mask sanitizer, developed to place the UV-C Germicidal lamps to provide optimum direct coverage of up to 2 FFRs at a time. The unit doses the masks with 254nM UV light that has been proven to inactivate 99.9% of all viruses.

Portable, 12V Personal Device

The unit is fully portable and uses a 12V wall outlet certified and suitable for use on a worldwide basis. To avoid delays in manufacture the unit has been designed to use off the shelf components to avoid delays due to having to produce tooling for production. 

Simple and Safe to Use

The plastic chamber is impervious to UV light, a lid safety interlock is provided to ensure the UV lights cannot be operated without the lid closed. A main power switch and a cycle start button are also incorporated. Once started the SaniBoXX will run its own 30 min cycle.

 

Design and 3D Modeling

Our engineers and designers have designed the SaniBoXX from the ground up using available components. 3D Modeling and simulation was used to determine the best placement for the UV-C lamps. The circuitry was designed using 12V low voltage components for safety.

Multi Use UV-C Sanitizer

SaniBoXX certainly was designed to allow FFR Decontamination. However, It also can be used for a whole range of your personal products, cell phones, jewelry and personal hygiene products and even more! It's portable design makes it easy to take wherever you need it!

Made In AMERICA!

SaniBoXX is a new product! Designed, developed and manufactured right here in Houston, Texas! We are proud to be able to offer a US made product to help America. The case for example is made by Igloo 5 miles from our plant in Katy, Texas!

The Team and our Story!

You are probably wondering who we are and why we have built SaniBoXX! Our company is DAMZ Inc.. DBA, RUSH Auto Works (RAW). We have been in business for 5 years in Houston and we are actually a small specialty race car manufacturer. We designed, from scratch, the RUSH SR-1 race car and we are currently in production of that car.

Personally, I am the president of RAW and also serve as the Technical Director for a Houston based Oil and Gas service company. I am a mechanical engineer with over 40 years experience in product design, development and manufacture. I also have over 30 issued patents and have won awards for technology initiatives. Our team is a small, however, we had outside assistance and contributors to the design of SaniBoXX!

As an engineer, when we started to see the effects of this pandemic and its affect on the medical industry and our medical personnel, we started to have some rather extreme emotions. It may be easy to say that these people chose their career path and dedication and its their job to deal with this! Yeh!

Well as an engineer… it is also our job to make sure that they have tools, technology and equipment to do that job. We as engineers are part of that supply chain. There is NO question that that supply chain failed. We have let them down!

Those emotions I mentioned, shame, helplessness, grief even anger they start to play on your mind. At that point you can either find somewhere to hide and feel sorry for yourself our get off your ass and try do something… Anything to help.

There were several groups around designing actuators for BVM’s to address the ventilator shortage. GM and FORD were asked then ordered by the POTUS to start building ventilators, with government backing I will add! So here we had the two largest automakers in our nation stepping in to do something! We, on the other hand, are perhaps the smallest automaker in the nation. No one was going to ask or order us to do anything and we certainly weren’t going to get funded to do it! But we knew we had to try… we had to do something… Anything to help!

Beyond the shortage of ventilators to treat patients the largest problem our medical providers are facing is a shortage of PPE. Their FFRs in particular are in great shortage. They are designed to be disposable and they are supposed to discard them after any contact where they may have been contaminated. Typically, these personnel are provided with multiple masks, some six or more per shift. Today many are getting 1 per week, if they are lucky! The costs of FFRs have gone from $0.41 to in some cases hospitals paying over $10 each. This is not a problem that is going to be solved in 2 weeks some are forecasting shortages for over 6 months!

This is our story!

This is why we started to design and produce the SaniBoXX. We want to help. We hope that we can help our medical personnel stay safe so they can save lives! We are trying to do something…Anything to help!

If we had backing like GM and Ford or had the personal wealth, we would build 10s of thousands and get them to anyone that needed them. We don’t, we have to sell them or raise funds to get them built. We are not making a profit we are selling them at or close to our cost!

We are offering our engineering files and supplier list, for free, to any organization that wants to build them too, so that more can be made and get to people who need them!

The SaniBoXX is not a singular solution, it hopefully will be one of many. It is a personal device and a personal choice weather to use it or not. There are other alternatives, Heat treatment being one that certainly may be a strong viable option. The CDC guidance and N95Decon.org have both published documents detailing the effectiveness of these techniques! 

We have heard a lot of other suggestions. Some are ridiculous and obviously will NOT work. Please read the CDC and N95Decon.org documents for full information on FFR Decon!



Visit RUSH Auto Works to learn more about us!

 

LINKS

Decontamination and Reuse of Filtering Facepiece Respirators-CDC

N95DECON.org study of N95 filtering facepiece respirator decontamination

Decontamination Methods for 3M N95 Respirators

DAMZ Inc Press Release On SaniBoXX

Risks and challenges

We have tried to eliminate as many risks as we can in this project. There are only 2, small components that we have to manufacture and are easily made with a CNC router. We have our own 5 axis CNC router and have access to many others through third party supply. All other components have been sourced from reputable suppliers that have current stock. Some of these are coming from overseas so there is risk involved of supply delays due to shipping delays that could be caused by interruptions due to the Covid 19 pandemic. We have mitigated manufacturing scaling risks in this development should it receive extreme orders.
story_txt:
The Need
The Covid 19 pandemic has spread almost world over and will touch the lives in some way of almost everyone on our planet. Its spread has brought emergency and medical services to their knees on a worldwide basis. Certainly, the biggest problem facing them is the supply of ventilators but second to that is the global shortage of respiratory masks or Filtering Facepiece Respirators ( FFRs )
This is a global problem. You don’t have to search very far to find the horror stories of these personnel going from multiple masks per day, to using the same mask for extended periods during this ongoing pandemic! To combat this pandemic, to fight for our future, to treat the infected, these individuals are putting their lives on the line over their inability to get a sterile mask. This problem is not going to last 2 weeks but is projected to be an ongoing problem for the next 6 months!

The Technology, It's Part of the CDC's guidance for FFR Decon.
UV Sterilization is not new, it has been used in water and air purification systems for years. More recently significant advances have seen whole room sterilization being done in hospitals with UV robots. China is now even using it to sterilize whole public transportation buses!Most of us are familiar with UV lights, we have seen them in clubs and know we get that tan from the Suns UV light. But it is UV-C, a very specialized and also the most dangerous UV light, that has been shown to kill 99.9% of germs, virus and pathogen. While NO data has yet been attained to prove its effectiveness against covid-19 it has been demonstrated to be effective against the SARS-CoV virus culture.The CDC has  issued its guidance for "Decontamination and Reuse of Filtering Facepiece Respirators". This guidance outlines three principal techniques for FFR decontamination including UVGI! SaniBoXX exceeds the CDC recommendation of 1J/cm2 dosing of UVC on all surfaces of the FFR. For further info on the CDC guidance please click the link below!
CDC Recommendations for FFR Decontamination
UVGI Sterilization of an entire bus
The Solution
A group of engineers, technicians, researchers, friends and sponsoring corporations, have come together and in record time designed, developed and tested the SaniBoXX UV-C Personal Sanitizer Unit. Currently the only UV-C Personal Sanitizer, designed to sanitize respirator masks, FFRs, as well as your other personal items! We have done this in the hope that it will help First Responders, medical personnel and people in the emergency categories fight this pandemic with improved safety for them and their families!

Overview
SaniBoXX is a 15W, 5 lamp, UV mask sanitizer, developed to place the UV-C Germicidal lamps to provide optimum direct coverage of up to 2 FFRs at a time. The unit doses the masks with 254nM UV light that has been proven to inactivate 99.9% of all viruses.

Portable, 12V Personal Device
The unit is fully portable and uses a 12V wall outlet certified and suitable for use on a worldwide basis. To avoid delays in manufacture the unit has been designed to use off the shelf components to avoid delays due to having to produce tooling for production. 

Simple and Safe to Use
The plastic chamber is impervious to UV light, a lid safety interlock is provided to ensure the UV lights cannot be operated without the lid closed. A main power switch and a cycle start button are also incorporated. Once started the SaniBoXX will run its own 30 min cycle.
 

Design and 3D Modeling
Our engineers and designers have designed the SaniBoXX from the ground up using available components. 3D Modeling and simulation was used to determine the best placement for the UV-C lamps. The circuitry was designed using 12V low voltage components for safety.

Multi Use UV-C Sanitizer
SaniBoXX certainly was designed to allow FFR Decontamination. However, It also can be used for a whole range of your personal products, cell phones, jewelry and personal hygiene products and even more! It's portable design makes it easy to take wherever you need it!

Made In AMERICA!
SaniBoXX is a new product! Designed, developed and manufactured right here in Houston, Texas! We are proud to be able to offer a US made product to help America. The case for example is made by Igloo 5 miles from our plant in Katy, Texas!
The Team and our Story!
You are probably wondering who we are and why we have built SaniBoXX! Our company is DAMZ Inc.. DBA, RUSH Auto Works (RAW). We have been in business for 5 years in Houston and we are actually a small specialty race car manufacturer. We designed, from scratch, the RUSH SR-1 race car and we are currently in production of that car.Personally, I am the president of RAW and also serve as the Technical Director for a Houston based Oil and Gas service company. I am a mechanical engineer with over 40 years experience in product design, development and manufacture. I also have over 30 issued patents and have won awards for technology initiatives. Our team is a small, however, we had outside assistance and contributors to the design of SaniBoXX!

As an engineer, when we started to see the effects of this pandemic and its affect on the medical industry and our medical personnel, we started to have some rather extreme emotions. It may be easy to say that these people chose their career path and dedication and its their job to deal with this! Yeh!Well as an engineer… it is also our job to make sure that they have tools, technology and equipment to do that job. We as engineers are part of that supply chain. There is NO question that that supply chain failed. We have let them down!Those emotions I mentioned, shame, helplessness, grief even anger they start to play on your mind. At that point you can either find somewhere to hide and feel sorry for yourself our get off your ass and try do something… Anything to help.
There were several groups around designing actuators for BVM’s to address the ventilator shortage. GM and FORD were asked then ordered by the POTUS to start building ventilators, with government backing I will add! So here we had the two largest automakers in our nation stepping in to do something! We, on the other hand, are perhaps the smallest automaker in the nation. No one was going to ask or order us to do anything and we certainly weren’t going to get funded to do it! But we knew we had to try… we had to do something… Anything to help!Beyond the shortage of ventilators to treat patients the largest problem our medical providers are facing is a shortage of PPE. Their FFRs in particular are in great shortage. They are designed to be disposable and they are supposed to discard them after any contact where they may have been contaminated. Typically, these personnel are provided with multiple masks, some six or more per shift. Today many are getting 1 per week, if they are lucky! The costs of FFRs have gone from $0.41 to in some cases hospitals paying over $10 each. This is not a problem that is going to be solved in 2 weeks some are forecasting shortages for over 6 months!

This is our story!
This is why we started to design and produce the SaniBoXX. We want to help. We hope that we can help our medical personnel stay safe so they can save lives! We are trying to do something…Anything to help!If we had backing like GM and Ford or had the personal wealth, we would build 10s of thousands and get them to anyone that needed them. We don’t, we have to sell them or raise funds to get them built. We are not making a profit we are selling them at or close to our cost!We are offering our engineering files and supplier list, for free, to any organization that wants to build them too, so that more can be made and get to people who need them!The SaniBoXX is not a singular solution, it hopefully will be one of many. It is a personal device and a personal choice weather to use it or not. There are other alternatives, Heat treatment being one that certainly may be a strong viable option. The CDC guidance and N95Decon.org have both published documents detailing the effectiveness of these techniques! 
We have heard a lot of other suggestions. Some are ridiculous and obviously will NOT work. Please read the CDC and N95Decon.org documents for full information on FFR Decon!
Visit RUSH Auto Works to learn more about us!
 
LINKS

Decontamination and Reuse of Filtering Facepiece Respirators-CDC

N95DECON.org study of N95 filtering facepiece respirator decontamination

Decontamination Methods for 3M N95 Respirators
DAMZ Inc Press Release On SaniBoXX
Risks and challenges
We have tried to eliminate as many risks as we can in this project. There are only 2, small components that we have to manufacture and are easily made with a CNC router. We have our own 5 axis CNC router and have access to many others through third party supply. All other components have been sourced from reputable suppliers that have current stock. Some of these are coming from overseas so there is risk involved of supply delays due to shipping delays that could be caused by interruptions due to the Covid 19 pandemic. We have mitigated manufacturing scaling risks in this development should it receive extreme orders.

story:
The Mask Reborn Box

We created a box that renews protective masks and respirators. To help everyone with the PPE (personal protective equipment) shortage, we designed our box to be low-maintenance, affordable, and fool-proof. With this kit, you can join the fight against the pandemic by sanitizing masks.

Our device uses an effective, proven, and tested four-step process to clean, dry, sanitize, and most importantly, re-apply a static charge to an otherwise disposable mask. Here is the process:

  • First, we wash the mask in hot water at 60º Celsius for 30 minutes. This step is only used when the mask is visibly dirty or difficult to breathe through as it tends to shorten the life of the mask.
  • Next, we dry it with hot air at 60º for 30 minutes to sanitize it.
  • Meanwhile (or separately), we expose the mask to UVC light which further sanitizes the mask killing 99% of bacteria and viruses like COVID-19. This is done either at the same time or as a separate 30-minute process depending on the model.
  • Finally, we apply electricity to renew the static charge.

We designed our device to be easily assembled or disassembled. When it is not in use, it can be folded down for easy storage and packaging. We will offer a version of the kit where you can build your own enclosure allowing you to re-use whatever material you have on hand.

Why we built the Mask Reborn Box

The world has suffered a lot from the Coronavirus. We wanted to do our part in helping people with this pandemic (as well as possible future pandemics).

Since there is so much unknown about this novel virus, people are understandably fearful. With so much uncertainty, getting as many protective masks as you can is actually a very rational thing to do! But what is good for the individual is not always good for society. While hoarding is understandable, given everyone's fears, it has caused a global shortage of masks that medical professionals and others require.  The WHO and other organizations recommend only wearing masks sparingly, even though the world would be safer if everyone were to wear a proper mask.

To compound the problem, people with fewer resources are finding it harder to get proper protection. But viruses don't care about your race or social status. Neither do we. We believe that everyone has the right to protective equipment. We hope to get our box in the hands of as many people as possible.

Environmental Impact

If we were to use disposable masks as they were meant to be used, that would mean using 3.2 billion masks a day. So if you were to use masks properly, you would need to dispose of your old mask and use a new one every 4 hours. This adds up to 3.2 billion new masks every day. That is a lot of landfill!

With our kit, we can cut that number dramatically by reusing these masks instead of them ending up in a landfill, clogging out sewers, or in our oceans.

Another way we show our commitment to the environment is by using PP boards as the shell. The boards can biodegrade in soil or be disposed of by being burnt without releasing any toxic chemicals.

We also plan on using the ENIG technique to manufacture our control boards which minimizes lead pollution. We will also find ROHS certified factories to manufacture the enclosure.

Our Research

There are ways to safely wash and sanitize disposable masks at home, but most people don’t do it properly. And when they do, it removes the essential static charge on the surface of the mask. Although our box will work with any disposable mask, it is especially useful for the N95 mask because of the recharging step.

You have probably heard of the N95 mask. It is one of the most common and effective masks people use to help protect themselves from viruses. It is also very hard to get currently because it is in high demand. It's officially called the N95 FFR. The weird numbers and letters are the classification that the U.S. National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health uses. The FFR stands for Filtering Facepiece Respirator, the N is 'Not oil-resistant' (there is also R and P for oil-Resistant and oil-Proof), the 95 means it filters out at least 95% of airborne particles. It was developed in the 1970s for industrial use but became a healthcare standard in the 1990s when a team lead by Tennessee professor Peter Tsai invented a novel way to embed static electricity into non-woven fabric. It proved to be world-changing virus-blocking technology that is now a global standard (here is a link to how this technology came about).

We researched how these masks work and discovered that the key reason these masks stop working is that the static charge dissipates. We made this video below to give you a simplified explanation of how a static charge helps make masks block particles while maintaining breathability.

 

 

The method we use in the Mask Reborn Box is in accordance with paper "Guidelines of Reusing Masks by Electrostatic Recharging During COVID-19” by Jianfeng Chen of the Beijing University College of Chemical Engineering, and as outlined by a paper by Stanford University researchers entitled “Can N95 respirators be reused after disinfection? And for how many times?.” The process is outlined in this video:

We used professional meters to make sure the static charge was adequate and even surpassed standards outlined in the papers above (you can find videos and more information on our website).

Test Result Video (long):

The video above shows that with our method, we were able to successfully re-apply static charge and restore the filtering of PM0.3 particulate matter to used masks. Results below:
 

 

The Boxes

We are building 2 different versions of the PMRB (Pre-production Mask Reborn Box):

  • Semi-PMRB  - A portable, modular box that can renew 1 mask at a time.
  • PMRB - A large desktop model that can renew up to 6 masks at a time.

 

The Semi-PMRB

The Semi-PMRB

 

This Semi-PMRB is made out of polypropylene (PP) boxes (in the demo video the mock-up uses cardboard and not PP). Since there are 4 modules in this kit, you can potentially have 4 masks being processed in the box at any given time.

This kit has 2 different timer types available; one either an analog or a digital timing mechanism. The analog timer uses a dial allowing you to manually set the timing. The digital model runs for a set amount of time depending on what step you are on. Both kits will automatically stop the various processes when the timer stops.

Why 2 designs? Other than the $5 difference, they both take the same amount of resources to build and assemble. Also, by choosing the model you want, you get to help us with market research!

Semi-PMRB analog timer: 

With the analog timer, you turn a dial to select the amount of time.

 

Semi-PMRB digital timer:

The digital timer offers accurate and preset parameters.
 

The PMRB

The PMRB model has a larger footprint and a greater capacity. It can take 6 masks at a time in the drying, UVC, and recharge stages, but up to 12 masks in the washing stage. It also has a different PCB board and layout for the controls. This one is only available with a digital timer.

The PMRB model

If we reach a stretch goal of $100,000, the PMRB box will have a molded case something like the image below: 

3D rendering of how the finished PMRB model might look

The final product will be made out of molded plastic, but the current model is made out of PP. If we reach our stretch goal, your order can be upgraded to molded plastic. If you are a maker, you can also have the option to build the enclosure yourself. Because of the size of the package, this also saves you a lot on shipping. But don't worry - we'll send you the parts and instructions on how to build the enclosure yourself. You can use polypropylene, cardboard, or whatever material you have on hand that you want to experiment with.

 

The Rewards

We have 3 models on offer:

Electrostatic Recharge module - It turns out that this is the least expensive part of the box! This is just the part of the Semi-PMRB model that applies the static charge to the masks.

 

 

Semi-PMRB - This is the smaller of the two models and has a modular design. It comes in two versions - one with a high-temperature washing module, and one without.

The Semi-PMRB comes with an analog timer, but you can choose the digital timer as an add-on perk. Also, to save costs and to cater to makers, you have to solder the circuit board yourself. We think this is really fun and it is not as hard as you may think. But, as an add on, you can choose to have us solder it for you.

As a bonus, Mitch Altman, a well-known teacher of how-to-solder and a leader of the global maker movement, has offered to help guide you through the process of soldering the circuit board with a live webinar!

 

PRMB - This is an "industrial" model that can refresh more masks at a time.

There are two versions depending on whether you want hot water or not. The advantage of hot water is that hot water offers a little bit of extra sanitization. The advantage of not using hot water is that it still gets sanitized with hot air and UVC light, but there is lower power consumption.

We also are offering makers a DIY version of the kit if you want to make your own enclosure.  this model comes with a DIY handbook on how to build an enclosure for it. An advantage of building your own encloser is that it saves a lot of money on shipping costs.

 

Configurations

Why are we offering different configurations?

We have four main reasons:

  • Since we are assembling them ourselves, having this many options has minimal impact on the assembly process.
  • You can get them faster because we can stage the shipping as parts come in.
  • If you are a maker, you have the option to build it yourself!
  • Your choice of model will help us with market research so we know where to put our resources after the crowdfunding.

    All reward options

    Shipping

    Tier 1 - We estimated it weighs less than 1 KG.

    Tier 2 - We estimated it weighs less than 2 KG.

    Tier 3 - Though it weighs only 5 KG, the oversized package increases the shipping cost dramatically.

     

    Isolation Glove Box

    We are offering and isolation glove box (pictured below) for $30. All models of the Mask Reborn Box fit inside. This allows you to use the box in isolation so you can make extra sure that you don't contaminate masks after you sanitize it. The bag features an air-sealed hole to put the power cord through and two gloves to access inside the box. It folds up so you can put it away when not in use. We will also send you 12 sealable bags so you can seal the sanitized masks inside.

    Isolation glove bag(prototype, and we are still upgrading it better)

    Re-sealable bags

    These are just regular, re-sealable zipper storage bags like the kind Ziploc makes. We will include some that are the right size for a standard mask. We've included some in the kits just to get you started.

    Our timeline

     

     

    Our Team

    Our international team

     

    We are an international team of makers, inventors, and designers brought together to help the world in a time of crisis. We all had different experiences that brought us together.

    Torrey Nommesen is an American living in Xi’an, China. When the early stage of the breakout happened, he left to visit South Africa to wait out what seemed like a flu that only affected Wuhan China. He was planning on traveling for a little while until the disease was under control and he could come back to work in Xi’an. However, his vacation only lasted a few weeks before the pandemic became global and South Africa went on lockdown. He is currently stuck in Cape Town, South Africa until he can get a flight to either China or the United States. He has been a long time friend and colleague of Kalimorv, so when he was asked to become part of the team, he joined without hesitation.

    Kalimov Lok is a Macanese maker who lives in Shanghai. Since his mother has a background in bioengineering, she had the foresight to get him a stock of medical masks before most people knew it would become a problem. He quickly realized that everyone was going to need masks. He calculated that a global pandemic would mean that we need 3.7 billion masks every single day. Later officials calculated that number to be 3.2 billion. At first, he was intent on sitting at home and waiting out the pandemic, but one day he noticed an online merchant taking advantage of the situation by selling masks of questionable quality at exorbitant prices. As an inventor, he decided that he could do something about it. A lot of makers in his community were starting to learn and share knowledge about how masks work. He discovered that most masks had an Achilles' heel in that they would need a static charge to work properly. Since his passion is electronics, he decided that there had to be a way to solve this issue.

    Meanwhile, Jason Leong was trapped with his family in Yichang, Hubei near Wuhan - ground zero of the early stage of the virus. Having heard about Kalimorv's efforts, he realized that he could help. Kalimorv had an electronics lab and Jason had a lot of material knowledge to help select and order supplies. When the Hubei lockdown was over, Jason quickly drove back to his home town of Guangzhou, a thousand kilometers away. There he was able to work in his lab more effectively.

    With the help of a global network of maker communities to help with research, surveys, collecting data, and analysis, we tested different sketches and blueprints. On May 1st, the team participated in the MIT Hackathon Challenge “Africa Takes on COVID-19.”

    Halima Ouatab joined the team from Morocco during the hackathon. She brought her expertise in global market chains. Because of COVID-19, she had to pause her studies, terminate her internship, and stay away from her family. She watched as the situation worsening and her community suffered. Halima was key in extending our perspective to include Africa. She encouraged us to find a solution that takes into account the underprivileged, reasoning that if we can address the needs of developing countries first, then it would be easier to modify our product for a global market.

    During the hackathon, we successfully finalized not one, but 2 different working prototypes. We were able to create a proof of concept for our methods to show that we could successfully restore masks with our box. We have continued to upgrade or design after the challenge making the prototype safer and easier to use. We are now ready for our next challenge: to show the Mask Reborn Box to the world.
