All reward optionsShippingTier 1 - We estimated it weighs less than 1 KG.Tier 2 - We estimated it weighs less than 2 KG.Tier 3 - Though it weighs only 5 KG, the oversized package increases the shipping cost dramatically. Isolation Glove BoxWe are offering and isolation glove box (pictured below) for $30. All models of the Mask Reborn Box fit inside. This allows you to use the box in isolation so you can make extra sure that you don't contaminate masks after you sanitize it. The bag features an air-sealed hole to put the power cord through and two gloves to access inside the box. It folds up so you can put it away when not in use. We will also send you 12 sealable bags so you can seal the sanitized masks inside.Isolation glove bag(prototype, and we are still upgrading it better)Re-sealable bagsThese are just regular, re-sealable zipper storage bags like the kind Ziploc makes. We will include some that are the right size for a standard mask. We've included some in the kits just to get you started.Our timeline  Our TeamOur international team We are an international team of makers, inventors, and designers brought together to help the world in a time of crisis. We all had different experiences that brought us together.Torrey Nommesen is an American living in Xi’an, China. When the early stage of the breakout happened, he left to visit South Africa to wait out what seemed like a flu that only affected Wuhan China. He was planning on traveling for a little while until the disease was under control and he could come back to work in Xi’an. However, his vacation only lasted a few weeks before the pandemic became global and South Africa went on lockdown. He is currently stuck in Cape Town, South Africa until he can get a flight to either China or the United States. He has been a long time friend and colleague of Kalimorv, so when he was asked to become part of the team, he joined without hesitation.Kalimov Lok is a Macanese maker who lives in Shanghai. Since his mother has a background in bioengineering, she had the foresight to get him a stock of medical masks before most people knew it would become a problem. He quickly realized that everyone was going to need masks. He calculated that a global pandemic would mean that we need 3.7 billion masks every single day. Later officials calculated that number to be 3.2 billion. At first, he was intent on sitting at home and waiting out the pandemic, but one day he noticed an online merchant taking advantage of the situation by selling masks of questionable quality at exorbitant prices. As an inventor, he decided that he could do something about it. A lot of makers in his community were starting to learn and share knowledge about how masks work. He discovered that most masks had an Achilles' heel in that they would need a static charge to work properly. Since his passion is electronics, he decided that there had to be a way to solve this issue.Meanwhile, Jason Leong was trapped with his family in Yichang, Hubei near Wuhan - ground zero of the early stage of the virus. Having heard about Kalimorv's efforts, he realized that he could help. Kalimorv had an electronics lab and Jason had a lot of material knowledge to help select and order supplies. When the Hubei lockdown was over, Jason quickly drove back to his home town of Guangzhou, a thousand kilometers away. There he was able to work in his lab more effectively.With the help of a global network of maker communities to help with research, surveys, collecting data, and analysis, we tested different sketches and blueprints. On May 1st, the team participated in the MIT Hackathon Challenge “Africa Takes on COVID-19.”Halima Ouatab joined the team from Morocco during the hackathon. She brought her expertise in global market chains. Because of COVID-19, she had to pause her studies, terminate her internship, and stay away from her family. She watched as the situation worsening and her community suffered. Halima was key in extending our perspective to include Africa. She encouraged us to find a solution that takes into account the underprivileged, reasoning that if we can address the needs of developing countries first, then it would be easier to modify our product for a global market.During the hackathon, we successfully finalized not one, but 2 different working prototypes. We were able to create a proof of concept for our methods to show that we could successfully restore masks with our box. We have continued to upgrade or design after the challenge making the prototype safer and easier to use. We are now ready for our next challenge: to show the Mask Reborn Box to the world.

story:
We all know how much time we spend working out. We also know that the more time we spend being active, the more support our bodies need: like extra calories or more hydration. Vitalete applies identical logic to vitamin and mineral supplementation by offering three different daily formulations, each optimized for the number of hours per week that you dedicate to exercise. We’ve also created a companion night formula tuned to aid recovery and sleep quality - a critical factor regardless of your level of athletic activity.

The research that backs up each ingredient is listed on our site, with links to relevant published studies. And the manufacturing facility we’ve partnered with is NSF-certified, so Vitalete meets the FDA’s cGMP certification for quality and purity. With Vitalete, you can be absolutely certain that what it says on the label is exactly what’s in the product. 

Personally, I’ve been a cyclist and fitness advocate for my entire life. I’m excited about finally bringing an optimized vitamin option to the athletic community. Thank you for your support.

Chris Matthews

Cyclist and Hopeful Founder, Vitalete

________________

"Intriguing. One of the things I've learned (full story to come...) from all this blood work is that maintaining vitamin/mineral balance when you're very active is harder than you think, even when you eat your body weight in fruits and vegetables. I like that this company doesn't include the usual suspects that you see in other supplements for active people (looking at you antioxidants), which can actually hinder performance and recovery, but instead took the time to include what we burn through and need to replace as well as what supports our active lifestyle." 

- Selene Yeager, aka "Fit Chick"

https://www.facebook.com/FitChickSeleneYeager/posts/813295935456389
________________


Vitalete 3hr+    $45 (90-day Supply)  Save $15 now, and if you decide to subscribe, you'll save $5 per month forever!

You're awesome.  Seriously, if you're consistently working out three hours a week, you're already ahead of the curve. We want to help you stay there. Our 3hr+ formulation contains the essentials to support your active lifestyle, including key vitamins and minerals, energizing B vitamins, and sport-specific dosages of calcium, magnesium, and zinc, which are all lost through sweat. Our 3hr+ formulation includes 3,000IU of Vitamin D, which helps aid energy and hormone regulation. We've also included amino acids L-Carnatine and N-Acetyl Cystene, both proven energy boosters, and Garlic Extract to help regulate cholesterol. It's the athletic baseline you need, in the quantities to support your efforts, and all backed by real science. 

Vitalete 6hr+    $90 (90-day Supply)  Save $15 now, and if you decide to subscribe, you'll save $5 per month forever! 

When you work out 6 hours or more each week, people look at you differently. They might not know why, but they see it in your eyes. Determination, focus, drive. You're serious, they know it. Our 6hr+ supplements were built for you—we boosted the levels of key ingredients in our 3hr+ formula, and added a few new ingredients that you'll appreciate. First, we added Beta Alanine, an amino acid that reduces acid build up in muscles, reducing pain during hard efforts. We've also included a pre-methylated version of Folic acid to ensure that folate levels are optimal, regardless of your genetic methylation status. Third, we included Vitamin B6 to aid in cell repair and red blood cell production. For you, this all got serious a long time ago. We're here to keep it that way.

Vitalete 9hr+    $240 (90-day Supply)  Save $30 now, and if you decide to subscribe, you'll save $10 per month forever!

If you're working out 9 hours or more each week, you're in a very elite class of athletes. There's no questioning your dedication, or your effort. We know how much you value those thinner and thinner slices of advantage: the better you get, the harder it gets to improve. You used to talk about shaving minutes, now it's fractions of a second. We've elevated the levels from our 6hr+ formulation and added 2 additional supplements: Nicotinamide Ribosode and Pycnogenol. Both are supported by research to improve athletic performance and endurance, and both are legal for competition. These premium additions make our 9hr+ formulation an exceptionally potent companion to your weekly workout regimen. With 9hr+ you're getting the science-proven essentials in the quantities that match you and your workouts, from a single, certified source.

Vitalete +Night    $45 (90-day Supply)  Save $15 now, and if you decide to subscribe, you'll save $5 per month forever!

Sleep is when your body refuels, produces growth hormones, and resets cortisol levels. Regardless of how or how much you work out, quality sleep will always be a benefit, and without it, you're always at a disadvantage. 

The Vitalete +Night formula includes 4 specific ingredients that aid sleep and recovery without resorting to sedatives.  Vitalete +Night includes 5-HTP, which promotes serotonin production—our brain's source of calm, order, and hope. Phosphatidylserine lowers stress and helps aid muscle recovery, and Tart Cherry Extract acts as an anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant. We've also included Taurine, which has a calming effect on the brain; it's often included in energy drinks to counteract their high amounts of sugar and caffeine.

________________

What's in it:

________________


To get this started, we need to place our initial order with our US-based manufacturer. The minimum order quantities to make Vitalete are substantial, but we're confident we can get there!

As a supporter, you’ll get a 90-day supply of the formulation of your choice at our discounted early-backer prices, delivered in August of 2015.

After we reach our funding goal, Vitalete will switch to a subscription-style service, and as an early supporter, you'll have the choice to opt-in to continued regular delivery at your discounted price for as long as you want. By selling direct, this helps keep prices low, and if you decide to subscribe, you’ll never have to worry about running out. 

This is a fixed all-or-nothing campaign – so we need your support now to make Vitalete a reality.

________________

Everyone deserves to get the most from their efforts. For athletes, that means not only fully enjoying the time spent doing the activities we love, but also to get the highest health and fitness benefits from it - and recover fast so we can go back for more!

I’ve seen the effects applied science can have on athletic performance first hand: I spent over 20 years in the cycling industry working directly with some of the world’s fastest athletes and their coaches. More recently, I worked with an extremely high-end healthcare startup in the San Francisco Bay Area that applied genetic and biomarker data to make healthy people even healthier. These elite coaches and doctors were in a unique position: they could focus on finding advantages that non-active people wouldn't value, but they're priceless for us.   

Volumes of scientific research on vitamins and athletic efforts do exist, it's just not always easy to find or interpret. We've put it all to use in designing Vitalete. 


Initial funding will provide the funds needed to order the initial production run, and ship product to you, our early supporters. We'll also have enough remaining inventory to continue to grow, and to re-supply you after your first 90-day supply is used up. No money will be spent on anything other than product and shipping costs at this point - we're dedicated to growth!


________________

The biggest risk for Vitalete is that the vitamin industry is poorly regulated and because of this, often not trusted. Our success hinges on our ability to be a different kind of company, and to stand out as the most trusted and reliable vitamin source for athletic people.

We’re willing to be brutally honest about what’s included in our products, how they’re certified, and the science we’ve collected to support them. Rather than hide behind secret “proprietary blends” and other shadowy techniques, we’re committed to transparency. We’re confident that the athletic community will value this approach, and the results they can lead to. 

We’ve chosen a US-based manufacturing partner with the highest levels of certification - their NSF certification means that Vitalete meets cGMP standards, guaranteeing quality, purity, and accuracy in the ingredients. Very few vitamins take this step. We’re doing it because it’s the only way to be sure that we’re delivering a top quality product.

Lastly, we’re committed to being a long-term partner for our customers: we’ll keep adding to our research base, and we’ll provide helpful and actionable science-driven information that will complement any active lifestyle. We want this to feel more like a club than a product, with members who all value their health.

________________

If you're active 3 hours or more per week, we'd love your support: you can pre-order a 90-day supply of whichever formulation matches your weekly effort. We'll give you special pricing (and you can keep that pricing for as long as you like), and we'll be hugely grateful for helping us turn this idea into a reality. 

A note to others: We know Vitalete isn’t for everyone. It won’t turn someone into an athlete, and it won’t replace the need for a healthy diet or a well-planned exercise/training schedule. But for the people it is designed for, there’s nothing like it, which is exactly why we want to make it.

If Vitalete isn’t for you, that’s okay – but please consider helping us by sharing our story with your athletically-minded friends & colleagues. They might end up thanking you for turning them on to something that, like us, they’ve always wanted, but couldn’t find anywhere.


About shipping:

Due to regulations, currently we can only ship to the USA.  We hope to expand internationally after our initial launch.

story:
Did you ever build a den when you were a kid?

If you did, then you’ll understand just how awesome inflatable building blocks would be. This campaign is raising money to bring YOU… L-Air Blocks! L-Air Blocks are inflatable building blocks that attach to one another using hook & loop patches. This allows you to build up with confidence and get creative with whatever you're building. Whether it’s a den, a chair, a sofa, a fort or anything else you can think of. L-Air Blocks are ready.

My Name is Henry Garner. Im a co-founder of L-Air Blocks Ltd & the creator of L-Air Blocks. My goal throughout my life has been to have my own business. I’m half way there by having a company set up but, now I need you. Having gone through a few stages of prototypes, I have now developed the production ready version. This however is where I’ve hit a brick wall. For me to bring the price down, I have to order in bulk (100,000 blocks to be exact) and I need your help to raise £250,000 to pay for the first full production order.

We plan to sell the blocks in packs of 5 (Booster), 20 (Starter) & 30 (Bumper). So this first production order will allow us to buy 2,000 packs of 5; 3,000 packs of 20 and 1,000 packs of 30. Depending on what perk you go for, you could get one pack, all three or a multiple of one pack size.

Whether you've got kids or you're a big kid at heart!

As the idea has grown, we've learnt that the product might be for more than just kids. The target audience we feel is for 4-11 year olds, however we also think that there is a secondary target audience of people 16 years and older. Younger children have a natural curiosity and desire to build, be creative, discover and play. And then with people 16 years and older, it brings back old memories of making a den or a fort when they were younger.
To start off with the blocks will be available in Red, Yellow, Blue, Green & Orange. These vibrant yet basic colours should make the product appealing to a wider audience. In the future we will be bringing out other colours, but to start off with, we want to keep things simple by keeping our product range small.

The right Perk for you!

Are you looking to build something fun and creative or to support our campaign? If you're looking to build something, the perks offering blocks are the ones to go for. If you're looking to support the campaign, the merchandise perks are your best choices.

No matter whether you go for a small perk or a big perk, we couldn't appreciate what you're doing for us any more than we already do.

£1 & £5 are huge thank you's. What separates them apart is the wall. The wall of thank you's. If you go onto our website you will find a page called the 'Wall of Thank You's!' On that page you can look for your name, like on school leavers hoodies. Not only can you have fun looking for it, you can look at it knowing you've helped support an awesome campaign.

For 25 & 35 pounds, you can get our official L-Air Blocks clothing. There are two T-Shirts and one Polo Shirt. The T-Shirts are available in two different designs, with variations of the logo on them. The Polo Shirt has the company emblem on it, but presents it in a more professional way.

£40, £100 & £150 gets you packs of L-Air Blocks. You can have either: a pack of 5 (a.k.a a Booster pack), a pack of 20 (Starter Pack) or a pack of 30 (Bumper Pack). As well as getting packs of blocks, you also get a discount off the purchase of a Booster Pack (from our website). The discount ranges from 10%-20% depending on which perk you go for.

For anyone who wants to build big there are two perks that are just right for you. You can either go for all three packs in a perk worth £225 or you can go for the ultimate builders perk. For £900 you can get 10 Starter Packs; so that's 200 blocks!

For £100 you will be sent a personal thank you video. In that video, I (Henry Garner) will express my gratitude to you, to show you just how much I appreciate your contribution.

£250 & £500 get you exclusive rights. The £250 perk allows you to become a product tester. Not only would you see future products first, but then you would be able to test them and have a say into what changes should be made and help shape what the final product becomes. The £500 perk allows you to be one of the first one hundred people to buy any future product from L-Air Blocks Ltd. Before being launched to the public, you will have the option to buy them and have them before anyone else.

The important question - where is your money going?

So as you may already know, we are asking for £250,000. That money is going to be used to place our first full scale production order, to help us achieve economies of scale. The order will be for 100,000 blocks and for the packaging materials for the booster, starter and bumper packs. This order will cost us $291,330 (the manufacturer prices in US dollars) and will provide L-Air Blocks with sufficient stock to start trading fully.

You can either go for all three packs in a perk worth £225 or you can go for the ultimate builders perk. For £900 you can get 10 Starter Packs; so that's 200 blocks!For £100 you will be sent a personal thank you video. In that video, I (Henry Garner) will express my gratitude to you, to show you just how much I appreciate your contribution.£250 & £500 get you exclusive rights. The £250 perk allows you to become a product tester. Not only would you see future products first, but then you would be able to test them and have a say into what changes should be made and help shape what the final product becomes. The £500 perk allows you to be one of the first one hundred people to buy any future product from L-Air Blocks Ltd. Before being launched to the public, you will have the option to buy them and have them before anyone else.The important question - where is your money going?So as you may already know, we are asking for £250,000. That money is going to be used to place our first full scale production order, to help us achieve economies of scale. The order will be for 100,000 blocks and for the packaging materials for the booster, starter and bumper packs. This order will cost us $291,330 (the manufacturer prices in US dollars) and will provide L-Air Blocks with sufficient stock to start trading fully.

story:
The Next Evolution of the Water Bottle

Water bottles -- what a great invention!  They can keep you going while you work out, keep you cool as you walk around in the sun, and they're indispensable for hiking and long car trips. 

But sometimes, right when you need it most, you don't have a water bottle around.  The thirst is intense!  Why don't you have a water bottle with you?  Because it's just too bulky and inconvenient to carry around everywhere.

More Portable

What we all really need is a more convenient water bottle.  That way, we don't have to stop at the gas station and buy a soda.  We can save money, save our parched throats, and improve our health and well-being.

Voila: The Squish is that more convenient bottle!  It comes with a cool carabiner lid, so you can just clip it right on your jeans' belt loop and comfortably carry it everywhere.  Also, eliminating a major source of water-bottle-frustration, it will actually fit in your car's cup holder! 

With the Squish, whether you're driving, working, playing... wherever you may be, you never need to be thirsty.

That's exactly what the Squish does!  Pop it out to full size to fill it up, then when it's empty shrink it down to a squat little cylinder.  It's as simple as that!  Replace your cacophony of random, old, smelly, gross water bottles with a lovely, modern,z compact set of Squishes.

So Easy!  So Awesome!  So Fun!


More Storable

Do you have a whole cupboard full of water bottles?  If so, you're not alone.  Many of us do.  When you're not using your water bottles -- and in all honesty you're probably usually not, because, as we covered above, they're just too bulky and inconvenient -- they sure do take up a lot of storage space.  In today's world of urban living and efficiency, can you really afford all that clutter in your life?  Instead of the clutter, wouldn't it be better to have simple, clean, elegant,.... and small?

But wait, how could a water bottle be small, and yet be big enough to hold all the water you need?

What if it could shrink?

That's exactly what the Squish does!  Pop it out to full size to fill it up, then when it's empty shrink it down to a squat little cylinder.  It's as simple as that!  Replace your cacophony of random, old, smelly, gross water bottles with a lovely, modern, compact set of Squishes.

Which side would you rather have?  Replace the right side with the left!



More Adorable

Speaking of smelly and gross, that is another problem that the Squish solves.  It's made of high-quality platinum-cured (that's the best) silicone.  That means it's:

BPA Free

Lead Free

FDA Approved

Non-reactive

Non-absorbent

Dishwasher-friendly

In short: it's safe.  Your previous generation of water bottles, made of polycarbonate, polyethylene, other plastics, or even aluminum (which will also have a plastic resin coating by the way)..... ehhh, we're not so sure.

Also: it's really clean.  And easy to keep that way!  Silicone doesn't want to soak anything up.  And virtually nothing will stick to it.  So go ahead and use it for your coffee, your tea, or yes, even that most notorious of smell-producers: your protein shake.  Then just throw it in the dishwasher and it will wash right off.  No lingering flavors or stains left behind.  Or of course washing it by hand will accomplish the same thing.

Because of all this, it can keep looking just as great as the day it was made for years and years to come.  Did we mention it looks great?  It does.  Its stylish profile is really ergonomic, too.  It just feels great!  It's a pleasure to use.  In our testing it's been very durable.  The Squish will be built to last.  The Squish is the water bottle of the future, because it's the only one that will be around for it!

The Future of Water Bottles


Sum Up

More efficient to store.

More convenient to carry.

More clean and pristine.

A water bottle you'll just love... More!



What We Need & What You Get

With your contribution, we can bring this product to your doorstep. Unlike many campaigns, we actually can be in production and shipping you your water bottles in a matter of weeks.  The design is set, the molds are ready, and it even has already been tested and marketed to a limited extent in Asia.  We just need a little bit of help to do a production run for the good old US of A.  You'll then be enjoying your Squish water bottle before you know it.

Let's do it!  Go ahead and pitch in today!

story:
Clique aqui para ler em Português.


English

It is a system of reminders and notifications in real time, thought and created for the elderly and their caregivers / family members.

OneCare Base – basic service — allows you to schedule reminders in an interactive voice call format to the elder’s land-line or mobile phone. All of these reminders are set up by the caregiver, in a simple and practical way from the mobile application OneCare Dori.


Example: Daniel has set up the following reminder to his mother land-line: “Hello mother. Don't forget to take your pill at breakfast. If you had already took it press 1, if you will take it press 2, if you are out of pills press 3, if you need help press 4.” - sent everyday working day at 10h00.

Through the mobile application, the caregiver can monitor in real time the status of each reminder, as well as the answers given by the elder.


The OneCare Dori Base can also be complemented with xSmart sensors.

These sensors allow you to use daily routines – which are increasingly evident with the aging process – to activate the reminders in an automatic and smart way:


The caregiver can thus set a reminder that will act according to the accomplishment or not of a certain activity or set of daily activities.

Examples:

Mrs. Alice has 74 years old, and every morning she must take medication for breakfast. John, Mrs. Alice's son and caregiver, connected eSmart to the toaster that his mother always uses to prepare breakfast, setting up a reminder that automatically operates if the mother didn't prepare it;


Mrs. Alice suffers from heart problems. So, Mario (Mrs. Alice's grandson and caregiver) defined that, whenever his grandmother is with the TV on for more than 6 hours in a row, it is automatically activated a reminder to suggest that Mrs. Alice takes a walk in the surrounding of her house, as instructed by the doctor;


Mrs. Alice must take a special medication once a week. Joan (Mrs. Alice's sister and caregiver), can set it to be sent, automatically, a reminder to her the sister to take the medication, whenever the pill box, that Mrs. Alice keeps in a drawer, it isn't handled the day it is suppose to take that special medication;


Validation: this idea comes from an actual real-life problem. But will our solution be useful for other similar cases? Through the early sale, at an exclusive price of some units OneCare Dori, we will be able to understand what is the true potential and value of this solution.

Development: we have invested great effort and resources developing Onecare Dori. We are currently working on the mobile application and eSmart sensor (electric sensor). Then we intend to develop the mSmart (sensor for drug box) and for this purpose we need your support: the OneCare Dori mSmart early sale, we will get the "breath" necessary in order to in a few months develop the hardware and software required so that this sensor becomes real.

Tests and feedback: with all the early sales we can get through this campaign, we aim to create a unique community of beta testers. We want to hear the opinion of the first users of OneCare Dori and fine-tune existing features. We expect to add exciting new features based on feedback we get from this community.


OneCare Dori Base is a monthly subscription service that may be combined with sensors  xSmart, which are acquired through a single payment.

OneCare Dori Base: mobile application + Reminder Service through voice calls; 

xSmart Hub: device responsible for the communication between xSmart sensors and OneCare Dori Base;

xSmart Sensors (require OneCare Dori Base + xSmart hub):

eSmart: electric sensor;

mSmart: sensor for pill box;


Note: perks with "(PT)" in it only allows the users to set reminders for Portuguese phone numbers. The remaining Perks allows the users to set reminders for phone numbers of the following countries: Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Andorra, Angola, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Bahamas, Bangladesh, Belgium, Bolivia, Bosnia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Bulgaria, Cabo Verde, Cambodia, Canada, Cayman Islands, Chad, Chile, China, Colombia, Democratic Republic of Costa Rica, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Diego Garcia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Greece, Guatemala, Guinea-Bissau, Honduras, Hong-Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Jamaica, Japan, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Laos, Latvia, Lebanon, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macao, Macedonia, Malawi, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Moldova, Monaco, Mongolia, Montenegro, Morocco, Mozambique, Namibia, Nepal, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Romania, Russia, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Sweden, Switzerland, Syria, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Uganda, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom (UK), United States of America (USA), Uruguay, Venezuela, Vietnam, Zimbabwe.


Mobile Application

  • Installation and configuration guide;
  • Creates reminders based on a fixed schedule;
  • Creates reminders triggered based on xSmart sensors;
  • Creates occasional reminders;
  • Status display of the reminders and respective answers;
  • Historic;
  • Account management and monthly subscriptions;
  • Notifications;
  • Data encryption;
  • It meets the European standards for data protection;
  • Compatible with Android and iOS;


eSmart – Electric Sensor

  • Weight: 130g;
  • Dimensions: 80x80x45mm;
  • Communication period: 5 seconds (minimum);
  • Consumption: 0,9W to 1,5W;
  • Power: 100-230V / 50Hz-60Hz depending on the country of delivery);
  • Maximum current: 16A;
  • Communications: 2,4GHz (Zigbee Home Automation);
  • Communication range: up to30m (indoor) or up to 100m (line of sight);
  • Processor: Low Power CPU;
  • Interfaces: Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz) + multi-colored LED.


mSmart – Pillbox Sensor

(under development)

  • Interfaces: Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz);


xSmart Hub

  • Weight: 95g;
  • Dimensions: 90x90x33 mm;
  • Consumption: <1,5W;
  • Power: 100-230V / 50Hz-60Hz (depending on the country of delivery);
  • Processor: Low Power CPU;
  • Interfaces: Ethernet + RF (868MHz/915Mhz) + Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz) + multi-colored LED;
  • Number of supported xSmart sensors: until 12;


All equipment complies with all applicable EU directives: 

  • R&TTE: Radio and telecommunications terminal equipment (including EMC -Electromagnetic compatibility e LVE: Low Voltage Equipment);
  • RoHS: Restriction of the use of certain hazardous substances in electrical and electronic equipment;
  • WEEE: Waste electrical and electronic equipment;
  • B&A: Batteries and accumulators and waste batteries and accumulators;
  • PPW: Packaging and Packaging Waste;
  • Compliance to the european data protection directives;

Mário Pereira: Software Eng. & Back-end Developer;

Marta Pinto: Biomedical Eng. & Front-end Developer;

Diogo Bhovan: Product Manager & Marketing and Communication;

Marisa Malva: Business Development & Project Manager;

Q: How many sensors can OneCare Dori handle? 
A: OneCare Dori can handle until 12 sensor for each xSmart hub. 

Q: How does OneCare Dori ensures data privacy?
A: OneCare Dori ensures personal data security and privacy by meting current legislation related.

Q: Which countries can OneCare Dori xSmart be delivered? 
A: OneCare Dori xSmart can be delivered to the following countries: Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Andorra, Angola, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Bahamas, Bangladesh, Belgium, Bolivia, Bosnia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Bulgaria, Cabo Verde, Cambodia, Canada, Cayman Islands, Chad, Chile, China, Colombia, Democratic Republic of Costa Rica, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Diego Garcia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Greece, Guatemala, Guinea-Bissau, Honduras, Hong-Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Jamaica, Japan, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Laos, Latvia, Lebanon, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macao, Macedonia, Malawi, Malaysia, Malta, Mexico, Moldova, Monaco, Mongolia, Montenegro, Morocco, Mozambique, Namibia, Nepal, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Norway, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Romania, Russia, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Sweden, Switzerland, Syria, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Uganda, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom (UK), United States of America (USA), Uruguay, Venezuela, Vietnam, Zimbabwe.

Q: Is there a shipping cost? 
A: OneCare Dori Base does not have any costs associated. When the “Perks”  include physical devices (eSmart, mSmart sensors or xSmart hub) their costs depend on shipping zones. 

Q: Why do I need xSmart hub? 
A: xSmart hub is the device responsible for sending the xSmart sensors info to the central system of OneCare Dori. The hub connects with the sensors through a wireless conection and with internet through your home router. 

Q: What is the maximum distance between sensor and xSmart hub?
A: The distance between xSmart hub and sensors should be equal or less than 30 meters, indoor; and untill 100 meters in open field. Each sensor has also a bridge function, which means that it has the hability to make the connection between another sensor and the xSmart hub




Português

É um sistema de lembretes e notificações em tempo real, criado a pensar nos idosos e nos seus cuidadores/familiares.

O serviço base - OneCare Dori Base -, permite agendar lembretes em formato de chamada de voz interactiva para o telefone fixo ou móvel do idoso. Todos estes lembretes são configurados pelo cuidador, de forma simples e prática a partir da aplicação móvel do OneCare Dori.


Exemplo: o Daniel definiu o seguinte lembrete para o telefone-fixo da Mãe: “Olá Mãe. Não te esqueças de tomar o comprimido ao pequeno-almoço. Se já tomaste tecla 1, se vais tomar tecla 2, se já não tens comprimidos tecla 3, se precisas de ajuda tecla 4.” – despoletado todos os dias úteis às 10h00

Através da aplicação móvel, o cuidador pode acompanhar em tempo real o estado de cada lembrete, bem como as respostas dadas pelo idoso.


Estes sensores permitem usar as rotinas diárias - que são cada vez mais evidentes com o avançar da idade - para activar os lembretes de forma automática e inteligente:


O cuidador consegue assim configurar um lembrete que actuará consoante a realização, ou não, de determinada actividade ou conjunto de actividades diárias.

Exemplos:

A Dna. Alice tem 74 anos, e todos os dias de manhã tem de tomar medicação ao pequeno-almoço. O João (filho e cuidador da Dna. Alice) ligou o eSmart à torradeira que a Mãe utiliza sempre que prepara o pequeno-almoço, configurando um lembrete que atua automaticamente caso a Mãe não o prepare;



A Dna. Alice sofre de problemas do coração. Assim, o Mário (neto e cuidador da Dna. Alice) definiu que sempre que a sua Avó estiver com a televisão ligada por um período superior a 6h seguidas, é ativado automaticamente um lembrete a sugerir que a Dna. Alice faça uma caminhada nas imediações de sua casa, conforme indicado pelo médico;



A Dna. Alice tem de tomar uma medicação especial uma vez por semana. A Joana (irmã e cuidadora da Dna. Alice), pode definir que seja enviado automaticamente um lembrete para a irmã tomar a medicação sempre que a caixa dos medicamentos, que a Dna. Alice guarda numa gaveta, não for manuseada no dia da toma da medicação.




Validação: esta ideia surge de um problema real da vida real. Mas será que a nossa solução serve para outros casos semelhantes? Através da venda antecipada a preço exclusivo de algumas unidades do OneCare Dori, vamos conseguir perceber qual o verdadeiro potencial e valor desta solução.

Desenvolvimento: temos investido muito esforço e recursos no desenvolvimento do Onecare Dori. Estamos neste momento a trabalhar na aplicação móvel e no sensor eSmart (sensor eléctrico). Seguidamente pretendemos desenvolver o mSmart (sensor para a caixa de medicamentos) e para tal precisamos do teu apoio: com a venda-antecipada do OneCare Dori mSmart, conseguiremos o "fôlego" necessário para em poucos meses desenvolver o hardware e software necessários para que este sensor se torne real.

Testes e feedback: com todas as pré-vendas que conseguirmos através desta campanha, pretendemos criar uma comunidade exclusiva de beta-testers. Queremos ouvir a opinião dos primeiros utilizadores do OneCare Dori e afinar as funcionalidades existentes. Contamos poder adicionar novas funcionalidades interessantes com base no feedback que obtivermos desta comunidade.



O OneCare Dori Base é um serviço de assinatura mensal que pode ser complementado com os sensores xSmart que são adquiridos através de um pagamento único.

OneCare Dori Base: Aplicação móvel + Serviço de lembretes através de chamadas de voz;

Concentrador xSmart: dispositivo responsável pela comunicação entre os sensores xSmart e o OneCare Dori Base;

Sensores xSmart (requerem OneCare Dori Base + Concentrador xSmart):

eSmart: sensor eléctrico;

mSmart: sensor para caixa de medicamentos;


Nota: os Perks assinalados com "(PT)" permitem lembretes efectuados exclusivamente para números de telefone Portugueses. Todos os outros perks, permitem efectuar lembretes para números de telefone dos seguintes países: Afeganistão, África do Sul, Albania, Alemanha, Andorra, Angola, Argentina, Argélia, Arménia, Arábia Saudita,  Australia,  Áustria, Bahamas, Bangladesh, Bolívia, Bosnia, Bosnia e Herzegovina, Brasil, Bulgaria, Bélgica, Cabo Verde, Caimão, Cambodja, Canadá, Casaquistão, Chade, Chile, China, Chipre, Colombia, Coreia do Sul, Costa Rica, Croácia, Diego Garcia, Dinamarca, Egipto, El Salvador, Emiratos Arábes Unidos, Equador, Eslováquia, Eslovénia, Espanha, Estados Unidos da América, Estónia, Filipinas, Finlandia, França, Gana, Georgia, Grécia, Guatemala, Guiné Bissau, Holanda, Honduras, Hong Kong, Hungria, India, Indonésia, Iraque, Irlanda, Irão, Islândia, Israel, Itália, Jamaica, Japão, Jordânia, Kuweit, Laos, Letónia, Libano, Liechtenstein, Lituânia, Luxemburgo, Macau, Macedónia, Malawi, Malta, Malásia, Marrocos, Moldavia, Monaco, Mongólia, Montenegro, Moçambique, México, Namibia, Nepal, Nicarágua, Nigéria, Noruega, Nova Zelândia, Panamá, Paquistão, Paraguai, Peru, Polónia, Porto Rico, Portugal, Qatar, Quénia, Reino Unido, República Checa, República Dominicana, Roménia, Rússia, Singapura, Sri Lanka, Sudão, Suiça, Suécia, São Marino, Sérvia, Síria, Tailândia, Taiwan, Turquia, Ucrânia, Uganda, Uruguai, Venezuela, Vietname, Zimbabwe.


Aplicação Móvel

  • Guia de instalação e configuração;
  • Criação de lembretes com base num agendamento fixo;
  • Criação de lembretes despoletados com base nos sensores xSmart;
  • Criação de lembretes pontuais;
  • Visualização do estado dos lembretes e respetivas respostas;
  • Histórico;
  • Gestão de conta e subscrições mensais;
  • Notificações;
  • Encriptação dos dados;
  • Cumpre as normas Europeias de proteção de dados;
  • Compatível com Android e iOS;

eSmart - Sensor Eléctrico

  • Peso: 130g;
  • Dimensões: 80x80x45mm;
  • Intervalo de comunicação: 5seg (mín);
  • Consumo: 0,9W a 1,5W;
  • Alimentação: 100-230v / 50Hz-60Hz (varia consoante país de entrega);
  • Corrente máxima: 16A;
  • Comunicações: 2,4GHz (Zigbee Home Automation);
  • Alcance de comunicação: até 30m (indoor) e até 100m (em linha de vista);
  • Processador: Low Power CPU;
  • Interfaces: Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz) + LED RGB.

mSmart - Sensor para Caixa de Medicamentos

(em desenvolvimento)
  • Interfaces: Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz);

Concentrador xSmart

  • Peso: 95g;
  • Dimensões: 90x90x33;
  • Consumo: <1,5w;
  • Alimentação: 100-230v / 50Hz-60Hz (varia consoante país de entrega);
  • Processador: Low Power CPU;
  • Interfaces: Ethernet + RF (868MHz/915Mhz) + Zigbee Home Automation (2,4GHz) + LED RGB;
  • Número de sensores xSmart suportados: até 12;


Todos os equipamentos cumprem com todas as diretivas aplicáveis da União Europeia:

  • R&TTE: Radio and telecommunications terminal equipment (que inclui EMC -Electromagnetic compatibility e LVE: Low Voltage Equipment);
  • RoHS: Restriction of the use of certain hazardous substances in electrical and electronic equipment;
  • WEEE: Waste electrical and electronic equipment;
  • B&A: Batteries and accumulators and waste batteries and accumulators;
  • PPW: Packaging and Packaging Waste;
  • Conformidade com as directivas europeias de protecção de dados.

Mário Pereira: Eng. de Software & Back-end Developer;
Marta Pinto: Eng. Biomédica & Front-end Developer;
Diogo Bhovan: Gestão de produto & Marketing e Comunicação;
Marisa Malva: Desenvolvimento de negócio & Gestão de projecto;

P: Quantos sensores suporta o OneCare Dori?
R: O OneCare Dori suporta até 12 sensores por cada concentrador xSmart instalado.

P: A privacidade dos dados é garantida?
R: A segurança e privacidade dos dados pessoais é totalmente garantida pelo OneCare Dori, cumprindo toda a legislação em vigor relativa à proteção e tratamento destes.

P: Quais os países para onde enviam o OneCare Dori xSmart (eSmart & mSmart)?
R: O OneCare Dori xSmart poderá ser expedido para os seguintes países: Afeganistão, África do Sul, Albania, Alemanha, Andorra, Angola, Argentina, Argélia, Arménia, Arábia Saudita,  Australia,  Áustria, Bahamas, Bangladesh, Bolívia, Bosnia, Bosnia e Herzegovina, Brasil, Bulgaria, Bélgica, Cabo Verde, Caimão, Cambodja, Canadá, Casaquistão, Chade, Chile, China, Chipre, Colombia, Coreia do Sul, Costa Rica, Croácia, Diego Garcia, Dinamarca, Egipto, El Salvador, Emiratos Arábes Unidos, Equador, Eslováquia, Eslovénia, Espanha, Estados Unidos da América, Estónia, Filipinas, Finlandia, França, Gana, Georgia, Grécia, Guatemala, Guiné Bissau, Holanda, Honduras, Hong Kong, Hungria, India, Indonésia, Iraque, Irlanda, Irão, Islândia, Israel, Itália, Jamaica, Japão, Jordânia, Kuweit, Laos, Letónia, Libano, Liechtenstein, Lituânia, Luxemburgo, Macau, Macedónia, Malawi, Malta, Malásia, Marrocos, Moldavia, Monaco, Mongólia, Montenegro, Moçambique, México, Namibia, Nepal, Nicarágua, Nigéria, Noruega, Nova Zelândia, Panamá, Paquistão, Paraguai, Peru, Polónia, Porto Rico, Portugal, Qatar, Quénia, Reino Unido, República Checa, República Dominicana, Roménia, Rússia, Singapura, Sri Lanka, Sudão, Suiça, Suécia, São Marino, Sérvia, Síria, Tailândia, Taiwan, Turquia, Ucrânia, Uganda, Uruguai, Venezuela, Vietname, Zimbabwe.

P: Quais os custos de envio?
R: Para o OneCare Dori Base não há qualquer custo de envio associado, já os restantes “Perks” que incluam dispositivos (Sensores eSmart, mSmart ou Concentrador xSmart) variam consoante a zona de expedição.

P: Para que serve o concentrador xSmart?
R: O Concentrador xSmart é o dispositivo responsável por enviar as informações dos Sensores xSmart para o sistema central do OneCare Dori. O concentrador liga-se aos sensores através de uma ligação sem fios e à internet através de uma ligação ethernet.

P: Qual a distância de comunicação máxima entre os sensores e o concentrador xSmart?
R: Os sensores poderão estar a uma distância do concentrador igual ou inferior a 30 metros (quando dentro de um edifício) e até 100 metros (em linha de vista). Cada sensor tem ainda a função "bridge" o que significa que tem a capacidade de servir de "ponte" entre um sensor que esteja a uma distância superior do concentrador.

Visit these links and / or write about your concerns and suggestions to crowdfunding@magentart.com

  

  • Build the first automatic machine to make realistic synthetic skin (MaGentart artificial skin) of whose blueprints are already made. (2018)
  • Build the first automatic machine for making prostheses and other customized devices, whose blueprints are already completed at 80%. (2019)
  • Firmly enter the US market (2020)
  • Establish a specialized laboratory for solutions and devices that improve the condition of pets and other animals that have suffered deformities and amputations. (2018)

Representative images - None of these products was made by MaGentart.

.

 

We have divided the system into three groups; each one has its own specific objective.

GROUP No. 1. For corporate strengthening

You are the key factor to determine the growth and increased business impact of this company. Give us the opportunity to strengthen the work that has begun. In the future, feel the satisfaction of having done your share.

  • Recruitment of technical and administrative staff.
  • Launch of 10 new specialized products for diabetics.
  • Improvement of the tools in the workshop.
  • Purchase of measurement and control equipment for the laboratory.
  • Upgrade of machinery and equipment for the workshop
  • Photography and video equipment.
  • New computer and office equipment..
  • 3D equipment; scanners, printers, laser cutting and CNC router.
  • Purchase of specialized parts for prosthetic arms, feet and legs.
  • Relief and rehabilitation elements; wheelchairs, bars and exercise machines.
  • Acquisition of some patents and industrial rights.

 

BONUSES FOR CONTRIBUTORS OF GROUP No. 1

Your permission is previously requested. ** Shipments are free. ** The tickets, lodging, and travel expenses different from those in the offer are not afforded.

GROUP No. 1. * ALL CONTRIBUTORS

GROUP No. 1. * FOR CONTRIBUTIONS OVER  $ 500 ** All the above, plus:
  • Satisfaction for giving us the opportunity to continue working for the people who so desperately need us.
  • A certificate of appreciation in printable letterhead.
  • Acknowledgement by publishing your name and a special link (authorized by you) to your social networks.
  • Video message and / or video call from the management team, to thank him personally.
  • Invitation to a conference group via SKYPE, to share experiences and knowledge.
  • A card and a plate that makes you an honorary member of MaGentart.
 

GROUP No. 1. * FOR CONTRIBUTIONS OVER $ 2.000 ** All the above, plus:

GROUP No. 1. * FOR CONTRIBUTIONS OVER $ 8.000 ** All the above, plus:
  • A symbolic and exclusive MaGentart artificial skin sample, customized to your skin color and tone. * With your name. * The phrase "thank you for your support" and our logo. * All of the text is embossed (5-inch plate).
  • A kit including a shirt and other representative items.
  • Exclusive event: A visit to the workshop to participate in a basic course of hyper realistic creation of body parts (8 hours).
  • With a tour, a cocktail and food shows.
  • In addition, you will leave a lasting mark on the world - you will have the hyper realistic 3D sculpture of your hand or that of a loved one; with the same size, made of a thin synthetic marble, on a wooden base and an acknowledgement plate.

 

GROUP No. 2. In order to help more than 1200 beneficiaries of found ' EN SU PIEL':

THE BENEFICIARIES:

They are more than twelve hundred people from different Latin American countries, with all kinds of amputations and injuries. With your contribution in 2016, the first 250 people will be assisted, with priority for children, teenagers, women, unemployed heads of household and those suffering from pain or psychological problems because of some disability or social and / or employment discrimination.

Those interested in benefiting from the fund, may send a request to MaGentart E-mail, with personal details, copy of the ID, and the description and photos of the injury.

REWARDS FOR CONTRIBUTORS OF GROUP No. 2

Your permission is previously requested. ** Shipments are free. ** The tickets, lodging, and travel expenses different from those in the offer are not afforded.

GROUP No. 2. * FOR ALL CONTRIBUTORS TO ' EN SU PIEL'

GROUP No. 2. * CONTRIBUTIONS OVER $ 500, for ' EN SU PIEL' ** All the above, plus:

  • The satisfaction of giving relief to those suffering physically and emotionally.

  • An acknowledgement certificate in printable personalized letterhead.
  • Acknowledgement by publishing your name and a special link (authorized by you) to your social networks.
  • Video message and / or video call from the management team, to thank him personally.
  • Exclusive access advances videos and testimonies of the beneficiaries.
  • Invitation to a conference group via SKYPE, to share experiences and knowledge.
  • A license and a letterhead that makes an honorary member of the fund " EN SU PIEL".

 

GROUP No. 2. * CONTRIBUTIONS OVER $2.500, for ' EN SU PIEL' ** All the above, plus:

GROUP No. 2. * CONTRIBUTIONS OVER $8.000, for ' EN SU PIEL' ** All the above, plus:
  • A symbolic and exclusive MaGentart artificial skin sample, customized to your skin color and tone. * With your name. * The phrase "thank you for your support" and our logo. * All of the text is embossed (5-inch plate).
  • A kit including a shirt and other representative items.
  • Exclusive event: A visit to the workshop to participate in a basic course of hyper realistic creation of body parts (8 hours).
  • With a tour, a cocktail and food shows.
  • In addition, you will leave a lasting mark on the world - you will have the hyper realistic 3D sculpture of your hand or that of a loved one; with the same size, made of a thin synthetic marble, on a wooden base and an acknowledgement plate.

 

GROUP No. 3. For the direct purchase of our products

For those who need to acquire a prosthesis or another product.

Due to logistical reasons, only three products are included for sale, but all of them provide unique opportunities this campaign. You can learn more about our solutions by visiting this link.

Remember that:
The prosthesis on offer are ranked on LEVEL 1, but you can also ask for the other two versions of each product (LEVEL 2 and LEVEL 3) which are cheaper. In many cases, a minimum of two personal appointments at the facilities in Colombia (Bogota and / or Medellin) are required.
The rewards do not cover trips, lodging, or per diem.
Buyers and beneficiaries must agree and comply with the contracts, policies and procedures of MaGentart

GROUP No. 3 * Only $850. Purchase a finger prosthesis

GROUP No. 3 * Only $2.500. Purchase a hand prosthesis

EXCLUSIVE OFFER FOR THIS CAMPAIGN
** Real price $1.300. Total savings $ 450**

** Complete treatment with a first-level prosthesis.
$250 discount.
+ Maintenance and replacement insurance ($100).
+ Physical and psychological assessment ($50).
+ Psychological therapy (if required).
+ Registration in MaGentart  management system + query + quotation (50$).
+ Monitoring and control

EXCLUSIVE OFFER FOR THIS CAMPAIGN
** Real price $3.700. Total savings $1.200 **

** Full treatment with a first-level prosthesis.
$850 discount.
+ Maintenance and replacement insurance ($250).
+ Physical and psychological assessment ($50).
+ Psychological therapy (if required).
+ Registration in MaGentart management system + query + quotation ($50).
+ Monitoring and control.

Only For a fully amputated hand (up to the wrist)

 

GROUP No. 3. SUPER BONUS. * $150

EXCLUSIVE OFFER FOR THIS CAMPAIGN

A (non-refundable) BONUS, which guarantees a 25% discount on purchases of any value.
For products whose manufacture is feasible, according to the case study.
+ Physical and psychological assessment is also included.
+ Registration in MaGentart management system + query + quotation.
Valid until November 2017.
After purchasing your SUPER BONUS, send an email to crowdfunding@magentart.com with the receipt and personal data of the beneficiary, explaining the injury with recent photos.

Instructions and / or the first appointment that done through SKYPE video conferencing will be mailed.

 

 

What if you cannot attain the objective?
We appreciate all the support. If we do not reach our goal, the proceeds for GROUP No. 1 will be invested in hiring new staff and replacement of equipment and tools.
All proceeds for GROUP No. 2 (' EN SU PIEL' fund) will be delivered to the beneficiaries according to each donation.
For GROUP No. 3, all treatments and devices will be delivered according to the published offer.

Payment through PayPal is not completed successfully, what can I do? *** How I can contribute funds if I do not have a credit card? *** What do I do if my credit card is rejected? *** How should I proceed if I want to make a big donation?
For all cases above, you can send an email to the customer service team of INDIEGOGO, at support@indiegogo.com. They can follow up your transaction and help with any problems or questions.
You can also write directly to crowdfunding@magentart.com, we will be glad to provide alternatives.

How I can make a direct donation to MaGentart company?
You can also make a donation through bank transfer or credit cards VISA, AMEX, MASTER, DINERS cards, enabled for international transactions.
An alternative method for donations is through Western Union or Money gram.

Please, if you have questions, email us at crowdfunding@magentart.com  to send fund transfer instructions. Thank you very much indeed for supporting our campaign!

What if my question is not answered here?
You can visit the FAQ section of our website.
We will gladly answer any questions you have about the campaign. You may send an email to crowdfunding@magentart.com

 

PARA DONACIONES DIRECTAS AL FONDO "EN SU PIEL"

¿Cómo hago al tener una inquietud adicional?

Comuníquese por correo, cuéntenos con claridad ¿cuál es su inquietud?, déjenos su nombre, ubicación y teléfono, su cuenta de Skype o WhatsApp. Tan pronto sea posible le responderemos.

¿Además de dinero, que otras cosas puedo donar?

Cada persona tiene necesidades diferentes , trataremos de ayudarle en lo que sea posible. La historia de cada beneficiario, tiene una reseña con los tipos de contribuciones adicionales con los que se les puede ayudar a mejorar su calidad de vida. Trataremos de tener un listado actualizado con estos elementos.

¿Con que tarjetas de crédito reciben donaciones, pagos y afiliaciones?

VISA / MASTERCARD / AMERICAN EXPRESS / DINERS

¿Qué sistema usan para las donaciones, pagos y afiliaciones con tarjetas de crédito?

Como comercio afiliado a la Red CredibanCo. Contamos con el código único, la certificación de de comercio seguro y la autorización para realizar transacciones con plástico usando el DATAFONO.

Las transacciones a distancia, se hacen de forma directa en la plataforma de VENTA NO PRESENCIAL de CREDIBANCO COLOMBIA.

¿Cómo puedo hacer un abono con PayPal?

Comuníquese por correo, díganos de cuanto es el monto, para enviarle el botón de pago de PayPal.

¿Cómo puedo hacer una donación si no tengo una tarjeta de crédito?

Haciendo una consignación en Bancolombia o Davivienda.

Haciendo un giro nacional por Efecty, Servientrega, Gana, Giros y finanzas, en los almacenes EXITO, o cualquier casa que envíe giros o remesas a Medellín - Colombia.

¿Puedo donar por medio de remesa internacional?

Un método alternativo para donaciones es por WesternUnion o Money gram.
o cualquier agencia que haga remesas hacia Colombia.

¿Cómo debo donar si quiero hacer una gran donación?

Es preferible que se comuníquese por correo, cuéntenos de cuanto es el monto, déjenos su nombre, ubicación y teléfono, su cuenta de Skype o WhatsApp. Tan pronto sea posible nos comunicaremos para ultimar detalles.

story:
What is The Bow?

The Bow is a commercial grade, multi-purpose fitness system created by a personal trainer for fitness minded people, offering over 400 real exercises in a variety of training disciplines.  

Invented by Sydney trainer Coach Ali, The Bow was created due to the lack of high-quality, all-in-one training systems on the market.

Coach Ali needed a product that was commercial-grade and worthy of withstanding maximum usage at his own gym, something he could trust to bring to his clients. Tried and tested, Coach Ali ensured that every part, attachment and piece of The Bow was the best product he could offer his clients both at his gym and at home. 


What can The Bow do for you?

The Bow consists of three hero parts; The Bow Resistance Cables, The Bow Suspension Cables and The Bow Bar. These parts are combined with unique anchoring systems, handles and steel carabineers to deliver the very highest quality, all-in-one training partner.  The Bow also comes with unparalleled support through over 200 virtual classes in suspension training, resistance training, Pilates & aesthetics resulting in serious functional & physical transformations. 



 A message from Coach Ali

"My dream is to impact and change the lives of over 1,000,000 people worldwide through providing affordable quality health & fitness services.

My mission is to make high quality workouts affordable and accessible for everybody around the world. The opportunity to lead a healthy, fit and happy life should be your right, not just a privilege for those who can afford it. My Bow fitness system along with your support will help ensure this becomes reality".


Risks and challenges

The challenge for us is to place The Bow in front of audiences considering real value fitness equipment & training support. There is a big risk of being overlooked simply because there are so many gimmick fitness products on the market today that is very difficult for consumers to differentiate between a truly brilliant invention and a waste to time gimmick.

As we all know the best product is not always the most successful and that is a real risk on hand for us.

We are very confident that users will agree that The Bow is the best mobile fitness product on the market for a variety of reasons:

1) It is seven (7) time more versatile that other suspension trainer systems

2) It is designed to be virtually unbreakable and perform endlessly, tested commercially for 2 years prior to release.

3) The only fitness system in the world capable of over 400 real exercises in a variety of disciplines.

4) Unparalleled class & program support with over 200 free workouts on "Coach Ali" YouTube channel plus new programs added weekly.


Over 3000 Reviews

The Bow has been reviewed over 3000 times over the past two years at founding centre Ultimate Pilates with a near perfect customer satisfaction score of 4.93/5.00

Supporting us will help us support you!

Coach Ali has personally committed to giving supporters over 365 virtual Bow classes through his YouTube channel "Coach Ali".  This simply means that if you were to train to a different program every day, it will be an entire year before you repeat a class which will make it virtually impossible to get bored training with The Bow. 
Your support is imperative and absolutely invaluable in enabling us to provide endless free commercial quality fitness programs for everyone around the world to enjoy, participate and benefit from.  
Your support also gets you the very best all-in-one strength & conditioning system ever & helps us reach our goals too. Everybody stand to win should this project be successful!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to support us through the campaign, then please share this campaign with friends or family who stand to benefit from The Bow & our low impact highly effective training programs.   Please share on social media. Cheers to your good health :)

The challenge for us is to place The Bow in front of audiences considering real value fitness equipment & training support. There is a big risk of being overlooked simply because there are so many gimmick fitness products on the market today that is very difficult for consumers to differentiate between a truly brilliant invention and a waste to time gimmick.
As we all know the best product is not always the most successful and that is a real risk on hand for us.
We are very confident that users will agree that The Bow is the best mobile fitness product on the market for a variety of reasons:
1) It is seven (7) time more versatile that other suspension trainer systems
2) It is designed to be virtually unbreakable and perform endlessly, tested commercially for 2 years prior to release.
3) The only fitness system in the world capable of over 400 real exercises in a variety of disciplines.
4) Unparalleled class & program support with over 200 free workouts on "Coach Ali" YouTube channel plus new programs added weekly.


Over 3000 Reviews
The Bow has been reviewed over 3000 times over the past two years at founding centre Ultimate Pilates with a near perfect customer satisfaction score of 4.93/5.00

Supporting us will help us support you!Coach Ali has personally committed to giving supporters over 365 virtual Bow classes through his YouTube channel "Coach Ali".  This simply means that if you were to train to a different program every day, it will be an entire year before you repeat a class which will make it virtually impossible to get bored training with The Bow. Your support is imperative and absolutely invaluable in enabling us to provide endless free commercial quality fitness programs for everyone around the world to enjoy, participate and benefit from.  Your support also gets you the very best all-in-one strength & conditioning system ever & helps us reach our goals too. Everybody stand to win should this project be successful!
Other Ways You Can Help
 If you are not in a position to support us through the campaign, then please share this campaign with friends or family who stand to benefit from The Bow & our low impact highly effective training programs.   Please share on social media. Cheers to your good health :)

story:
Short Summary

As an Emergency Room nurse, I see people just like you with chronic conditions such as heart failure, kidney failure, high blood pressure, COPD, and more every day.  Many times these people are in and out of the hospital on a regular basis for worsening conditions and have a very low quality of life. I cannot tell you how common it is to not correctly understand your medications or the diagnosis itself.  It’s not the fault of your physicians or the hospitals that you’ve visited. It’s simply a shortcoming in the healthcare system.

An additional complication you may be facing is how long it takes to get an office visit with your primary care provider.  According to an article in Forbes Magazine, physician wait times have increased 30% nationwide. A March 2017 article in the Houston Chronicle stated that the average wait time for primary care providers is 19 days and only getting longer.  This in large part, is due to the numbers of people moving to the area and the enormous growth we are experiencing. What this means for you is longer wait times, decreased access to your doctor, and inevitably, more frequent Emergency Room visits as a result.

The American Heart Association presented a chart showing the causes of hospitalization for people with heart failure, and declared that over 2/3 of these hospitalizations were preventable.  What this means is, with the proper attention at home, over 3 million Americans could have avoided hospitalization. This is where we can help.

You deserve a  better quality of life than what you’ve been dealing with, and we can make this happen.  When you join Transitional Cardiac Care, we will provide you with the necessary supplies including a scale, blood pressure cuff, and oxygen sensor much like you would have at your doctors office or hospital.  But, unlike your current home medical supplies, our equipment will send your daily vital signs through the internet to our health record where we are watching for any signs of complications or worsening disease processes.  Together, we can detect early signs and intervene immediately. Your physician will be contacted and updated with your progress or any new changes in your condition and be able to make adjustments to your treatment plan at that time.  Most times treatment is very simple when identified early on, and in progressing cases we can get you into your doctor’s office faster and with greater efficiency. I want to be a resource to you and your physician, so we can keep you out of the hospital and enjoying your life the way you want too.  

What We Need & What You Get

Currently we are working with third party vendors to supply equipment and technology.  And while these services are performing well, we have a larger mission that they are unable to meet.  You see, we envision a much larger application with trending, positive and motivational feedback based on your unique personality type.  We have developed a system that can be monitored in real time anywhere in the world and increase compliance and understanding of the disease process, signs and symptoms, medications, and so much more.  

To do this however, we need to raise money for both equipment and software.  The initial goal is $30,000 but this is just the starting point to reaching our total goal of $100,000.  With this goal we will be able to provide a free app, bluetooth home equipment, and work in conjunction with major home health companies as well as private individuals to improve patient outcomes.  In addition, members of heart failure support groups like Mended Hearts will be able to get extra discounts.

If we do not reach the full goal, then funds will go to the new app and we will continue to work with third party equipment suppliers.  Obviously this is not ideal, and it does limit some of the capabilities of the system, but it time we will achieve this mission.

 

Perks for you:

 

$10 Donation

Hand written note of appreciation from our CEO

Eternal gratitude (and who can put a price on that?

 

$50 Donation

Access to our patient focused educational videos

Hand written note of appreciation from our CEO

 

$100 Donation

15% off home health equipment

Access to our patient focused educational videos

Hand written note of appreciation from our CEO

 

$200 Donation

25% off home health equipment

Access to our patient focused educational videos

Hand written note of appreciation from our CEO

And if we meet our $100,000 goal we will donate equipment and app to a member of Mended Hearts in your name!

$400 Donation

Free home health equipment

Access to our patient focused educational videos

Hand written note of appreciation from our CEO

And if we meet our $100,000 goal we will donate equipment and app to a member of Mended Hearts in your name!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge in accomplishing this is the app development.  There are several apps on the market that can track and monitor vital signs.  But none of them are able to communicate with an electronic health record that your doctor is able to see and review.  None of these apps are designed with the heart failure patient in mind either.  These are all broad based and designed for the general public.  And thats fine for the general public, but I know that you have specific needs that are not being addressed.  Maybe you don't even know what they are yet, but trust me, they are there.  App development is not cheap, fast, or easy and I'm a ER nurse not a app developer.  However, I have teamed with excellent people who are fully dedicated to this project and have their own personal reasons to complete this mission.  1 in 5 people will be diagnosed with some form of heart disease, and we all are affected or know someone who has been affected by heart disease.  Help us reach our goals, so we can help others live their best life.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are financially able to contribute or not you can still help!  Spread the word by sharing this campaign on your social media accounts, the more the better!  Email your friends and family!  Indiegogo make it easy with their share tools.  You can do more than you think with just a simple share.  

Thank you so much, from all of us at Transitional Cardiac Care of Texas.  Be sure to check out our site at www.takecontrolofyourheart.org.

story:
Bad breath dilemma

Lots of people out there struggle with bad breath to some degree. It may ruin your social life. It may limit your career or affect your love life. Visits to dentists, expensive mouthwashes, endless gum chewing, brushing and flossing five times a day may only mask the problem. Chlorine or alcohol-based mouthwashes can make your mouth dry and the problem worse. Brushing - there is only so much you can brush during a busy work day and chewing gum may cause all kinds of adverse health effects. All these solutions focus on the mouth when in some cases, bad breath may originate in the throat (tonsil stones), the esophagus and the stomach (keto breath).

Proposed solution

You may find yourself at your wit's end and start experimenting with various home remedies. I started looking for an organic, additive-free solution for my occasional bouts of bad breath a few years ago. After much research and trial-and-error experiences of my own, I stumbled into parsley. For thousands of years, parsley has been known and used for its anti-fungal, antibacterial and anti-mutagenic properties. Mainly, it can suppress digestive tract bad bacteria growth for extended periods of time. It tastes great. It is natural and healthy and best of all, you can grow it in your own garden.

Parsley seed oil has been used and marketed before in various oral hygiene products, but with varying success. It may not have the same properties as organic parsley. I found parsley to work better, but the only problem was that the parsley extract is perishable.

Manufacturing process

I developed a proprietary blend of various parsley extracts and essential oil combinations. For the base, I used organic grapeseed oil. It is tasteless, odourless and fairly light. Fresh, organic parsley is washed and dried. Then it is milled to a fine consistency and mixed with the base oil. Afterwards, I let it sit for awhile to allow the oil to absorb the parsley extract and for water and particles to settle. The infused oil is then harvested using gravitational pull and further refined using advanced filtering techniques.

The next challenge was how to boost parsley power with a fresh scent. After some experimenting, I tried adding organic mint extract which resulted in a promising product. It has a long shelf life as it is oil based. Mint and parsley act as natural preservatives preventing oil from getting rancid. It is an amber-green, clear liquid. It has a pleasant smell and taste. It also has moisturising properties and helps soothe dry mouth.

Parsleyfier - soothes bad breath

To this day, I use the product myself and came up with the name Parsleyfier. It is an absolute miracle and a life saver. I take about half a teaspoon three times daily, and the results are remarkable. It can be taken either on an empty stomach or after a meal. My breath is usually at its worst after 2 PM, and this is usually the time when most meetings take place at work. Parsleyfier solved the problem and gave me confidence. No more bad breath.

The product is light. It tastes refreshing. It is easy to take, and it works for 2-3 hours. 

How you can help bring the product to the market

I would very much like to share this product with others struggling with the problem of bad breath. However, it needs more work in order to reach the market. I have a domain name reserved - www.parsleyfier.com . I also designed bottling and labelling for the product. I can produce small test batches (50-100 bottles).

To take it to the next level, in addition to my own investment, I require further funding in order to:

  • Refine the recipe and the manufacturing process
  • Purchase equipment for medium-sized batch production
  • Purchase bottling, labels and packaging
  • Fund an online marketing campaign
  • Research liability and insurance requirements

story:
Short Summary

 

Hi I am Dr. Chris Doubae. I have a Ph. D. in Chemical Technology from a leading London College.

Also I have many years of experience with commercial aspects of R&D.

This campaign is important to me as I wish to do something new and useful in the area of reduction in the risk of development of cancers based on real science. Its a subject I have been dealing with for many years now. Its important to give those at risk now options for maintenance of their health.

You could help prove something new and wonderful here for human health.

I do not see many alternatives about - meaning any real ones for those at risk of serious negative internal health developments. We also aim to invest all surplus funds into more R&D.

We need these funds in order to run the test production trials, ship the output to you - the end users -  and to start to build the information base for the evaluation of Brazactin over time.

If you have any concerns regarding your health please consult your local physician.

If you have any concerns regarding these supplements please consult your physician

If you have any possible side effects from taking these supplements please see your physician.

One Capsule is approximately equivalent to one cup of raw brassicas.

story:
NaturalSleep (™ pending) - Get to sleep quickly and stay asleep, naturally.

Poor sleep has obvious negative effects on one’s ability to perform throughout the day.  People who suffer from chronic sleep problems are also at risk for additional long term health risks, including obesity, Heart Disease, Hypertension, Diabetes and reduced life expectancy.  

The sleep aid market is crowded with sedatives as well as natural remedies with varied results.  Our research has identified a formulation with a very high success rate helping people with chronic sleep disorders finally get a great night sleep without the grogginess and side effects of sedatives.   NaturalSleep comes in 2 parts, Doze and Dream. Doze is soothing and will help you wind down and drift off to sleep quickly.  Dream supports getting a deeper, healthier sleep through the night or returning to sleep if you wake briefly.     


As we age our sleep regulatory system becomes less efficient, which can compounded by nighttime habits, like use of computer screens and LCD TVs late at night. NaturalSleep is a supplement that supports our natural sleep regulatory mechanisms, making them more effective. It contains no sedatives and is non-habit forming.  If you have trouble getting to sleep and staying asleep through the night, you will benefit from NaturalSleep balancing the levels in the body to enjoy a full night's’ sleep, waking refreshed.  

 

How does it work?

​

NaturalSleep has proven effective to restore healthy sleep to people who have suffered chronic sleep problems by supplementing the body’s natural sleep regulatory mechanisms.  You can get to sleep and sleep soundly through the night.  For example, melatonin is one ingredient in NaturalSleep.  Melatonin is produced by our pineal gland's. It’s the nocturnal hormone, blocked during daylight hours while our optic nerves are sensing light at the blue end of the spectrum. After hours of darkness and lack of blue spectrum light, our brain's melatonin level rises and encourages sleep. Some peoples’ pineal glands become less effective producing melatonin as they age, therefore reducing mild sedation it provides. Nightime use of televisions and computer screens with high blue spectrum light also suppress natural production of melatonin.  The other ingredients in NaturalSleep work in a similar fashion to restore effectiveness of the body’s natural sleep regulation.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

This campaign will support the initial production of NaturalSleep and the final processes to sell and deliver NaturalSleep to our customers. Ongoing production and distribution will be sustainable at our $25 target sale price.  And our customers will get full healthy nights sleep.

 

Our initial production of NaturalSleep will cost about $50,000, our goal for this campaign.

$25 donors will receive a 60 capsules each of the two part NaturalSleep formula, a 30 to 60 day supply.

$75 donors will receive 3 bottles each of the two part NaturalSleep formula, an estimated 3 to 6 month supply.

To support this project and receive NaturalSleep, select the perk you want and click "Get this Perk"  Selecting "Back It" is counted as a donation and doesn't allow you to enter details like shipping address.   

 

All funds will be refunded if our goal is not met.

 

The primary challenge is funding the production of NaturalSleep.  If this campaign is successful, we will have the capital to fund first and ongoing production and delivery of NaturalSleep to our customers.  If the campaign isn’t fully successful we will return your contribution with our thanks.

As a new venture, we’re sure to experience unforeseen challenges with the continued development, manufacturing and delivery of NaturalSleep.  Our team has over forty years combined experience managing all aspects of successful sales, service and technology companies. We are establishing the relationships and contracts to enable the manufacturing and scale the logistics and distribution of NaturalSleep.  We’ve worked extensively with industry to define all the links in the supply chain to deliver NaturalSleep to our customers. Our US based manufacturer has a 50 year history of success developing products for thousands of companies.  We are also working with industry leaders to support ongoing sales and delivery going forward. These efforts combined with our diverse expertise will enable us to solve any problems that come up.

story:
Kaenz Benefits

 

How does Kaenz work?

 

1- Work with a smartphone app that teaches you the aquatic exercises.

 

2- Perform them with your Kaenz Kit, which includes the k-Belt and several fitness floats.

 

3- Put on your k-Earphone, to interact with this virtual agent, guiding and correcting the movements in the water.

 

4- According to your level and objectives, adapting to your needs rather than using a pre-programmed exercise routine.

 

5- Every time you use Kaenz, you will be cleaning liters of drinking water for the neediest in the world.

 

Kaenz Kit

Kaenz Team

 

 

Kaenz Timeline
