story: …..

Important update:

We are exited to announce that we found a new manufacturer overseas that will significantly lower the cost for Hemotec. This will bring down the retail price to $180 instead of $480 as was calculated from the existing manufacturer. We're planning in our early campaign to offer Hemotec to all our backers for  as low as $ 120.  We also decided to end the campaign and refund all the funds  to our backers because our goal is to make Hemotec accessible to all instead of making our backers pay more for the product. Our next campaign will be launched soon once important adjustments have been made. Thank you again for your support.

 

Introducing relief. Introducing Hemotec.

I have seen first hand the physical and emotional impact of hemorrhoids in people’s lives.

Hemotec is the outcome of a protected Intellectual Property, created to offer a fast and simple solution for people who suffer from this condition. It uses electrotherapy to gently relieve pain, discomfort, and pressure. Treatment plans are programmed and adjusted by each user depending on the severity of the inflammation without the use of harmful medication.

The design of this device is compact and fits right into your pocket giving you the ability to use it discreetly without no one knowing. This allows you to enjoy vacations, spend time with your family and friends, and working while receiving therapy when you need it the most.

The use of Hemotec will result in a pain free, faster, convenient and non-messy treatment for each user. Most importantly, it will bring you relief by removing your pain almost immediately and preventing future complications involving surgeries. The same cannot be said for the present solutions currently available. 

Our main goal is to make this device FDA approved and available worldwide as soon as possible to improve the quality of life for hemorrhoid sufferers. More than 900 million people around the globe will be able to take advantage of this device. We can make relief happen and be part of a transformed and improved way of life.  This worldwide availability vision is not going to come without challenges. Currently, we are working with resources in key countries committed to see this fulfilled in the near future.

We are setting a financial goal of $150,000. Whether reached or not, the funds are to achieve the FDA approval and start the manufacturing of this device. We are very thankful and appreciate all contributions no matter the size. Once approved and manufactured, our contributors will receive the units ordered.

You can still be part of our journey! Another way you could help besides contributing, is to simply get the word out! Please share this campaign using Indiegogo's share tools with friends, family, coworkers and neighbors. This will create momentum around Hemotec and potentially lead to more contributors.
story_txt: Important update:We are exited to announce that we found a new manufacturer overseas that will significantly lower the cost for Hemotec. This will bring down the retail price to $180 instead of $480 as was calculated from the existing manufacturer. We're planning in our early campaign to offer Hemotec to all our backers for  as low as $ 120.  We also decided to end the campaign and refund all the funds  to our backers because our goal is to make Hemotec accessible to all instead of making our backers pay more for the product. Our next campaign will be launched soon once important adjustments have been made. Thank you again for your support. Introducing relief. Introducing Hemotec.I have seen first hand the physical and emotional impact of hemorrhoids in people’s lives.Hemotec is the outcome of a protected Intellectual Property, created to offer a fast and simple solution for people who suffer from this condition. It uses electrotherapy to gently relieve pain, discomfort, and pressure. Treatment plans are programmed and adjusted by each user depending on the severity of the inflammation without the use of harmful medication.The design of this device is compact and fits right into your pocket giving you the ability to use it discreetly without no one knowing. This allows you to enjoy vacations, spend time with your family and friends, and working while receiving therapy when you need it the most.The use of Hemotec will result in a pain free, faster, convenient and non-messy treatment for each user. Most importantly, it will bring you relief by removing your pain almost immediately and preventing future complications involving surgeries. The same cannot be said for the present solutions currently available. Our main goal is to make this device FDA approved and available worldwide as soon as possible to improve the quality of life for hemorrhoid sufferers. More than 900 million people around the globe will be able to take advantage of this device. We can make relief happen and be part of a transformed and improved way of life.  This worldwide availability vision is not going to come without challenges. Currently, we are working with resources in key countries committed to see this fulfilled in the near future.We are setting a financial goal of $150,000. Whether reached or not, the funds are to achieve the FDA approval and start the manufacturing of this device. We are very thankful and appreciate all contributions no matter the size. Once approved and manufactured, our contributors will receive the units ordered.You can still be part of our journey! Another way you could help besides contributing, is to simply get the word out! Please share this campaign using Indiegogo's share tools with friends, family, coworkers and neighbors. This will create momentum around Hemotec and potentially lead to more contributors.

story: Physicians examine patients; take medical histories; prescribe medications; and order, perform, and interpret diagnostic tests. ... Surgeons operate on patients to treat injuries, such as broken bones; diseases, such as cancerous tumors; and deformities, such as cleft palates. 25,000 Dollars is needed for a surgery to enable me hear normal with my ears. Doctor said I need to so that I can live normal in society. This had made me not able to work neither could I be able to learn anything. Because most teachers find it difficult to repeat words when one didn't hear them. Please my good people help me. I am dying.

story:
Becrit es la Proteína de doble calidad, con más beneficios que la proteína animal y más sostenible que la proteína vegetal. Cuida de tu cuerpo y cuida del medioambiente.

Becrit es el ingrediente perfecto para tus recetas proteicas saludables.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Esta Proteína de Doble Alta Calidad se creó para cubrir las necesidades de una nueva generación fitness que desea cuidarse comiendo productos saludables mientras respetan su cuerpo y la naturaleza que les rodea. Con esto en mente, hemos diseñado Becrit con la proteína más revolucionaria.

 

 

Sabiendo que la ganadería representa el 15% de los gases de efecto invernadero, es imperativo que hemos de encontrar nuevas fuentes de proteína sostenibles para nuestro planeta.

 

 

 

 

 

Muchos vegetarianos están dispuestos a comer insectos por 2 razones:

  • Es un alimento muy sostenible con el medio ambiente y no supone ningún peligro para el calentamiento global.
  • Los insectos tienen sistema nervioso central simple sin receptores de sensibilidad, por lo tanto no sufren ningún dolor.

Ser vegetariano es una decisión personal de cada uno tomada por diferentes razones. Nosotros no comemos carne y sí comemos alimentos con proteína de insecto por su contribución nutricional y porque su producción respeta el medio ambiente.

Este tipo de dieta se conoce como entovegetariana.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

La harina de insecto tiene valores proteicos más altos que cualquier otro alimento natural sin procesar. Esto la hace el alimento más eficiente del mundo en términos de proteína.

 

 

 

Los insectos se crían en una granja de Holanda con más de 40 años de experiencia en la cría de insectos. Siguen las estrictas directivas de la UE, así que no usan antibióticos, hormonas ni pesticidas.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Después de meses de investigación, búsqueda y desarrollo, hemos diseñado un polvo de proteína de insecto con unos valores nutricionales impresionantes, una textura muy suave y un sabor dulce y natural.

 

 

 

Becrit Fresa con Chocolate Blanco y un toque de Baobab

Ingredientes: proteína vegetal (soja, guisante), polvo de insecto entero (Alphitobius diaperinus larvae) (14%), miel natural en polvo, betanina (jugo de remolacha en polvo), maltodextrina, arom natural, saborizante, extracto de pulpa de baobab orgánico (0,8%), espesante (goma de xantano), endulzante (sucralosa). / Alérgenos: Gluten, soja. Si eres alérgico a los moluscos, crustáceos o motas de polvo doméstico, es posible que seas alérgico a la proteína de insecto.

Becrit Vainilla con Coco y un toque de Canela

ngredientes: proteína vegetal (soja, guisante), polvo de insecto buffalo entero (Alphitobius diaperinus larvae) (14%), miel natural en polvo, maltodextrina, saborizante (vainilla y coco), canela (0,6%), espesante (goma de xantano), endulzante (sucralosa). / Alérgenos: Gluten, soja. Si eres alérgico a los moluscos, crustáceos o motas de polvo doméstico, es posible que seas alérgico a la proteína de insecto.

Becrit Chocolate con un toque de Maca

Ingredientes: proteína vegetal (soja, guisante), polvo de insecto buffalo entero (Alphitobius diaperinus larvae) (13%), polvo de cacao, miel natural en polvo, extracto de raíz de maca (1,5%), saborizante, espesante (goma de xantano), endulzante (sucralosa). / Alérgenos: Gluten, soja. Si eres alérgico a los moluscos, crustáceos o motas de polvo doméstico, es posible que seas alérgico a la proteína de insecto. ten, soy. If you are allergic to mollusks, crustaceans or house dust mites, you may also be allergic to insect protein.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

En Becrit, tenemos un espíritu de colaboración que abrazamos desde el principio. Después de haber vendido las mejore marcas de productos de entomofagia en Europa, decidimos hacer uestra propia marca. Para lograr esto, unimos a los mejores socios posibles de toda Europa, todos alineados con nuestra filosofía, para crear un producto revolucionario. Para nosotros era esencial encontrar un grupo de empresas que apoyara nuestro proyecto y nuestra filosofía detrás de él. Juntos, a través de nuestros esfuerzos de colaboración hemos avanzado poco a poco para crear el mejor polvo de proteína de insecto del futuro. Ahora, gracias a la comunidad de Indiegogo, estaremos listos para producir el primer Becrit Insect-Protein y dar los primeros pasos para cambiar el mundo.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Al comienzo de Becrit, nos sentamos para hablar del futuro en un chiringuito de la playa mientras bebiamos unos “zumos”. En ese momento escribimos algo que dictaría el camino de nuestras futuras decisiones.

 

 

 

 

 

El Basque Culinary Center es la mejor universidad culinaria de España y un centro de investigación e innovación en el mundo de la alimentación y la gastronomía.

Eligieron a Becrit entre las start-ups gastronómicas con más potencial del país. Nos enseñaron los entresijos del negocio de la alimentación, desde restaurantes hasta online retailers.

Aprovechamos este momento para mostrar nuestra gratitud al BCC por todo lo que aprendimos, por toda la ayuda que nos ofrecieron y, por su puesto, por los buenos amigos que hicimos en el camino.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Youth sports community

  

A group of young people set up an online and offline sports platform. Because of the prevalence of covid-19 virus, our project had to be stranded.

If you are interested in it, please help us through the difficulties. We will also record your contact information while thanking you, and give you corresponding discounts after the platform goes online.

A group of young people set up an online and offline sports platform. Because of the prevalence of covid-19 virus, our project had to be stranded.
If you are interested in it, please help us through the difficulties. We will also record your contact information while thanking you, and give you corresponding discounts after the platform goes online.

story:
Each WearME sensor can track your body posture and temperature, monitor your heart and lungs, and improve your health at home or when on-the-go. It consists of the smart sensor, custom jacket, and companion application.

WearME is the first ever multi-modal sensing solution that can be used to capture both physiological and range-of-motion data at any point along the body.

 

The WearME companion application is easy to use and includes a personal avatar that acts both as a data interpreter and personal trainer. You can customize your companion avatar to look like you or anyone you want. 

 

WearME is founded by a strong team with over 50 years of cumulative experience. We are backed by research from Intel and the National Science Foundation and have published peer-reviewed papers about WearME to top journals.

It consists of the smart sensor, custom jacket, and companion application.WearME is the first ever multi-modal sensing solution that can be used to capture both physiological and range-of-motion data at any point along the body. The WearME companion application is easy to use and includes a personal avatar that acts both as a data interpreter and personal trainer. You can customize your companion avatar to look like you or anyone you want.  WearME is founded by a strong team with over 50 years of cumulative experience. We are backed by research from Intel and the National Science Foundation and have published peer-reviewed papers about WearME to top journals.

story:
People are Sitting More Than Ever

People are sitting too much.  Back pain is epidemic.  Doctors say "Sitting is the new smoking".  Now there's a chair that eliminates the harmful posture caused by all conventional chairs.
story_txt: People are Sitting More Than EverPeople are sitting too much.  Back pain is epidemic.  Doctors say "Sitting is the new smoking".  Now there's a chair that eliminates the harmful posture caused by all conventional chairs.

story:
Growiti is the World’s first NFC-based soil moisture sensor that enables you to know when to water and how much your potted plants simply using a smartphone or tablet.


English

Growiti: mobile phones become gardeners thanks to an app which controls plant watering -www.andalusianstories.com/the-story-of-the-day/


Spanish

Growiti: el móvil convertido en jardinero con una app que controla el riego de las plantas -http://www.historiasdeluz.es/?s=growiti&x=0&y=0


French

Growiti: le mobile converti en jardinier avec une app qui contrôle l’arrosage des plantes -  http://nouvellesdelandalousie.com/category/lhistoire-du-jour/


German

Growiti: le mobile converti en jardinier avec une app qui contrôle l’arrosage des plantes -http://nachrichtenausandalusien.com/nachricht-des-tages/growiti-giessen-kontrolliert


Chinese

Growiti: 手机变成园丁，应用程序控制花盆植物的浇水情况 - http://andaluxiyaxinwen.com/zhiwu-jiaoshui


Russian

Growiti – мобильное приложение контролирует полив комнатных растений -http://novostiandalusii.com/growiti-poliv-komnatnyh-rastenii/




There’s plenty of solutions at market that promise to detect when watering plants, but they come to be in many cases useless, very expensive, complex and not easily to understand, showing thousands of insignificant data.


That’s why we create Growiti, a smart system focused on the essentials giving you a straight answer on your NFC enabled smartphone or tablet: when to water. For those who love the data, they can also check percentages, charts, etc. Growiti becomes the most affordable existing solution.


What makes Growiti to gain advantage over current solutions arises from its technical features. The system is battery free, what means battery and charging system are not required making Growiti energy efficient too. We are manufacturing our prototypes using a 0.6 mm thickness PCB.  Flexible circuits are more cost-effective and it can be encapsulated like a label. Plus, the adopted contactless NFC technology avoids any installation and ongoing maintenance.













Dimensions: 59 High x 59 Wide x 3.2 Deep (mm)
Physical type: Flexible sensor encapsulate in polyethylene
Use environment: Indoor & outdoor
Standard: ISO 15693 and ISO 18000-3 mode 1 compatible
Technology: 13.56 MHz ±7k Hz carrier frequency
UID: Yes 64 bits.
Hmin: 1.6A/m
Pmin: 30mW
Color: customizable laminated image
Operating temperature: -10ºC to 65ºC


We are about to reach the definitive prototype before starting mass production, but we need your help. As a part of the development of the product, we are recruitment beta testers to try and experiment with Growiti. This is known as the users experience testing stage.
  • Become one of the earliest adopters of Growiti and get access to the latest before anyone.
  • Be a part of the exciting building of Growiti.
  • Receive special mention at our beta tester wall.
  • Be a leading decision maker.
  • Give your potted plants a healthier life. They never will dry up because of overwatering or underwatering.


We just need you take care of your potted plants and complete voluntarily an anonymous online survey at the end of the test.


Support us to become a beta tester. Check the rewards list and make your choice.




- SHIPPING INCLUDED.

- Beta version delivery is scheduled on Octuber 2015.






This campaign has two goals:

  • Test users’ experience with Growiti.
  • Raise funds enough to make possible the mass production.

Growiti has built many working prototypes so far, but the main contest is still pending, to test the product with users from over the world that help us to improve and adjust the current prototype before launching the final version.


What are your funds for?

  • Setting mass production.
  • Start-up costs.


By helping us, you’re contributing to make a more breathable and restful world. In return, you’ll be one of the earliest adopters of Growiti and get access the latest updates before anyone.



Growiti
La Gitanilla, 17, Oficina 13
Malaga, Ma 29005

Spain

www.growiti.com

hello@growiti.com



What consists the prize of a beta tester of?

You’ll be a part of this exciting project and get access to the latest before anyone else becoming an early adopter. Beta testers will take part of the building of Growiti and his name will be shown on our website. Plus, they will get one unit of Growiti for free on ocassion of the launching if the make a order.

Is this the release candidate?

The version of Growiti you'll get is a working prototype. The release candidate will be developed after collected and evaluated all your opinions.

I’m already a beta tester, what am I supposed to do?

Enjoy the experience and experiment whilst you take care of your potted plants. At the end of the probationary period you will voluntary and anonymously fill in an online survey. That’s all.

What can I grow with Growiti?

You can grow any houseplant, both indoor and outdoor. But please, consider that Growiti only works on potted plants.

How many plants can I track with my mobile device?

You can install and track so many plants as you have. Growiti app is not limited to a fix number of sensor.

How big is the soil moisture sensor?

We are building Growiti in a 50x50mm size.

Where should I bury the soil moisture sensor?

To have a better performance and avoid noise and signal break down, consider burying your sensor next to the pot border.

Can I use Growiti in a garden or outdoor?

You can use Growiti exclusively in potted plants, no matters if they are indoor or outdoor. Cultivating plants in pots is the only requirement.

Does “battery free” means I don’t have to charge it?

Yes, Growiti is energy efficient. You can power it by using your NFC smartphone or tablet because of its energy harvesting system.

Which smartphone and tablet are supported?

Growiti is 100% compatible with all mobile devices with near field communication (NFC) capability. Click to check the LIST OF NFC-ENABLE DEVICES. 

Currently we are running on Android devices. Later Q3, we will finish windows phone compatibility. Apple has not enabled NFC yet in spite of newest iPhone 6 is equipped with this technology, but iPhone 6 NFC functionality is expected to open up later.

Will there be a fee for the service or app?

No, definitely. The service and the app will be always free for all Growiti’s users.

Do I need any tools to install my Growiti?

Not at all. The adopted contactless NFC technology avoids any installation and ongoing maintenance. The Growiti sensor is buried in your potted plant soil.

What about the shipping?

Estimated delivered date for testing model is scheduled on Octuber 2015. Keep in mind this date could change due to production fluctuation.

What about sunlight, pH and EC?  

Sunlight, pH and EC are important when you are growing plants, but apply the exact amount of water is the most important factor to keep your plants healthy. If we reach our goal with this campaign, we will consider to add more functionalities to our product.

Why is neccesary to consider the soil type?

Soil has pores which are the spaces that exist between soil particles. In this space may be water or air. The soil's ability to retain water is strongly related to particle size; water molecules hold more tightly to the fine particles of a clay soil than to coarser particles of a sandy soil, so clays generally retain more water. 

When you are configuring your plant inside the Growiti app, it will ask you what kind of soil you have in your pot. This information will be added to our algorithm to predict when the plant must be watered.

Are the Growiti´s waterproof?

Yes, Growiti was designed to be waterproof.


Risks and challgenges

We recognize that it’s impossible to plan for every risk. But our team deep experiences and skills we can meet any challenge that comes along. 
We have already prototyped the product and it works, the technology is proven and we are on the user experience testing stage. We have an experienced team but high-tech products are difficult and problems will arise on order fulfillment. We know that we can deliver within the estimated delivery timeframe.

Disclaimer

The pictures of Growiti are of prototypes. Small changes to improve your experience will most definitely occur before you receive your Growiti! Please contact us if you have questions.
story_txt:
Growiti is the World’s first NFC-based soil moisture sensor that enables you to know when to water and how much your potted plants simply using a smartphone or tablet.English
Growiti: mobile
phones become gardeners thanks to an app which controls plant watering -www.andalusianstories.com/the-story-of-the-day/
Spanish
Growiti: el móvil convertido en jardinero
con una app que controla el riego de las plantas -http://www.historiasdeluz.es/?s=growiti&x=0&y=0
French
Growiti: le mobile converti en jardinier
avec une app qui contrôle l’arrosage des plantes - 
  
  http://nouvellesdelandalousie.com/category/lhistoire-du-jour/ 
German
Growiti: le mobile converti en jardinier
avec une app qui contrôle l’arrosage des plantes -http://nachrichtenausandalusien.com/nachricht-des-tages/growiti-giessen-kontrolliert
ChineseGrowiti: 手机变成园丁，应用程序控制花盆植物的浇水情况 - http://andaluxiyaxinwen.com/zhiwu-jiaoshui
RussianGrowiti
– мобильное приложение контролирует полив комнатных растений -http://novostiandalusii.com/growiti-poliv-komnatnyh-rastenii/There’s
plenty of solutions at market that promise to detect when watering plants, but
they come to be in many cases useless, very
expensive, complex and not easily to understand, showing thousands of
insignificant data. 
That’s why we create Growiti, a smart system focused on the essentials
giving you a straight answer on your NFC enabled smartphone or tablet: when
to water. For those who love the data, they can also check percentages, charts,
etc. Growiti becomes the most affordable existing solution.

What makes Growiti to
gain advantage over current solutions arises from its technical features. The
system is battery free, what means battery and charging system are not required
making Growiti energy efficient too. We are manufacturing our prototypes using
a 0.6 mm thickness PCB.  Flexible circuits are more
cost-effective and it can be encapsulated like a label. Plus, the adopted
contactless NFC technology avoids any installation and ongoing maintenance.
Dimensions: 59 High x 59 Wide x 3.2 Deep (mm)Physical type: Flexible sensor encapsulate in polyethyleneUse environment: Indoor & outdoorStandard: ISO 15693 and ISO 18000-3 mode 1 compatibleTechnology: 13.56 MHz ±7k Hz carrier frequencyUID: Yes 64 bits.Hmin: 1.6A/mPmin: 30mWColor: customizable laminated imageOperating temperature: -10ºC to 65ºCWe are
about to reach the definitive prototype before starting mass production, but we need
your help. As a part of the development of the product, we are recruitment beta
testers to try and experiment with Growiti. This is known as the users experience testing stage.


Become one
of the earliest adopters of Growiti and get access to the latest before anyone.
Be a part
of the exciting building of Growiti.
Receive special
mention at our beta tester wall.
Be a
leading decision maker.
Give your potted
plants a healthier life. They never will dry up because of overwatering or
underwatering.

We just
need you take care of your potted plants and complete voluntarily an anonymous online survey at the end of the
test.
Support us
to become a beta tester. Check the rewards list and make your choice.
- SHIPPING
INCLUDED.- Beta version delivery is scheduled on Octuber 2015.


This
campaign has two goals:

Test users’
experience with Growiti.
Raise funds
enough to make possible the mass production.

Growiti has
built many working prototypes so far, but the main contest is still pending, to
test the product with users from over the world that help us to improve and
adjust the current prototype before launching the final version.
What are
your funds for?

Setting
mass production.
Start-up
costs.

By helping us,
you’re contributing to make a more breathable and restful world. In return, you’ll
be one of the earliest adopters of Growiti and get access the latest updates before
anyone.
GrowitiLa Gitanilla, 17, Oficina 13Malaga, Ma  29005 Spain






www.growiti.com
hello@growiti.com

What consists the prize of a beta tester of?
You’ll be a part of this exciting
project and get access to the latest before anyone else becoming an early
adopter. Beta testers will take part of the building of Growiti and his name
will be shown on our website. Plus, they will get one unit of Growiti for free on ocassion of the launching if the make a order.

Is this the release candidate?The version of Growiti you'll get is a working prototype. The release candidate will be developed after collected and evaluated
all your opinions.


I’m already a beta tester, what am I supposed to do?
Enjoy the experience and experiment
whilst you take care of your potted plants. At the end of the probationary
period you will voluntary and anonymously fill in an online survey. That’s all.

What can I grow with Growiti?
You can grow any houseplant, both
indoor and outdoor. But please, consider that Growiti only works on potted
plants.
How many plants can I track with my mobile device?
You can install and track so many plants
as you have. Growiti app is not limited to a fix number of sensor.

How big is the soil moisture sensor?
We are building Growiti in a 50x50mm
size.
Where should I bury the soil moisture sensor?
To have a better performance and
avoid noise and signal break down, consider burying your sensor next to the pot
border.

Can I use Growiti in a garden or outdoor?
You can use Growiti exclusively in potted
plants, no matters if they are indoor or outdoor. Cultivating plants in pots is
the only requirement.
Does “battery free” means I don’t have to charge it?
Yes, Growiti is energy efficient. You
can power it by using your NFC smartphone or tablet because of its energy
harvesting system. 
Which smartphone and tablet are supported?
Growiti is 100% compatible with all mobile
devices with near field communication (NFC) capability. Click to check the LIST OF NFC-ENABLE DEVICES. 
Currently we are running on Android
devices. Later Q3, we will finish windows phone compatibility. Apple has not
enabled NFC yet in spite of newest iPhone 6 is equipped with this technology,
but iPhone 6 NFC functionality is expected to open up later.
Will there be a fee for the service or app?
No, definitely. The service and the
app will be always free for all Growiti’s users.
Do I need any tools to install my Growiti?
Not at all. The adopted contactless
NFC technology avoids any installation and ongoing maintenance. The Growiti sensor
is buried in your potted plant soil. 
What about the shipping?
Estimated delivered date for testing
model is scheduled on Octuber 2015. Keep in mind this date could change due to production fluctuation.
What
about sunlight, pH and EC?  
Sunlight,
pH and EC are important when you are growing plants, but apply the exact amount
of water is the most important factor to keep your plants healthy. If we reach
our goal with this campaign, we will consider to add more functionalities to
our product.
Why is
neccesary to consider the soil type?
Soil has pores
which are the spaces that exist between soil particles. In this space may be
water or air. The soil's ability to retain water is strongly related to
particle size; water molecules hold more tightly to the fine particles of
a clay soil than to coarser particles
of a sandy soil, so clays generally retain more water. 
When you
are configuring your plant inside the Growiti app, it will ask you what kind of
soil you have in your pot. This information will be added to our algorithm to
predict when the plant must be watered.
Are the
Growiti´s waterproof?
Yes,
Growiti was designed to be waterproof.
Risks and challgengesWe recognize that it’s impossible to plan for every risk. But our team deep experiences and skills we can meet any challenge that comes along. 
We have already prototyped the product and it works, the technology is proven and we are on the user experience testing stage. We have an experienced team but high-tech products are difficult and problems will arise on order fulfillment. We know that we can deliver within the estimated delivery timeframe.DisclaimerThe pictures of Growiti are of prototypes. Small changes to improve your experience will most definitely occur before you receive your Growiti! Please contact us if you have questions.

story:
Dr-Jack is a wearable device that contains lifesaving information of the owner.

(Versione Italiana qui)

- How to use it

With Dr-Jack you can store all the information about your health status, allergies, diseases, blood type, previous surgeries, emergency phone numbers (ICE) and take them always with you. In case of need, accident, faint, or if you are not able to communicate, the rescuer can read in a simple and easy way the data stored in Dr-jack so to help the injured in the best way as possible.

- How it works

Dr-Jack connects to all devices, such as smartphones and tablet and with any operating system (Android, iOS, etc.), through the headphone jack and alongside with the App you can chose which data to make accessible to the rescuer and which one to protect with password.

- For whom

With Dr-Jack you can protect your relatives and you can know they are protect even when not home.

Think of your children, if they have any allergies or diseases with Dr-Jack, a teacher or anyone, at school in the gym or anywhere else, can get to know their particular needs so they will not be unprepared in case of emergency.

Think of your grandparents, as well. When they go outside for a walk, if they suffer from Alzheimer, they could get lost and forget how to get back home. If they wear Dr-Jack anyone, with a smartphone or a tablet and the App, can read the number of a relative and contact them; in this way, you can give an immediate help.

- The technology

Dr-Jack is an extremely innovative product that uses a widespread communication system, so used that any device can read the data: the headphone jack that any smartphone, tablet and pc have and it is compatible with every operating system, such as Android and iOS.

Download the App, connect Dr-Jack and you will be able to read all the data in the App or on the Website.

Privacy is guaranteed thanks to the jack, because data is read only when Dr-Jack is physically connected to the device.

Bluetooth technology was not chosen because the 2.0 version required paring, so a PIN number that could not be given in case of faint of the injured. The 4.0 version, instead, would have given easy access to personal data to anyone even at many meters away and the older devices would have not been capable of this technology.

The NFC technology was not chosen, as well, because not every device have it integrated and some, such as Apple’s device, would not permit access to third party App.

Dr-Jack, instead, is universal, easy, fast, intuitive and works without battery!

Download the free app on iOS: bit.ly/dr-jack_ios and Android: bit.ly/dr-jack_android soon on Windows Phone too.

- What we need & what you get

Dr-Jack, at this time, is only a perfectly functioning prototype and to make it smaller and easier to wear, we need your help and support.

Depending on how much money we will rise thanks to your support, the team can decide the material to use, certify the device according to the law and, why not, we could make it become a lifesaving jewel!

The team worked hard to make it compatible with iOS and Android. Thanks to your support we could make it compatible with Windows phone OS and other devices, such as PCs and Macs, as well. After all everything has got a headphone jack, right?!

Dr-Jack is just one-step away from you. What are you waiting for? Pre-order one now!

Saving a life is very important for us. What about you?

(concept)

Versione Italiana

Dr-Jack è un dispositivo salvavita che contiene le informazioni sanitarie di chi lo indossa.


- Come si usa

Con Dr-Jack puoi memorizzare tutte le informazioni sul tuo stato di salute, eventuali allergie, patologie, gruppo sanguigno, interventi subiti, etc., anche i tuoi numeri di emergenza (ICE) e portarli sempre con te. In caso di necessità, incidente, malore, se non si è in grado di comunicare, chiunque soccorra, potrà leggere in modo semplice ed immediato i dati sanitari salvati su Dr-Jack e aiutare l'infortunato nel miglior modo possibile. 


- Come funziona

Dr-Jack si collega a tutti i dispositivi come smartphone e tablet, con qualsiasi sistema operativo (Android, iOS, etc), tramite l'ingresso audio (jack) delle cuffie e con l’app Dr-Jack puoi decidere quali dati memorizzare, quali rendere accessibili a chi soccorre e quali proteggere con una password. 


- Per chi

Con Dr-Jack puoi proteggere i tuoi cari e saperli al sicuro quando sono fuori casa. 

Pensa ai tuoi figli, se hanno particolari allergie o altre patologie con Dr-Jack un’insegnante o qualunque persona, a scuola, in palestra o in qualsiasi altro posto, potrà venire a conoscenza delle loro particolari esigenze, comportarsi di conseguenza e non sarà impreparato in caso di pericolo. 

Pensa anche ai tuoi nonni. Quando escono per fare una passeggiata, se soffrono di Alzheimer, potrebbero perdersi e non ricordare più come tornare a casa. Se indossano il loro Dr-Jack, chiunque, con uno smartphone o un tablet e l’app-Dr jack installata, potrà leggere il numero di un parente da avvertire e contattarlo dando così un primo aiuto immediato. 


- La tecnologia

Dr-Jack è un prodotto estremamente innovativo che utilizza un sistema di comunicazione comune, talmente comune che tutti i dispositivi possono leggerne il contenuto: il jack delle cuffie, che smartphone, tablet, pc hanno ed è compatibile con qualsiasi sistema operativo come Android, iOS.

Basta scaricare l'app, inserire facilmente Dr-Jack e potrete leggere tutti i dati inseriti tramite la stessa app o sul sito web.

La privacy è garantita dal jack in quanto i dati vengono letti solo se viene inserito fisicamente Dr-Jack sul tablet o smartphone.

Non abbiamo scelto la tecnologia Bluetooth perché la versione 2.0 necessita di pairing e quindi di PIN che non può essere fornito in caso di incoscienza dell'infortunato. La versione 4.0 invece, avrebbe fornito facile accesso ai dati personali a chiunque anche a diversi metri di distanza e i dispositivi più datati non sarebbero stati compatibili.

L'NFC, invece, non è stato scelto perché non tutti i device lo hanno integrato ed alcuni, come Apple, non permettono l'accesso alle App di terze parti.

Il nostro Dr-Jack invece è universale, facile, veloce, intuitivo e funziona senza batteria!

Scarica la nostra app gratuita su iOS: bit.ly/dr-jack_ios e Android: bit.ly/dr-jack_android presto anche su Windows Phone

- Come puoi esserci d'aiuto

Dr-Jack attualmente è un prototipo perfettamente funzionante e affinché diventi più piccolo e facilmente indossabile, abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto.

In base alla cifra che raggiungeremo grazie al tuo supporto, potremo scegliere il materiale con cui realizzarlo, certificarlo secondo le norme vigenti e, perché no, potremo farlo diventare un gioiello salvavita!

Abbiamo lavorato per renderlo compatibile per iOS e Android. Grazie al tuo aiuto diventerà compatibile anche con Windows Phone e i dispositivi fissi come PC e Mac. D'altronde tutto possiede un ingresso Jack, no?!

Dr-Jack è solo ad un passo da te. Cosa aspetti a prenotarne uno?

Salvare una vita per noi è davvero importante. Per te?


(concept)

story:
I am John OLoughlin, Boat Builder, Inventor and Designer 

One day I was sitting by the water, just up from the Harbour. It was a nice sunny day. I saw a man trying to get on his paddle board.The board just kept rolling and moving away from him, on and on, each time he tried. Then he just give up and lay down on his board, let his paddle go and started using his hands to paddle his board. I felt sorry for him. He was not a old man but maybe not a very fit man. This was on my mind so I started looking into it . My research found this to be a huge problem. Paddle boards are like small yachts and a yacht without a keel is not stable and just wants to roll. Paddle boarding  can be very challenging for most of us at any time. To cut a long story short we now have a Stand Up Paddle Keel Board, the Ezyrider. This paddle board will help a lot of people who may find it hard to get started in the sport of paddle boarding.

The project is now at the tooling stage .This will take  2 two 3 weeks. Our 3 D manufacture design is ready for the tooling stage. Production time is two months. Product will be ready for shipping . July / August  2017.

I am now ready to tool up and start manufacturing the Ezyrider Paddle Keel Board. It would be great to have you on board. Your help would bring this project to reality and would be very much appreciated .

Thanks guys,

John OLoughlin.

story:
We need your help to change the world!

Non-profit organization

Read more:

https://organ-tree.com

Individuals register on Organtree either as a future organ donors or recipients. Future donors also nominate someone as their beneficiary in the process.

When an Organtree registered Donor is deceased, his / her organs become available for donation to Organtree recipients.

Hospital staff access the Organtree system to identify the most suitable recipients.

Once a match is found and the recipient chooses to accept the donated organ/s, the recipient compensates the Donor's beneficiaries by an agreed upon amount.

 

 

 

https://organ-tree.com

story:
THIS campaign to raise financial support for advocacy for homeopathy provides multiple perks for each level of contribution.  If you prefer to donate to a non-profit organization that supports the work of Dana Ullman, MPH, CCH, and then, get a tax-deductible donation, go to the separate campaign HERE (!)  for that.

Dana Ullman seeks your financial support to help "cure" the misinformation that exists for homeopathy. Many of Dana's articles have provided a very compelling statement for homeopathy. Drawing from high quality medical and scientific research as well as from history, Dana's advocacy is appreciated by people all over the world.

In mid-July, 2018, an important homeopathic research conference  is taking place at the Royal Society of Medicine in London, England.  Two Nobel Prize-winning scientists will be presenting, including Luc Montagnier, MD (the physician/scientist who discovered the AIDS virus!) and Brian Josephson, PhD (who got his Nobel Prize in Physics when he was just 23 years old...he is now a Professor at Cambridge).

Dana needs to attend this conference and report on it...he cannot self-fund projects like this anymore...instead, he NEEDS community support to attend this special one-of-a-kind conference...and for the time and energy to write about the conference and then to help promote whatever he writes about it via social media.

Dana also plans to provide ongoing advocacy for homeopathy during this next year as the FDA makes its decisions on how they plan to regulate homeopathic medicines.  Dana has already begun to write about this subject here at the famed Mercola.com website.

Dana has a long history of successfully advocating for homeopathy, including writing chapters on homeopathy in FOUR medical textbooks (two of which were published by Oxford University Press...and none of which he received a single penny for this important work).  

Dana has also written a collection of 40 articles (!) at the famed HuffingtonPost (click here  to access this important body of information).

The bottomline is that Dana is NOT asking for a handout; he is asking for a donation to a non-profit organization that helps to fund his important advocacy work.  And as you will discover, you will get real tangible gifts back to you for each level of support you provide.  And beyond this gifts will be REAL and COMPELLING advocacy for homeopathy (which is certainly vital in today's world).

Many of Dana's articles have provided a very compelling statement for homeopathy. Drawing from high quality medical and scientific research as well as from history, Dana's advocacy is appreciated by people all over the world.In mid-July, 2018, an important homeopathic research conference  is taking place at the Royal Society of Medicine in London, England.  Two Nobel Prize-winning scientists will be presenting, including Luc Montagnier, MD (the physician/scientist who discovered the AIDS virus!) and Brian Josephson, PhD (who got his Nobel Prize in Physics when he was just 23 years old...he is now a Professor at Cambridge).Dana needs to attend this conference and report on it...he cannot self-fund projects like this anymore...instead, he NEEDS community support to attend this special one-of-a-kind conference...and for the time and energy to write about the conference and then to help promote whatever he writes about it via social media.Dana also plans to provide ongoing advocacy for homeopathy during this next year as the FDA makes its decisions on how they plan to regulate homeopathic medicines.  Dana has already begun to write about this subject here at the famed Mercola.com website.Dana has a long history of successfully advocating for homeopathy, including writing chapters on homeopathy in FOUR medical textbooks (two of which were published by Oxford University Press...and none of which he received a single penny for this important work).  Dana has also written a collection of 40 articles (!) at the famed HuffingtonPost (click here  to access this important body of information).The bottomline is that Dana is NOT asking for a handout; he is asking for a donation to a non-profit organization that helps to fund his important advocacy work.  And as you will discover, you will get real tangible gifts back to you for each level of support you provide.  And beyond this gifts will be REAL and COMPELLING advocacy for homeopathy (which is certainly vital in today's world).

story:
simply apply to pulse points, breathe deeply, and BeBetter

 

~ NO SYNTHETIC OILS ~ NO PESTICIDES ~ ORGANIC ~

 

  

 

one of the most powerful forms of plant based medicines

 

                

 

 

 

 

Today, they've proven these alternative medicines can help fight cancer, preventing cell growth or even apoptosis (cancer cell death). Similarly they can improve cognitive health including those diagnosed with Alzheimers, dementia, brain injury, or to improve memory, cellular function and more...

 

 

   

 

  

 

Here are some interesting facts on the research and benefits of essential oils used in our blends:

 

Valerian essential oils help to improve sleep quality, calm gastrointestinal troubles, reduce heart palpitations, protect the skin, reduce nervous disorders, lower blood pressure, stimulate cognitive ability, eliminate anxiety, and lessen menstrual cramps, among others.

Frankincense contains the compound pinyin, helps with your immune system, contains anti inflamatory properties

Lavender oil is the no1 used essential oil, used especially for relaxation

Lemon is great for the lymphatic system and uplifting the spirit

Peppermint is a great natural energiser and good for digestion

Lemongrass has antimicrobial properties and gives a great energy boost

Rosemary is reported to help promote the regeneration of neurological tissue, it improves memory, helps you focus, improves organ functions such as the prostate and gallbladder, it helps with neuropathy and neuralgia, and much more!

Cedarwood oil is great for relieving stress and tension and has a calming effect on the mind. The aroma of cedarwood encourages the release of serotonin, which helps to stabilize moods. 

             

 

Frequent mistakes with essential oils:

  • Using them internally/ingestion
  • Diffusers: over use can have adverse affects
  • Direct inhalation - this should be limited

 

This is why at BeBetterOils we use a pocket sized rollerball. With quick access you simply apply to pulse points on your wrist or neck and breathe deeply.

 

 

Our vision reflects our commitment to deliver products that do not contain the following:

~ Petroleum ~ Sulfates (SLS, SLES, etc) ~ Synthetic colours and fragrances ~ 

~ Harmful chemical and preservative ~

 

simply apply to pulse points, breathe deeply, and BeBetter

  

The essential oils are all organic, and sourced throughout Europe.

CBD cannabinol oil is a legal oil taken from the cannabis plant. It's health benefits are unparalleled and it's a primary ingredient in the anti-cancer oil and the CBD oil blends.

 

BeBetterOils is a UK company with logistics based in Asia, Europe and the USA. We have fulfilment partners lined up, and our team members have been involved in crowdfunding projects which have raised over $1million. We understand the challenges of campaigning, production, and fulfilment - we aim to maintain a high level of response to our backers and to delivery a quality product, on time, and that our backers will rave about with pride.

 

Thank you for helping us make this happen.

100% REAL ORGANIC TEAS

 

70% OFF RETAIL

 

 

REAL ORGANIC FRUITS & ALL NATURAL FLAVOURS

- INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE -

3 MONTHS OF TEA (6 OZ)

                           

 

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE 

FREE DELUXE TEA STEEPER & COFFEE PRESS

INDEGOGO EXCLUSIVE 

   ONE FREE ORDER OF ROCK SUGAR

 

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE 

FREE ONE YEAR MEMBERSHIP.

                                                     

WHATS REALLY IN YOUR TEA?

Pesticides are a big problem in tea production, and since tea can’t be washed before it’s packaged, the only way to rid it of pesticides and other chemical residue is to never use them in the first place. There are a select few producers, and processors of organic tea, in the varieties that you love from your favorite tea companies who actually do that. At Good Earth, we only deal with 100% organic tea farms, using real organic fruits and flavours. The result we think is the world best Tea delivered right to your door – all at up to 70% off retail! 

30 COUNTRIES, 151 TEAS, ONE EPIC CUP!

We’ve spent a lifetime cultivating excellent taste in tea. With your contribution today, we look to expand our selections, stock for distribution; buying and keeping our suppliers of teas, other products, perks, etc. satisfied to meet the great demand we plan to encounter all over the world, and offering more to you for less. We also wish to attract the talents of top web developers, designers, and pair with suppliers for other necessities to get us a stable launch.

 

ITS ONLY GETS BETTER! 

70% OFF RETAIL.

At Good Earth  you get your favorite tea-shopping experience without the markup of the mall and the hazards of contaminants.

Our motto is simple: People first! We are proud of what we do and share our products with our friends, children and families. Better Tea, and Better Prices is not a privilege its a right.!

 

WE CARE, INCLUDED!

Honestly, how many companies make a product that benefits you more that it benefits their pockets, their futures and so on.

Our team has been working hard on this for over two years now, and to show our thank to you, our we have some really special offers starting at just $15.  Invite your tea-loving friends to check us out on social media, and teavolve with the Good Earth Tea today!

 

    Pass it on!

    if you can't help us by financial means, then at least help us spread the word and get your few bucks ready for our launch, so you can experience the evolution of better products at a better prices, and feel the difference of a company that actually cares about the customer more than getting rich. 100% organic teas from all over the world is where we decided to start, because we are tea lovers, and such a launch will give the the consistent capital to move into other fields with a name recognized all over the world with the cedentials to better serve you.

    OTHER INDIEGOGO SPECIALS

    GOOD EARTH TEA STARTER: $15

    RETAIL: $25

     

     

     

    TEA TEST DRIVE: $25

    RETAIL: $40

     

     

    TEA, ROCK SUGAR AND MORE: $75

    RETAIL: $150

     

     

    THE ULTIMATE PERK: $99

    RETAIL: $225

story:
Meet

MoBee Smart~Air

 


 

MoBee Smart~Air... an all in one Smart Air System

 

MoBee Smart~Air monitors the air around you and eliminates viruses, bacteria, dust, allergens smoke, and harmful pollutants from the air you breath.

 

Breathing polluted air puts your health at risk.

 

Most People Spend 90% Of Their Time Indoors......Not realizing that the indoor air they're breathing may be much more polluted than the air

Effectively purifies the air with it's multi-layer filter.

  • Pre-filter
  •  Hepa filter
  • Activated carbon filter
  • Activated carbon grid
  • Plus, an Ionizer to eliminate particles that are too small to small to filter out.

Eliminates viruses, bacteria, smoke, dust, pollen, allergens, VOCs (gaseous chemicals) & extremely harmful PM2.5 "fine particulate matter" pollution. 

 

 

 

Wireless & Portable ~ So It Can Go Anywhere!

 

Take MoBee Smart~Air from your home, to the car & to the office...With a long lasting lithium battery it can go anywhere you need fresh, clean air.

 

Conveniently recharges from a standard ac outlet, a 12v car outlet adapter, or even from your laptop or desktop USB port.

 

Charging Options

 

Car Kit Accessories $39 Value - Free
 

Kit Includes:

  • The car kit contains a stand with a magnetic attachment to hold the purifier securely in place.
  • It also comes with a non-slip mat for placing the MoBee Smart~Air on a flat surface
  • And... a band that can be used to attach the purifier to the back of a headrest.

 

 

 

Dedicated mobile app ~ for a truly smart system

 

You can view the air quality data & control the purifier all from your mobile phone. Check CO2 & PM2.5 (fine particulate matters) levels in your air & view the air temperature.

Remote start, timer function & fan speed control...all from your phone.

 

Why did we develop MoBee Smart~Air?

 

Fresh, clean air is something that is vital to our health and well being. Clean air should be available wherever we go, but we don't always have a choice in the air quality that we breath...until now.

Is the air inside your work place clean? Or...is it full of germs...pollution...allergens?

How would you even know?

How clean is the air inside your car? Dust, allergens, industrial pollutants, car exhaust...is something that all motorist are exposed to and is extremely unhealthy to breath.

 

The EPA has stated that indoor air quality can be up to 100x worse than the air outdoors....and that includes our offices and work areas.

Also, exposure to car exhaust and external pollutants when driving can contribute to both lung cancer & heart attacks.

  • The American College of Allergist states that 50% of all illnesses are caused or aggravated by polluted indoor air.

 

Poor indoor air quality is a concern year round...however, during the colder months we tend to keep windows and doors shut, which can make the air quality even worse. colder months are also prime cold and flu season!

 

The air inside many office buildings is unhealthy for several reasons.

  • Inadequate ventilation is caused by “sealing” a building. Sealing a building helps prevent air from leaking out, which reduces overall energy costs. However, this has been identified as a major contributor to worker-reported health problems.

 

  • Micro-organisms or bacteria may get trapped in the ventilation system and can be spread throughout the building by way of the ventilation system. 
  • Viruses & bacteria spread very easily throughout the air, especially when people are in close proximity to each other, such as in offices, etc. 

 

Exposure to air pollution while driving

 

Car exhaust and other pollutants such as dust, allergens, etc. can be a serious health issue for those who spend time in their cars.

Many of these pollutants are pm2.5 (fine particulate matter) which pose a serious risk to our health.

According to the Lancet Oncology Journal, exposure to car exhaust increases the risks of both lung cancer & heart attacks.

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are dedicated to bringing MoBee Smart~Air to the market as quickly as possible. We do not expect any delays and plan to start shipping in October 2016.

MoBee Smart~Air
