story:
Introducing the Core Activator

Core muscle activation in every exercise

Finally, a fitness machine designed as a lasting solution for a healthy back

This patented machine is the first to move you in all three planes of motion, take compression loads off of your spine, and activate multiple core muscles around your spine; all while keeping you in a safer/more powerful spine neutral position.

The Core Activator was created out of necessity by Dr. Jeff Fishel after several paraplegic spine patients came to his practice to train their core. They all had the prognosis of life in a wheelchair and needed to strengthen core muscles to make easier transitions to and from the wheelchair. But traditional exercise machines have the user seated, which places harmful compression on the spine and shuts down key core muscles. Dr. Jeff found that there was nothing on the market that was safe for his patients, so he built one himself.  And, the results have been amazing! See Dr. Jeff's Story at the end of the campaign.

Anyone with back pain can benefit from the Core Activator. You can choose to wear braces and use ergonomic chairs to lessen the pain, but that is not a long term solution.  Bracing restricts movement, and movement is necessary for keeping joints and muscles healthy and pain-free.  Most lower back pain can be prevented with the correct exercise of the core muscles that SURROUND the spine and this is exactly what the Core Activator was designed to deliver.   

What separates the Core Activator from the competition?

Conventional machines: (i.e. MedX) 

  • Seated position; spine is compressed by nearly 2x body weight
  • Inhibits anterior core muscles from activating
  • Muscle isolation
  • Inhibits pelvic motion
  • Eliminates the Kinetic chain (no hamstrings or glutes)
  • Separate flexion, extension, stretching machines
Core Activator:
  • Not seated: reduces spine compression to less than body weight
  • Works synergistic core muscle belt 
  • Engages multiple core muscles 360° around the spine
  • Allows normal functional pelvic motion
  • Incorporates kinetic chain, including hamstrings and glutes (unless you are in a wheelchair glutes and hamstrings need to be activated for optimal spinal health) 
  • Stretches and strengthens in all 3 planes of motion (forward flexion, extension, lateral) 
Low back extension machines are damaging to the spine (Dr. Stuart McGill and Dr. Callahan 2007)

Core Activator Benefits 

Ease Back Pain - Motion is essential for a healthy spine. Core muscles working together has lasting positive effects on low back health. 

Maintain Low Back Health - A few minutes a day will build muscle memory for more efficient movement patterns linking core to your extremities.

Improve Posture - Strengthens and links postural muscles 360 degrees around your spine.

Burn More Calories - More muscles firing increases caloric burn.

Increase Power and Endurance - Training to recruit core in every exercise brings powerful stabilizing muscles to every task.

Release Tension - Stretches multiple muscle groups from calves, hamstrings, glutes, low back and core, through your shoulder girdle. 

Breathe Better - Your diaphragm is the main muscle for respiration and sits at the top of your core. It is exercised on this machine. 

Tone Love Handles - Can you tighten your love handles? You will now!

Here's How it Works


Tighten and tone core muscles without rigorous exercise or straining your back.  Two things are needed to develop a healthy low back.  Motion and Core muscles working together.  Motion lubricates your spinal joints and brings a lot of circulation to the muscles and nerves that surround your spine.  You can’t build a strong, stable spine by moving in just one plane of motion.  The Core Activator's patented design allows you to exercise on all three planes of motion while maintaining spine neutral position, the strongest position for your spine.  

Whether simply stretching or exercising on the Core Activator your abdominals, obliques, and low back, fire together creating a very powerful set of stabilizer muscles.  This prevents muscle fatigue because more muscles are being used, allowing your body to use less energy.  Pre-activating core muscles in your warm-up  will wake up these stabilizer muscles so they fire during more dynamic moves, such as golf, cycling, lifting or jogging.  With continual core integration exercise, you don’t even have to remember to activate your core.  It becomes automatic, like a reflex. 

Connect hips, Core, and extremities 

The Core Activator teaches you a proper hip hinge which is important for low back health and optimal performance. Physical therapy clinics are busy with clients who have injured their backs due to improper form, muscular imbalances, and deficient movement patterns.  A big problem for many people is how to get the hips to move without the low back flexing along with it. Rounding of the back makes it difficult to activate core muscles and creates pressure on a specific disc making it vulnerable to injury. Spine neutral position will spread the load over multiple discs, meaning less pressure and a stronger and safer position to be in. A proper hip hinge is movement (flexion and extension) through the hip joint that requires keeping a neutral spine. The top pad on the Core Activator helps you maintain safe, spine neutral position throughout the entire exercise. 
Think of how many instances a day you may be at risk of rounding.  Sitting at your desk, standing at your desk, brushing your teeth, getting something out of the fridge, picking something up off the floor, getting out of your car, golfing... Using the Core Activator for a few minutes a day will groove proper movement patterns to keep your back healthy and safe. For athletes, mastering the hip hinge will lead to stronger lifts, faster sprints, and more powerful moves. 


Do you sit all day at work? 

Unchanging posture leads to decreased fluid and nutrition exchange in the spinal discs.  If you can, every couple of hours get on the Core Activator and do 10-15 repetitions in each range of motion as long as there is no pain in that range of motion.  Do this daily to reverse the negative effects of sitting.

Don’t have the time, just do forward flexion two times a day. 


"Studies have found that sedentary behavior, including sitting for extended periods, increases the risk for developing dozens of chronic conditions..."               ~ The Wall Street Journal

Reverses the Negative Effects of Sitting:  Use the Core Activator throughout the day to stretch and deliver motion into your spine and low back.  In minutes you will feel tension release and elasticity return.   Motion into your spine and low back muscles will help restore and repair the damage that has been done. 

Daily Stretches and Exercises Video
Keys to a Healthy Back

1. Get motion into your low back muscles and spine daily
2. Learn to hip hinge – spine neutral position
3. Teach core muscles to activate together automatically
4. Reduce the compression load on your spine while exercising


It's for everyone, regardless of fitness level

Athletes are finding this machine to be an effective tool for warm-up prior to play as well as building repetitive, powerful movements. Seniors can perform various exercises with ease, improving stamina and balance; see short video.  Personal trainers and physical therapists can use the Core Activator as part of their toolkit.  We are adding features that will allow easy use in hospital room situation for geriatric physical therapy.  It is collapsible for easy storage and the built in rollers make it easy to move. 


Why is the Core Activator better than other methods?

Besides taking compression off the spine, the 45-degree angle causes you to hold onto an abdominal brace.  This means that you are engaging abs, obliques, and low back muscles simultaneously, not in isolation.  Through repetition, these muscles learn to fire automatically adding power and stability to your movement. It becomes a reflex for your other activities during the day.    
An editorial in Navy Times, recently called for sit-ups to be banned completely. It called them an ‘outdated exercise today viewed as a key cause of lower back injuries’.  The Canadian Armed Forces have already done this as well. If the Army is phasing out sit-ups, maybe you should too. A spokesman for the American Council on Exercise told the Wall St Journal that sit-ups are ‘an antiquity of exercise best left in the dustbin of fitness history’.
The Core Activator product technology is patented and is like no other machine on the market.  The ability to move the user in forward flexion, lateral flexion, and back extension while in spine neutral position is what makes this machine unique.  The top pad eliminates the mistake of rounding your back.  It takes the stress off the spine and discs to less than body weight.   It increases motion.  It increases resistance yet it decreases the resistance at its most vulnerable position. It activates core muscles all the way around your spine during every exercise, giving you the power to build an enduring healthy low back.

Get Stronger with a Core Integration Workout 

Imagine for a moment that your body had no individual muscles, no isolated muscle groups. This is actually how your body moves in nature; on multiple planes. That is why we designed the Core Activator to allow you to exercise on all three planes of motion. 
There are plenty of core exercises out there that you can do on your own.  But, you won't really know if you are doing them correctly.  The Core Activator takes all of the guessing (and possible injury) and hard work out of it. You can't mess up.  It grooves proper movement patterns.  It's the only machine on the market to makes this so easy and effective. 
On this one piece of equipment, you can train Cardio (HIIT), Strength, Explosiveness, Balance, and Stretching. 
After 30 days using the Core Activator you will feel taller, lighter, and move with more power.  The obliques (love handles or muffin tops) have been a difficult muscle to get tone until now.  Use it for a month and you will be able to tighten those love handles on command. 
Four Machines in One - no matter what exercise you do, you link core


Advanced Exercises on the Core Activator Video

Core Activation and Golf 

Safely stretch hamstrings, hips, low back, upper back, and shoulder girdle while pre-activating core muscles prior to you round.  Core stabilization allows you to control your body statically and dynamically during the golf swing. Rotational exercises on the Core Activator are simply better and safer. Training core muscles to fire automatically will give you a more powerful, repetitive swing and increase your endurance.  
  

Cycling


Highlights 

Spine Neutral Position - The safest and most powerful position your spine can be in. 

Reduces Compression on Spine and Low Back - A compressed spine is vulnerable to injury. The 45-degree angle reduces compression load to less than body weight (sitting is 180% of body weight). 

Proper Hip Hinge - The top pad keeps you in spine neutral position during the entire exercise movement. Spares the spine. Allows for kinetic transfer of energy/force to the upper body. 

Daily Warm Up Tool - Wake up core muscles prior to golf, jogging, or any dynamic exercise

Wide Range of Use - For everyone from seniors to elite athletes, trainers, therapists, and hospitals

Compact Design - Folds easily to roll under bed or put in closet


The Science Behind the Design 

This is what research shows.  Sitting compresses the spine by nearly twice your body weight. A compressed spine is vulnerable to injury.  Key core muscles shut down when you sit. The 45° of the Core Activator reduces compression load to less than body weight. The angle of the machine causes you to hold onto an abdominal brace.  We used EMG testing to see how core muscles were being utilized and their firing patterns.  The EMGs showed multiple core muscles all the way around the spine activate simultaneously. Once these muscles are trained repetitively to fire together, it then becomes a reflex for daily activities and athletic movements. 

According to the renowned expert in spine function and injury prevention, Dr. Stuart McGill, "the staples of most back rehab programs should be eliminated because of the tremendous compressive loading forces that they create through the discs of the spine." "Do enough sit-ups, does not matter who you are, you will hurt your discs."  "Focusing on a single muscle generally does not enhance stability but creates patterns that result in less stability. It is impossible to train muscles such as transverse abdominis or multifidus in isolation." The other critical factor, says Dr. McGill, is to "groove optimal muscle activation patterns." That is, teach the muscles that stabilize your spine to support your back during any activity, for maximum protection.  (Dr. McGill has been the author of over 200 scientific publications  addressing the low back).  

People with low back pain find it difficult to engage core muscles without repetitive help. Hodges, Ph.D.  Arch. of Physical Med. Rehab

Muscular strength of trunk is LESS influential in low back pain than co-activation and recruitment patterns. O’Sullivan, PhD

According to research presented in the European Journal of Applied Physiology, core muscle activation is limited while performed in a seated position.

The National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH) studied 8,000 hourly retail workers for two years. This study found that elastic support back belts did not reduce the incidence of back injury claims or low back pain (Wassell, et al.,2000).


The concept of Neuroplasticity:  Neuroplasticity is your brain’s ability to create new neural pathways and reshapes existing ones.  While holding an abdominal brace and performing repetitions we are grooving a neurological pattern.  As we activate core muscles, we exercise an appropriate neurological pathway. The more we exercise that pathway the more efficient that pathway becomes.
If some of our core muscles go silent or aren't firing appropriately, then the multifidi ( the low back muscle that protects the discs) becomes overactive and eventually fatigues.  Once it fatigues then that muscle is no longer useful and cannot protect the discs.   


TESTIMONIALS 

Dr. Michael Torry Ph.D. (Director, Biomechanics Laboratory at Illinois State University):  “The science speaks for itself.  When we do traditional core exercises, we put unnecessary loads on the spine.  Tighten the Core equipment allows us to exercise the core muscles, the erector spinae, and the abdominals, in the proper sequence and also take the load off the spine.  That’s a win – win exercise.”  Mike was elected to the prestigious National Academy of Science Keck Futures Initiative in 2007 and currently serves as a Society Representative the US National Committee on Biomechanics

 

Dr. Jim Suttie - PGA National Teacher of the Year 2000; Golf Digest's 50 Greatest Teachers List and  instructor to several tour professionals.  "The Core Activator absolutely could help anyone with a back problem in golf. It will help you stand up straighter and give you more stability.  I never really found a product, until I found this one, that really helped my back."

 


"I love the Core Activator"

“Tighten the Core equipment significantly improves athlete performance by engaging and activating core muscles unlike any other equipment available. This equipment will help athletes to perform at a higher level.” Randy Ballard – Olympic Trainer and Athletic Trainer University of Illinois

“We have used the Core Activator equipment for several years with great results.” Herm Schneider, Chicago White Sox Head Trainer

Dr. Jeff has several patients that were paraplegic and are now walking today. One patient was in a wheelchair for over 10 years!  They put a lot of hard work into walking again and the Core Activator was a vital tool in their therapy. 

 

   The Tighten the Core tee shirt               Core Activator Commercial Unit

FAQ

Will the Core Activator improve my bad posture? The Core Activator trains postural muscles and spine stabilizers in the proper kinetic chain sequence, resulting in improved posture. You will feel the results from day one. 

I am an active athlete with a strong back.  Can I benefit from the Core Activator?

We have found that many athletes, even world class athletes, have deficiencies in their core which lead to hamstring, knee and ankle injuries. Several Olympic Athletes have used the Core Activator.  It helped them to tap into hidden core muscles that were not being utilized properly before.  Elite athletes know that in order to maximize power, you need to maximize muscle activation patterns within your core. You can easily train specific skill exercises on the machine such as shoulder/core for pitchers, and arms/core wide receivers, 

What does it mean to be a better mover?

Proper stretching of the muscles along with exercise will help maintain normal range of motion and provide relief for muscles that are suffering disuse atrophy.

Can an older person use the Core Activator? 

After 18 years of age, we humans lose our blood supply to our spines.  After that, the only way to get nutrients in is through motion.  As you age, the spine begins to show wear as the discs dry out, shrink and the space between the discs gets smaller. Good motion into spinal discs hydrates and strengthens the discs, and reduces inflammation and stiffness.  Our oldest user is over 100 years old, and she loves it!

I have osteoarthritis.

Exercise and hydrating the discs is an important part of OA treatment.  The Core Activator will help decrease joint pain and improve function.  Motion is the life of your spine.

I am overweight.  Is the Core Activator a good fit for me?

Yes, many times we find overweight individuals have a difficult time exercising on the floor.  The Core Activator is easier to get into position and with more muscles involved in every exercise you will burn more calories and feel results quicker.

Next in the Pipeline

This isn't a one trick pony.  The Assisted Squat Machine is next in the pipeline. Maintain perfect squat form while taking the compression off your back, knee joints, ankle joints, and hips.  Perfect for someone that is rehabbing low back, hip, knee, or ankle surgery. The Assisted Squat is a great tool to progressively move into more dynamic and heavier load movements. We have blueprints for a dozen other spine friendly pieces of equipment, but we need your help! 

Dr. Jeff's story

I have sustained many injuries involving severe trauma which required months of rehabilitation. Although my injuries have been severe, they are minute compared to impairments of some of the patients I have treated today. I am very blessed to have the ability to help others.

As an athlete in high school and college, I suffered many injuries. But, when I broke my back it changed my life.  On February 9, 1980, my good friend Marty Thomas and I went back home for the weekend. While at home, we were driving back from a small get together with friends in a nearby town when a drunk driver crossed the center line and hit us head-on. Both drivers were killed, Marty being one of those drivers. I shattered my leg with a compound comminuted fracture and compression fractures of the lumbar spine. Bones were sticking out of my left leg and the bottom of my shoe was facing me. My left leg, with both knees fully extended, was approximately 9 inches shorter than my right.  My wounds were deep; psychological greater than physical. Placing my feet on the dashboard right before impact saved my life. No one was wearing seat belts in either vehicle. 

The doctor who operated on me was a close personal friend of my grandfather. He cleaned all the debris from my ankle and pieced it together as best he could. He told me I would never be able to walk without a limp and if the toes turn black I would lose the limb. I was in a back brace and a leg cast for several months. When those came off, the rehab began. 
After weeks in the hospital and many more weeks in rehab, I became faster and stronger than I was before.  This led me to find out as much as possible about the science and biomechanics of low back and spinal health. For many years I studied and followed the research from the foremost authorities on back pain and rehab, with specific attention to the work of Dr. Stuart McGill. 
Today, I work with spine and trauma victims for a living and have worked with several world class athletes.  How this all started was, I wanted a low back and core training device that was safe for my spine patients.  Something that placed the user in a spine-friendly position, that didn’t compress the spine and was able to deliver motion into the low back.  And, I was sure that there was something out there that I could buy.  The reality was there was nothing.  One of my patients said that someone should make one then; and I said, yeah someone should…  So I went to work in my garage building a prototype.  

What started out as a simple low back machine has turned into a lot more.  I was working with some Olympic athletes that were coming off injuries and we started finding more and more uses and implementations for the machine.  We knew that in order to maximize our power, we needed to maximize muscle activation patterns within our core. So, we started testing all sorts of exercises using EMG technology.  EMG stands for electromyography.  An EMG measures the electrical activity of muscles and their contraction.  The EMG was showing the Core Activator was readily activating multiple core muscles.  The athletes were able to activate abs and obliques as well as low back all at the same time.  So I rounded up some friends and we got to work placing units within different walks of life. 

            

A Major League Baseball team started integrating our machine into their core training and therapy programs. Other users included the US Air Marshals, physical therapists, and chiropractors.  We brought it to a biomechanics laboratory at a major university for analysis and then we met Doc Suttie. Doc is one of the top PGA golf instructors in the world and is a doctor of biomechanics.  He has had 3 back operations.  Well, Doc now has a Core Activator at each of his training locations and is a big fan of our product. He claims to be two inches taller now. 
The spine patients that I work with had the neural pathways still intact, but their prognosis was not good. These young men had been in their wheelchairs for 2 years and up to 10 years for one patient. All are walking today! See their stories here.

Dr. Jeff Fishel - Experience

  • 24+ years in private practice
  • 14 years working with Division 1 and World Class Track Athletes
  • Doctorate of Chiropractic - Logan College, St. Louis MO 1991
  • CCSP - Certified Chiropractic Sports Physician 1992
  • 500+ hours post-doctorate clinical neurology
  • Board eligible Chiropractic Neurologist
  • 300+ hours post-doctorate rehabilitation
  • M.S.S. Master of Sport Science, United States Sports Academy 1986
  • Ergonomic Consulting - Job Station Analysis and Redesign specializing in (RSI) Repetitive Strain Injury and Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS)

5.  Click "review and continue" to continue with a payment using a credit card.

6.  Click on the "continue without logging in" link

Other Ways to Help!

Click the Follow/Facebook/Twitter buttons next to the "BACK IT" button on this page. If enough do this it helps us to get featured on Indiegogo's homepage! 

Why become a Core Activator Backer?

Our mission is to help people to live a healthy, active life.  We have seen tremendous results from patients and athletes using this simple machine and are eager to see what it can do for you. 

We would love to hear from you.  Send an email to drjeff@tightenthecore.com and I will get back to you as soon as I can.   Supporters can also follow us on Twitter @tightenthecore and like us on Facebook.  And don't forget to go to our website at tightenthecore.com
Over the last several years we have been thru many prototypes to get this product just right.  We have now finished the design and are ready for production, but we need help to get the core activator into your home. We hope that you’ll join us.
Thank you for purchasing the Core Activator and sharing with your family and friends.  
Yours in health, 
Dr. Jeff
story_txt:
Introducing the Core Activator
Core muscle activation in every exercise Finally, a fitness machine designed as a lasting solution for a healthy backThis patented machine is the first to move you in all three planes of motion, take compression loads off of your spine, and activate multiple core muscles around your spine; all while keeping you in a safer/more powerful spine neutral position.The Core Activator was created out of necessity by Dr. Jeff Fishel after several paraplegic spine patients came to his practice to train their core. They all had the prognosis of life in a wheelchair and needed to strengthen core muscles to make easier transitions to and from the wheelchair. But traditional exercise machines have the user seated, which places harmful compression on the spine and shuts down key core muscles. Dr. Jeff found that there was nothing on the market that was safe for his patients, so he built one himself.  And, the results have been amazing! See Dr. Jeff's Story at the end of the campaign.Anyone with back pain can benefit from the Core Activator. You can choose to wear braces and use ergonomic chairs to lessen the pain, but that is not a long term solution.  Bracing restricts movement, and movement is necessary for keeping joints and muscles healthy and pain-free.  Most lower back pain can be prevented with the correct exercise of the core muscles that SURROUND the spine and this is exactly what the Core Activator was designed to deliver.   

What separates the Core Activator from the competition?
Conventional machines: (i.e. MedX) 


Seated position; spine is compressed by nearly 2x body weight
Inhibits anterior core muscles from activating
Muscle isolation
Inhibits pelvic motion
Eliminates the Kinetic chain (no hamstrings or glutes)
Separate flexion, extension, stretching machines

Core Activator:


Not seated: reduces spine compression to less than body weight
Works synergistic core muscle belt 
Engages multiple core muscles 360° around the spine
Allows normal functional pelvic motion
Incorporates kinetic chain, including hamstrings and glutes (unless you are in a wheelchair glutes and hamstrings need to be activated for optimal spinal health) 
Stretches and strengthens in all 3 planes of motion (forward flexion, extension, lateral) 

Low back extension machines are damaging to the spine (Dr. Stuart McGill and Dr. Callahan 2007)


Core Activator Benefits 

Ease Back Pain - Motion is essential for a healthy spine. Core muscles working together has lasting positive effects on low back health. 
Maintain Low Back Health - A few minutes a day will build muscle memory for more efficient movement patterns linking core to your extremities.
Improve Posture - Strengthens and links postural muscles 360 degrees around your spine.
Burn More Calories - More muscles firing increases caloric burn.
Increase Power and Endurance - Training to recruit core in every exercise brings powerful stabilizing muscles to every task.
Release Tension - Stretches multiple muscle groups from calves, hamstrings, glutes, low back and core, through your shoulder girdle. 
Breathe Better - Your diaphragm is the main muscle for respiration and sits at the top of your core. It is exercised on this machine. 
Tone Love Handles - Can you tighten your love handles? You will now!


Here's How it Works


Tighten and tone core muscles without rigorous exercise or straining your back.  Two things are needed to develop a healthy low back.  Motion and Core muscles working together.  Motion lubricates your spinal joints and brings a lot of circulation to the muscles and nerves that surround your spine.  You can’t build a strong, stable spine by moving in just one plane of motion.  The Core Activator's patented design allows you to exercise on all three planes of motion while maintaining spine neutral position, the strongest position for your spine.  
Whether simply stretching or exercising on the Core Activator your abdominals, obliques, and low back, fire together creating a very powerful set of stabilizer muscles.  This prevents muscle fatigue because more muscles are being used, allowing your body to use less energy.  Pre-activating core muscles in your warm-up  will wake up these stabilizer muscles so they fire during more dynamic moves, such as golf, cycling, lifting or jogging.  With continual core integration exercise, you don’t even have to remember to activate your core.  It becomes automatic, like a reflex. 
Connect hips, Core, and extremities 
The Core Activator teaches you a proper hip hinge which is important for low back health and optimal performance. Physical therapy clinics are busy with clients who have injured their backs due to improper form, muscular imbalances, and deficient movement patterns.  A big problem for many people is how to get the hips to move without the low back flexing along with it. Rounding of the back makes it difficult to activate core muscles and creates pressure on a specific disc making it vulnerable to injury. Spine neutral position will spread the load over multiple discs, meaning less pressure and a stronger and safer position to be in. A proper hip hinge is movement (flexion and extension) through the hip joint that requires keeping a neutral spine. The top pad on the Core Activator helps you maintain safe, spine neutral position throughout the entire exercise. 
Think of how many instances a day you may be at risk of rounding.  Sitting at your desk, standing at your desk, brushing your teeth, getting something out of the fridge, picking something up off the floor, getting out of your car, golfing... Using the Core Activator for a few minutes a day will groove proper movement patterns to keep your back healthy and safe. For athletes, mastering the hip hinge will lead to stronger lifts, faster sprints, and more powerful moves. 







Do you sit all day at work? 

Unchanging posture leads to decreased fluid and nutrition exchange in the spinal discs.  If you can, every couple of hours get on the Core Activator and do 10-15 repetitions in each range of motion as long as there is no pain in that range of motion.  Do this daily to reverse the negative effects of sitting.

Don’t have the time, just do forward flexion two times a day. 





"Studies have found that sedentary behavior, including sitting for extended periods, increases the risk for developing dozens of chronic conditions..."               ~ The Wall Street Journal
Reverses the Negative Effects of Sitting:  Use the Core Activator throughout the day to stretch and deliver motion into your spine and low back.  In minutes you will feel tension release and elasticity return.   Motion into your spine and low back muscles will help restore and repair the damage that has been done. Daily Stretches and Exercises Video
Keys to a Healthy Back
1. Get motion into your low back muscles and spine daily2. Learn to hip hinge – spine neutral position 3. Teach core muscles to activate together automatically4. Reduce the compression load on your spine while exercising

It's for everyone, regardless of fitness level
Athletes are finding this machine to be an effective tool for warm-up prior to play as well as building repetitive, powerful movements. Seniors can perform various exercises with ease, improving stamina and balance; see short video.  Personal trainers and physical therapists can use the Core Activator as part of their toolkit.  We are adding features that will allow easy use in hospital room situation for geriatric physical therapy.  It is collapsible for easy storage and the built in rollers make it easy to move. 


Why is the Core Activator better than other methods?

Besides taking compression off the spine, the 45-degree angle causes you to hold onto an abdominal brace.  This means that you are engaging abs, obliques, and low back muscles simultaneously, not in isolation.  Through repetition, these muscles learn to fire automatically adding power and stability to your movement. It becomes a reflex for your other activities during the day.    

An editorial in Navy Times, recently called for sit-ups to be banned completely. It called them an ‘outdated exercise today viewed as a key cause of lower back injuries’.  The Canadian Armed Forces have already done this as well. If the Army is phasing out sit-ups, maybe you should too. A spokesman for the American Council on Exercise told the Wall St Journal that sit-ups are ‘an antiquity of exercise best left in the dustbin of fitness history’.

The Core Activator product technology is patented and is like no other machine on the market.  The ability to move the user in forward flexion, lateral flexion, and back extension while in spine neutral position is what makes this machine unique.  The top pad eliminates the mistake of rounding your back.  It takes the stress off the spine and discs to less than body weight.   It increases motion.  It increases resistance yet it decreases the resistance at its most vulnerable position. It activates core muscles all the way around your spine during every exercise, giving you the power to build an enduring healthy low back.


Get Stronger with a Core Integration Workout 

Imagine for a moment that your body had no individual muscles, no isolated muscle groups. This is actually how your body moves in nature; on multiple planes. That is why we designed the Core Activator to allow you to exercise on all three planes of motion. 
There are plenty of core exercises out there that you can do on your own.  But, you won't really know if you are doing them correctly.  The Core Activator takes all of the guessing (and possible injury) and hard work out of it. You can't mess up.  It grooves proper movement patterns.  It's the only machine on the market to makes this so easy and effective. 
On this one piece of equipment, you can train Cardio (HIIT), Strength, Explosiveness, Balance, and Stretching. 
After 30 days using the Core Activator you will feel taller, lighter, and move with more power.  The obliques (love handles or muffin tops) have been a difficult muscle to get tone until now.  Use it for a month and you will be able to tighten those love handles on command. 
Four Machines in One - no matter what exercise you do, you link core

He told me I would never be able to walk without a limp and if the toes turn black I would lose the limb. I was in a back brace and a leg cast for several months. When those came off, the rehab began. 

After weeks in the hospital and many more weeks in rehab, I became faster and stronger than I was before.  This led me to find out as much as possible about the science and biomechanics of low back and spinal health. For many years I studied and followed the research from the foremost authorities on back pain and rehab, with specific attention to the work of Dr. Stuart McGill. 
Today, I work with spine and trauma victims for a living and have worked with several world class athletes.  How this all started was, I wanted a low back and core training device that was safe for my spine patients.  Something that placed the user in a spine-friendly position, that didn’t compress the spine and was able to deliver motion into the low back.  And, I was sure that there was something out there that I could buy.  The reality was there was nothing.  One of my patients said that someone should make one then; and I said, yeah someone should…  So I went to work in my garage building a prototype.  



What started out as a simple low back machine has turned into a lot more.  I was working with some Olympic athletes that were coming off injuries and we started finding more and more uses and implementations for the machine.  We knew that in order to maximize our power, we needed to maximize muscle activation patterns within our core. So, we started testing all sorts of exercises using EMG technology.  EMG stands for electromyography.  An EMG measures the electrical activity of muscles and their contraction.  The EMG was showing the Core Activator was readily activating multiple core muscles.  The athletes were able to activate abs and obliques as well as low back all at the same time.  So I rounded up some friends and we got to work placing units within different walks of life. 
            
A Major League Baseball team started integrating our machine into their core training and therapy programs. Other users included the US Air Marshals, physical therapists, and chiropractors.  We brought it to a biomechanics laboratory at a major university for analysis and then we met Doc Suttie. Doc is one of the top PGA golf instructors in the world and is a doctor of biomechanics.  He has had 3 back operations.  Well, Doc now has a Core Activator at each of his training locations and is a big fan of our product. He claims to be two inches taller now. 

The spine patients that I work with had the neural pathways still intact, but their prognosis was not good. These young men had been in their wheelchairs for 2 years and up to 10 years for one patient. All are walking today! See their stories here.


Dr. Jeff Fishel - Experience


24+ years in private practice
14 years working with Division 1 and World Class Track Athletes
Doctorate of Chiropractic - Logan College, St. Louis MO 1991
CCSP - Certified Chiropractic Sports Physician 1992
500+ hours post-doctorate clinical neurology
Board eligible Chiropractic Neurologist
300+ hours post-doctorate rehabilitation
M.S.S. Master of Sport Science, United States Sports Academy 1986
Ergonomic Consulting - Job Station Analysis and Redesign specializing in (RSI) Repetitive Strain Injury and Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS)


If Paying for Perk with Credit Card:

If you are using credit card:
1.  When you get to the PayPal screen, you'll see up top "Choose a Way to Pay"
2.  Select the second option: "Pay with a debit or credit card"
3.  Complete the form
4.  When you get to the checkbox that says: "Save this information with a PayPal account. It's easy and free to sign up. Learn more about PayPal", uncheck  the box.
5.  Click "review and continue" to continue with a payment using a credit card.
6.  Click on the "continue without logging in" link
Other Ways to Help!
Click the Follow/Facebook/Twitter buttons next to the "BACK IT" button on this page. If enough do this it helps us to get featured on Indiegogo's homepage! 
Why become a Core Activator Backer?

Our mission is to help people to live a healthy, active life.  We have seen tremendous results from patients and athletes using this simple machine and are eager to see what it can do for you. 

We would love to hear from you.  Send an email to drjeff@tightenthecore.com and I will get back to you as soon as I can.   Supporters can also follow us on Twitter @tightenthecore and like us on Facebook.  And don't forget to go to our website at tightenthecore.com

Over the last several years we have been thru many prototypes to get this product just right.  We have now finished the design and are ready for production, but we need help to get the core activator into your home. We hope that you’ll join us.
Thank you for purchasing the Core Activator and sharing with your family and friends.  
Yours in health, 
Dr. Jeff

story:
Para español baja un poco porfavor 

Pour Francais, veuillez descendre SVP 


 Regenere, spreading life
from within you!



In a glimpse, I want to subtitle the videos of Regenere, and I want to fund me doing it through you :) Maybe there are other campaigns that need the money more, so you can go to another one, but I need the money to teach you how to avoid chronic deseases like cancer, diabetes, etc. I think if we all start doing our part to kill cancer cells inside ourselves, the cancer outside ourselves (pollution, economy, social, political unrest) can be solved little by little!


Thanks! 




23/03

One of the 847 testimonies at Regenere.org

Fasting, Living Feeding and return of

my organic and spiritual health! 

written by LibrSpirit on 01 December 2015 at 11h18

Having gone through a huge sickness, i turned naturally towards therapeutical fasting, livin feeding and a return to my health. It had been many years since I was vegetarian, almost raw vegan and for 2 years now I feed on vegetable juices, sometimes during juice fasts or with every day meals (even if my body only has one meal a day, it is enough). I am a big fan of fasting, very long ones (45, 32 or 28 days for example). I also learned to develop and awake my soul and spirit and reconnect with nature, and small things, which are the most vital. I don't refuse everything in conventional medicine though. However I have learned the wonders of plants, and its products in our organism (physical and spiritual). We are our own healers, our own shamans, and doctors can help us, but we are the one and only actors of our psychic, physical and emotional health. What we absorb (food, environment, emotions) is vital for the body and spirit. We are one!

I am really thankful to Thierry who does a wonderful job in his site and he is a wonderful soul! The tips on vegetable juices, and cold soups are also great and very helpful! Thanks to the whole Regenere Team. It's only with my best wishes that I  confirm my transition passage from a nasty nutrition towards a healthy one. This also means spiritual awakening, because I think one cannot go without the other. We can heal our body, but if we don't worry about our soul and spirit, emotional blocks will always be there to create sicknesses. Thank you all! 

My objectif in Terra Incognita will bring me a fasting with vegeable juices and medical plants (3 juices and 3 teas every day). 

Great effort you guys  and I wish you all a great experience!

I am filled with positive emotions and love!!! 


Do you know why milk is not the best? 

Do you know how gluten affects your body and ultimately leads to chronic fatigue, inmune diseases and cancer?

Some of you may already know Thierry Casanovas from the REGENERE.org site, but for those of you who don't, please watch this video, I promess you the video is an eye opener and you will not regret watching it carefully! 


Thanks for watching! 

If you didn't watch, then go back! It is essential to understand how your stomac works if you want to help relieve cancer in the world! It is far too complicated for me to explain it here. That is why I would like you to watch the video... Thanks! 

Now that you have understood the basic principles of natural laws,  the same laws that govern fungus, microbes, nature and Human Beings as well...


Keep on reading! 

Thierry is the representative of the REGENERE movement in France. It aims to return individual autonomy and empowerment to every human being. They have come up with a nutrition model that makes the one we have right now totally useless! You know, the one where we eat meat, milk and bread... Find the first steps towards this new nutrition here. 


Already 62,000 people are following Regenere Youtube channel, which counts nearly 16 million views , it's now going global with your help! 



2. Thank you Regenere 

for saving my life!


Before at 26 yo (2009) 


Now at 33 yo! (look at the difference in my smile and brightness in eyes)



I plan to translate  as fast as possible between 40 and 60 videos from Thierry in both English and Spanish in 4 months. You will be able to check them out, here


Videos like this one:


I will also translate the 6 step guide to regeneration, with tips to have a diet transition with success! Please find here, the first steps! 


The movement is going international, thanks to you and me, but first we need you to help funding it!


 I thank you for helping me! 



We can make the difference! 

Now what, let's talk business... :)


3. Financing (ETA 4 months)*


The financing which will last 4 months will go to:

Regenere                                        

Transcription from Voice to Script and authorship of videos .......................... 20%

(Or $51 per video)

Honoraries of 2 Native Translators in English and Spanish:  

Subtitling of 60-80 videos to English and Spanish...............................................40%    

(Or $51 per video)

Responsible: Javier Lara

Revising and subtitling of 60-80 videos and Quality Assurance .........................20%
Fundraising and Campaign Marketing......................................................................20%

(Or $102 per video)

   Total $18000


*DISCLAIMER

- I understand pricing is high, but bare in mind that each video takes around 20 hours to be transcribed, syncd, translated and proofread! So this means that each person will be working $10 per hour! 

- If I get to 25% of my objective, Regenere will get 5% and I will not hire any translator.

- If I get to 50% of my objective, Regenere will get 10% and I will hire 1 translator. 

         


4. Linguistic Experience 


I don't pretend to say that there aren't better people for this job, but they are not as motivated as I am! 


2001 : BAC économique Lycée Francais @ San Salvador, El Salvador.

2006: BA in International Business NMSU @ New Mexico US 

2012: Master I International Management @IAE Toulouse - France

2012: Translation of 45000 words from www.UZplaces.com ; Spanish - English.

2013: English Teacher Diploma @ UNAM (México DF - México) 

2014: Translation of the book "Despierta paz" from Renee Salinas ; Spanish - French.

2014: Approved HSK3 Intermediate Level Chinese Proficiency Test. 

2014: Revision of Chinese Novels Liljana Arsovska Mo Yan ; Chinese - Spanish.

2014: Translation of the "short tale" "an enigmatic smile". Chinese - Spanish. 

2016: Sous titrage de la vidéo Mon meilleur conseil de santé (pas encore live) et sous titrage de 30 minutes pour changer une vie.  

Linguistic Combination: Spanish A  English B French B  



I understand the sum might be a lot of money, but subtitling these videos is hard work, and this project deserves every dollar in the world! 

There are some obstacles in the way since my ankle and lumbar column are hurt from a car accident, but again, I don't fear this because I feel guided to do this and no activity is more fun than translating microcellular wisdom as of now! 

If you cannot collaborate with money, but you want to help in any way, you can also share my campaign in whatever social network you want! Remember to use Indiegogo's own tools!



  A big thank you to you! 
  Without you, I am, but together we are strong! 

Regenere.org regenerant

la vitalité en toi! 



1. Intro 


Est-ce que tu connais les effets de la viande dans ton corps? 

Du lait?

Est-ce que tu sais pourquoi ce n'est pas le meilleur de les manger?

 Est-ce que tu connais comment le gluten se colle dans ton estomac et peut occasioner de maladies autoimmunes, fatigue chronique et un cancer? 


Quelques uns d'entre vous peut être  déjà connaissent Thierry Casanovas, mais pour ceux d'entre vous qui ne le connaissent pas encore REGENERE, SVP faites click ici.


Merci d'avoir vu la vidéo! 



Maintenant que vous avez vu la video et vous comprenez les principes de base des lois naturelles, les mêmes lois qui gouvernent les microbes, les virus, la nature, et donc l'Etre Humain...je t'invite à aider la planete à avoir cette sagesse! 


Lisez la suite s'il vous plaît,


Thierry est le représentant du mouvement Regenere en France. Son objectif est de retourner l'autonomie individuelle de chaque individu au niveau de la santé, mode de vie et permaculture. Ils ont tout un modèle de transition qui remplace celui d'avant (avec de la viande, produits laitiers et du pain) et vous pouvez le voir ici. C'est seulement une guide et c'est à chaqun de le personaliser dans son cadre bien spécifique!



Il y a déja 62,000 personnes qui suivent la chaine Youtube de Regenere, avec 16 millions de vues. Ce-ci a augmenté depuis 5 années et maintenant on est responsable que toute la planete sache cette sagesse! 



2. Merci Regenere pour sauver ma vie 

Avant (2009)

26 ans



Maintenant (2016)

33 ans avec un gran et VRAI sourire!


Comme pour certains d'entre vous, ce mouvement a sauvé ma vie (celle de Javier Lara) du gluten et des produits laitiers, qui étaient en train de tuer l'énergie de mon corps. Je remercie vivement Thierry et tout le mouvement Regenere pour améliorer ma vie! 


La traduction de 40 à 60 vidéos se fera au plus tôt possible, et tous ceux qui contribuent auront droit à toutes les traductions le jour même où elles seront publiès.  Des vidéos ont été déjà traduites et tu peux les voir ici.



Des vidéos comme celle-ci: 



Ce mouvement va prendre un essort international, grâce à toi et moi, mais nous avons besoin que tu aides premier! Moi je le ferrai de toute facon, mais tu peux le manifester beaucoup plus rapidement...

 Tu es l'unique responsable que ce-ci soit une realité! Es-tu à l'hauteur? 

On va parler de sous maintenant...!


3. Financement*

(Estimé pour 4 mois)


Regenere                                                                                                                     Transcription au Francais et Propriété des vidéos......................................... 20%

(Soit $51 par vidéo)

Salaire de 2 traducteurs:   

Sous titrage de 60-80 vidéos en Espagnol et Anglais......................................40%       

(Soit $51 par vidéo par traducteur) 

Responsable: Javier Lara

Revision et soutitrage de 60-80 vidéos...............................................................10%
Responsabilité de qualité native de l'Espagnol et l'Anglais................................20%
Responsable Financier et Marketing....................................................................10%
(Soit $102 par vidéo)                                         


Total $18000

 On y arrive, allez!


*IMPORTANT 

- Je comprend que c'est beaucoup d'argent, mais comprenez aussi que chaque vidéo prend aux alentours de 20 heures pour être transcrit, synchronisé, traduit et verifié!  Cela signifie que chaque personne travaillera pour $10 de l'heure!  

- Si j'arrive à 25% de mon but seulement, Régénére aura 5%  et je n'embaucherai aucun traducteur.

- Si j'arrive à 50% de mon but seulement, Regenere aura 10% et j'embaucherai un traducteur.



4. Expérience en Langues


Je ne prétend pas sugérer que je suis le mieux capable pour ce job. C'est sûr qu'il y en a d'autres mieux que moi! 


2001 : BAC économique Lycée Francais @ San Salvador, El Salvador.

2006: Licence en Commerce International NMSU @ Nouveau Mexique, Etats Unis.

2012: Master I International Management @IAE Toulouse - France

2012: Traduction du 45000 mots du site www.UZplaces.com ; Espagnol - Anglais

2013: Diplome d'Enseignement d'Anglais @ UNAM (México DF - México) 

2014:Traduction du livre "despierta paz" de Renee Salinas ; Espagnol - Francais.

2014: Revision de romans avec Liljana Arsovska Mo Yan ; Chinois - Espagnol

2014: Traduction du "short tale" "an enigmatic smile" Chinois - Espagnol et Chinois             - Anglais. 

2016: Collaboration pour soustitrer  "Mon meilleur conseil de santé" (pas en ligne encore) et Soustitres  30 minutes pour changer une vie.  (Francais vers Espagnol)

Combinaison Linguistique Espagnol A  Anglais B Francais B


La traduction ne sera pas facile puisqu'il y a beaucoup de vidéos. Aussi, mon pied, colonne lumbaire et cervicale ne sont pas au meilleur état après un accident de voiture. Mais encore une fois je me sens guidé vers ce projet, c'est donc ma responsabilité, qui va le faire sinon?  


Si tu ne peux pas collaborer avec de l'argent, mais tu veux toujours aider, tu pourrait me metre en contact avec de traducteurs natifs d'Espagnol ou Anglais! Tu peux aussi partager ma campagne aux résaux sociaux... rappels-toi d'utiliser les outils Indiegogo! 


        UN GRAND MERCI POUR L'AIDE!
       SANS TOI, RIEN N'EST POSSIBLE!






Regenere.org se esparce por tu organismo! 



1. Intro

Conoces los efectos de la carne en tu cuerpo? 

De la Leche? 

Sabes porqué no es lo mejor para consumir? 

Sabes como el gluten se pega en tu estomago y puede ocasionar enfermedaddes autoinmunes, fátiga crónica y cancer? 


Algunos de ustedes ya conocen a Thierry, pero para los que no lo conzcan, por favor hagan click aquí, Es un video largo, pero valdrá la pena cada minuto! 
Gracias por verlo!
Ahora que ya comprendiste los principios básicos y leyes naturales, las leyes fisiológicas, las mismas leyes que gobiernan los hongos, microbios, virus, la naturaleza y el Ser Humano, 
Sigue leyendo! 

Thierry es el representante del movimiento Regenera en Francia. Su objetivo es retornarle al individuo su autonomía a nivel de salud, modo de vida y permacultura. Tienen ya toda una guía para hacer una transición gradual y remplazar la nutrición de antes! Aquí puedes ver la primera etapa que te doy con mucha alegría! 

Ya 64,000 personas lo siguen y su canal cuenta ya las 16 millones de vistas. Está haciéndose un movimiento global con tu ayuda! Ya eres parte de él si compartes esta campaña!  



2. Gracias Regenere por salvar mi vida! 


Antes (2009)

26 años


Ahora (2016)

33 años con una gran
y VERDADERA sonrisa!


Como para algunos de ustedes, este movimiento significó salvar mi vida del gluten y los productos lácteos, que estaban matando la energía dentro de mi cuerpo y le agradezco a Thierry y todo el movimiento Regenere por mejorar mi vida! Siento que es mi responsabilidad el difundir el mensaje Regenere a todo el planeta, y además no puedo pensar en nada más divertido que traducir sabidurìa microcelular! Lo harìa gratis pero necesito dinero para comprar frutas y vegetales! 

La traducción de 60  a 80 vídeos se hará lo más pronto posible, y todos los que contribuyan recibirán un update con el video apenas est´r traducido, y también los podrán ver en la página de Regenere International. 


Podemos hacer la diferencia, pero primero debes ser tú el que me ayuda. Del resto me ocupo yo... Estás a la altura de ayudarme? 


Ahora hablemos de dinero! :D 



3. Financiamiento *

(Estimado para 4 meses)


Regenere                                        
Transcripción de Voz a Script en Francés y Propiedad de Vídeos........................ 20%
Honorarios de 2 Traductores Inglés y Español:  

Subtitulaje de 160 vídeos de Inglés a Español.........................................................40%

Responsable: Javier Lara

Revisión y Subtitulaje de 160 vídeos y Garantía de Calidad...................................20%

Campaña Indiegogo y Marketing..............................................................................20%


TOTAL $18000

*IMPORTANTE

- Entiendo que el precio es alto, pero recuerda que cada video toma alrededor de 20 horas en ser transcrito, sincronizado, traducido y verificado! Asì que hablando de 70 videos, esto significa que cada persona trabajará por 10 dólares la hora! 

- Si llego al 25% de mi objetivo, Regenere obtendra 5% y no contrataré a ningun traductor. 

- Si llego al 50% de mi objetivo, Regenere obtendrá 10% y contrataré a 1 traductor. 


                                                        

      Es una realidad que lo logramos, sé parte de este movimiento! 



4. Experiencia y Educación Lingüística


No pretendo decir que hay mejores personas para realizar este proyecto, pero que además de las cualidades tengo la motivación para lograrlo. 


2001 : BAC économique Lycée Francais @ San Salvador, El Salvador.

2006: Licenciatura en Comercio Internacional @ NMSU Nuevo México, Estados Unidos. 

2012: Master I International Management @IAE Toulouse - Francia.

2013: Diploma de Profesor de Inglés  @ UNAM (México DF - México) 

2012: Traducción de 45000 palabras del sitio www.UZplaces.com ; Español - Inglés.

2014:Traducción del libro "despierta paz" de Renee Salinas ; Español - Francés. 

2014: Revisión de novelas con Liljana Arsovska Mo Yan ; Chino - Español.

2014: Traducción del cuento corto Una sonrisa sin respuesta. Chino - Español.  

2016:  Subtitulaje del vídeo "Mi mejor  consejo de salud" (todavia no está en linea) y colaboración en subtitulaje de 30 minutes pour changer une vie.  

Combinación Linguistica Español A  Inglés B Francés B



Obstáculos en el camino 

Hay algunos obstáculos que puedo ver en el camino: no será fácil traducir tantos videos por unas lesiones que tengo en las cervicales y lumbares después de un accidente de carro. Me costará mucho pero seguro que la satisfacción y el legado que dejé para hispano y angloparlantes perdurará por siempre! 

Si no puedes colaborar con recursos económicos, pero quieres ayudar de cualquier forma, podrias ponerme en contacto con traductores de inglés, y español.También puedes compartir esta campaña en cualquier red social que prefieras y así logras que alguien que sí dispone de recursos ayude! Recuerda de usar las herramientas de indiegogo! 


Muchas gracias por leer!


Estoy seguro que juntos podemos hacer la diferencia!

2014: Revision of Chinese Novels Liljana Arsovska Mo Yan ; Chinese - Spanish.
2014: Translation of the "short tale" "an enigmatic smile". Chinese - Spanish. 
2016: Sous titrage de la vidéo Mon meilleur conseil de santé (pas encore live) et sous titrage de 30 minutes pour changer une vie.  
Linguistic Combination: Spanish A  English B French B  




I understand the sum might be a lot of money, but subtitling these videos is hard work, and this project deserves every dollar in the world! 
There are some obstacles in the way since my ankle and lumbar column are hurt from a car accident, but again, I don't fear this because I feel guided to do this and no activity is more fun than translating microcellular wisdom as of now! 
If you cannot collaborate with money, but you want to help in any way, you can also share my campaign in whatever social network you want! Remember to use Indiegogo's own tools!




  A big thank you to you! 

  Without you, I am, but together we are strong! 


Regenere.org regenerant
la vitalité en toi! 


1. Intro 
Est-ce que tu connais les effets de la viande dans ton corps? 
Du lait?
Est-ce que tu sais pourquoi ce n'est pas le meilleur de les manger?
 Est-ce que tu connais comment le gluten se colle dans ton estomac et peut occasioner de maladies autoimmunes, fatigue chronique et un cancer? 

Quelques uns d'entre vous peut être  déjà  connaissent Thierry Casanovas, mais pour ceux d'entre vous qui ne le connaissent pas encore REGENERE, SVP faites click ici. 
Merci d'avoir vu la vidéo! 




Maintenant que vous avez vu la video et vous comprenez les principes de base des lois naturelles, les mêmes lois qui gouvernent les microbes, les virus, la nature, et donc l'Etre Humain...je t'invite à aider la planete à avoir cette sagesse! 
Lisez la suite s'il vous plaît,
Thierry est le représentant du mouvement Regenere en France. Son objectif est de retourner l'autonomie individuelle de chaque individu au niveau de la santé, mode de vie et permaculture. Ils ont tout un modèle de transition qui remplace celui d'avant (avec de la viande, produits laitiers et du pain) et vous pouvez le voir ici. C'est seulement une guide et c'est à chaqun de le personaliser dans son cadre bien spécifique!




Il y a déja 62,000 personnes qui suivent la chaine Youtube de Regenere, avec 16 millions de vues. Ce-ci a augmenté depuis 5 années et maintenant on est responsable que toute la planete sache cette sagesse! 



2. Merci Regenere pour sauver ma vie 

Avant (2009)
26 ans




Maintenant (2016)
33 ans avec un gran et VRAI sourire!




Comme pour certains d'entre vous, ce mouvement a sauvé ma vie (celle de Javier Lara) du gluten et des produits laitiers, qui étaient en train de tuer l'énergie de mon corps. Je remercie vivement Thierry et tout le mouvement Regenere pour améliorer ma vie! 

La traduction de 40 à 60 vidéos se fera au plus tôt possible, et tous ceux qui contribuent auront droit à toutes les traductions le jour même où elles seront publiès.  Des vidéos ont été déjà traduites et tu peux les voir ici.




Des vidéos comme celle-ci: 
Ce mouvement va prendre un essort international, grâce à toi et moi, mais nous avons besoin que tu aides premier! Moi je le ferrai de toute facon, mais tu peux le manifester beaucoup plus rapidement... Tu es l'unique responsable que ce-ci soit une realité! Es-tu à l'hauteur? 
On va parler de sous maintenant...!





3. Financement*
(Estimé pour 4 mois)Regenere                                                                                                                     Transcription au Francais et Propriété des vidéos......................................... 20%(Soit $51 par vidéo)
Salaire de 2 traducteurs:   
Sous titrage de 60-80 vidéos en Espagnol et Anglais......................................40%        


(Soit $51 par vidéo par traducteur) Responsable: Javier Lara Revision et soutitrage de 60-80 vidéos...............................................................10%Responsabilité de qualité native de l'Espagnol et l'Anglais................................20%
Responsable Financier et Marketing....................................................................10%(Soit $102 par vidéo)                                         



Total $18000
 On y arrive, allez!


*IMPORTANT 
- Je comprend que c'est beaucoup d'argent, mais comprenez aussi que chaque vidéo prend aux alentours de 20 heures pour être transcrit, synchronisé, traduit et verifié!  Cela signifie que chaque personne travaillera pour $10 de l'heure!  
- Si j'arrive à 25% de mon but seulement, Régénére aura 5%  et je n'embaucherai aucun traducteur.
- Si j'arrive à 50% de mon but seulement, Regenere aura 10% et j'embaucherai un traducteur.







4. Expérience en Langues

Je ne prétend pas sugérer que je suis le mieux capable pour ce job. C'est sûr qu'il y en a d'autres mieux que moi!

La traduction ne sera pas facile puisqu'il y a beaucoup de vidéos. Aussi, mon pied, colonne lumbaire et cervicale ne sont pas au meilleur état après un accident de voiture. Mais encore une fois je me sens guidé vers ce projet, c'est donc ma responsabilité, qui va le faire sinon?  

Si tu ne peux pas collaborer avec de l'argent, mais tu veux toujours aider, tu pourrait me metre en contact avec de traducteurs natifs d'Espagnol ou Anglais! Tu peux aussi partager ma campagne aux résaux sociaux... rappels-toi d'utiliser les outils Indiegogo!

33 años con una gran y VERDADERA sonrisa!






Como para algunos de ustedes, este movimiento significó salvar mi vida del gluten y los productos lácteos, que estaban matando la energía dentro de mi cuerpo y le agradezco a Thierry y todo el movimiento Regenere por mejorar mi vida! Siento que es mi responsabilidad el difundir el mensaje Regenere a todo el planeta, y además no puedo pensar en nada más divertido que traducir sabidurìa microcelular! Si no puedes colaborar con recursos económicos, pero quieres ayudar de cualquier forma, podrias ponerme en contacto con traductores de inglés, y español.También puedes compartir esta campaña en cualquier red social que prefieras y así logras que alguien que sí dispone de recursos ayude! Recuerda de usar las herramientas de indiegogo! 






Muchas gracias por leer!

story:
We all know that essential oils smell great, but they are also powerful holistic tools to benefit everyday life.

we have unlocked the ancient power of essential oils and combined them with the anti-inflammatory properties of CBD.

 

MEET THE SCENTS

Focus -

ft. peppermint, orange, & eucalyptus

Fire -

ft. cinnamon, lemon, & black pepper

Recover -

ft. wintergreen, spearmint, & tea-tree

Shield -

ft. tea-tree, cedar, & peppermint

Rest -

ft. lavender, rosemary, & ylang ylang

TOO LEGIT -

Reviews for days...

(check out our G1 product line reviews on amazon.com)

 

CERTIFIED = BONAFIDE -

Backers have the peace of mind knowing products are created with safety and cleanliness in mind. Our products will be manufactured in a cGMP certified manufacturing facility, assuring quality, safety and a guaranteed reduction in cross-contaminants. 

The Power Of CDB

CBD oil derived from 100% pure un-adultered hemp-seed oil packs a powerfully efficacious punch.

Based off studies pertaining to hemp oil, the Komega6 team has selected this ingredient to leverage it’s anti-inflammatory properties and also it’s known benefits to affect skin health. Making hemp oil a natural selection as a carrier oil for topical use. While blended with potent essential oils, this makes for one highly beneficial blended oil unknown to any other essential oil brand currently on the market.

The Bulk of the work has already been done,

with 99% of our pre-planning, sourcing, R&D and manufacturing-partner negotiations complete.

Your support is all we need to bring our 2nd Generation Topical Essential Oil Blends to market.

US backers can expect to receive their perks by starting Sep — Nov.

Perks with apparel may take one to two weeks longer to ship depending on printing runs, sizing & volume. 

Facts About Komega6

We are an established start-up with a proven record of delivering quality health & wellness products to market and are asking backers to help us with funding our newly designed product-line extension—introducing our new carrier blend featuring CBD oil (from hemp-seed oil); in return, backers will receive deepened discounts and a chance to be the first to try the latest and greatest products from komega6. 

  • We have been in business for 3 years — & retain a positive presence on amazon.com, zulily.com & walmart.com 
  • This is our 1st official product line extension primarily focusing on revamping our core product line of blended topical oils.
  • We are asking backers to help us fund the procurement of components and raw materials to mass-produce our second generation of essential oil-based products featuring CBD oil.

After much feedback from our customers and vendors, we have gone back to the lab & developed what we feel to be a superior upgrade to our already established topical essential oil blend line. Needless to say, we are very excited to share them with customers; both new and those that are already familiar with our brand.

What We Need

We need funding to help us purchase raw materials & components at increased volume. 

  • Our small startup business up to this point has been entirely passion-funded by direct sales and humble amounts of owner financing.
  • Komega6 is asking for $25,000 to support us in reaching a larger volume of raw-material & bottle component procurement orders — this is intended to give us broader brand exposure and also to increase our per-unit profitability, primarily for the purpose of attracting potential investors. 

What You Get

  • We are promising backers with the delivery of your choice of perk containing variances of our core 5 - essential oil blends.  Our blends are pre-mixed essential oil blends that are blended with our topical carrier oil blend (trademark pending) — featuring hemp oil, argan oil, & coconut oil. Some perks will include bonus option gifts such as bath salts or apparel. 

"Stretch Goals" — the backers' bonus*

  • Funding provided*, our backers will also get the possibility of being the first to back and receive our extended "stretch goal" offerings of essential oil diffuser blends, pure oils, soaps, and pillow sprays stated for out planned product-pipeline. Our Stretch goals will be posted once we determine the success of the campaign and its feasibility. Repeat backers will provide hidden perks for even deepened discounts. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The majority of backer-risk is reduced in our proven track record and already established procurement & manufacturing processes. There is always a risk in regards to crowd-funding. Such as time restraints and financial planning pitfalls. We have dedicated much time and resources to the planning and launching of this campaign to alleviate potential issues.

  • The bulk of our product research and design is already complete
  • Pre-planning pertaining to material procurement & manufacturing procedures have been pre-established; raw materials & bottle components have been price-negotiated & ready-to-go with provided funding.
  • We have established a launch plan with our vendors to alleviate operational short-comings pertaining to Logistics, Manufacturing & Financial processes.

Fulfillment

Our projected fulfillment window goals are from Sep-Nov 2018, we feel this time-frame gives us time in order to order raw materials to have direct shipped to our manufacturing partner, manufacture and bottle backers products, quality check, and then send off to a 3rd party fulfillment center to be fulfilled to backers. There may be instances where problems come array during these processes, we are committed to full transparency in our process and will keep backers updated on critical news pertaining to their order. Some contingencies may include the following and should be expected.

  • We will not receive funding and order totals until 15+ after this campaign ends.
  • We will not have total order details on perks such as tee shirt sizes and scent variables from order to order until after the campaign has ended and we have reached out to backers for clarification on the details of their purchased perk — for example, shirt sizes and scents preferred. This may take several weeks to obtain all this information and will impact order forecasting thus causing delays.
  • Our manufacturer may have commitments to complete other clients before our manufacturing & bottling runs because we cannot currently commit to a hard-line order amount and run date at this very moment our manufacturing timeline may be subject to changes.
  • The same instance goes for a third party shipping provider for order fulfillment. In a worst-case scenario, we have our own shipping processes in place that meets our current fulfillment demands. With that being said, we will personally ship orders if need-be but will plan for a more streamlined approach.

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Isn't CBD oil illegal in most states?

There is a TON of misinformation pertaining to CBD oil, what it is, and it's legality. But the short answer is, no CBD is not illegal for distribution within the U.S., It is illegal for production and processing in several states in the U.S., this is due to its relationship with the marijuana plant itself (you can't legally grow marijuana in most U.S. states).

CBD or Cannabidiol is found in many parts of the cannabis plant, but its legality is only affected by its sourcing stemming from the part of the plant it is extracted from (any oil extracted from marijuana leaves and stems are considered illegal in most non-participating states due to the potential cross-contamination with the illegal psychoactive oil, THC).

In our case, we are using CBD derived from Hemp Seed Oil (small amounts of CBD is found in hemp seed oil) Hemp Seed oil does not contain THC, or any other illegal substance. Our Hemp Seed oil is sourced out of Canada, where it is perfectly legal to extract and export.

 

Are Komega6 products organic?

Technically speaking, yes, all of our products consist of raw organic oils that are produced from cold-pressed or steam distilled extraction processes. At this very moment, we have not paid for any official certificates stating that our products are organic, but we assure you that they are.

Do you grow your own essential oils? Where do they come from?

No, much like every other essential oil brand, we obtain our oils via distribution — all of our raw materials including our essential oils come with certificates of analysis proving their quality. We are committed to only using high-quality essential oils in our products and will make these certificates available via our website once obtained. The oils are sourced from farms from all over the globe and provided to us via a network of distribution partners accompanied with information that provides us with their region of origin. 

Are your oils for consumption?

Although our oils may be safe to consume for most, we do not recommend consuming them as they are designed specifically for topical use.

Can you use komega6 topical blends in a diffuser?

Due to the inclusion of the carrier oils in our blends, we do not recommend distilling our topical blend oils. But you can if you really want to... Effects may vary.

Wil I get a rash from applying the oils topically?

All of our blends have been tested on multiple subjects to cut back on the risk of skin irritants. But in some cases, an individual may be particularly sensitive to an oil. If you have any known allergens to any of the oils listed on the label, we suggest not applying and contacting us for a replacement or refund.

What do I do if I have an allergic reaction to a topical blend?

Please contact your doctor immediately for any medical related advice. 

What if I do not like a scent or have a bad experience with a blend?

Please contact us directly through our website support email provided on komega6.com and ask us for either a replacement or a refund.

Do you ship abroad?

Yes, we will provide worldwide shipping. Most perks will include free shipping within the continental U.S., some lower tier perks will require a shipping charge. Orders placed for shipping outside the U.S. will have an additional $20 charge — keep in mind, different countries have different customs policies and there is always a risk of delays or even confiscation when shipping abroad. In the case that a package is not delivered, please contact our support.

Where do they come from?No, much like every other essential oil brand, we obtain our oils via distribution — all of our raw materials including our essential oils come with certificates of analysis proving their quality. We are committed to only using high-quality essential oils in our products and will make these certificates available via our website once obtained. The oils are sourced from farms from all over the globe and provided to us via a network of distribution partners accompanied with information that provides us with their region of origin. Are your oils for consumption?Although our oils may be safe to consume for most, we do not recommend consuming them as they are designed specifically for topical use.Can you use komega6 topical blends in a diffuser?Due to the inclusion of the carrier oils in our blends, we do not recommend distilling our topical blend oils. But you can if you really want to... Effects may vary.Wil I get a rash from applying the oils topically?All of our blends have been tested on multiple subjects to cut back on the risk of skin irritants. But in some cases, an individual may be particularly sensitive to an oil. If you have any known allergens to any of the oils listed on the label, we suggest not applying and contacting us for a replacement or refund.What do I do if I have an allergic reaction to a topical blend?Please contact your doctor immediately for any medical related advice. What if I do not like a scent or have a bad experience with a blend?Please contact us directly through our website support email provided on komega6.com and ask us for either a replacement or a refund.Do you ship abroad?Yes, we will provide worldwide shipping. Most perks will include free shipping within the continental U.S., some lower tier perks will require a shipping charge. Orders placed for shipping outside the U.S. will have an additional $20 charge — keep in mind, different countries have different customs policies and there is always a risk of delays or even confiscation when shipping abroad. In the case that a package is not delivered, please contact our support.

story: Gaza has suffered a barbaric siege for 13 years! It has been declared unlivable by the United Nations! It has a population of 2m the majority of which are children!  It is one of the most densely populated vulnerable and impoverished places on the planet! Often described as an "Open-air prison! It has been under almost constant attack! In particular several major military operations having destroyed most of the basic infrastructure needed to sustain life! Due to the blockade, sustained military attacks and imposed cuts to International Aid by the USA the people, in particular, the children face a desperate struggle for life! The health system is crumbling it can't cope! 97% of the water is undrinkable and there is a shortage of almost everything the economy has collapsed! Now it has Covid19! That is why this Emergency Appeal  LEAF s "Food to Fight Covid19"  in Gaza is so important.  With your donations, we will supply for $70 a package of fresh locally sourced Fruit vegetables and protein with clean drinking water! This will feed a family of 4 for 2 weeks, the food will be chosen for its benefits to boost the immune system and being locally sourced will help the local economy! Health advice with basic methods to avoid infection will also be given in a leaflet. The people of Gaza now face self-isolation unlike us in the west they do not have the money or access to any of the services we take for-granted!  Your donation even 1$ will help save lives. Gaza is uniquely vulnerable to the spread of Covid19, a healthy diet will at least help sustain a healthy immune system! Please share this appeal on all media! Please also make a donation however small! So those in Gaza who think the world has forgotten them have a chance for life, let them know you care!
