story:
Electric Neck Massager Pulse Back 6 Modes Power Control Far Infrared Heating Pain Relief Cervical Physiotherapy Massager.

 

About Item:

★Massager : With ergonomic U-design,The use of low-frequency electrical pulse, magnetic effect,loop traction three-synchronous treatments to form high-performance composite energy field.Latest portable electronic snap-on neck massaging device for wellness and well being as well as prevention of cervical neck pain,headache, shoulder pain.

★Ergonomics ： The massager adopted U shape, is in accordance with the streamline and ring-type design of human neck cervical. What’s more, the neck strap can be adjusted to 160°, you can adjust it freely.6 modes transferable and 10 kinds of intensity adjustable. You can choose any mode or intensity according to your need.

★Electric pulse massage：To promote blood circulation, relax the local muscles, electrode pads designed to achieve double massage effect,relax massage mode, cupping mode, scraping mode, hammer tapping mode, acupuncture mode, massage mode.

★Magnetic effect : The built-in magnetic can massage human acupoint, which can balance the nervous system, improve the oxygen supply, microcycle and the nutrition status of the tissue cells.

★Electrode patch : It combines a variety of massage techniques in traditional Chinese medicine, promoting blood circulation, massage coverage more widely.The massager can be used on neck, back, leg and waist etc, applicable for the whole body.

Feature: 

1.Ergonomics. The massager adopted U shape, is in accordance with the streamline and ring-type design of human neck cervical. What’s more, the neck strap can be adjusted to 160°, you can adjust it freely.

6 modes transferable and 10 kinds of intensity adjustable. You can choose any mode or intensity according to your need.

2.Magnetic effect. The built-in magnetic can massage human acupoint, which can balance the nervous system, improve the oxygen supply, microcycle and the nutrition status of the tissue cells.

Electric pulse massage. It can stimulate repeatedly nerve acupoint to promote metabolism, relax muscles and eliminate soreness etc.

3.3D intelligent fit technology. You can easily adjust electrode according to your neck curve.

4.Electrode patch. It combines a variety of massage techniques in traditional Chinese medicine, promoting blood circulation, massage coverage more widely. 

5.The massager can be used on neck, back, leg and waist etc, applicable for the whole body.

 

Note: 

It is recommended that you should use a wet towel to wet the neck before using it and make the instrument completely close to your necks, otherwise, you will feel neck tingling and rashes.

Specification:

Material: ABS + silicone + stainless steel + magnetic

Power: 3V 30mA

Battery type: 2 x AAA battery（Not included）

Pulse frequency: 0Hz~1000Hz 

Size: 18*11.5cm(L*W)

Weight: 174g

Color: White .

Electric pulse simulates Chinese medicine six massage techniques: 1, relaxing massage mode 2, cupping mode 3, scraping mode 4, patting mode 5, acupuncture mode 6, manipulation mode.


1. Can promote local blood circulation, relax the local muscles to relieve inflammation, swelling, pain, fatigue.
2. The use of low-frequency electrical pulse, magnetic effect,loop traction three-synchronous treatments to form high-performance composite energy field.
3. Simple operation, clear process, more humanized.
4. Automatic and convenient Settings each time 15 minutes of a comfortable massage journey.

Package content:

1 x Massager

1 x Electrode patch

1 x User manual(English)

story:
The Vision, The Why

When we opened our door 2 years ago, Ameanspinn started with very used bikes, and in no time they broke, chipped, and got tossed out.  We owe to all of our customers who have kept us open to offer newer safer bikes. 

Ameanspinn Indoor Cycling Studio is the place to be for Indoor Cycling & fitness in the  Downtown Wheaton Maryland area. This area was in need of a dedicated, fun and motivating indoor cycling studio.  We offer classes (as early as  6AM) lead by dedicated inspired instructors. Every class has its challenges on all level, you'll be driven to push hard and gain desired results.  

Our goal for this campaign is to raise $21,000 in 60 days. We must raise all $21,000 to get any of the donations, we will use the funds raised towards our stationary bikes new flooring & lighting to deliver the best indoor-cycling studio experience in the area. The bikes we want are repurposed reconditioned  and designed specifically for Ameanspinn, coming from a Gym Supply facility, allowing us to keep costs down without sacrificing quality. At approximately $900 each, 21 bikes will cost $18,900; add administrative fees for this campaign, and our total comes to $21,000.

All we needs is, top of the line metered bikes, new durable flooring,  kick-ass studio lighting, & customers pouring in, this wont take anytime at all once we get the donations pouring in.
It can be completed but only with your help, we know we can get there.

We're here today to ask you to join the Ameanspinn  movement by contributing! 

It's imperative that we accomplish this goal  to enable us to better serve our community of students with safe bikes, smoother rides, and worry-free  bikes breaking down in the middle of class time. How embarrassing! 

We hope you are able to contribute, and we appreciate your continued support and involvement in enriching the fitness goals of each student and community over all.

We're so grateful for our Community of students who have already gone to support our studio, rocked it out with us in fundraisers, know that we wouldn't be where we are today without the support, love,  and dedication from our students.

Help us give back to you and everyone who steps in to Ameanspinn!

Every contribution you support adds a beat to your heart and ours!  

Thank you for believing!  We can't wait to Spinn Mean with YOU!

Ameanspinn Cycle Studio -

story:
Back Pain Relief with the Most Portable Lumbar Stretcher for Less Cost than One Chiropractor Visit!

The Lumbar Lengthener is essentially an extremely portable decompression table without the expensive trip to see a chiropractor. It also replaces bulky inversion tables and their blood-induced head rush that causes extreme pressure, discomfort, and dizziness.

In fact it’s so light and portable that it fits into a small case that can easily fit into a carry on bag for travel and only weighs about 11 ounces.

Instead of using gravity to stretch your lumbar muscles and spine as does an inversion table, the Lumbar Lengthener uses a little bit of force in a similar way to decompression tables. Simply pull on the handle, let go, relax and enjoy the stretch in you lower back.

The Benefits of the Lumbar Lengthener:

✔ Extremely Portable - Unlike inversion tables, decompression benches, or having to drive to see a chiropractor, this goes anywhere you go. It only weighs about 11 ounces and fits in a small bag (not included).

✔ Easy to Store - Even stored in a case, the Lumbar Lengthener is only about 13" long x 5 wide x 1" thick so you can store it in a drawer. Other solutions often become part of your home’s decor.

✔ Relax While Using - No applying constant pressure or hanging upside down making it impossible to relax.  Simply pull the handle and the locking pulley keeps the tension on the cord. Just lie there, relax, and enjoy the stretch.

✔ Low Cost - Chiropractor visits cost $30 to $200 a session with a series of treatments costing $450 to $6000. For about the same cost as one low end session, you can use this solution anytime, anywhere, as often as you like.

✔ Built in Safety - You’re protected from applying excessive force on your spine since your upper body isn’t tied down. Gravity holds your upper body in place, but if you try to apply too much force it will slide. This protects your spine from injury while still providing just the right amount of stretch.

✔ Benefits of Stretching - Helps relieve lumbar pain by reducing nerve pressure, re-hydrating discs, realigning the spine, relaxing tense muscles, decreasing inflammation, and increasing blood circulation.


About the Creator

My name is Tim Bruxvoort and I created this product for myself. I'm 59 years old and have been mostly sitting in front of a computer for the last 35 years doing product development in one way or another. Unfortunately the spine isn't designed for that much sitting and it has resulted in spinal discs that are compressed. I have tried various devices to decompress my discs, and while they help, they all had one problem or another.

At the top of the list is the expensive spinal decompression therapy you can get from a chiropractor. They have complex tables you can lay on to decompress your spine. While they work, it takes too much time to drive to the chiropractor's office plus you need lots of visits that cost several thousand dollars. That's understandable since these tables can cost upwards of $80,000 to buy. Also, if I'm traveling then I don't have access to these visits.

Next on the list are inversion tables or other bulky table like devices. Inversion tables provide a nice stretch but my head feels like it's going to explode with all that blood rushing to it. So they're just not an enjoyable experience for me. Plus all of these table devices take up so much room they essentially become part of your home decor. Not attractive at all.

Then there are devices where you apply manual pressure to stretch your spine. For me that caused pain in my wrists, plus it isn't very relaxing when you constantly have to apply pressure.

So my goal was to develop a device that was portable enough that I could take it anywhere when I travel, something that did not require constant pressure so I could relax while using it, and something that was far more affordable that chiropractor visits. 

It took three different types of prototypes but as they say; "The third time is a charm". I think once you try the Lumbar Lengthener you'll agree with what "they" say. 

Thanks for helping me fund the manufacture of this product!

Current Status

I decided to build 100 units right away and the webbing, cord, and pulley assembly is complete and being shipped to me right now. The tooling for the handle is being done now and then 100 handles will be produced here in the USA. The user manual is completed but needs to be printed yet and then we will be ready to package these units and get them shipped.

The funds for this campaign will help pay for the inventory so we can get this product launched to the market. Your contribution will not only get you the Lumbar Lengthener first, but will also help other back pain sufferers in the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute now, we would appreciate it if you would share this campaign with your friends or back pain sufferers you know. Just use the Indiegogo share tools above. Thanks for your help!

story:
Short Summary

We tell our story on our website, http://www.pawspantry.net.

We found LuLu as a rescue dog to serve as a companion for me when my husband was dealing with what was diagnosed as terminal cancer.

By God's grace, he has survived multiple treatments, and LuLu is now an incredible part of our family. 

While taking care of LuLu, I was disappointed in the treats available - too many chemicals, too expensive, and too many fillers. This led to an intensive search for great recipes and ingredients, and a great deal of tinkering.

I love to bake, and decided to ensure LuLu got the very best foods and treats. I make her food from fresh and healthy ingredients, and also all her treats. That effort led to a group of treats that LuLu has tested and approved, and she is addicted to a steady supply.

Many of my friends and friends of LuLu asked for some of the treats I was making, and I was glad to provide them. However, we discovered that all such treats have to go through a rigorous process of analysis, certification and registration. 

We started the process, and now we are at the last stage of launching our business!

Because it is expensive to get this done, we decided to use this crowdfunding opportunity to get to the next phase. Rather than simply ask for money, we are providing a true value to all of our supporters that includes a sample selection of our initial six products, as well as some great gifts.

Whether you have a furbaby you want to pamper or want a great gift to give a friend or your local shelter, this is your opportunity to support Paws Pantry and get a handsome reward for that support. 

We will be supporting rescue groups and shelters with our profits, and we will also be working with the Job Creation Institute to help empower other women to pursue their dreams.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal for this effort is $25,000. That will allow us to complete all the legal and regulatory processes, finalize the packaging and inventory, and to produce our initial products, including your rewards.

We will gauge our costs to the level of support, but the full funding will get us fully operating and selling online. Regardless of the final level of support from this campaign, we will complete the regulatory requirements and get the first products out within 60 days of closing this project.

We have three levels of participation, explained in more detail here on this page:

  • $25 - you get six two-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a one-year discount for all our products.
  • $50 - you get six four-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a two-year discount for all our products.
  • $100 - we'll send you six eight-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a lifetime discount for all our products. You will also be listed on the Paws Pantry Hall of Fame page on our website unless you prefer otherwise.

The Impact

We are following through with this idea for multiple reasons.

First, I am excited about having my own business helping others to provide healthy treats to their dogs. We love our furbabies, and this is a great way to ensure they stay around as long as possible.

Secondly, I have gained a new appreciation for how many other women would like to follow their own dream, but like me are intimidated by the processes involved.

My adviser, Margie, shares this desire and has made it possible for me to get to this point. Her advice and assistance has been invaluable, and she is looking forward to working with and empowering other women. We'll be providing more information on that in our updates.

We are also very excited by the response from shelters and rescue groups. We will work closely with local groups and shelters and provide low-cost treats to help with their work and to use as fundraisers. 

We have other ideas, such as creating a DIY treat-baking option, and for helping families to use our treats for learning about business and the free enterprise system. 

Risks & Challenges

While we are counting on completing the full funding, we are committed to moving forward, and we will ensure that all of our initial supporters receive the products promised at their level of support.

We have thoroughly researched the requirements for final certification, and we are confident we will qualify. We are also pleased that while this process has been cumbersome, it creates what Margie calls a "Barrier to Entry" and helps make our treats even more marketable and unique.

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope you will participate at one of the three levels, but you can help regardless:

  • Please let all your friends and social media contacts know about our campaign. The Indiegogo share tools make this really easy.
  • Think about supporting even if you don't have a dog, and use the rewards as gifts and for your local shelter.
  • We would love to get your comments and feedback, no matter what!
  • Please send any questions - we will add them to this site and on our website.

Thanks for letting us share our dream with you...we look forward to keeping you updated as that dream becomes a reality...

We will gauge our costs to the level of support, but the full funding will get us fully operating and selling online. Regardless of the final level of support from this campaign, we will complete the regulatory requirements and get the first products out within 60 days of closing this project.
We have three levels of participation, explained in more detail here on this page:

$25 - you get six two-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a one-year discount for all our products.
$50 - you get six four-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a two-year discount for all our products.
$100 - we'll send you six eight-ounce packets of our treats, plus some special Paws Pantry swag, and a lifetime discount for all our products. You will also be listed on the Paws Pantry Hall of Fame page on our website unless you prefer otherwise.


The Impact
We are following through with this idea for multiple reasons.
First, I am excited about having my own business helping others to provide healthy treats to their dogs. We love our furbabies, and this is a great way to ensure they stay around as long as possible.
Secondly, I have gained a new appreciation for how many other women would like to follow their own dream, but like me are intimidated by the processes involved.
My adviser, Margie, shares this desire and has made it possible for me to get to this point. Her advice and assistance has been invaluable, and she is looking forward to working with and empowering other women. We'll be providing more information on that in our updates.
We are also very excited by the response from shelters and rescue groups. We will work closely with local groups and shelters and provide low-cost treats to help with their work and to use as fundraisers. 
We have other ideas, such as creating a DIY treat-baking option, and for helping families to use our treats for learning about business and the free enterprise system. 

Risks & Challenges
While we are counting on completing the full funding, we are committed to moving forward, and we will ensure that all of our initial supporters receive the products promised at their level of support.
We have thoroughly researched the requirements for final certification, and we are confident we will qualify. We are also pleased that while this process has been cumbersome, it creates what Margie calls a "Barrier to Entry" and helps make our treats even more marketable and unique.

Other Ways You Can Help
We hope you will participate at one of the three levels, but you can help regardless:

Please let all your friends and social media contacts know about our campaign. The Indiegogo share tools make this really easy.
Think about supporting even if you don't have a dog, and use the rewards as gifts and for your local shelter.
We would love to get your comments and feedback, no matter what!
Please send any questions - we will add them to this site and on our website.

Thanks for letting us share our dream with you...we look forward to keeping you updated as that dream becomes a reality...

story:
We ended our campaign before the planned date, please check the updates page for more infos.

Huge thanks to all our backers and supporters!

 

Introducing Insulin Angel

A team of experienced mobile health innovators got together to create Insulin Angel. The people who created Insulin Angel are diabetics or parents to diabetic children which makes this product also come straight from the heart.

The app notifies you before your insulin reaches a dangerous temperature and, crucially, if you forget and leave it behind. It makes diabetes easier to live with.



 "This will be such a breakthrough. Reducing the anxiety of living with medical conditions is just as important for me in my job as the condition itself." -Dr. Philip Unwin of The Hart Surgery

As many as 380 million people around the world suffer from diabetes, and for those dependent on insulin their daily regime of injections and blood tests can present a huge challenge.

Insulin Angel works with any medication that's temperature sensitive, or even if you simply want to make sure you don't forget your equipment - everything from asthma pumps to EpiPens to insulin.

What Does Insulin Angel Do?


+ It Gives You Peace of Mind: Temperature Tracking

Insulin Angel measures your medication’s temperature and warns you before dangerous levels are reached via the dedicated smartphone app.



+ It Looks Out for You: Monitoring Stored Medication

A recent study showed that 29% of domestic fridges regularly operate at temperatures of 9°C and above, which is higher than the recommended upper limit for most stored temperature sensitive medication.

Insulin Angel operates wirelessly inside the fridge and connects to your smartphone. In the event of a power outage, or other fridge failure, Insulin Angel tracks and records the storage condition of your stored and reserve medication.


    + It Helps You to Remember:  Proximity Tracking

    Insulin Angel alerts you only when you forget or lose your medication. Its context algorithms recognise if you are around home or work and when you are elsewhere. This avoids false notifications, for example when you are in the garden and your medication is somewhere indoors.



    + It Keeps You Informed: Notification of Parents and Carers

    We ourselves are parents of children with Type 1 diabetes and we know how stressful it is to live with a chronic condition. Insulin Angel can simultaneously push alerts to a parent or carer as well as the user, to ensure that important messages are acted upon fast.


    + It Knows What Is Best: Built-in Medication Database

    The most used insulins in the UK, USA and Germany are in the app's database. The database contains manufacturers' temperature recommendations, both for in-use medication and stored medications as well asseveral temperature sensitive blood glucose monitors from Accu-Chek and Bayer.
    In addition, we store data for the rheumatism medication Humira and the asthma medication Salbutamol. The database continues to evolve and expand, and we are keen to hear from you what additions you would like to see.

    + It Plans Ahead: Weather Warnings

    The Insulin Angel app gathers weather data about your current location and warns you about upcoming heat-waves or cold spells so you can take extra care.


    Donate an Insulin Angel Device

    The ability of Insulin Angel to monitor the temperature of medicines is especially important in regions with extreme climates lacking access to refrigeration.

    With this in mind we have partnered with Access Afya, a social enterprise creating a network of high-tech health centresin Kenya providing consultations, information, on-site diagnostics, and authentic medication.

    All of our perks may be bought as donations to our charity partner Access Afya. simply purchase as normal and wait for us to get in touch.


    The Insulin Angel Device

    Four iterations of our design have led us to a small, light and portable product (5cm x 2.5cm / 2” x 1” inch).


    We value quality, so we chose injection-molded ABS plastic and high quality electronics from Nordic Semiconductors. The battery is a readily available CR 2032 coin cell. 

    The digital temperature sensor is accurate to +/- 0.5 ºC and the internal memory can save up to three months of sensor data, which can be retrieved on the app and exported in csv or xml formats. Proximity sensing is also accurate, we have tested it up to 30 meters and even through two thick brick walls!



    The Insulin Angel App

    The Insulin Angel app will be available for free on both iOS and Android, and will be compatible with every modern smartphone that has Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity (iPhone 4S +, Android 4.3+). The apps runs in the background, communicates with the device at regular intervals and warns the user by a sound and vibration notification every time the medication approaches an unsafe temperature or if it becomes lost.

    We are programming the apps with clever battery-saving algorithms so that the Bluetooth connection does not compromise your smartphone’s battery life.

    When setting up each one of the new devices, you can choose your specific Insulin, or medication or test equipment from a list, and the app will automatically set up safe storage and in-use temperature settings.


    The Roadmap

    The Team

    We are a team of diabetics and parents of diabetic children who know that living with a medical condition such as diabetes is challenging. There is a lot to think about, with very serious consequences now and in the long term. It’s complicated and worrying. We could not find a solution to our problems so we decided to make one ourselves!


    Reducing Wastage, Reducing Costs

    Many medications come with recommended storage temperatures. Medication can be thrown away both because expiry dates are reached and because storage conditions are in doubt.  When in doubt most people throw away expensive medication.

    One study of the economic impact caused by discarded insulin concluded that insulin wastage averaged as high as 34.1% in hospitals in Ontario, Canada. This is a cost of $8,000 for the largest hospital surveyed and translated to an estimated cost of $360,000 a year for this region alone. We know from personal experience that doubt leads to waste.


    With Insulin Angel we can confirm whether medication has been safely stored.  We hope that by removing doubt, w can document this wastage and find ways to reduce it.

    The Technology

    Insulin Angel is built using relayr.io technology; a Berlin-based startup which provides easy tools to build connected products. The device communicates with smartphones using Bluetooth Low Energy. 
    The hardware is based on the design reference of the WunderBar, relayr’s development platform. We chose relayr’s solution because it’s the best. They designed everything from the chip to the servers to work seamlessly together.





    The Insulin Angel Story

    Each founder is either a diabetic or father of a diabetic. We have personally experienced times when we didn’t really know the temperature guidelines for our medication; we certainly didn’t know if temperature limits were breached. 

    We decided to solve these problems by making a high quality temperature and proximity sensor, realising that most sensors weren’t good enough and none stored any medication data. We tried various sensors - the better ones, usually used in industrial installations, were big bulky and expensive. None of the lower cost ones were reliable enough to trust with our vital medication. And it certainly wasn’t possible to connect the devices to a simple app that would run on everyday smartphones.




    So, knowing about sensors and mobile technology we decided to fix it, making an inexpensive, light-weight, accurate, reliable solution. We made ease-of-use a must from the beginning; the device had to connect wirelessly to any modern phone (iPhone 4S +, or Android 4.3+). And once the medication is confirmed the App needed to know what the safe temperatures for your medication.  And that’s what we built.

    We went the extra mile and organised user testing with our local diabetes communities (which was how the team met), sharing the idea or a test device with people suffering from diabetes, rheumatism and asthma, and with medics themselves.


    What is diabetes?

    Diabetes is a common but serious health condition. The disease takes various forms which all result in sufferers being unable to properly metabolize carbohydrates. There is no known cure for diabetes today, so many sufferers (especially Type 1) rely on insulin injections using "pens" or pumps.  

    Modern Medicine made it possible for people with diabetes to live a normal life if they pay strict attention to measuring blood sugar levels and taking the right doses of insulin at the correct time. It is a stressful condition, and it makes something as simple as eating an apple into a complex exercise of testing, carbohydrate counting and injecting.

    Some diabetes facts:

    • In the USA around 29 million (more than 9% of the population) have diabetes.
    • In the UK over 3 million people have been diagnosed with diabetes. Of these about 10% permanently and critically require insulin.
    • Of children with diabetes, 96% have "Type 1" requiring multiple insulin injections on a daily basis.

    The annual cost of diabetes to the USA is estimated at $245 billion. Those with "Type 1" diabetes and some with "Type 2" need to ensure their medication is carefully looked after and never forgotten.

    As insulin needs to be used and stored within specific temperature ranges, uncertainty over storage conditions can result in medicine being unnecessarily thrown away. 


    Risks & Challenges

    Manufacturing an electronic product can be tricky, but we have our expert partner Pilotfish on board. They bring an hardened team of 40 engineers and designers, with experience working on Hansaton hearing aid holders, BMW’s Mini dashboards and world leading Native Instruments DJ controllers.

    App development is handled by relayr who created Wunderbar and developed the firmware, electronics and iOS/Android SDKs. They are very familiar with this technology because they invented it!

    With this capable and experienced team behind our product we have a clear picture of the road ahead. We undertake always to keep our backers and participants up-to-date with both pitfalls and achievements in our exciting journey to make Insulin Angel a reality.


    Get in Touch

    Investors:

    https://angel.co/insulin-angel

    https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/insulin-angel

    Distribution partners and healthcare providers:
    sales@insulinangel.com

    Charities in need of Insulin Angel devices:

    hello@insulinangel.com

    Press:

    insulinangel@dynamopr.com



    Device FAQ

    Which colors are available?

    There will be three colors which our backers can help us choose.

    How big is the device?

    5 cm x 2.5 cm / 2” x 1” (inches).

    How exactly do we measure temperature?

    The sensor we use is accurate to +/- 0.5°C. This measures the ambient temperature surrounding the insulin and transmits it to the app.

    How does the device connect with the app?

    Bluetooth Low Energy. The device must be manually paired with the app the first time it is used. From then on it will automatically connect when within range.

    Must the device stay near to the medication to work? If so, how near?

    Yes, the device should be stored as close as possible to the insulin, ideally in the same case.

    Can I manually adjust the safe temperature range?

    Yes, either select a medication or enter the range manually by referring to your medication manufacturer’s guidelines.

    Can children use the device?

    We made Insulin Angel with parents and children in mind. Parents can receive notifications if their child is without their insulin. Please note that very young children should not use the device unsupervised, it may present a choking hazard.

    What batteries does the device use?

    CR 2032 coin cell

    How do I change the battery?

    The battery can be changed simply by opening the case.

    Which other medications can?

    Insulin Angel was devised with diabetes in mind, but it works just as well with other temperature sensitive medications that are easily forgotten.

    Is the device waterproof?

    No, but the device is splash-proof and can be placed inside a waterproof container if needed without affecting its function.

    App FAQ

    Which phones does the app work with?

    Any Android or iOS phone which supports Bluetooth 4.0. This includes iPhone 4S and iOS version 7.0 or later. This includes Android 4.3 or later.

    Will there be an app for Windows phones?

    We do not have plans to develop for any devices except those running Android and iOS.

    Is the app free?

    Yes. We only charge for the devices.

    Will you add more features as part of the development?

    We have a couple of features we would like to test using your feedback including wastage reporting and reminders of expiry dates and tasks.

    How big is the database?

    Our medication database includes the 30 most commonly used insulins and some other medications, we are counting on the community to let us know about other medications that you would like to see included.

    How does the app know whether my device is in a fridge or in a backpack?

    When a device is first used, the app offers the option of monitoring insulin in storage or in use. This may be changed at any time.

    How do you set up the app to know where your home and work is?

    The app identifies Wifi networks related to your home and workplace. This minimizes unnecessary proximity alerts.

    How does my parent or carer receive notifications?

    Notifications to the diabetic rely on Bluetooth only. As long as both the diabetic and parent phone are connected to the internet, these notifications are forwarded to the parents app.

    Will the app help me to locate my insulin?

    The device contains a proximity sensor. It tells you when your insulin is nearby, but not exactly where it is.

    At what distance from the device will the app alert me?

    Approximately 20 meters

    Medical FAQ

    What other medication does it work with?

    There are many examples, one being patients taking Humira for rheumatoid arthritis.

    What if the app says the insulin is too hot or too cold, do I throw it away?

    The manufacturer of your medication recommends storing it and keeping it within a certain temperature that includes a safety margin

    What happens if I forget my insulin?

    Once your phone exceeds a distance of approximately 20m from the Insulin Angel device it will receive an alert.

    Do you have any medical backing?

    We have presented our product to a number of doctors and pharmacists and the feedback we have had is overwhelmingly positive. Dr. Philip Unwin of The Hart Surgery: "This will be such a breakthrough" as "Reducing the anxiety of living with medical conditions is just as important for me in my job as the condition itself."

    Indiegogo FAQ

    If I select a perk, will the money be taken out of my account immediately?

    Yes, but if the campaign fails to reach its goal you will be refunded in full.

    What are the delivery costs?

    Worldwide shipping costs are included in all perk levels, . Devices are shipped securely with tracking.

    Do you ship to my country?

    We ship to every country in the world.

    Are you teaming up with any charities?

    Yes, Access Afya is the first on our list, and you are welcome to recommend other charities, NGOs or health organisations who would benefit from donated Insulin Angel devices.

story:
We have reached the end of our campaign and want to thank all the people that donated to our cause.  Throughout this campaign we were also searching for investors and companies that would help us put the Q-Wave Pulse on the market.   During this campaign there was a lot of interest in our product because of Indiegogo.  We were contacted by potential investors (companies) and will be meeting with them to progress with the manufacturing.  In the meantime, the people who have bought our product will still be able to purchase the Q-wave on our web site when it is ready.   The purchases that the contributors made on Indiegogo will be refunded to you. 

In addition, we will set up a Paypal account on our web site and will be taking orders around end of 2016.


We will keep everyone posted on our web site www.qwavepulse.com. 

We will be still continuing through Indiegogo InDemand.



One simple device can heal so much!

Introducing the Q-Wave Pulse™- a breakthrough technology that helps heal chronic pain and much more.

We are truly the first only electronic technology device for healing pain that is self contained. Unlike other products that use IPhone or Bluetooth connections we are totally, 100% self contained healing, with no risk of health concerns later that could be associated with cell phone technology or no extra wires or pads needed like with TENS therapy, we are the first ever technology utilizing micro energy healing that is directly placed on the injured area.
Garth Holding the Inventor of the remarkable Q-Wave Pulse™.  His vision began and was inspired by the many people and treating specialists he met on his journey of recovery from a catastrophic car accident.  His motivation was to help people who suffer with chronic pain. There is more to this story, go to our website - My Story  http://www.qwavepulse.com/.
Take control of your pain, heal your injuries with the Q Wave Pulse ™ The first self-contained electronic healing device.

Low Frequency Healing can regenerate body tissue - Medical Net May 2015

Frequencies in the low range below 15 Hz can improve cell viability, thanks to its ability to get molecules moving, and researchers have used it to increase blood flow to tissues in the process of healing and regenerating. In particular, low-intensity frequency that is pulsed in wave pattern similar to the Q Wave Pulse ™ healing disc have been used to help regenerate cartilage and bone, and in tissue engineering to stimulate cells in the human body.


We Believe in healing pain, let's work together and help us to support this great product and reach our goal of $100,000.00 by June 24, 2015.


UPDATE - TIME CAPSULE

We are introducing a novel idea for all our supporters who contribute a minimum of $50 pledge. If we can get 2000 pledges or more we will give everyone the opportunity to have their name placed in our time capsule at the end of the campaign.  Each individual who contributes will have their name, picture, message, and country recorded on a memory disc and placed in a time capsule along with a Q-Wave Pulse healing disc to be locked away until the year 2117.  The location of the time capsule will be at the Akai Centre in Canada .  We would like everyone’s participation in helping us reach our goal.  When you pledge please send us an additional note to info@qwavepulse.com and include your primary email and message that you want to have your name placed in the time capsule.

Updates will be posted on our web site as we progress.  The date of the draw will be posted on the updates page www.qwavepulse.com.  We will video tape the time capsule ceremony at the Akai Centre.


The high cost of pain – painful facts:

Opium based medications $1,800.00 per month minimum = $21,600.00 per year or one time fee of $99 for one Q-Wave Pulse Healing Disc.  

Here's what you need to know so that you, a friend or a loved one can make the right decision.

Side effects of Opiod medications for pain relief (Data from Drugs.com):

Abdominal or stomach pain; blurred vision; burning while urinating; chest pains, crawling, itching, numbness, prickling, "pins and needles", or tingling feelings; convulsions; cold sweats; depression; difficult or labored breathing; dizziness; fainting; fever or chills; hallucinations; irregular or increased heartbeat; lower back or side pain; mood changes; muscle pain or cramps; nausea or vomiting; nervousness; numbness in the hands, feet, or lips; rapid breathing; rapid weight gain; seizure; severe constipation; shakiness in the legs, arms, hands, or feet; sweating, swelling of the face, hands, ankles, feet, or lower legs; tightness in the chest; swollen, painful, or tender lymph glands in the neck, armpit, or groin; constant thirst; ulcers, sores, or white spots in the mouth; unusual bleeding or bruising; unusual tiredness or weakness; wrinkled and pock marked face.

The Q-Wave Pulse™ no side effects.

How the Q-Wave Pulse™ Healing Disc Works

The natural approach to help you control and heal  pain. The patented  Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc is based on the science of energy healing medicine. Our therapeutic  device releases electronic pulses in the form of of ultra low frequency waves that penetrate deep into tissue, cells, muscle and joints to relieve your pain.  


Sound Waves

These waves stimulate the area and increase the blood flow in order to revitalize and enable the body to heal more efficiently. That's why our healing disc is very unlike other healing devices which only deliver a light electrical current to the skin and tissue to disrupt the pain cycle temporarily.


Pain

The Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc  can reduce pain, help heal tissue and cells in the human body, and accelerate healing by as much as 80%. The compact disc-shape electronic micro chip device with rechargeable lithium battery technology can be placed on or over the injured area to begin the healing process.  Current main stream treatments for chronic pain are drugs and heavy pain medications.  These drugs can help ease the pain but not the problem.  As a result your are left addicted along with numerous side effects.

Can you imagine how much relief you can have at the touch of a button.  You or a loved one could be free of addictive and expensive pain medications.  Because the disc is self-contained you don't need pads, wiring, other attachments or mobile devices giving you complete freedom to you use it. This could totally change your life and how you deal with the pain.

The Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc delivers 4 pre-set frequencies in a pulse rhythm vibration, that is set to 20 minute treatment intervals but easier to use and doctor recommended. The frequency is set by you to promote healing of the injured area. We have set out what each frequency can heal in our instructional booklet.


Our prototype with 4 Pre-set frequencies from 3Hz to 11Hz:

Green - 11 Hertz

Red - 7.8 Hertz

Blue - 6.8 Hertz

Yellow -  3.3 Hertz


Q-Wave Pulse™ prototype and Garth, Inventor

"It doesn’t have to hurt to heal" is our motto because it’s true. Often other medical devices and electronic healing products send such a high signal into the skin and tissue that they do more damage than good. People often feel extreme pain from severe injuries or nerve damage because the injured areas are very sensitive to electronic signals often causing a burning sensation. The Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc utilizes ultra-low frequencies below 12Hz which are FDA cleared. These electronic signals do not cause pain or burning of the skin or injured area. Instead the frequencies penetrate tissue to speed up and promote healing while increasing blood flow to the injured area.

To use the Q-Wave Pulse™ all you have to do is press the on/off button and wait of for the device to turn on.  All the lights will turn on showing you all the frequencies available.  Next you press the on/off button again for few seconds and cycle through each frequency.  Once you found the frequency you would like to use let go of the button and start the healing process.   Next time you use the device it will remember the last setting. It's that simple.

Supporting Evidence on Frequency Healing

Supporting documentation is based on years of clinical trials and studies that have been done before us with the Schuman Resonance Studies, Dr. Royal Rife, Dr. Richard Gerber (Vibrating Medicine), Dr. Michael Weingarten, (Chief of Vascular Surgery at Drexle University). 

 Orthopoedic Technology Review - Stimulating Treatment - For the last 30 years, surgeons have extensively studied the use of electrical current for the treatment of difficult fractures, including nonunions, delayed unions, and stress fractures.  Electrical stimulation has been documented to be useful as a treatment.

See more supporting evidence on our web site: www.qwavepulse.com

The Q Wave Pulse ™ Low frequency energy healing device will be featured in Gentleman Genus Magazine http://www.gentlemangenius.com/p/blog-page.html

and other great on-line magazines, radio and television shows.

Dolphins heal at 8 Hz

The Natural sound emited by Dolphins is one of the four pre-set frequencies

covered in the Q Wave Pulse ™ Healing Disc at 7.8 Hz 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeOzQbiLC8I


The Q-Wave Pulse™ Team


Garth Holding, Inventor & CEO of Quantum Wave Technologies Ltd.

Joanne Holding, CFO Quantum Wave Technologies Ltd.

Bob Dickie, CEO and Shahram Nabavi, Sr Industrial Designer of Spark Innovations

Ron Thatcher, Sr Mechanical Engineer, Spark Innovations

Juan Pablo Jou-Valencia, B.Sc. Chemical Eng., Bio-consultant for Quantum Wave Technologies Ltd.


We would also like to thank Marcus Kihn of Alles Creative for helping us with all the graphics and video portion of our campaign.

Our team of professional engineers and industrial designers from Spark Innovations, independant Bio-consultant and consulting medical professionals have worked hard putting together our innovative technology to help people suffering with daily pain.  

FUNDING

Production and Fulfillment Plan

All our supporters are very important to us.  You will be the ones responsible to bring this remarkable technology to people suffering from pain.

Step 1 - Idea

The idea has been put into practice.  Bob Dickie and his professional team of designers and engineers at Spark Innovations have built a prototype, the tooling (mold ready for production) and guided us through the manufacturing process.  We have been awarded a US Patent, International PCT  and Trade Mark for the Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc.  This has been a long and expensive endeavour.




Draft designs of the Q-Wave Pulse™



Q-Wave Pulse™ the size of face watch (showing the underneath of the device)

The Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc allows for freedom and motion letting you place it anywhere on the body. In addition you can use our attachments:

  • a velcro breathable sport strap with a built in ring insert for the Q-Wave Pulse™
  • an adhesive throw away patch (patented) with a built in ring insert for the device that allows the user to attach it anywhere on the body
  • a reusable Patch (patented) with a built in ring insert for the device.  The difference is the rubberized surface that you wet and attach anywhere instead of throwing it away.


Step 2 - Pre-Manufacturing 

We are currently in the final stages of design and pre-manufacturing.  What that means is the working prototype has been made and the tooling for the device has been developed.  We are now ready to start full production.

We know that the Q-Wave Pulse™  can treat and heal pain. Your financial support of the Q-Wave Pulse™ healing disc will allow us to get our product out to you by end of 2015. 

Step 3 - Funding Why We Need Your Support

Let's change the way people heal - without drugs.  You as a backer will now have an important role.  The funding you provide us will get us through to the next stages of manufacturing and distribution of the device.  We need to  tell everyone about   Q-Wave Pulse™,  what it can do and the endless possibilities.  

For us our crowdfunding campaign is an important way to send the message out and raise awareness.  Our product is so simple and portable that it provides a natural solution that not only helps relieve pain but also gives people back their lifestyle and freedom.   


Your support will help us reach the dream of helping millions.  Everyone is important to this campaign.  We will provide updates on our web site which you can follow and be part of our future success. 


Spread the word on Facebook, Youtube, Garth's tweet (@Qwaveman), Joanne tweet (@qwavefemnerd). 


Perks







More Shipping Details

The kit consists of the following:

  • Q-Wave Pulse™  (how many depends which reward you chose)
  • a velcro breathable sport strap
  • reusable patches
  • USB charger
Some countries have varying shipping and duty costs.  Once we receive all the funding we will send out the device to you immediately. We're going to try our best to make this as cost effective and painless as possible.  Thank you for your generous support.

When will I receive my Q-Wave Pulse™?:

Product is scheduled for shipping by November 2015.  If there are any delays we will have updates on our web site.

Where do you ship and is shipping included?:

We will ship all over the world.  We're going to try our best to make this as cost effective and painless as possible.  Therefore we have decided that all shipping costs will be included in your pledge to thank you for your generous support during this campaign.

FAQ:

How does it work?

The Q-Wave Pulse™ emits electronic pulses into your injured area.  You will feel a tingling sensation.  There are certain areas of your body where it will take longer to feel any sensation.  This doesn’t mean the Q-Wave Pulse™ is not working.  It works but your body tissue might be more damaged in places and you will not feel the tingling right away. The frequency penetrates the injured area to speed up, promote healing and increase blood flow.  It's important to allow the device to run through it's full 20 minute healing cycle.  Continuous treatments are recommended for the best results.  Over time the injury will get better and you will feel less pain.

How do I use it?

The Q-Wave Pulse™ has one button that you can to turn on/off and select different frequencies for a 20 minute cycle.  This makes it very simple to use especially for people on the go. You can also use our several attachments for placing the Q-Wave Pulse™ on difficult areas like joints and back. 

Can I use the Q-Wave Pulse™ if I have implants?

We recommend that people with pacemakers, defibrillators or any type of implanted electronic devices do not use the Q-Wave Pulse™ without consulting your physician.  

The device can be used with any type of orthopedic metal implants. Again always consult your physician. 
Your Satisfaction is Guaranteed!
If you are unhappy with the Q Wave Pulse ™ after 30 days send it back to us for a full refund you just pay the shipping and handling charges. 

What if it doesn't work?

All units are pre-tested before they leave the manufacturer.  If you are not satisfied we will provide you with a money back guarantee.  

Will the Q-Wave Pulse™ work on nerve pain type injuries?

Everyone is different when it comes to pain.  Not everyone feels pain the same way. The Q-Wave Pulse™ is a tool to help relieve your pain over time. Like our motto says "it doesn't have to hurt to heal".  Nerve pain is very sensitive to any any type of stimulation.  The Q-Wave Pulse™ provides a gentle way of controlling the pain.

If you require more information, please contact us at:

info@qwavepulse.com

and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
We are so proud of the product we produced that we have selected the all or nothing campaign on Indiegogo.com which means if we don't reach our goal of $100,000 by June 25, 2015 you get your money back and we don't get paid, so there is absolutely no risk to you in helping us in our campaign and best of all your much needed support helps others dealing with pain and injuries.

We want to hear from you on any suggestions or comments no matter the contribution.  You are helping us to bring this remarkable technology to the market and would appreciate any feedback. Thank you.

In addition, we will set up a Paypal account on our web site and will be taking orders around end of 2016. 
We will keep everyone posted on our web site www.qwavepulse.com.  
We will be still continuing through Indiegogo InDemand.

story:
Welcome to our Project!

Introducing the Project

We are a team of three completely different people who wants to act along and launch something essential. The concept is to start a project that can benefit others and help society. 

Our project is based on examinations and studies of dental care. "Our true kickstart" was that we recognized how some people these days cannot afford to smile anymore. Which leads us to one of our main ideas - anybody should be able to smile - and a broken smile can always be fixed. 

Basically our goal is that everyone should be able to afford dental care quality products - not having to make own home experiments to get access. There are three products in our focus - custom craft teeth - teeth whitening - VitaMeal which has its focus on famine and starving populations.

As a team we have been able to initiate the project and attained some major steps already. Now we are getting ready for a countdown and finally being able to open up our doors. 

We now inquire you to assist and follow our progress and birth into something that we hope you also see a meaning in. We need this last lift in order to become real. Thank you for your indulgence!

Main Issue and Main Goal -

The main issue that we are attempting to undertake is the high costs of dental care. Whereas our main goal is to limit the costs while maintaining and preserving a high standard and quality. 

All over the world the necessity of having a well working hygiene and dental care have increased by a high amount of people. In contrast dentists and others have realized this need - taken this into their advantage. Consequently it can be stated that their is a notable change in price due to this. 

Of course, people who are helping others with dental care should be paid for the products - but it should not be a gold mine on peoples needs.

Investigation -

Many people, including a member of our team have had the unfortunate to struggle with a broken tooth. Luckily him - the insurance covered it. Yet, when the insurance is not there to cover - it is a big problem.

We welcome your freedom of investigating this area by yourself. However, what we have found in our explorations are that the last past years, a number between 20 - 30% of people in Europe tends not to go to the dentist appointments due to high costs. Its not that they don't want to - they can't.  

Most people who cannot afford e.g insurance including, 20 - 30 % of people in Europe only shows up to the dentist or doctor when it is considered urgent. 

Now if we choose to look at why some people choose not to go regularly to the dentist - we could easily agree on stupidity or dentist fear. However, we have the knowledge that the true factor prohibiting this are high costs. Who could blame them? Not being able to spend money on a new tooth, these people rather tend to blame high tax and low income to be the actual reason. 

As people start to demand more dental healthcare such as, repairing a tooth or a set of teeth or whitening - we could easily confirm that the demand has a correlation to the increasing of prices. 

Luckily for us, we do not have to go through the piles of laws and decrease tax and increase salary in order for people to afford dental care. This solution is more simple and none complex - we just want to eliminate the costs.

An more frequent action people choose to do nowadays - are to make their own products since they cannot afford the real. If we use this example to give you a hint - we would like you to recall of what that happened when people were prohibited the usage of alcohol. Well people made it themselves, which resulted in the massacre at Valentine's Day, Chicago. Now hopefully this will not go as far.

Jokes aside, the true meaning is that making own products could be dangerous - Its inspiring to see that more people use creativity to craft their own products. However, are they doing it because the joy or cause they have to? 

Now if you are on of these product makers please bear in mind that some are abrasive and should not be used more than recommended - such as our whitening toothpaste. 

Product Idea and Goal

As stated earlier on our presentation - we are focusing on three products - and we have goals for each of them as we expand.

Tooth / Teeth Repairing

Our scientist and craftsman have the education and skill in the ceramics of crafting teeth. Now one obstacle when lowering the price is that usually the quality lowers too.  We know that the high costs of the appointments are not due to the costs of making the product but for profit. Sure if you would like a golden tooth that might not be true. 

Here are some of our handmade quality products.

These are made in the lab that we have access to. As well, yes we do have legal rights to create teeth for customers. The pictures are all including in our PDF - that we gladly share to anyone who wish - as well there are completed registration papers etc.

The main goal of our Teeth products

  • Cut down the costs by 50% - this means that we take craft, shipping, procedure in consideration as well maintaining quality.
  • Increasing our Technology in our dental research to give more long lasting products and higher quality available.
  • Our project is not country based which means that we are not only going to focus only on one country e.g Sweden, we are focusing globally.
Example: if the cost is 750 EU for repairing a tooth we aim to lower it to 325 EU - where the goal is to accomplish the exact same quality.

Tooth Whitening 


We are always in the mode of establishing new colleagues and partners, taking possible expansions by huge importance. One product that we happily recommend people using - is one of our Sponsors dental care products. We are willing to keep on recommending these products to our customers. 

What make these products special?

Firstly, the prices does matter.  Everyone can afford these products and everyone should be able to get a white smile if that is what they want to.  

Secondly, these products show results, which everyone says. However, to prove it we are willing to give out free samples for customers to try so that they can see results before buying it. 

Lastly, thanks to a good price, free samples, results - people now don't have to go and buy these expensive whitening kits or undergo ripoff procedures. Now if you already chosen an expensive way - we also have an anti-plague so that you can keep those results.

The main goal of our Whitening products: 

  • Maintain a low cost so that all people can afford whitening instead of crafting various products at home or buying expensive kits.
  • Offer our customers, free samples of our recommendations. Giving them a chance of trying the results.
  • Helping people who have been through expensive procedures - to change - and keep their results without having to go to the next annual procedure.

VitaMeal - Charity


As we said in our introduction we want to contribute to society. Booth by lowering the expense to peoples demand on dental healthcare but in addition we also want to help others that needs our help. Famine is a problem that cannot be tackled alone, therefor we chosen to support VitaMeal since it proves results.


Why VitaMeal?
VitaMeal is probably the only true charity product that we know shows best progression. Everytime that we send a donation we fed one child for a whole month in Malawi. 
Our goal with VitaMeal is to open peoples eyes. Each customer will receive information about VitaMeal and an opportunity to spread it to others - and as thanks our goal is to provide free samplings to whoever supports the war against famine.  We hope to be able to be proud sponsors in the fight against famine.

Risks and Challenges 


One of our problem that we definitively are going to encounter during our expansion are the time of making teeth to our customers. The way we have thought of this is - if the project expands so do we have to do. Easily, by investing in new team members to help us craft and deliver quality.

Another possible threat is that more people dentists start to lower costs but that was our main goal so we do not plan on tackling them, rather we would like them to become partners, expanding our main idea further.

Partnerships - some dentists might be totally against our fruitful idea trying to put obstacles by not willing to help with the procedure. We are going to focus on the ones who are willing to contribute first - making sure that they get their business going. The idea of that more people can afford their dental services more people as well dentist will be aware of this.


Conclusion


Yes, everyone should be able to afford our products. No matter what product that is in interest. People should be able to white or repair their teeth not having to stall it out due to high costs. In some years we will have to expand and more people around the globe will be able to get a quality dental healthcare without spending a fortune.

The main idea is to benefit peoples dental care - not only in Sweden but globally. We have already gotten huge support from many people as well companies. Nowadays the whole team is working on the project - adjusting - progressing - as well our real time jobs - fighting to make this real. 

We are so close to start this and become a whole part of it. We just need the last kick to get us a boost and start. 

If you think - believe and hope for our dream to come true or want to take a part of our dream. Everything counts, small or big, penny or gold. Each step makes us comfortable to say that we are convenient to presume that we are on the threshold to this dream coming true.

We sincerely hope you liked our presentation and if you would want to become a part of us your gladly appreciated to contact us! As well, if there are any questions just let us know!


Other Ways You Can Help

Penny or no penny there are always ways to help us! Maybe you would like to be a part of or future - or maybe you have a friend whom might like this idea. If you want to contribute nonetheless, please share us, like us, talk about our idea, and we are forever grateful for your great contribution!


Rewards 

The rewards are not something we want to limit - if you love limited offers we apologize - but our concept is that everyone should be able to afford dental care and whitening. The extra thing that we can do that is a limited offer but unlimited people can get access to it during the project launch- is our last reward.

Fund Plans -

75% - crafting and material

15% - product development and quality

5% - making webpage and contacting our clients

5% - starting costs 

All further funds will increase our productivity.

Contact:

Felix Höglund : FelixHoglund@Live.se

0735 444 298

story:
Who I Am

As founder of KD Aromacare, I create spa-quality aromatherapy skin care products. I only use all natural, organic ingredients. All of my creations contain complex, Therapeutic Grade essential oils designed to help you achieve your personal skin care goals.

I invite you to treat your skin to my fantastic face and body scrubs, body oils and specialized anti-aging products. Discover for yourself how my powerful creations will transform your skin. I create products for all skin types, including those with allergies or sensitive skin conditions. All products are handmade in Austin, Texas.


I offer you the opportunity to give your body the care it deserves.


What You Get

My all natural products and essential oils will benefit you every day. Quite a few people have been asking for my products and I would love to make them for you!  In order to do so, I need a certain number of orders to be pre-ordered.  I chose this platform to offer you this opportunity because I will not accept pre-order payments unless I am confident all orders can be filled in a timely manner and with the funds for supplies secured.
I want to ensure I can provide everyone with the quality skin care products they deserve!

For this special opportunity, I am offering face/body scrubs and face/body moisturizing oils.


What We Need

The complete funding of this campaign will not only go towards providing you with amazing products to be delivered to your home, but also towards providing you other wonderful products in the future.

I purchase all ingredients in bulk. Funds will be applied towards the purchasing of quality ingredients for your products and other necessary things such as:

*  Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils

*  Carrier Oils

*  Bottling and Labeling costs

*  Herbs

*  Formulation Expenses

* Shipping Costs

Funds will also be applied towards:

*  Formulation of new products

*  Refining formulations of other products

*  Marketing


A Little More About KD Aromacare

All KD Aromacare products are developed and manufactured by myself, founder/owner, Chantell Champlain.

An advocate of proactive skin care, I have been formally trained in clinical aromatherapy at the Aromatherapy Healing Arts Academy and am known for formulating high quality complex blends. I attribute my Native American heritage and the influence of my tribe's (Narragansett Indian Tribe) culture of using herbs for their amazing properties as a strong influence in my gravitation towards aromatherapy and all natural body care.

KD Aromacare (formerly Kalei Doscope Aromocare) experienced instant success and growth with retail opportunities as well as participating as a vendor at the largest Christmas Bazaar in the nation (The Armadillo Christmas Bazaar) for two consecutive years. However, out of dedication and passion for KD Aromacare, I have spent the past few years conceptually developing the future of KD Aromacare to ensure the best pathway for growth while staying true to its mission of providing the highest quality products.

In the future, KD Aromacare will be focusing on selling my product line at large-scale events and retail opportunities in addition to individuals. I will also be offering specialty services such as certified Rain Drop Therapy and personal consultations for custom blends. My mission is to ensure that we are not only assisting the community as a whole with their body care needs, but also the individual whom may benefit from a more personalized aromatherapy experience.


Why KDA Products?

I have always been committed to providing the highest quality skin care products to my customers.  That includes formulating products with high quality all natural and organic ingredients versus lower quality inexpensive ingredients.

My customers have told me they have seen results within days and that remains to be what I strive to offer, results.

I am a firm believer in pro active skin care and take pride in helping people achieve their skin care goals!

Other Ways You Can Help

> Can't order a product at this time?  You can still help someone get theirs!  Every $10 or $20 donation helps!

> Do you want to ensure you get your amazing skin care product from KDA?  Help me reach the goal! Share this campaign with others whom you know would love to upgrade their skin care regimen!

story:
We love light-sabers. We’ve loved them from the first glorious swing to the electric clash of that final strike - we can't deny the joyous excitement coursing through our veins. With over 10 years of saber experience under our belts, we still hadn’t found a saber to live up to our expectations. So we made our own, better than the rest, with features designed to address the shortcomings of other sabers. Now we’re ready to share our creation with saber enthusiasts everywhere to give “Epic Battle” a whole new meaning.


Custom units with multiple colors, sounds, and motion effects will cost you over $800 and you still have to fumble with clunky buttons, tiny retention screws, and frustrating chargers. The Valence Saber™ is cut from a different mold. Not only is it a fraction of the cost but it is loaded with more features than any existing saber.

Patent-Pending, Bluetooth-controlled, instant color and sound change, a battle-ready handle free from buttons or switches, USB charging for your saber, and tool-less blade retention. No other saber on the planet packs as much as the Valence Saber. Make your pledge now and stand together for endless fun!


Base Hilt


The Valence Saber communicates via Bluetooth LE with your Android™* smartphone for instant color and sound change. Control up to 7 sabers at the same time on one device. The free Valence Saber App allows you to preview color and sound on your phone before you make the changes to your saber. You can even turn off individual sound effects and adjust the volume. Best of all you can effortlessly turn your saber on and off with one press. 

*Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

What if I don't have/want to use my phone?
Good news! The Valence Saber's suite of effects are also available directly on the saber. Highly specific motions allow color and sound change; these motions are designed to be purposeful and time sensitive so your saber has the best chance of keeping the setting you want. And the saber already turns on and off without the phone, so no worries there.



Blades

Each saber's blade is 1.25" outside diameter, approximately 33.5" in length. The wall is 1/16" wide, allowing the blade to be durable yet light enough for extensive dueling. The LED strips are housed in the blade, which is removable, along with the diffusing foam and 3M diffuser film. Tested by slamming into concrete. Results: no discernible damage, no broken LEDs. These blades can take punishment. See OUR PROMISE section for warranty.

Valence Sheath™

The Valence Sheath is a revolutionary feature that completely changes the way you experience costume-ready, custom saber handles. Now with each Valence Saber you can quickly customize the entire cosmetic look and feel in seconds without the need to purchase additional sabers.


How it Works:


Back us now!: Pick your perk. When you back us for a Valence Saber you get the VS Echelon™ sheath at no additional cost! That's right, your first sheath is on us.

Super Simple Assembly: The sheath slides over the existing base handle and locks securely into place. A soft-tipped guide screw makes sure the speaker slots and USB slot line up and stay that way. Screw is permanently attached during manufacturing so no tools are required for the sheath, either. To remove simply pull firmly on the sheath and it slides off.

Customize: Need to make a quick costume switch? No problem. The Valence Saber switches with you. Or maybe your character is in between the light and dark and switches sabers based on his or her mood? We've got you covered. As our sheath library grows you'll be able to choose from simplistic, minimalist designs to full-on movie ready wonders perfect for your costume!


The Valence Saber is so well built, so reliable that if at any time it breaks from normal use you can send it back for a one-time replacement. Just don't take a bath with it or call on the power of Thor - we can't cover silly or supernatural.*

*Lifetime warranty covers saber to saber contact only. One-time replacement Valence Saber is offered. No warranty is given on replacement saber. No damages, including water, electrical, physical, non-saber contact, etc., covered. No disassembly or assembly damage covered. "Dead" battery unit not covered




Look, stuff happens. But we want you to know transparency and honesty are forefront in making the best product we can. That's why we hired an expert guide in our supply partner so we can rectify any unforeseen problems quickly and get you your saber as fast as possible. 

We've prototyped and everything fits, but that doesn't mean it will during production. And if it doesn't we'll have to go back and fix it, which takes time. Our greatest challenge is ensuring the saber you get is the saber we want you to get. If it takes longer than anticipated you'll be the first to know.


Beyond this you can rest easy knowing your Valence Saber will permanently occupy a warm place in your heart- figuratively speaking of course.

**Valence Saber, LLC and the Valence Saber™ are in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Lucasfilm ltd., Disney, or any of their subsidiaries, associates, employees, or licensed affiliates or agents. Images displayed on this campaign page are the original, sole property of Valence Saber, LLC and do not represent any copyrighted or trademarked material of the aforementioned parties. All other images that are not the original, sole property of Valence Saber, LLC are the property of their independent owners. Valence Saber, LLC will take all steps necessary to ensure that its property in no way confuses the audience with property copyrighted and trademarked by Lucas Film ltd. or Disney. Valence Saber, LLC makes no claim to own any of the copyrights or trademarks of Lucas Film ltd. or Disney and further claims no use of these copyrights or trademarks in content presented from Valence Saber, LLC.
