story:
Introducing U-GYM Mini

U-GYM Mini is designed to comfortably and effectively relieve muscle pain, especially in the lower back and shoulder areas. Many people today experience stress and muscle pain due to long hours at work or busy days at home. Have you experienced shoulder and back pain before? It's a very common: according to the Mayo Clinic, approximately 80% of all Americans will have lower back pain at least once in their lives.

Those who suffer from chronic muscle pain end up seeking professional help. While therapies such as massage, cupping, and acupuncture have proven to be effective, they are too expensive and time-consuming.

 

U-GYM Mini does more than give you a satisfying massage

U-GYM Mini relieves shoulder pain, back pain, and other muscle aches in as little as 15 minutes. Its smartphone-controlled digital massage programs provide the same kind of deep tissue massage you’d normally get from a professional electrotherapy clinic, and are designed to improve your blood circulation and will significantly help you sleep better.

We created U-GYM Mini to be a safe, ultra-portable, and effective digital muscle stimulator, and to treat muscle pain effectively. It's smaller and lighter than a deck of cards. Using proprietary technology, U-GYM Mini gives you a real massage and helps you relax by relieving muscle pain and lowering stress. You can use U-GYM Mini anytime, anywhere, to improve your quality of life and boost your productivity!

 

Get an effective massage, ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

With U-GYM Mini you can enjoy a massage anytime, anywhere. It's easy to wear and lets you relieve muscle pain on the go. You can even get a massage without anyone noticing by hiding the pads and cords under your clothes!

 

Work comfortably during those long days at the office

There's no need to wait until after work to treat sore muscles. Get the massage you need right in the office. U-GYM Mini will get you through those long work days with ease.

 

Bring your own personal massage therapist with you

Get more rest by treating muscle aches and pains while you sleep. U-GYM Mini features a timer that turns off after 30 minutes so you can fall asleep worry free while getting a massage.

 

Videos

Testimonials from first time users 

TechCrunch Interview Video
 

In the media

Megan Rose Dickey @TechCrunch: "I was able to try out the U-Gym muscle massager, and it was pretty cool."
 

Lester Victor Marks @AppleInsider: "The U-Gym product works well, and compares favorably with TENS units that cost almost five times as much.", "On the whole, it gives a new user what they need: places to put the electrodes, and advice about which program of pulsations might be used for. Score: 4.5 out of 5"

Marcus Chavers @NewsLedge: "Number one reason? No massage therapist visits. For those of us not down with a stranger giving us a massage, that’s a huge plus. It also mimics the benefits of expensive and time-consuming treatments like cupping and acupuncture."

Mahit Huilgol @TechPP: "Deep tissue massage is a messaging technique that focusses on realigning the layers of muscles and is often used for destressing and providing relief for muscle pain."

Tyler Lee @ubergizmo: "U-GYM Mini uses medium frequencies for its massages, unlike other TENS devices that operate below 1kHz.", "It is so small and easy to use, you could wear it under your clothes and no one would be the wiser. You could even get a massage while at work and your co-workers probably wouldn’t even know."

Testimonials

Trevor Owens: "The quality of the product is very high, not like the cheap ones you see in most stores. U-GYM is very close to the quality of the device you use at a chiropractor or physical therapist's office."

Charles Huang: "I loaned your U-GYM unit to a friend who hurt his back playing golf. He tried it and raves about it. Just thought you’d like to hear."

 

Product highlights (S.M.A.R.T)

S 一 Smart / Simple / Smile  

U-GYM Mini features smart technology, is simple to use, and (hopefully) makes you smile.

M 一 Mimic  

U-GYM Mini mimics the kind of deep-tissue massage you'd get from a professional massage therapist to effectively remove toxins and increase blood circulation.

A 一 Active

U-GYM Mini is small and ultra portable. You can use it on the go, anytime, anywhere.

R 一 Reduce

U-GYM Mini can save you time and money. It uses high quality rechargeable batteries to help reduce waste.

T 一 Technology

U-GYM Mini is the result of years of research. It uses good design to make medical grade electrotherapy technology simple and intuitive.

 

Key features

1. Bluetooth Connected: Users can update and program massage modes through smartphone app with embedded bluetooth chip in U-GYM Mini device.

2. Deep Tissue Stimulation: Our proprietary digital massage technology induces contractions in deeper muscles for more effective massage.  

3. Massage Program: All massage modes are digital making it upgradeable and customizable unlike other dull and looped programs in  most TENS units on the market.

4. Smartphone Control: Control and customize U-GYM Mini with U-GYM app.

5. Program Sharing: Users will be able to create his or hers personal massage modes and share to others through social media.

6. 4000-8000Hz Frequency: U-GYM Mini utilizes medium frequency technology used in medical therapy for deep tissue stimulation.

7. Up to 6 hours: U-GYM Mini can use up to 6 hours with 2600mAh rechargeable lithium battery fully charged.

8. Ultra Portable: U-GYM Mini is extremely small in size making it easy to bring alone.

9. Stylish: Designed by former Under Armor designer, it has stylish and fashionable look.

 

The U-GYM app

While U-GYM Mini works as a standalone device for basic functionality, the U-GYM apps connects U-GYM Mini to your smartphone over Bluetooth and lets you remotely control your massage experience. You can download new massage programs, update and edit existing programs, and share your favorite programs and settings with friends.

U-GYM Mini’s digital massage mode is an unprecedented innovation that allows users to download and remix(compose) their own, personalized massage modes with ease.

 

Key App Features:

Massage Recommendation: We will collect data to find the everyone's favorite modes. We will then make personal recommendations that fits you perfectly.

Massage Customization: Users can fine tune each massage mode by adjusting the massage duration, intensity, and depth that matches your personal needs.

Massage Profile Sharing:  Share your massage profile over social media. Discuss and share different massage modes with all of your friends online! 

 

How do you use U-GYM Mini?

It's extremely easy to setup U-GYM Mini for a relaxing massage! Thanks to its stylish and minimalist design, U-GYM Mini only features 3 buttons: a power/mode key, and two intensity buttons (+ and -). Simply connect one snap-on lead to each pad, plug the cord into U-GYM MIni, then place the pads on your body.

Step1: Take the 1-to-2 cord and two pads out of the package, connect one snap-on lead to each pad, plug the cord into U-GYM Mini,  then place the pads on your body.

Step2: Turn on your U-GYM Mini, adjust massage strength with + or - key.

Step3: Begin enjoying massage!

You can use the the U-GYM app on your smartphone for even more control, and to download different massage programs. We'll be releasing new programs on a regular basis, and you'll also be able to customize programs and make them your own, then share them with friends through the app.

 

Why massage can help you sleep

Getting less than 8 hours of quality sleep per night has been proven to be harmful to your health. Oversleeping on the weekend does NOT make up for the loss and is definitely NOT a solution for sleep deprivation. All these findings suggest that sleeping quality is directly related to your health.

Routine massage has been proven to boost serotonin. Without serotonin our bodies can't create melatonin, which influences the sleep stage of our circadian rhythm. Massage is a reasonable holistic solution to chronic insomnia and symptoms brought on by sleep deprivation. (3)

Although we are still currently conducting research on sleep deprivation, there is a reasonable amount of evidence supporting holistic solutions such as massage is a healthier therapy choice opposed to a quick fix narcotic.

 

Choose your perk

$99     U-GYM Mini Standard Pack ($50 savings from retail)

$5     Thank you for supporting us!

$39   Pack of Assorted Extra Pads

$188 U-GYM Mini Double Early Pack ($110 savings from retail)

$277 U-GYM Mini Family Early Pack ($170 savings from retail)

 

Each U-GYM Mini Set Includes

Each U-GYM Mini Set includes: U-GYM Mini device, one micro-USB cable, one 1-to-2 cord and four 5X5ch pads.

 

Pack of Assorted Pads Includes

Assorted pad pack includes: 

- 5x5cm/8pcs (2 bags) : For abs, arms and small areas.

- 5x9cm/4pcs (1 bag) : For abs, love handle, leg, shoulder areas.

- 7x13cm/2pcs (1 bag) : For love handle, back, thigh areas.

- 1-to-4 cord for use with 5x5cm & 5x9cm pads.

Free shipping with any U-GYM Mini Set purchase. (Add $15 for shipping if only buys pads.)

 

U-GYM Mini vs. the competition

U-GYM Mini specs

Our mission

When U-GYM founder and CEO Mark Yu received treatment for a shoulder injury three years ago, he discovered that professional electrotherapy is painless and highly effective. Still, having to travel to electrotherapy appointments was time consuming, inconvenient, and expensive. That’s how Mark ended up studying medium frequency stimulation with the goal to create a portable device.

After successfully shipping the team's first product -- U-GYM Pro -- for sports and exercise enthusiasts, Mark received a lot of feedback and conceived a simpler, more consumer-friendly device designed to improve sleep quality. U-GYM Mini is the result of this collaboration with the community.

 

Why does U-GYM Mini work?

 

How do you mimic a real deep-tissue massage?

Our core technology is based on digitally-controlled electrical muscle stimulation. U-GYM Mini uses medium frequencies (above 1kHz) to mimic a real massage. Most consumer TENS units use low frequencies which only stimulate shallow tissue to superficially block pain without penetrating the actual muscles. Low frequencies also tend to irritate the skin.

By using medium frequencies, U-GYM can stimulate deep tissue like muscles and provide a more effective and comfortable massage. The immediate result is better nerve stimulation for pain control, but the longer-term benefit is improved blood circulation which eliminates toxins, relieves sore muscles, and helps you relax.

 

We make complex technology simple

Medium frequency stimulation (above 1kHz) is commonly used in professional electrotherapy, but it typically requires large, stationary machines.

After years of studying medium frequency stimulation, our team finally succeeded in implementing professional-grade electrical muscle stimulation in a small, light, and portable device.

Most TENS units on the market use a simple, low frequency waveform (below 1kHz) which is less effective and can irritate the skin.

U-GYM Mini uses multiple, simultaneous medium frequency waveforms to provide a real deep-tissue massage that effectively relieves muscle aches and pains.

U-GYM's core technology mimics the massage techniques of a professional massage therapist using complex medium-frequency waveforms. It's like having a massage therapist with you right when you need to relax.

With a relaxed body and improved blood circulation, you'll finally enjoy quality sleep.

Stretch goals

After we meet our initial goal, we'll add the following rewards will to every machine (for backers who pledge $69 or more). 

Raise over $100,000 will add belt clip and lanyard to each U-GYM Mini Set

Raise over $200,000 will add ??? to each U-GYM Mini Set (Will reveal reward after $100,000 is reached)

 

Our Team Members

 

Mark

Founder / CEO

Masters of Computer Science from New York University, Co-founder/CMO of AirSig, Inc., and founder of CARWAii.com. Mark Yu is an innovative serial entrepreneur and active mentor to young startups. Mark has over 15 years of sales and marketing experience in the Semiconductor and Biotech Industries.

CC

Cofounder / CTO

BS of Electrical Engineering from China University of Science and Technology. Over 20 years of experience in Research Development & Application Engineering for consumer electronics. CC’s main focus includes digital electronic circuit design, single chip program design, chip process and production management.

Aki

Cofounder / COO

BS of Commercial Design from Ming Chuan University. Over 20 years of experience in Graphic Design, Packaging Design, Corporate Identity Systems (CIS), Web Design, App Structuring and Marketing. Aki is also Founder & Creative Director of AkiDesign Studio.

Johnson

Developing Engineer

B.S. NCKU Physics, M.S. NCTU Electronics Engineering, analog circuit design, microcontroller robot design, product maintenance, and material management.

Max

Account Executive

B.A. in CGU Business Management, over 4-year experience in marketing and business development, best of sales for 3 consecutive years at Listen Culture International.

Marty

App Developer

MBA in Marketing, Lubin School of Business, Pace Univ. Founder & CEO of Inforton Technology Co., Ltd. Over 10 years of product marketing and project management experience in the wireless & semiconductor Industries. Started working on health-related apps in 2009 for both iOS & Android.

Oren

Mechanical Engineer

BS of Mechanical Engineering from Lunghwa University of Science and Technology in Taiwan. Over 15 years of experience in exterior and mechanical design for innovative products. Special interests in consumer products and medical devices.

 

Professional Advisors

Dr. Chin-Yin Tsai

Medical Advisor

MD, School of Rehabilitation Medicine at Chung Shan Medical University. Bachelor of Chinese Medicine from China Medical University. Founder of Northern Taiwan Chinese Weight-Management Association. President of Chihui Jingxi Traditional Chinese Medicine clinics. Attending physician of both Chihui and Junyue Chinese Medicine Clinics.

Dr. Abel Po-Hao Huang

Clinical Advisor

MD, Biodesign fellow at Stanford Health Care, PhD from the Institute of Clinical Medicine at National Taiwan University. Attending Neurosurgeon & Assistant Professor at the Department of Neurological Surgery, National Taiwan University Hospital. Y Combinator alumni (W15). Neurosurgeon and Medical entrepreneur.

P.T. Victor Tsai

Clinical Consultant

President of Just Well Sports Medicine Center, certified therapist for cancer rehab at the Ministry of Health and Welfare, member of the Taipei Homecare physical therapy team, physical therapist for the ALS association and Eden Foundation, designated therapist for the X-Revolution Sports Training center, ex-team leader at Bo-Cheng orthopedics, ex-physical therapist at Country Hospital Rehab center.

The Impact

We strongly believe the U-GYM Mini (Smart Digital Muscle Stimulator) campaign will help many people improve their health with minimal effort. U-GYM Mini can help people save not just time but also money. It’s a very practical and convenient health-enhancing device, and will undoubtedly make a very positive impact on people’s lives in today’s busy world.

As such, your support for this campaign is definitely significant since your contribution will soon make U-GYM Mini available and affordable to young and old people alike.

Risks & Challenges

Our team members -- including CC, Marty, CM, and Mark -- all have had many years of experience in Taiwan’s electronics and semiconductor industries. Since our country is famous for manufacturing superb products like Apple’s iPhone, we believe we’re in the best place to  undertake the U-GYM project.

In addition, prior to this campaign, we have successfully funded and shipped our U-GYM Pro project. Since we have experience delivering the complex products on Indiegogo, we're confident we can complete this project.

 

Injection molding

For quality purposes, we’ve decided to manufacture our parts using injection molding. There's typically a 60-day lead time to fabricate the molds for these parts, and fine tuning each mold will extend the timeline by an additional 2 weeks. This is where we might run into delays. To minimize this risk, we’ve already spent our own money on molds ahead of the campaign.

 

Supply chain and logistics

To minimize possible delays in acquiring certain key components such as the lithium polymer battery, we’ve made our design accommodate four different battery sizes from four different manufacturers.

For custom-made parts with long lead times like the converter, we’ve already started the ordering process using our own funds ahead of the campaign. This will minimize possible delays.

For common parts, we’ve already started quality assurance by setting up rigs to test incoming components and sub-assembled modules. We have years of experience developing and producing consumer electronics (eg. laptops, mini servers, and communication modules), so we know what we’re doing and are confident that we can deal with whatever challenges present themselves throughout the manufacturing process.

 

Our timeline

2012.09 The idea of applying professional stimulation technology to consumer is formed

2015.11 Launched U-GYM Pro on Indiegogo

2016.07 Fulfilled U-GYM Pro orders worldwide

2016.09 Announced U-GYM Mini focused on sleep and well-being

2016.10 Launched U-GYM Mini on Indiegogo

2016.11 Release first beta U-GYM Mini units

2016.12 End of U-GYM Mini campaign

2017.01 Release first production U-GYM Mini units

2017.02 Release U-GYM Mini beta app

2017.02 Start pilot production for U-GYM Mini

2017.03 Start shipping U-GYM Mini to early backers

2017.05 Start U-GYM Mini mass production

Certification

U-GYM Mini requires certain certifications in its respective markets. As a result, we’ve started to prepare documents and samples, working closely with a consulting company specializing in international certification procedures for medical appliances.

The manufacturers we’ve hired in Taiwan are GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) certified and have experience manufacturing medical devices, and TENS units in particular. In addition, we’ll have FCC and CE certificates ready for Bluetooth connectivity before delivery.

While we’re well prepared to handle all the respective processes, we can’t eliminate the risk of possible delays due to compliance issues. Should we encounter any unexpected problems, we’ll do our best to keep you informed and fulfill your order.

 

Other ways you can help

Do you like our project? If so, tell your family, friends, and people you think might need it. Please don’t hesitate to share our project with them. We need all the help and support we can get. Even just providing your feedback will help us in a big way!

Share our campaign directly: https://igg.me/at/ugymmini

 

Safety and precautions

U-GYM Mini is suitable for use by adults. However, like with all forms of exercise, some care is needed when using our product, so please bear this in mind when reading the points below. Do not use U-GYM Mini if:

·  You have an electronic implant (eg. pacemaker) or suffer from other heart problems.

·  You are pregnant.

·  You suffer from cancer, epilepsy, or are under medical supervision for cognitive dysfunction.

·  You are connected to high-frequency surgical equipment.

·  There are a number of illnesses for which U-GYM Mini is unsuitable. Please consult your physician if you’re not certain about your condition.

·  Remember to seek professional advice if you feel uncertain in any way before or after using U-GYN Mini. It's always good to let your doctor know about your progress.

 

FAQs

Q1. Since your product is categorized as medical device, do you have any compliance records and certifications?

A1. Our product is designed just like any a professional electrotherapy device and we’re implementing safety measures and protection against mis-operation. In addition, we plan to apply for FDA compliance and other necessary certifications in key markets once we have more prototypes on hand. We’re working with Emergo Group which specializes in helping companies get approved. We need to raise funds on Indiegogo to build more devices and cover the expense of multiple applications.

Q2. I’m trying to compare U-GYM Mini to other portable TENS or EMS machines. Does the U-GYM Mini stimulate muscles in a way that other similar equipment does not? Why is the price so much lower in Taiwan?

A2. The biggest difference between U-GYM Mini and other portable machines are the operating frequencies, the number of waveforms, and the stimulation intensity. Most machines out there still focus on one or two specific uses but U-GYM Mini is a multi-purpose device that’s user programmable.

People have been using electrotherapy for decades, so there are many different types of devices on the market. Taiwan is home of OEM and ODM manufacturers for many name-brand electro-stimulator companies, such as Antelope Suit, Slendertone, OSIM, and Omron. As such, the devices are cheaper in Taiwan and China. There hasn’t been much change in the basic design and functionality of these devices -- only small incremental updates -- and most portable stimulation devices still look similar and have a limited set of features.

U-GYM Mini uses the latest technology and the most advanced components to make it effective, ultra-portable, and programmable. We’ve even customized and designed our own components to match our requirements. As such, the cost of producing U-GYM Mini is much higher than the competition. We hope you enjoy all the benefits U-GYM Mini has to offer and we look forward to reading your feedback.

Q3. What's the difference between U-GYM Pro and U-GYM Mini?

A3. U-GYM Pro, our first product, is designed for sports and exercise enthusiasts to help them before, during, and after exercise. U-GYM Mini is for mainstream consumers and designed specifically to help users relieve muscle aches and pain to improve their sleep. Here's a comparison chart is:
story_txt:
Introducing U-GYM MiniU-GYM Mini is designed to comfortably and effectively relieve muscle pain, especially in the lower back and shoulder areas. Many people today experience stress and muscle pain due to long hours at work or busy days at home. Have you experienced shoulder and back pain before? It's a very common: according to the Mayo Clinic, approximately 80% of all Americans will have lower back pain at least once in their lives.Those who suffer from chronic muscle pain end up seeking professional help. While therapies such as massage, cupping, and acupuncture have proven to be effective, they are too expensive and time-consuming. U-GYM Mini does more than give you a satisfying massageU-GYM Mini relieves shoulder pain, back pain, and other muscle aches in as little as 15 minutes. Its smartphone-controlled digital massage programs provide the same kind of deep tissue massage you’d normally get from a professional electrotherapy clinic, and are designed to improve your blood circulation and will significantly help you sleep better.We created U-GYM Mini to be a safe, ultra-portable, and effective digital muscle stimulator, and to treat muscle pain effectively. It's smaller and lighter than a deck of cards. Using proprietary technology, U-GYM Mini gives you a real massage and helps you relax by relieving muscle pain and lowering stress. You can use U-GYM Mini anytime, anywhere, to improve your quality of life and boost your productivity! 
Get an effective massage, ANYTIME, ANYWHEREWith U-GYM Mini you can enjoy a massage anytime, anywhere. It's easy to wear and lets you relieve muscle pain on the go. You can even get a massage without anyone noticing by hiding the pads and cords under your clothes! 
Work comfortably during those long days at the office
There's no need to wait until after work to treat sore muscles. Get the massage you need right in the office. U-GYM Mini will get you through those long work days with ease.

 
Bring your own personal massage therapist with you
Get more rest by treating muscle aches and pains while you sleep. U-GYM Mini features a timer that turns off after 30 minutes so you can fall asleep worry free while getting a massage.

Key features1. Bluetooth Connected: Users can update and program massage modes through smartphone app with embedded bluetooth chip in U-GYM Mini device.2. Deep Tissue Stimulation: Our proprietary digital massage technology induces contractions in deeper muscles for more effective massage.  3. Massage Program: All massage modes are digital making it upgradeable and customizable unlike other dull and looped programs in  most TENS units on the market.4. Smartphone Control: Control and customize U-GYM Mini with U-GYM app.5. Program Sharing: Users will be able to create his or hers personal massage modes and share to others through social media.6. 4000-8000Hz Frequency: U-GYM Mini utilizes medium frequency technology used in medical therapy for deep tissue stimulation.7. Up to 6 hours: U-GYM Mini can use up to 6 hours with 2600mAh rechargeable lithium battery fully charged.8. Ultra Portable: U-GYM Mini is extremely small in size making it easy to bring alone.9. Stylish: Designed by former Under Armor designer, it has stylish and fashionable look. The U-GYM appWhile U-GYM Mini works as a standalone device for basic functionality, the U-GYM apps connects U-GYM Mini to your smartphone over Bluetooth and lets you remotely control your massage experience. You can download new massage programs, update and edit existing programs, and share your favorite programs and settings with friends.U-GYM Mini’s digital massage mode is an unprecedented innovation that allows users to download and remix(compose) their own, personalized massage modes with ease. Key App Features:Massage Recommendation: We will collect data to find the everyone's favorite modes. We will then make personal recommendations that fits you perfectly.Massage Customization: Users can fine tune each massage mode by adjusting the massage duration, intensity, and depth that matches your personal needs.Massage Profile Sharing:  Share your massage profile over social media. Discuss and share different massage modes with all of your friends online!  How do you use U-GYM Mini?It's extremely easy to setup U-GYM Mini for a relaxing massage! Thanks to its stylish and minimalist design, U-GYM Mini only features 3 buttons: a power/mode key, and two intensity buttons (+ and -). Simply connect one snap-on lead to each pad, plug the cord into U-GYM MIni, then place the pads on your body.Step1: Take the 1-to-2 cord and two pads out of the package, connect one snap-on lead to each pad, plug the cord into U-GYM Mini,  then place the pads on your body.Step2: Turn on your U-GYM Mini, adjust massage strength with + or - key.Step3: Begin enjoying massage!You can use the the U-GYM app on your smartphone for even more control, and to download different massage programs. We'll be releasing new programs on a regular basis, and you'll also be able to customize programs and make them your own, then share them with friends through the app. Why massage can help you sleepGetting less than 8 hours of quality sleep per night has been proven to be harmful to your health. Oversleeping on the weekend does NOT make up for the loss and is definitely NOT a solution for sleep deprivation. All these findings suggest that sleeping quality is directly related to your health.Routine massage has been proven to boost serotonin. Without serotonin our bodies can't create melatonin, which influences the sleep stage of our circadian rhythm. Massage is a reasonable holistic solution to chronic insomnia and symptoms brought on by sleep deprivation. (3)Although we are still currently conducting research on sleep deprivation, there is a reasonable amount of evidence supporting holistic solutions such as massage is a healthier therapy choice opposed to a quick fix narcotic. Choose your perk$99     U-GYM Mini Standard Pack ($50 savings from retail)$5     Thank you for supporting us!$39   Pack of Assorted Extra Pads$188 U-GYM Mini Double Early Pack ($110 savings from retail)$277 U-GYM Mini Family Early Pack ($170 savings from retail) Each U-GYM Mini Set IncludesEach U-GYM Mini Set includes: U-GYM Mini device, one micro-USB cable, one 1-to-2 cord and four 5X5ch pads. Pack of Assorted Pads IncludesAssorted pad pack includes: - 5x5cm/8pcs (2 bags) : For abs, arms and small areas.- 5x9cm/4pcs (1 bag) : For abs, love handle, leg, shoulder areas.- 7x13cm/2pcs (1 bag) : For love handle, back, thigh areas.- 1-to-4 cord for use with 5x5cm & 5x9cm pads.Free shipping with any U-GYM Mini Set purchase. (Add $15 for shipping if only buys pads.) U-GYM Mini vs. the competitionU-GYM Mini specsOur missionWhen U-GYM founder and CEO Mark Yu received treatment for a shoulder injury three years ago, he discovered that professional electrotherapy is painless and highly effective. Still, having to travel to electrotherapy appointments was time consuming, inconvenient, and expensive. That’s how Mark ended up studying medium frequency stimulation with the goal to create a portable device.After successfully shipping the team's first product -- U-GYM Pro -- for sports and exercise enthusiasts, Mark received a lot of feedback and conceived a simpler, more consumer-friendly device designed to improve sleep quality. U-GYM Mini is the result of this collaboration with the community. Why does U-GYM Mini work? How do you mimic a real deep-tissue massage?Our core technology is based on digitally-controlled electrical muscle stimulation. U-GYM Mini uses medium frequencies (above 1kHz) to mimic a real massage. Most consumer TENS units use low frequencies which only stimulate shallow tissue to superficially block pain without penetrating the actual muscles. Low frequencies also tend to irritate the skin.By using medium frequencies, U-GYM can stimulate deep tissue like muscles and provide a more effective and comfortable massage. The immediate result is better nerve stimulation for pain control, but the longer-term benefit is improved blood circulation which eliminates toxins, relieves sore muscles, and helps you relax. We make complex technology simpleMedium frequency stimulation (above 1kHz) is commonly used in professional electrotherapy, but it typically requires large, stationary machines.After years of studying medium frequency stimulation, our team finally succeeded in implementing professional-grade electrical muscle stimulation in a small, light, and portable device.Most TENS units on the market use a simple, low frequency waveform (below 1kHz) which is less effective and can irritate the skin.U-GYM Mini uses multiple, simultaneous medium frequency waveforms to provide a real deep-tissue massage that effectively relieves muscle aches and pains.U-GYM's core technology mimics the massage techniques of a professional massage therapist using complex medium-frequency waveforms. It's like having a massage therapist with you right when you need to relax.With a relaxed body and improved blood circulation, you'll finally enjoy quality sleep.Stretch goalsAfter we meet our initial goal, we'll add the following rewards will to every machine (for backers who pledge $69 or more). Raise over $100,000 will add belt clip and lanyard to each U-GYM Mini SetRaise over $200,000 will add ??? to each U-GYM Mini Set (Will reveal reward after $100,000 is reached) Our Team Members MarkFounder / CEOMasters of Computer Science from New York University, Co-founder/CMO of AirSig, Inc., and founder of CARWAii.com. story:
The Problem

Are YOU one of the millions of adults that suffers from bruxism? The painful grinding and wearing away of your teeth at night or even during the day. Did you know that 1 out of every 10 adults and roughly 25% of children suffer from bruxism? Over 300,000 people search Google and Amazon every month looking for a solution to end their teeth grinding pain and costly bills associated with it.

YES, there is a BIG Problem here!!! Unfortunately until now the only solution millions of people have had to help with teeth grinding has been dental guards which don't treat the problem, they just protect one's teeth. Dental guards don't stop you from grinding so you still wake up with a sore jaw, neck, and possibly migraines. 

The Bigger problems is when the current solutions fail and you may have to spend THOUSANDS of dollars at the dentist office for surgery to repair the damage. These are NOT solutions, they are bandaids!

What if you found a solution? What if YOU could be the SOLUTION?

 

The Cost of Teeth Grinding

  • Over-the-Counter Mouthguards $15 to $300 per guard
  • Expensive Dental Guards from Dentist $400 to $1100 per guard
  • Teeth Replacement - $1000 -$3000 per tooth
  • Bridge $500 to $1200 per tooth
  • Crown $500 to $3000 per tooth
  • Lost work days/ productivity

What if you could help end the physical and financial pain of the millions and millions of teeth grinding sufferers across the world?

 

Our Mission - The Solution

We've invented a therapy device to address the pain and $1,000's of dollars Bruxism sufferers pay in costly dental guards and dental repair procedures.

Now YOU can be the SOLUTION & Join the BruxRelief Team!

Biofeedback Therapy has been clinically tested for more than 25 years to end damaging and debilitating behaviors like teeth grinding. Studies have repeatedly demonstrated that biofeedback therapy can successfully aid an adult to retrain their brain and stop an unwanted behavior. In the last few years especially specific studies have been conducted with patients suffering from teeth grinding and biofeedback therapy once again proved to be the solution these patients were looking for to end their teeth grinding.

Up until now, biofeedback therapy was a costly procedure that only a few specialists across the country could perform.  

Do you suffer from teeth grinding? Chances are you know someone that does. Finally there's an affordable solution that you can use right at home..

We've invented a device based on over 25 years of clinical research that uses Biofeedback Therapy to enable teeth grinding sufferers to 'retrain their brain' and stop the unconscious behavior of grinding their teeth.

 

The Science

Biofeedback is a technique that provides individuals with information about their bodily functions with the intention of promoting changes in behavior that result in improved health. In other words, Biofeedback Therapy makes you aware of unconscious behaviors so that you stop them. Once you are aware you can 'retrain your brain' to stop the behavior. Biofeedback Therapy treats the root cause of the ailment and ends the pain. The BruxRelief device works by enabling the user to create a learned response that persists even after the therapy is discontinued as proven with other Biofeedback Therapy clinical results.

 

Insight Into The Grind

Developed with user friendly visuals and settings, the BruxRelief app helps you record your teeth grinding occurrences, track progress, and customize settings such as vibration and audio alerts. The app combines with BruxRelief to bring to the user a fully customizable therapy solution to address your Bruxism and teeth grinding.  

 

How It Works

Each KITT Basic and KITT Plus device will attach to your jaw with disposable EMG sticky pads. These pads will keep the device attached throughout the night and also monitor your jaw muscles for any clenching or grinding activity. A detachable earbud can be used with the KITT to help alert you during the night while not disturbing your sleeping partner. Once the KITT detects unnatural clenching or grinding behavior, the device will vibrate and send alert signal to the  ear piece. But we didn't stop there...

 (These features only available with KITT Plus)

The KITT Plus device will also communicate with your smartphone which can be used as an additional alert signal to wake you up if you are clenching or grinding. Lastly, in the morning you can track your progress with the BruxRelief app.

 

Timeline

We've done a lot of the leg work in research, prototyping, testing and planning but there's much more exciting work to be done.

  • Pre-Indiegogo: Research, Conception, Prototyping, Testing, Vetting
  • Indiegogo Launch & Funded – 30days
  • Engineering Design End Item – 90 days
  • Source Cost Effective Components – 30 days
  • Build Manufacture- 60 days
  • Packaging | Ship | Delivery – 30 days

 

Rewards

 

Founding Team

 

Advisors

 

FAQ's

Is BruxRelief designed to cure my Bruxism (teeth grinding)?

No BruxRelief is a bio-feedback therapy device designed to alert and communicate to the user when they are grinding their teeth. Like any therapy it’s efficacy is largely dependent upon the patient and their commitment to the therapy.

 

Can I sleep with my BruxRelief Kitt?

Yes you can wear the Kitt at day or night to record your teeth grinding habits. There is strong evidence that most sufferers from Bruxism grind at night. You can track and optimize your therapy with the Kitt’s day-time and night-time data.All of your personal therapy data will be available to you in the BruxRelief app.

 

Will the BruxRelief Kitt wake you up at night?

Yes the therapy is designed to signal the user through both audio and vibration to alert when grinding is taking place. It’s to be noted the first few nights maybe uncomfortable due to interruption of sleep to eliminate the unconscious behavior of grinding. However intensity settings can be adjusted to minimize the level of discomfort and the Kitt can be solely used to measure occurrences of grinding.

 

What is the life cycle of the battery and how often do I need to charge it?

The Kitt runs on a lithium polymer battery, which typically supports 300-400 charges over the course of its life. Your Kitt can last up to a week without charging, so we estimate the Kitts battery will last 3-5 years with normal use.

 

Will the Kitt app be supported by Iphone and Android?

Yes, the Kitt app will support both Apple and Android devices. Windows phones and other smartphones are not currently supported.

 

How long can I wear the stickers?

Kitt uses standard medical ECG stickers, and there are dozens of major brands for every skin type and use case. The stickers we ship with your Kitt are recommended for daily use, but other ECG stickers available on Amazon can last up to week.

A big part of the answer to this question is, it depends on your own preferences and skin type. For people with very sensitive skin, we recommend pediatric stickers that you throw away daily.

 

Can I use BruxRelief Kitt for my child?

Currently all test have been performed on Adults and we do not have any valid data of testing on children. Biofeedback therapy works at any age, but this particular therapy for Bruxism hasn't been tested on children.

Over-the-Counter Mouthguards $15 to $300 per guard
Expensive Dental Guards from Dentist $400 to $1100 per guard
Teeth Replacement - $1000 -$3000 per tooth
Bridge $500 to $1200 per tooth
Crown $500 to $3000 per tooth
Lost work days/ productivity
What if you could help end the physical and financial pain of the millions and millions of teeth grinding sufferers across the world? Our Mission - The SolutionWe've invented a therapy device to address the pain and $1,000's of dollars Bruxism sufferers pay in costly dental guards and dental repair procedures.Now YOU can be the SOLUTION & Join the BruxRelief Team!Biofeedback Therapy has been clinically tested for more than 25 years to end damaging and debilitating behaviors like teeth grinding. Studies have repeatedly demonstrated that biofeedback therapy can successfully aid an adult to retrain their brain and stop an unwanted behavior. In the last few years especially specific studies have been conducted with patients suffering from teeth grinding and biofeedback therapy once again proved to be the solution these patients were looking for to end their teeth grinding.Up until now, biofeedback therapy was a costly procedure that only a few specialists across the country could perform.  Do you suffer from teeth grinding? Chances are you know someone that does. Finally there's an affordable solution that you can use right at home..We've invented a device based on over 25 years of clinical research that uses Biofeedback Therapy to enable teeth grinding sufferers to 'retrain their brain' and stop the unconscious behavior of grinding their teeth. The ScienceBiofeedback is a technique that provides individuals with information about their bodily functions with the intention of promoting changes in behavior that result in improved health. In other words, Biofeedback Therapy makes you aware of unconscious behaviors so that you stop them. Once you are aware you can 'retrain your brain' to stop the behavior. Biofeedback Therapy treats the root cause of the ailment and ends the pain. The BruxRelief device works by enabling the user to create a learned response that persists even after the therapy is discontinued as proven with other Biofeedback Therapy clinical results. Insight Into The GrindDeveloped with user friendly visuals and settings, the BruxRelief app helps you record your teeth grinding occurrences, track progress, and customize settings such as vibration and audio alerts. The app combines with BruxRelief to bring to the user a fully customizable therapy solution to address your Bruxism and teeth grinding.   How It WorksEach KITT Basic and KITT Plus device will attach to your jaw with disposable EMG sticky pads. These pads will keep the device attached throughout the night and also monitor your jaw muscles for any clenching or grinding activity. A detachable earbud can be used with the KITT to help alert you during the night while not disturbing your sleeping partner. Once the KITT detects unnatural clenching or grinding behavior, the device will vibrate and send alert signal to the  ear piece. But we didn't stop there... (These features only available with KITT Plus)The KITT Plus device will also communicate with your smartphone which can be used as an additional alert signal to wake you up if you are clenching or grinding. Lastly, in the morning you can track your progress with the BruxRelief app. TimelineWe've done a lot of the leg work in research, prototyping, testing and planning but there's much more exciting work to be done.
Pre-Indiegogo: Research, Conception, Prototyping, Testing, Vetting
Indiegogo Launch & Funded – 30days
Engineering Design End Item – 90 days
Source Cost Effective Components – 30 days
Build Manufacture- 60 days
Packaging | Ship | Delivery – 30 days
 Rewards Founding Team Advisors FAQ'sIs BruxRelief designed to cure my Bruxism (teeth grinding)?No BruxRelief is a bio-feedback therapy device designed to alert and communicate to the user when they are grinding their teeth. Like any therapy it’s efficacy is largely dependent upon the patient and their commitment to the therapy. Can I sleep with my BruxRelief Kitt?Yes you can wear the Kitt at day or night to record your teeth grinding habits. There is strong evidence that most sufferers from Bruxism grind at night. You can track and optimize your therapy with the Kitt’s day-time and night-time data.All of your personal therapy data will be available to you in the BruxRelief app. Will the BruxRelief Kitt wake you up at night?Yes the therapy is designed to signal the user through both audio and vibration to alert when grinding is taking place. It’s to be noted the first few nights maybe uncomfortable due to interruption of sleep to eliminate the unconscious behavior of grinding. However intensity settings can be adjusted to minimize the level of discomfort and the Kitt can be solely used to measure occurrences of grinding. What is the life cycle of the battery and how often do I need to charge it?The Kitt runs on a lithium polymer battery, which typically supports 300-400 charges over the course of its life. Your Kitt can last up to a week without charging, so we estimate the Kitts battery will last 3-5 years with normal use. Will the Kitt app be supported by Iphone and Android?Yes, the Kitt app will support both Apple and Android devices. Windows phones and other smartphones are not currently supported. How long can I wear the stickers?Kitt uses standard medical ECG stickers, and there are dozens of major brands for every skin type and use case. The stickers we ship with your Kitt are recommended for daily use, but other ECG stickers available on Amazon can last up to week.A big part of the answer to this question is, it depends on your own preferences and skin type. For people with very sensitive skin, we recommend pediatric stickers that you throw away daily. Can I use BruxRelief Kitt for my child?Currently all test have been performed on Adults and we do not have any valid data of testing on children. Biofeedback therapy works at any age, but this particular therapy for Bruxism hasn't been tested on children.

story:
Introducing ESCALATE Functional Drink

For years we have been working on a solution that would enable active people to boost their energy according to their own individual needs. To achieve this goal, we needed to deliver something that hasn't been introduced before.

That is why we created the 3d SportTop technology.

Control your energy boost from the very first sip

Although ESCALATE’s bottle does include a brand new technology, we made sure its use is intuitive and simple from the first sip.

Because we want you to have the freedom to use ESCALATE on-the-go, the 3d SportTop cap is easily accessible and the strength of the drink is adjustable with one move. Have a look.

The ESCALATE concentrate fights fatigue, helps focus, and supports endurance

To perfect your performance, we've made sure that the technology is accompanied by an optimized combo of ingredients.

The real uniqueness of ESCALATE doesn’t lie in the individual parts – patented technology or the concentrate – but in the combination of the two.

We have talked to professional athletes, hobbyists, active people, sports fans and also people who do sports irregularly. And then, we listened.

After that, we took the feedback we received and locked ourselves in our labs with some of the best nutritional scientists in the world. Our goal was to come up with a great combo of ingredients that would maximize the effects of 3d SportTop and boost performance efficiently. 

Without being too scientific, here’s what's inside ESCALATE and how it can help you with your performance.

Why ESCALATE?

Because our team has years of experience working in the field of functional beverages, we have always known that introducing brand new technology is not an overnight success but a process.

To bring a perfected product to the market, we needed to make sure that benefits of using ESCALATE are covered not only in the use of the drink but also in the process of creation and the impacts on the environment.

 

How to get the best of your day using ESCALATE

Wondering how exactly can ESCALATE maximize your performance?

We gave ESCALATE to first few people and our team members. Each of them shared different kinds of experience how ESCALATE helped them get the best of their day.

Here's just a few of them:

 
 

 

Our story

Our journey to ESCALATE and Indiegogo started with a look. A look through a huge window that we have at our offices. Outside, people were rushing. Rushing to work, rushing to meetings, rushing to practices, rushing home, rushing to school, rushing to meet their deadlines.

There’s been a change that impacted all of us and outside of our window was a proof. We become more and more dynamic, flexible, and live our lives faster each day.

In this ”new” environment we live in, our surroundings are much more demanding than ever before. That's when we realized that this fast-paced, high-demand lifestyle forces all of us to have higher expectations when it comes to satisfying our personal needs.

In other words, the same solution, product, service just can’t satisfy every individual need people have.

A great example is our day-to-day life. Each of us has a different schedule, different habits, and different hobbies.

That’s why each of us:

  • gets tired at different times of day
  • has different performance peaks
  • needs energy incomes with different strength and in a different nutritional combination

This thought led us to the creation of ESCALATE - a functional drink that would be fully customizable and would be able to meet highly personalized expectations.

Awards

 

Rewards

 

Team

Challenges

The serial production of ESCALATE 3d SportTop technology and its special concentrate can only be postponed due to its complexity. Nonetheless, our goal is to deliver the rewards in October, 2018 and we will focus all of our efforts on this task.

So far, we have successfully solved several obstacles in our way and we have already prepared for the possible issues that might occur, that's why we are confident in delivering all of our promises.

story:
Buy Now At:

www.TravelBugBan.com

  •  

Picture this: you’re enjoying a refreshing breeze while home or on vacation in Florida or Hawaii. The doors and windows are wide open – you take in the full unobstructed vistas. Ahhh, how relaxing, the palm trees sway in the wind outside and the air inside is thick with...mosquitoes... Wait, what? Yikes!!! Mosquitoes!

If you want to enjoy a relaxing breeze while indoors, mosquitoes can get in and make you miserable. Mosquitoes carry harmful, deadly and debilitating disease like Zika, Dengue, Malaria, West Nile and more, it’s impossible to leave windows and doors open and enjoy a cool refreshing breeze. Until Now!

 

BugBan Plugins!

We’re revolutionizing bug repellents with our indoor mosquito repellent devices. BugBan plugs into a wall outlet, releases an all-natural pleasant (to you) fragrance that repels bugs, like mosquitoes. They're 100% natural, DEET-free and a healthy alternative for you and the planet. They're designed to keep mosquitoes outside where they belong.

   

Just plug in BugBan and get indoor harmless, non-topical protection for everyone in your family. There’s No phthalates, No DEET, No harsh chemical smells, No smoke, and No sticky mess. Now, when the sun's up or the nights are long you can throw open those doors and let the cool air flow in without the annoying mosquitoes.

Travel BugBan is the only EPA Established Company developing innovative plugin mosquito repellent solutions.

We're an eco-friendly, 100% natural manufacturer of mosquito control products that are as kind to you as they are to the environment.

We at Travel BugBan have pledged to do no harm: to you, your family, nor the planet. We understand every bee, mosquito and insect serves a vital role on our planet – and zapping, killing and eradication would disrupt our ecosystem and that contradicts our belief. We do not support the use of harmful ingredients to make those irritating bug sprays which have negative effects on our environment and the local ecosystems.

We developed BugBan Plugins out of necessity. 

About Travel BugBan, LLC

Travel BugBan, an EPA Est. Co. We believe our ecofriendly, non-topical, chemical-free, indoor, mosquito repellent devices have the ability to change the world. We developed BugBan Plugins out of necessity. You see, we love to travel. Our favorite destinations – anywhere warm or tropical. This is a problem, because these are the environments mosquitoes thrive . This is why we developed BugBan Plugins – Smarter, all-natural, ecofriendly, mosquito control devices for use at Home & Travel.

 

You see, we love to travel and we love a refreshing summer breeze. Our favorite destinations? Anywhere warm or tropical. This was a problem, because these are the same environments mosquitoes thrive in. And while on vacation, we left windows and doors open to take in the serene view and to feel the cool refreshing breeze. Unfortunately, this meant mosquitoes would enter. And mosquito borne illnesses like Dengue, Zika, or West Nile can wreak havoc on your vacation. According to the World Health Organization, “Mosquitoes are one of the deadliest animals in the world.” They go on to say, “Mosquitoes cause millions of deaths every year.”

But mosquito borne diseases won’t stop us from exploring the world and it shouldn’t stop you either. However, mosquito borne diseases did make us want to travel Smarter!

This is why we developed BugBan Plugins – Smarter, all-natural, eco-friendly, mosquito control devices for use at home and travel. Mosquitoes don’t have to ruin your vacation!  BugBan's tiny sizes makes them awesome travel companions. Just pack one in your luggage and plug it in the wall outlet when you reach your destination. Keep those annoying bugs at bay!

We think BugBan Plugins are the Smartest, all-natural, non-topical mosquito control devices on the planet.

We have developed a custom blended mosquito repellent using the most effective natural and eco-friendly ingredients. Our “Clear Liquid” repellent and “Clean Mat” repellent is formulated to control mosquitoes.  Simply screw on BugBan’s “Clear Liquid” repellent or slide in a “Clean Mat” repellent and plug it in. 

When BugBan is plugged into an outlet the device warmer goes to work. The device releases a subtle aroma which affects an insect's sensory receptors.  To humans, the aroma is pleasant, but it has a different effect on mosquitoes. To mosquitoes, the aroma masks the enticing odor of humans by shutting down the mosquitoes’ carbon dioxide receptor and by blocking the sensory. It’s like playing “hide and seek” – Think about it, if mosquitoes can’t find you, they won’t bite you. For up to 30 days, BugBan Plugin’s aroma fills the room with an invisible barrier. Mosquitoes learn that there is nothing enticing past the shielded area. 

We know there are plenty of bug repellents out there. So what are the benefits of BugBan Plugins over other natural bug sprays and candles?

  • Use BugBan Anywhere. Plugin BugBan in any room; at home, hotel, dorm, AirBnB while on vacation.

  • Enjoy a cool refreshing breeze. Plugin BugBan and let the breeze flow inside without the annoying bugs.

  • Non-Topical Solution. No applying, or reapplying! BugBan is a non-topical solution. This means, No applying bug sprays to your skin when you want to leave doors open, No need to use insect spray after your shower or before bedtime.

  • No harmful chemicals. Most bug repellents contain chemicals, like DEET and Phthalates.  These are harmful to humans and animals. BugBan Plugins are a healthier alternative. Don’t use harmful chemicals to repel bugs—go all-natural and stay worry-free.

  • No harsh smells. BugBan's fragrance won’t intrude on your daily life. Enjoy a sweet breeze in your home without harsh chemical smells and without smoke.

  • Up To 30-days of mosquito control. BugBan Plugin's mosquito repellent is formulated to be used exclusively with our devices. Our Clear Liquid repellent can last up to 30 days.
  • Plug it in and forget it! Plug your BugBan into an outlet and make your house a no-fly zone.

We recognized a gap in the market for an effective indoor mosquito control solution for use at home and travel. The need for a Smarter non-topical, chemical-free mosquito repellent was especially critical for traveler exploring high risk areas in the US and around the globe. – And, BugBan Plugins was born!

Looks like Shark Tank Judges are no match for BugBan Plugins.

However, we think there are some Sharks who will love us! Tell us which Sharks you think will support our all natural, eco-friendly, non-topical BugBan Products. We'd love to hear from you! 

We're ready to bring our revolutionary BugBan products to market during this mosquito season, but we need your support. - With your help, we’ll ramp up production and expedite delivery so that you have BugBan Plugins available for home use and travel. We plan to start shipping during the last week of our campaign. Thank you for your help to get us to the next level!


Product Development          $ 7,000

Product Packaging               $ 1,400

Labor                                       $ 1,500

Marketing                               $ 1.000

Shipping                                 $ 2,400

Website                                  $ 500

Miscellaneous                       $ 1,200

Total                                       $ 15,000

BugBan Plugins are here to help you stay mosquito free, the natural way. We’ve got your back when it comes to repelling bugs, but we need your help! Help us get BugBan produced so that we may deliver them across the USA and South America. Whether you're enjoying an open door in rural Texas or preventing irritating bugs from ruining your vacations both here and in other countries - we travel anywhere! We've got your back!  

Mosquitoes thrive after hurricanes.

With the current flooding and standing water there is sure to be a mosquito population boom, as such, the need to increase production is essential. 

Help support the Hurricane relief efforts. When you purchase a BugBan product for Hurricane Victims we will provide an additional 15 day supply of our all natural Clear or Clean mosquito repellent in your name.  Show Your Support!

We aim to start shipping during the last week of our campaign.

There is a predicted rise in pest numbers this hurricane season and if demand is high we may have to rethink our shipping strategy. This is a task to which we are prepared for!

If your question hasn't been answered below, please reach out to us. We work around the clock, so we will respond as soon as possible. 

1). Does BugBan Plugins include DEET? 

No, we're 100% DEET-free!

2), What's so bad about DEET?

DEET can cause damage to many man-made surfaces. This includes plastics and acetate as well as some materials like rayon and Spandex. It can also damage furniture and even natural materials like leather. Not even nail polish is safe. But just imagine what it could do to your skin - we have, and we don't like it!

3). What size room does BugBan Plugin cover?

BugBan Plugins are best in rooms up to 300 square feet.

4). What’s inside BugBan's mosquito repellent?

BugBan's Clean and Clear repellents contain natural ingredients such Geraniol,Lemongrass oil , Geranium oil, Peppermint oil, Cinnamon oil,  Basil,Grapeseed,  Vanillin, and soybean oil. The scent is mild to humans, but to mosquitoes and other creepy crawlies it acts like a force field.

5). What type of insects does BugBan Plugins repel?

BugBan’s formula helps control, mosquitoes, roaches, spiders and flies

6). Can pregnant women, babies and toddlers use BugBan Plugins?

We had you in mind when we developed BugBan Plugins –The 100% natural ingredients are generally deemed to be safe and the fragrance is pleasant. However, we suggest you discuss the list of ingredients and your tolerance with your physician before use. If your child has allergies, it's always wise to seek the advice of your physician. Always keep out of reach of children and read instructions for proper handling and use as some ingredients may cause irritation.

7), Can I use BugBan Plugins around pets?

BugBan Plugins have not been tested around pets, so we suggest you seek the advice of your veterinarian. But it's something we are looking at.

8), Can I use BugBan Plugins if I have medical conditions?

The list of ingredients on the label should be discussed with your physician before use to determine if BugBan’s products are right for you.

9). Are BugBan’s products approved by the EPA?

BugBan’s products are exempt under the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA) therefore, they have not been registered with the EPA

10). Does Travel BugBan support any non-profit organizations?

Travel BugBan is looking for partners with the ability to help distribute our mosquito products to victims of natural disasters. As part of our rewards, we're offering our backers the chance to send a BugBan Plugin to victims of Hurricanes (Harvey, Irma, Jose and Maria).

Help us spread the news about our new Smarter, non-topical, eco-friendly, all natural BugBan Products. Let your TravelBug friends and family know that BugBan is the perfect travel companion. Inform all your Couch PotatoBug friends that they can open windows and doors and enjoy a refreshing breeze while couch surfing. They will never have to swat at annoying mosquitoes again!

Start spreading the news! Please share us on Facebook, Twitter, tell a friend to tell a friend! We really need your support!

When you purchase a BugBan product for Hurricane Victims we will provide an additional 15 day supply of our all natural Clear or Clean mosquito repellent in your name.  Show Your Support!We aim to start shipping during the last week of our campaign.There is a predicted rise in pest numbers this hurricane season and if demand is high we may have to rethink our shipping strategy. This is a task to which we are prepared for!If your question hasn't been answered below, please reach out to us. We work around the clock, so we will respond as soon as possible. 1). Does BugBan Plugins include DEET? No, we're 100% DEET-free!2), What's so bad about DEET?DEET can cause damage to many man-made surfaces. This includes plastics and acetate as well as some materials like rayon and Spandex. It can also damage furniture and even natural materials like leather. Not even nail polish is safe. But just imagine what it could do to your skin - we have, and we don't like it!3). What size room does BugBan Plugin cover?BugBan Plugins are best in rooms up to 300 square feet.4). What’s inside BugBan's mosquito repellent?BugBan's Clean and Clear repellents contain natural ingredients such Geraniol,Lemongrass oil , Geranium oil, Peppermint oil, Cinnamon oil,  Basil,Grapeseed,  Vanillin, and soybean oil. The scent is mild to humans, but to mosquitoes and other creepy crawlies it acts like a force field.5). What type of insects does BugBan Plugins repel?BugBan’s formula helps control, mosquitoes, roaches, spiders and flies6). Can pregnant women, babies and toddlers use BugBan Plugins?We had you in mind when we developed BugBan Plugins –The 100% natural ingredients are generally deemed to be safe and the fragrance is pleasant. However, we suggest you discuss the list of ingredients and your tolerance with your physician before use. If your child has allergies, it's always wise to seek the advice of your physician. Always keep out of reach of children and read instructions for proper handling and use as some ingredients may cause irritation.7), Can I use BugBan Plugins around pets?BugBan Plugins have not been tested around pets, so we suggest you seek the advice of your veterinarian. But it's something we are looking at.8), Can I use BugBan Plugins if I have medical conditions?The list of ingredients on the label should be discussed with your physician before use to determine if BugBan’s products are right for you.9). Are BugBan’s products approved by the EPA?BugBan’s products are exempt under the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA) therefore, they have not been registered with the EPA10). Does Travel BugBan support any non-profit organizations?Travel BugBan is looking for partners with the ability to help distribute our mosquito products to victims of natural disasters. As part of our rewards, we're offering our backers the chance to send a BugBan Plugin to victims of Hurricanes (Harvey, Irma, Jose and Maria).Help us spread the news about our new Smarter, non-topical, eco-friendly, all natural BugBan Products. Let your TravelBug friends and family know that BugBan is the perfect travel companion. Inform all your Couch PotatoBug friends that they can open windows and doors and enjoy a refreshing breeze while couch surfing. They will never have to swat at annoying mosquitoes again!Start spreading the news! Please share us on Facebook, Twitter, tell a friend to tell a friend! We really need your support!

story:
We created a revolutionary pad that is all natural. Our Flowreign pads do not contain any toxins, chemicals, or dyes. It is three times as absorbent as the leading brand AND cotton pads. The innovative material pulls in the fluid to the bottom of the pad for ultimate dryness and cleanliness. Our pads can be worn three times as longer than the leading brand pads AND cotton pads. Our pads also have technology which prevents odors and bacteria. This is something that both the leading brand pad and the cotton pad cannot compete with. Not only do our pads eliminate smells but it also helps prevents infections and other female health complications because of the all-natural negative ions that are present in our pads.

Our Flowereign products are also made of biodegradable material. This will affect the environment positively compared to the leading brand pads which is equivalent to 4 plastic bags for one pad. The leading brand pads are an environmental hazard as it will never degrade completely and the landfills are overrun with this product.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $150,000 to assist directly with the cost of mass production and working capital to get this product to the public.

  • So Whats in it for you ? Besides assisting us in bringing the product to the mass market we are offering amazing perks including soft cotton  FlowReign logo T shirts , Fashionable granite styled water bottles , Gift certificates worth over $200 (depending on your level) , Recognition on our 5K and 10K race t-Shirts , social media shout outs ,as well as exclusive tickets to our Annual Gala!  ( I know CRAZY right !)

 

Whats the Big Deal What We're Currently Using ?!

What do Dioxin, Styrene, Furan, Chloromethane, and Chlorothane have in common? You guessed it right, our sanitary napkins. Nothing is more heart-warming than slapping on a pad and bracing yourself for all of the side effects that these chemicals can cause you. Gas for your car is expensive enough as it is, and although storing gasoline in as many places as possible to save on that monthly bill is tempting, placing them near your cherished, sensitive, and royal lady parts is not ideal. Let’s talk about these chemicals and what they are.
 

Dioxin and Furan ; Are like toxic chemical cousins and are a part of the dirty dozen.  Both of these products are found in pollutants  and are a cause for reproductive problems, issues with development, damage with the immune system, and the feared “C” word (cancer.)

Styrene; Its smoking ! You can find this in cigarette smoke and automobile exhaust.

Chloromethane; This chemical was initially used as a refrigerant before it was discovered how toxic this substance is, should we say anymore? We will.. this chemical has been found to cause seizures, paralysis and comas. It also has been linked to deformities in fetus’ pelvic growth, arms, and legs when pregnant mothers are exposed to this hazordous chemical.

Cholorthane; What’s Lucy without Ethyl ...Chloride ( I Love Lucy pun anyone?) Ethyl Chloride is a chemical which was used in refrigerant cooling systems just as chloromenthane was. Cholorthane is a proven central nervous system depressant.

 

Please don't be fooled with so called experts such as this article http://bit.ly/2iKEYsi when there have been independent non profit agencies that have utilized independent lab tests that have indicated proof of chemicals that are attributed to carcinogens http://bit.ly/2zgEZLt and http://bit.ly/2yVpIz5. This is similar to the cigarette companies having "Journalists" or "Advocates"  deceitfully spreading the word that cigarettes were a "safe" alternative. We should never take opinion articles that are not backed by facts as a way to determine our female awareness health concerns. If these chemicals were "healthy" they would be listed on the box of each and every leading brand pad and tampon. Toxic chemicals are NOT safe period! Now that you know the difference please make sure that you take the steps to protect yourself and the women that you love.

Most would agree that all of these chemicals have no place in our bodies; however we have been using these chemicals at least twice per month on one of the most delicate parts of our bodies. Let’s change this, we deserve better for our daughters, mothers, sisters , aunts, cousins, and friends by having a healthier product to use.

 

 

You Also can write to your representaive here http://bit.ly/2hldfeg and support the right to know act which will force the leading brand pad and tampon manufacturers to list these harmful toxins on their packages. We have the right to make informed decisions in regards to our health.

story:
GoGym Inception

I felt a tinge of guilt as I walked past the hotel gym on my way to the hotel lounge for dinner. My flight in was long and stressful and it took much longer than expected to finish up at the airport. The hotel gym had almost nothing useful for an avid lifter and looking up local gyms, calling for pricing, and figuring out navigation reminded me too much of my recent flight. As I lazily browsed the gym options over a greasy meal I realized something - there was no place where gyms around me were consolidated, finding information on the gym website was nearly impossible and I was pushing the back button and restarting far too often. I looked at my keys on the table and saw my home gym member pass and wished that thing could swipe me in anywhere.... and so the GoGym idea was born.

We have been bringing on gyms around the country so when you end up in a new city because of work or pleasure our app will show you where all of our affiliated gyms are around you, their amenities and reviews. Two clicks later and you have a GoGym pass to use at that gym. We also did away with the sales pitches and paperwork we are all used to when using a guest pass. With GoGym you walk in and show the front desk the pass on your phone and get right to your workout, just like at home.

With your interest and help, together we can launch the first universal gym membership!

Current Status

We haven't just been grinding it out in the gym!

At the time of this Indiegogo launch GoGym has about 75 gyms on board spread among 5 states across the country. We have gyms in a few major cities in Florida, Georgia, Ohio, New York, and California. At the Arnold Classic this past March we aquired a 350 person list of future customers who couldn't wait for the app to come out. Now that we've got the business plan, regulations, vision and strategy ironed out we are ready to get after it with a solid business and solid plan.

App Functionality

Here is a rundown of how the app will function once you download it on your iphone.

GoGym uses geolocation to pinpoint where you are and show you where all our affiliated gyms are in relation to you. The gyms will be highlighted by a gold pointer. Clicking on one of these pointers will bring up a quick overview of the gym, its distance from you, its amenities, hours of operation and pictures. If you're more of a list kind of person there is an option to view gyms in the list view as well.

Once you have found a gym that suits your needs click the GoGym Pass button to activate your 24hr pass. It will then show you the Pass that gets you into the gym. On this pass will be listed your name, the gym name and address of the gym, and the remaining time you have to use the pass (24hrs). When you arrive at the gym you simply show the front desk the GoGym Pass on your phone, they will verify and you can walk right in and get lifting. Once your pass expires we will send you and email to find out how your visit to the gym was and ask you to, if you'd like, to review the gym. This way the gym managers know what they are doing good and what they can improve upon for future members and guests alike. That is the fundamental functionality of the GoGym app. There are of course other nuances and perks to explore once the app is downloaded, but this gives a real time explanation of what a typical experience would look like.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The app is currently under construction and is estimated to be up on the app store mid February around the 12th.

While it is being developed we are looking to raise $11,000.

In the mean time and with your help this is what we will get accomplished:

  • Complete development of the initial GoGym app ($5,250) and begin development on an android app. 
  • Continue pursuing our goal of obtaining a presence in the top 30 most traveled to cities in America. Our planned and budgeted out multi-city sales trips are around $1,600. To reach our goal we would need to do around 3 sales trips. If we reach our goal of $11,000 we will only do 2 (roughly $3,200) and work from there 
  • Expand our advertising to get the word out to as many of our fellow fit friends as possible. With the app development and sales trips (2) we would have $2,550 left if we reach our goal of $11,000. Its a little low for an advertising budget but we believe acquiring more gym partners takes precedence initially.

Thats it! just 3 main goals. To try and raise the funds we are selling discounted memberships. A typical base membership (5passes) is $60/month and unlimited is $110/month. 

  • For $50 get locked in at discounted rate and get a month free
  • For $100 get locked in at discounted rate, get a month free, and get exclusive beta version.
  • For $150+ get locked in for unlimited at discounted rate of $90, get a month free, exclusive beta and be featured as one of our 'founding lifters' on our social media.

The Impact

If we can make this work it will be the first universal gym membership. Our tight knit community of healthy, avid lifters will grow tremendously and help the current members to excel and future clients to gain the motivation to join our ranks. Also, 2% percent of every membership and a portion of company profit will go to the Challenged Athletes Foundation. Based out of California, but with a nationwide outreach, they provide opportunities and support to people with physical challenges, so they can pursue active lifestyles through physical fitness and competitive athletics.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you have the means to purchase a full membership does't mean we're both SOL. Just like lifting there are other, just as important ways to help grow GoGym.

  • Toss us $5, $10, $20 bucks ... every little bit helps!
  • Tell your friends and workout partners, especially those who travel often to check us out.
  • Write something about us on Facebook or Twitter!
  • Post a pic of you getting after it at the gym - or better- at a gym while you're on the road!
  • Let us know about any gyms in your area that would be interested in earning some extra travel traffic.
