story:
WELCOME FUTURE YOLITES! 

TheYoloProject (TYP) is all about creating a community of individuals on a dedicated journey to a healthier lifestyle.  

 

We strongly believe that the number on a bathroom scale should not define anyone! So we set out to change the way we look at those numbers by turning them into achievable goals that earn you real life rewards.

The YoloScale is a modern and luxurious take on the traditional bathroom scale, equipped with bluetooth speakers; water proof touch screen display and rechargeable lithium battery. 

The YoloScale accessorizes your bathroom and finally upgrades your bathroom scale to Gadget status! The YoloScale will primarily measures weight and calculates BMI.  

Owning the YoloScale gives you access to the YoloApp and community: Yolites can only sign up to the YoloApp by synchronizing their YoloScale with the app.

(Available for IOS and Android) 

The YoloApp will recognize your device and guide you to complete your profile.

 Once you have access to the YoloApp, you will need to set your Weekly/Monthly/Yearly goals.  

Once your Weight/BMI targets are set, The YoloApp helps you manage your goals. Now it's time to get to work, get social and earn rewards! 

With the YoloApp, you can track your progress by weighing yourself daily or at least once a week with the YoloScale.

The YoloApp will also act as a dedicated social platform for documenting and sharing your journey. Four (4) main Upload categories will be available on the YoloApp.  

1. Food and Recipes: You can keep track of your daily meals by uploading pictures; you can also share your pictures or recipes with fellow Yolites.

2. Transformation pictures (TP): You can keep track of your progress by regularly uploading pictures of yourself; The YoloApp will automatically merge previous pictures with current ones side by side. You can also share your transformation pictures with fellow Yolites. 

3. Activities: Under this category, you can share whatever fitness related activity you are currently performing to achieve your goals. You can share this with fellow Yolites as well. 

4. Pets: This category is dedicated solely to pets. Don’t forget to share your cutest furry pictures with fellow Yolites. They too are very much part of your journey! 

With these 4 main categories; Yolites can surf recipes, activities, get motivated by transformations and ease the stress of the day with cute pet pictures. You can follow other yolites and be part of their journey, like and comment on pictures, build a following and be part of the community.   

 

REWARDS! 

For every progress (Pounds/Kg lost or gained) made towards your set goals, points (Yollars) will be earned. Yollars are updated each time your phone synchronizes with your YoloScale.

Note: While the YoloScale can be used by an unlimited number of people in the one-time weigh in mode, Only TWO (2) registered YoloScale users can have access to the YoloApp and YoloRewards at any given time.  

Your Yollars will be accessed in your reward center and can be redeemed as exclusive discounts, deals, gift cards e.t.c, all geared towards fitness and health.  

Splash your well-deserved Yollars and celebrate all your victories!

TheYoloProject, Inc. will partner with both in-store and online stores to bring you the best deals that can be redeemed with your Yollars. 

Our reward system is simple! Meet your goals and let the YoloScale pay for itself!

 

YoloScale Specification: 

• Dimensions: 440mm X 350mm X 45mm • Rechargeable li-ion battery 

• Music play time: 6 hours • Two inbuilt Bluetooth speakers•

Touch screen display • Water and dust resistance to IP53.

 

Pledges will be used to:   

Finalize product design.

Fund mechanical tooling of the product .

Compliance testing – FCC, UL, CE. Order components .

Pay for production, manufacturing & shipping costs of the first production run of the YoloScale.

Complete backend for the YoloApp .

Risk and Challenges:

Manufacturing consumer electronics is challenging. Having several complex assemblies and components lead us to sourcing from several suppliers. With that comes two major challenges.

The first is on time delivery of components used in the YoloScale and the second is receiving quality components that pass our high quality standards. Both of these may result in a delay in shipping of the YoloScale to Yolites.

We will approach these challenges by using multiple suppliers when possible along with tight oversight of the entire manufacturing process. 

We really appreciate your support and believe in this project and will do all we can to ensure on time delivery of your YoloScale.

With that comes two major challenges.The first is on time delivery of components used in the YoloScale and the second is receiving quality components that pass our high quality standards. Both of these may result in a delay in shipping of the YoloScale to Yolites.We will approach these challenges by using multiple suppliers when possible along with tight oversight of the entire manufacturing process. We really appreciate your support and believe in this project and will do all we can to ensure on time delivery of your YoloScale.

story:
As seen on:




What is RIQQON?

RIQQON is a display frame intended to exhibit a medal in a proper setting. A medal is a symbolic way to honour months or even years of hard work, effort and sacrifice. We refuse to allow an object that is pursued for so long and with such effort to be left one day at the bottom of a drawer or in an old shoe box.

Its modern design and technical solutions convert RIQQON into an aesthetic multimedia frame, worthy of a trophy that is not just received, but that is painstakingly won. Thanks to the individually printed QR code, your RIQQON will tell the story of your struggle and bring back the memories of winning whenever you want.





Shape compliant with most medals:






Extra strong neodymium magnets:




Our idea of RIQQON

There is a moment in the life of any sports person, even an amateur, when they want to verify their capabilities and fitness. What is left after such tests are medals. The symbolic participation awards and the winning medals for leading positions in competitions. As enthusiasts of sports and rivalry, we know that these trophies often share the fate of forgotten gadgets, abandoned somewhere at the bottom of a drawer. The reason is there are no proper and adequate places to exhibit them. This is why RIQQON came up with an easy solution to store and exhibit the trophies in a dignified and aesthetic way as well as to preserve and share the memories of winning them.

As the creators of this project, we discovered that many of our medals were kept in boxes or in the attics. We wanted to exhibit them, but found no interesting ideas of how to do it. This is why we invented one.



Why is RIQQON so special?

How does it work?


Stretch goals


Timeline




Meet the team

  Tomasz Czarnecki TOM

Ironman, multi-medalist , 10 years cultivating an amateur endurance sports . Engineer (robotics industry) , inventor, owner of several patents, looking for inspiration in everything that surrounds it. Co-founder of mobile robots and innovative agricultural machinery. Happy husband and father.


  Łukasz Szymula LUKE

Winner of over 40 sports medals, enthusiastic triathlete, runner, technical wreck and cave diver. As an economist connected with the online sector, he manages the largest performance marketing company in CEE and has co-authored several start-up projects. Married, 2 children.

story:
You can TACT™ in three easy steps after downloading the TACTspace™ app:

1. Select your friend in the TACTspace™ app 

2. Select your TACT™ message 

3. Click send!


Imagine receiving a message you feel, a communication without words. TACTonics™, LLC's patented Sensory Messaging technology makes this a reality. Using a sleek, wearable device called the TACTpuck™, this new dimension of digital communication allows Users to send discreet Sensory Messages, called TACTs, which will be felt through the Receiver's senses.

The Receiver doesn't have to open, read or even look at your message. Instead, the Sensory Message is called a TACT™ because it's tactile, and sensed by touch. The free app TACTspace™ sends from a message from one phone, tablet or computer to another. A wearable device called a TACTpuck™ delivers the message directly and discreetly. A TACTpuck™is about the size of a quarter and can be worn anywhere against the skin. 



Did you know our technology has applications for education? Check out this recent blog about education: http://www.teachthought.com/technology/we-have-an-idea-about-using-tactile-feedback-in-the-classroom/

HOW WE DIFFER FROM HAPTIC MESSAGING 

We find the haptic messaging features on the new Apple iWatch both exciting and validating for our fully-patented Sensory Messaging technology. At TACTspace we consider Sensory Messaging a "movement," not a "feature."  Here are the key differentials and advantages of using TACTspace.

Universal Language.  While haptic messaging is a fun option for the new Apple iWatch, there is no universally recognized language. The User is limited to exchanging personal "finger taps" and "heartbeats."  TACTspace offers an infinitely wider range of both practical, and whimsical, messaging with a pre-determined menu of common messages paired with meaningful stimuli combinations.  TACTspace Users will be able to create their own unique messages and associated stimuli, but they will be able to start with an existing platform of language, universally understood by other TACTspace Users.

Freedom.  We applaud Apple's efforts to free us from our phones, but TACTspace takes freedom to another level, in at least two ways. First, understand that unlike the iWatch, the TACTpuck wearable is not only much smaller, and more discrete, it does not have to be "viewed" to receive a Sensory Message (aka TACT Message).  And, since the TACT Message can be delivered without looking at the TACTpuck, the wearable does not have to be strapped to your wrist. It can be worn virtually anywhere on your person, against your skin. 

Platform.  The haptic messaging feature can only be used between two iWatch Users. Anyone who downloads the TACTspace mobile app will be able to send TACT messages to Users with the TACTpuck wearable. We envision the TACTspace app to be launched from any PC, laptop, tablet or smart phone, as well as social network sites like Facebook and CaringBridge.

Affordability.  The Apple iWatch has a relatively high price point. We want to see all generations and demographics enjoy the next dimension of digital communications.  So, the TACTspace moble app is a free download. And, the TACTpuck is available for as little as $89USD.

Vision.  The TACTpuck wearable V1.0 is only the beginning for TACTspace and TACTonics, LLC.  It is our way of introducing the world to Sensory Messaging. Our fully-patented technology will soon be available with more exciting stimuli, and integrated "pairable" peripherals.


TACTING AKA SENSORY MESSAGING 

How will I know what the TACT (Sensory Message) means? The TACTspace app will have a pre-programed menu of common messages with their associated stimuli combinations that will be universally recognized.  For example, “I Love You” = Red LED Halo, and Heartbeat Vibration Pattern.  Much like a phone log, the TACTspace app will keep track of all sent/received TACTs.  But, over time, Receivers will learn to recognize the TACTs without consulting the TACT log on their phone.

If I buy a TactPuck, who can send me TACTs (Sensory Messages)? Anyone with the (free) TACTspace app!

How will I know who sent me a TACT (Sensory Message)?  Much like a phone log, the TACTspace app will keep track of all sent/received TACTs.  But, over time, Receivers will be able to identify the Sender's "Signature", which would precede the TACT itself.  The Sender’s Signature can be set up in advance by the Receiver, much like a ringtone dedicated to your special contacts today.  Examples of contact Signatures include a unique LED Halo color, tone, or vibration.


TACTSPACE MOBILE APP

Is the TACTspace App IOS and Android compatible?  Yes.

Does TACTspace require a mobile phone to work? The TACTspace app can be downloaded to any mobile phone, PC, or tablet, and is required to send TACTs (Sensory Messages).  To receive TACTs, the TACTpuck wearable must be worn by the Receiver and in Bluetooth range of the paired mobile phone, PC or tablet.

Can TACTs be sent from other places?  Not yet.  In the future, one may be able to send a TACT from a licensed social network or website.

Is the app developed already? A proof-of-concept app has been developed.  TACTspace v.1.0 is scheduled to be developed after the successful crowdfunding campaign.


TACTPUCK WEARABLE

If the TACTpuck is connected to my mobile phone via Bluetooth, would I have to keep it on at all times? To receive a Sensory Message, your mobile phone would have to be Bluetooth paired to TACTpuck wearable.

How will I charge the TACTpuck?  The TACTpuck has a rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery.  A small Charge Port connects a USB charging cable with magnetic connector (included). 

How long will the battery last?  Under normal use, the battery will last for three to five days when fully charged. 

How will I turn the TACTpuck on? The TACTpuck is equipped with a simple Smart Button that will allow you to power up or down the device and assist in the Bluetooth pairing process.

Is the TACTpuck waterproof?  Yes, up to 5 atmospheres.

How big is the TACTpuck? About the size of a quarter.  Diameter: 30mm, Thickness: 8mm

How can I keep from losing my TACTpuck?  If your TACTpuck is separated from your paired phone beyond the Bluetooth range, your phone will alert you.

How can I wear my TACTpuck?  That’s up to you!  As long as the TACTpuck is placed against the surface of the skin, you should be able to receive any Sensory Messaging.  The TACTpuck can be worn in a garment pocket, or integrated in accessories, like the TACTband (for wrists or ankles) or TACTpendant (for necks).

Can my TACTpuck help me keep up with my phone too?  Yes!  If you happen to leave your Bluetooth paired phone behind, your TACTpuck will vibrate once it’s out of Bluetooth range.

What’s a Nudge Button?  The Nudge (pop-out) Button is a new stimuli designed to feel like a physical “poke” by changing the form factor of the TACTpuck.

Is the TACTpuck wearable developed already? A proof-of-concept app has been developed. TACTpuck version 1.0 is scheduled to be developed after the successful crowd funding campaign.

story:
Dear supporters,

Thank you once again from the bottom of our hearts for your support! We’d like to inform you on the shift of approach we have taken on this grassroots campaign, and keep you updated on the next step for SVET.

We have to cancel the Indiegogo campaign and take the independent route.

We are sending all contributions we had already received back to our backers because of an influx of technical issues on Indiegogo’s part that has hindered our campaign which inconveniently affected our loyal community. More than 70% of our backers could not proceed with PayPal payment because of: “Error Message. Your payment can’t be completed because one of the receivers can’t accept payments at this time.”

We are committed to the best quality product and service, so we are taking all measures possible to ensure that we are delivering our promises to you. We are continuing the manufacturing stage and producing our dearest SVET bulbs, keeping your needs in mind as our greatest motivation.

Please stand in solidarity with us as we exclude all our issues with ‘middlemen’ parties and let’s get this going together.

In a few weeks you will be able to support this proud crowdfunding campaign directly available on our website - http://svet.io/.

You can pre-order our bulb on our website and we will charge you only when we start shipping the product, while keeping you updated along the way in our journey. If there was a slight inconvenience at present, we do apologize. We now guarantee that the reward leads to a brighter and healthier future when we all watch the dream of human-centric lighting come true!

Yours sincerely,
SVET Team

story:
Short Summary

I was diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes in 2003 as a young adult with no family history or good understanding of this disease. As a type 1 diabetes patient I fully understand the challenges of living with diabetes. I have used syringes, insulin pens and insulin pumps as methods of injecting insulin into my body. However, I always had to carry insulin and syringes with me as primary or back up method of injection. 

My condition as an insulin user allowed me to understand the short comings of the pre-filled insulin carrying cases available on the market; they do not fuction properly and are not visualy appealing.  Because these were not relible I had to carry a large amount of supplies with me at all times even if I was using other higher cost options such as an insulin pump and/or insulin pens. In additon, my back ground in the design and manufacturing field for the last 20 years gives me an unique opportunity where I created this new product in order to improve my own life style and to help to improve the lifestyle of others living with this disease.  The goal is to provide an affordable pre-filled insulin syringe carrying case that people can afford whether they have access to insurance and more expensive options or not. 

This pre-filled insulin syringe case was designed by somebody with diabetes for people affected by diabetes. This product is one of many products that I am looking forward to bringing to the marketplace with the objective of improving the life of people living with diabetes.

According to the American Diabetes Association approximately 34 Million of people have diabetes  in the US and 1 in 3 adults will have diabetes by 2050 if current trends continue.  

In addtion, the cost of diabetes products and supplies are already prohibited for many individuals in the USA and around the world even with exisitng insurance coverage. 

Purchasing this pre-filled syringe case you are not just purchasing a very good quality product, you are also helping to bring new ideas and products to the market that enhance the life of people living with diabetes at an affordable price for people living with this deases. Your contribution will also help to make a difference in the life of people living with diabetes needing a daily dosage of insulin to survive.

 

Insulin Nation Article: See what others are saying about this product.

Link:

https://insulinnation.com/living/designing-a-gr...

 

What We Need & What You Get

The initial product is completly designed by myself to keep costs low and mantain quality. A local injection molding company will design and manufacture the injection mold in additon to molding these cases.

This is a flexible campain with a minimum requirment of $6,000 to design and manufature the plastic injection mold. This initial goal includes the molding of intial parts to fullfill all crowfunding campain orders. The second target is to reach additional $16,000.00 to purchase a small injection molding machine in order start molding these cases on my own to keep them affordable.  

Therefore, this campain is for $22,000.00 with minimum goal of $6,000.00  

 

Disclaimer: Insulin and syringe not included in product. You will load your own insulin into your syringe and then insert into product.

 

The Impact

By purchasing this product you will help to improve the life of people living with diabetes by creating low cost solutions that enhance their life style. This Pre-filled insulin syringe case is a cost effective alternative to significantly more expensive produsts such as insulin pumps and insulin pens. Your contribution will make this product more accessible to people that cannot afford more expensive products and/or provide a convenient cost effective back up options.

No insurance or high cost payments are required to purchase this product. So users will be able to carry their daily supply of insulin for a affordable cost without risking their monthy insulin vials.

Stylish and discreet this product can be carried in a purse, put in  shirt or pants pockets making it easily acessible while on the go!

 

Risks & Challenges

Initially this product was designed for my own personal use as I chose to upgrade it through the years I was able to adress many possible design issues earlier on.

Many of the risks and challenges that go along with design and manufacturing the product have been addressed in the last 15 years as I have redesigned the product with the intention of improving the design and functionality of the product while mantaining affordability. So, design flaws were looked at earlier on and improved accodingly. Such as material choices to overcome rigidity, increase flexibility and appearance(I was sure people wanted more color choices than black and white!).

I will continue to assess throughout the life of the product ways to improve it including collecting feedback from consumers.

This product is also in the patent pending statge. 

The highest risk/challenge that we may face is on the manufacturing side in regards to the injection mold or production.

However I have developed contacts in this industry for the last 20 years that produce high quality products, and my ultimate goal is to produce the product myself inhouse. 

In addition, the decision of working with a local US manufactuter in OH is intended to keep all activities close to home while giving Americans jobs,  

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to contribute financially? No problem!

You can pass this along to family and friends that have diabetes.

You can share this on social media

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

This product is also in the patent pending statge. 
The highest risk/challenge that we may face is on the manufacturing side in regards to the injection mold or production.
However I have developed contacts in this industry for the last 20 years that produce high quality products, and my ultimate goal is to produce the product myself inhouse. 
In addition, the decision of working with a local US manufactuter in OH is intended to keep all activities close to home while giving Americans jobs,  

Other Ways You Can Help
Unable to contribute financially? No problem!
You can pass this along to family and friends that have diabetes.
You can share this on social media
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
iinBo 

Die intelligente Sturzerkennung die man im Alltag nicht merkt!

(for english - check the video below!)

 

 

"Fast help in case of an emergency would be wonderful."                                                              A supporter and future user about iinBo

"iinBo gibt Sicherheit. Das stärkt Vertrauen, Lebensfreude und Lebenssinn."                       Eine Krankenpflegerin über iinBo

 

Was ist iinBo?

  • ein automatisiertes Sturzerkennungssystem
  • es erkennt einen Sturz und alarmiert Freunde, Nachbarn, Familie die Sie bestimmen per APP, SMS oder E-Mail
  • Schnell, pragmatisch, einfach, komfortabel und effizient

Für wen ist iinBo?

Für alle die:

  • alleine oder mit ihrem Partner leben
  • lange Spaziergänge, Jogging-Runden, Fahrrad-Trips machen
  • die fallen könnten wenn sie alleine sind und dann schnell Hilfe möchten
  • vor Allem für die bei denen es niemand erwartet hat, dass es doch passieren könnte

Wie funktioniert es:

  • Sie geben Ihre Hilfe-Kontakte im Webinterface einmal ein
  • Sie hängen die Tasche mit dem Modul einfach in ihr Unterhemd oder T-Shirt 
  • Sie stecken die iinBo Basis in eine Steckdose

Einfach und pragmatisch! Schnell und effizient bei einem Sturz"

Das iinBo Modul ist mit der Basis verbunden. So weiß diese, dass das System OK ist.  Daten werden nur bei einem Sturz aufgezeichnet. Gehen Sie weiter weg von Ihrem Haus nehmen Sie die Basis einfach mit (das Netzteil bleibt zu Hause).

Unser Ziel:

Das System für möglichst viele Menschen verfügbar zu machen und zu helfen!

Wir bitten Sie hierfür Ihre Unterstützung und benötigen diese!

Die Mittel verwenden wir für die Produktionstools, die Zertifizierung, Tests und die Teileproduktion. 

Wenn Sie kein System möchten haben wir für Sie ein schönes hochwertiges Teiimo Polo Shirt mit einem kleinen dezenten Logo auf der Brust.

 

 

Das Projekt iinBo liegt uns am Herzen. Wir haben in den vergangenen Monaten viele Gespräche geführt und gemerkt, dass es nicht nur in unseren Familien, sondern auch den Familien unserer Freunde und Bekannten Vorfälle gab, bei denen ein System wie iinBo eine große Hilfe gewesen wäre. Eine Umfrage unter potenziellen Nutzern hat uns zusätzlich in unserem Vorhaben bestätigt.

Ein erschreckendes Ergebnis aktueller Studien: Rund 33% der über 65-Jährigen stürzen mindestens einmal im Jahr. Bei Menschen, die alleine leben oder alleine unterwegs sind, bleiben Stürze oft erstmal unentdeckt. Es dauert oftmals sehr lange bis Hilfe kommt.

Das ändert iinBo. iinBo ist da wenn es gebraucht wird.

Meist denkt man das brauche ich nicht - bis man es dann gebraucht hätte.

Ein beruhigendes Gefühl und im Ernstfall ein sofortiger automatischer Hilferuf – das leistet der "Invisible Bodyguard" von Teiimo Health, kurz iinBo - unsichtbarer Leibwächter. Bequem und einfach. Man trägt es zu Hause, im eigenen Garten, alleine bei längeren Spaziergängen, Bergwanderungen oder unterwegs auf dem Fahrrad. iinBo, eine Kombination aus Textil und Elektronik, ist wie ein unsichtbarer Leibwächter, der dann sofort zur Stelle ist.

Unabhängigkeit und Sicherheit im Alltag

iinBo ist ein Begleiter für Menschen, die sich ihre Unabhängigkeit bewahren und sich in ihren eigenen vier Wänden sicher fühlen möchten, auch wenn sie alleine leben. Für alle, die aktiv sind oder alleine arbeiten. iinBo hilft, wenn etwas passiert. Verlässlich informiert das System die definierten Notfallkontakte. Das System passt auf Sie auf. Ganz unauffällig.

 

 

 

iinBo ist besser (als Uhren und andere Systeme)! Warum?

 

Das System, das Menschen dazu ermutigt, mobil und unabhängig zu bleiben.

 

Wie iinBo Ihr Leben sicherer macht

Das System besteht aus mehreren Teilen. Das kleine iinBo Modul, das mit Sensoren und Kommunikationstechnologie ausgestattet ist, wird in eine Tasche gelegt, die versteckt in den Shirts unserer iinBo Kollektion sitzt. Das Modul ist ungefähr halb so groß wie eine Kreditkarte und wiegt 9 Gramm. Im iinBo Modul sind Sensoren für die Sturzerkennung integriert. Die Position des Moduls - am oberen Rücken ist ein wichtiger Faktor für die Zuverlässigkeit und Präzision der Sturzerkennung. Ungewöhnliche Änderungen in der Körperbalance und Höhenabweichungen im Verhältnis zum Boden lassen sich so eindeutiger erkennen. Eine Akkuladung hält mindestens zwei Tage.

iinBo Modul und Basis kommunizieren über 2 Stockwerke und rund 500 Meter Luftlinie miteinander, abhängig u.a. von der Bauweise des Hauses. Haus und Garten werden abgedeckt. Die Reichweite ist durch eine optimierte Funktechnik deutlich größer als bei WLAN.

Wenn das Modul einen Sturz erkennt, meldet es den Notfall an die Basis, die eine Alarmierung Ihrer persönlichen Kontakte in die Wege leitet. Die Kontakte definieren Sie bei der Einrichtung des Systems und hinterlegen Sie in Ihrem Profil

 

Die iinBo Basis bieten wir in zwei Varianten an: ohne GPS und mit GPS. Die Variante mit GPS können Sie als mobilen Begleiter auf Wanderungen, Fahrradtouren, Städtetrips usw. mitnehmen. Einfach von der Ladestation lösen und in die Tasche stecken. Das Gerät hat eine Batterielaufzeit von mind. 24 Stunden. Das heißt, auch bei Stromausfall funktioniert es mind. 24 Stunden weiter. Es ist kein Neustart erforderlich, wenn der Strom wieder da ist.

* Für die iinBo Basis wird ein Servicevertrag abgeschlossen. Der erste Monat ist in den Paketen enthalten. Der Servicevertrag ist monatlich kündbar und beinhaltet eine Mobilfunkkarte sowie die Nutzung der Informationsplattform (Cloud). Die nachfolgenden monatlichen Kosten betragen 6€, eine Anschluss- oder Servicegebühr fällt für unsere Unterstützer nicht an. 

 

Auf Nachfrage haben wir ein einfaches SOS-Modul in unser System integriert.

Dieses bieten wir Ihnen als Zubehör an.

 

Einfache Installation in drei Schritten

  1. Stecken Sie das Basiselement in die Steckdose
  2. Nehmen Sie Ihren Laptop oder Ihr Tablet, um Ihr Basiselement auf Ihren Namen zu registrieren und die SIM-Karte zu aktivieren.
  3. Hinterlegen Sie Ihre Notfallkontakte

Fertig!

Sie können nun das Modul in eines der Shirts tun, und schon ist Ihr iinBo bereit.

 

Unser Ziel:

Dieses hilfreiche, möglicherweise lebensrettende, Produkt ganz vielen Menschen zur Verfügung zu stellen.

Wir denken zum Beispiel an alle, die fit sind und trotz ihres Alters gut alleine oder zu zweit zurechtkommen. An alle, die sich trotz gesundheitlicher Probleme in ihrem Zuhause am wohlsten und sicher fühlen und weiterhin aktiv sind und es weiter sein möchten. An alle, die sich um ihre Eltern oder andere Familienangehörige sorgen und immer wieder anrufen oder vorbeikommen, um sicherzugehen, dass alles in Ordnung ist. An Pflegerinnen und Pfleger bei mobilen Pflegediensten oder in Pflegeheimen. 

Teiimo ist ein junges Technologieunternehmen aus München, das 2014 gegründet wurde. Wir entwickeln Sensoren, Produkte und Systeme, die Menschen helfen, gesund und sicher zu leben. Unsere Technologien finden Anwendung in unterschiedlichen Bereichen wie Gesundheit, Medizin, Sport und Arbeitssicherheit. Die Aktivitäten für Gesundheit und Wohlbefinden sind im Geschäftsbereich Teiimo Health gebündelt. Alle Technologien, die wir für iinBo einsetzen, sind bereits erfolgreich erprobt, u.a. in anderen Projekten.

iinBo ist auch das Ergebnis vieler Gespräche mit Freunden, Verwandten und Fachkollegen. Wir wurden immer wieder angesprochen, ein derartiges Produkt zu entwickeln. Um iinBo zu einem fertigen Produkt zu machen, brauchen wir Ihre Unterstützung. Die finanziellen Mittel, die wir durch diese Kampagne erhalten, verwenden wir vor allem für die Produktionsvorbereitung (z.B. Herstellung der Spritzgussformen für die Produktion der Gerätegehäuse), für Produkttests, die Zertifizierung sowie die eigentliche Produktion.

 

Eine besondere Textilkollektion begleitet iinBo

Top Qualität – Top-Komfort

  • Natürliche Fasern
  • 100% Baumwolle oder 45% Baumwolle/50% Modal/5% Elasthan – je nach Modell
  • Weiche Stoffe
  • Bequemer Schnitt

Schicke Modelle für Ihren Stil

  • Polo-Shirts
  • T-Shirts
  • Trägerhemden

in klassischen Farben und den Trendfarben der Saison

schwarz, weiß, grau, blau, grün, senf, lila

verfügbar in den Größen S, M, L, XL, XXL

 

Was uns Unterstützer sagen:

"Schnelle Hilfe bei Unfall oder lebensbedrohenden Krankheitssymptonen wäre wunderbar."

"Ihr Shirt ist eine revolutionäre Erfindung"

"Das Shirt gibt Sicherheit zurück. Das stärkt Vertrauen,  Lebensfreude und Lebenssinn." 

 

Wir danken Ihnen für Ihre Unterstützung!

story: Little David needs to undergo a cornea transplant, Help Him live life with a good eyesight, nobody likes darkness

story:
Hello everyone!

I’m Beáta Carmen Kneszl,
I’m a writer.

I have a Borderline personality disorder.

Maybe you, your relatives or your friends has this personality disorder. Which affects more than 500 million people in the world.

I wrote this book in 2016.
At the begening no one trusted in it. Neither in my story nor in my book. That's why I had to create my book from a loan.
Since then, a lot has happened.

I get almost daily letters from the readers that I saved their lives with this book.
I was able to repay the loan.

I had many requests and the book is taught at ELTE. ELTE is a very famous Hungarian University (https://www.elte.hu/en/about-elte).
In the world, 500 million or rahter than 500 million people are suffering from this personality disorder.
It stamps us.
Such a personality disorder is due to such a disease which is not because of us.

Also, I got the Antistigma Award. What was a great pleasure for me. I can stand out even stronger for people to help whose are. Stamped and oppressesed by this disorder.

To be honestly I would like to get your help to realm English spoken areas. A samll piece has been translated but the issue is that I can’t finance the rest part. I would ask for your help.
Thank you very much in advance. Like your trust, and your help.
All the best for you!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
BACKGEAR came out by determination of two guys who are very fond of the world of technology, mechanics, design and artisanally made objects with eco-sustainable materials.

The company team is made up of Andrea, a professional technical profile, specialized in the various types of materials and related processes, and Fabio, a professional profile oriented towards marketing and finance.

Our concern is to always identify innovative solutions that can respond to people's needs (continuously evolving), giving functional, effective and quick response. We do this using the principles of mechanics, inventing and creating functional and well designed objects.

The product we intend to offer to the INDIEGOGO community is a PORTABLE DISPENSER named POCKET ROLL-ON equipped with an innovative dispensing system; it can be filled inside, according to the needs of the consumer, with different cosmetic solutions of various qualities, as long as they are liquid or in gel (cream, soap, hand sanitizer).

 

Its small size is able to guarantee the correct quantity of product essential to face the ordinary day activities at home and especially when you’re away. There is also a small closing cap which guarantees additional protection and prevents the product from drying out.

 

Each of its components is made of the most noble stainless steel - AISI 316 - used as a high-end raw material in the food, agri-food, chemical and pharmaceutical sectors, with excellent resistance to corrosion by acids (sulfuric acid, phosphoric acid, acids organic and chlorinated).

Specifically, the product is composed of:

1) A cylindrical body with two functions: the first is that of containing the preferred liquid / gel, the second is that of housing a sphere specially designed and perfectly calibrated with anti-drop seal together with a spring capable of guaranteeing the right pressure in order to assure the correct functioning and the correct supply of the product.

2) rear cap with thread, available in two formats:

-with flat surface (with O-RING) to guarantees minor volume in the pocket or in the bag.

-with integrated eyelet (with O-RING) to be positioned as a key ring, hanging on neck straps, etc ... 

3) A protective cap, covering the sphere.

PRODUCT FUNCTIONALITY

Everything has been studied and calibrated to contain within the dispenser one’s favorite or necessary cosmetic products in particular situations of daily life. Thanks to the high quality sphere it is possible to dose the product on the hands or more generally on skin surface in a precise and fast way, cutting out completely the waste of product.

DISTINCTIVE ELEMENTS

-Essential for its commodity of use

 

-Simple in shape,compactness and portability

-Ecological: it can be recharged on and on (LIQUID/GEL NOT INCLUDED). It can be recycled (316 stainless steel).

-Practical and Hygienic: can be washed in the dishwasher or sterilized with boiling.

The use of the dispenser allows you to buy refills of your favorite large-sized cosmetic product, with significant savings both economically and environmentally, thanks to a clear reduction in plastic packaging (small containers, tubes).

USE IT AFTER THESE SITUATIONS:

Additionally of useing it as a dispenser ... attach it to your car or home keys and use it as an anti-stress tool ... crush and rotate the sphere endlessly ... :-)

Our team carefully assessed the risks associated with the initiative; we understand that product design and prototyping may take longer than expected. Our challenge will be to make the product even in large quantities. We believe we have studied the right solutions even in case of important success of our Pocket Roll-on (high number of rewards). We have defined a time-line in line with our potential. While also analyzing the distribution of the product with extreme attention, this phase could lead to risks as it is not entirely managed by us; it is in fact an activity that will obviously be carried out by a forwarder. To limit any negativity in this regard, we have chosen to ship only to some countries of the world.

 

The product is made of noble durable materials (the best available stainless steel).
Resistant to acids, studied and guaranteed for the food industry and therefore extremely suitable for containing cosmetic products.

 

Built and manufactured in AISI 316 stainless steel, 100% recyclable. Packaging made of cardboard, also 100% recyclable. The chosen packaging, thanks to its cylindrical shape, can be reused as a pen holder, pencil case, etc ...
We want to specify that each cylinder can contain a maximum of 2 pieces. Over this, we'll  send the products inside a recyclable box

 

1) Stainless steel. Stainless steel is known to all for being one of the most durable materials ever: this leads to a low rate of material to be demolished and / or disposed of. Disposal costs are low and, above all, there are no problems due to the accumulation of large quantities of material in the dumpsites. In fact, stainless steel is completely recyclable so it can be reused several times in different applications. Suffice it to say that after having lost those properties that make it suitable for supporting weights and for the construction of various types of structures, it can be reused up to 90% in other sectors. In fact, we talk about down-cycling, that is, recycling through use in lower level applications.
2) Cardboard. Recycled and recyclable.

 

Since we are manufacturing most of the components in our area, we will have full control of our environmental practices. We are committed to maintaining environmentally friendly practices at every stage of component production, from recycling waste material to carefully disposing of any by-products from the manufacturing process
story_txt:
BACKGEAR came out by determination of two guys who are very fond of the world of technology, mechanics, design and artisanally made objects with eco-sustainable materials.


The company team is made up of Andrea, a professional technical profile, specialized in the various types of materials and related processes, and Fabio, a professional profile oriented towards marketing and finance.
Our concern is to always identify innovative solutions that can respond to people's needs (continuously evolving), giving functional, effective and quick response. We do this using the principles of mechanics, inventing and creating functional and well designed objects.
The product we intend to offer to the INDIEGOGO community is a PORTABLE DISPENSER named POCKET ROLL-ON equipped with an innovative dispensing system; it can be filled inside, according to the needs of the consumer, with different cosmetic solutions of various qualities, as long as they are liquid or in gel (cream, soap, hand sanitizer).
 





Its small size is able to guarantee the correct quantity of product essential to face the ordinary day activities at home and especially when you’re away. There is also a small closing cap which guarantees additional protection and prevents the product from drying out.
 

Each of its components is made of the most noble stainless steel - AISI 316 - used as a high-end raw material in the food, agri-food, chemical and pharmaceutical sectors, with excellent resistance to corrosion by acids (sulfuric acid, phosphoric acid, acids organic and chlorinated).

Specifically, the product is composed of:
1) A cylindrical body with two functions: the first is that of containing the preferred liquid / gel, the second is that of housing a sphere specially designed and perfectly calibrated with anti-drop seal together with a spring capable of guaranteeing the right pressure in order to assure the correct functioning and the correct supply of the product.

2) rear cap with thread, available in two formats:
-with flat surface (with O-RING) to guarantees minor volume in the pocket or in the bag.

-with integrated eyelet (with O-RING) to be positioned as a key ring, hanging on neck straps, etc ... 

3) A protective cap, covering the sphere.


PRODUCT FUNCTIONALITY
Everything has been studied and calibrated to contain within the dispenser one’s favorite or necessary cosmetic products in particular situations of daily life. Thanks to the high quality sphere it is possible to dose the product on the hands or more generally on skin surface in a precise and fast way, cutting out completely the waste of product.
DISTINCTIVE ELEMENTS
-Essential for its commodity of use
 



-Simple in shape,compactness and portability


-Ecological: it can be recharged on and on (LIQUID/GEL NOT INCLUDED). It can be recycled (316 stainless steel).


-Practical and Hygienic: can be washed in the dishwasher or sterilized with boiling.

The use of the dispenser allows you to buy refills of your favorite large-sized cosmetic product, with significant savings both economically and environmentally, thanks to a clear reduction in plastic packaging (small containers, tubes).
USE IT AFTER THESE SITUATIONS:


Additionally of useing it as a dispenser ... attach it to your car or home keys and use it as an anti-stress tool ... crush and rotate the sphere endlessly ... :-)

Our challenge will be to make the product even in large quantities. We believe we have studied the right solutions even in case of important success of our Pocket Roll-on (high number of rewards). We have defined a time-line in line with our potential. While also analyzing the distribution of the product with extreme attention, this phase could lead to risks as it is not entirely managed by us; it is in fact an activity that will obviously be carried out by a forwarder. To limit any negativity in this regard, we have chosen to ship only to some countries of the world.

The chosen packaging, thanks to its cylindrical shape, can be reused as a pen holder, pencil case, etc ...We want to specify that each cylinder can contain a maximum of 2 pieces. Over this, we'll  send the products inside a recyclable box

Disposal costs are low and, above all, there are no problems due to the accumulation of large quantities of material in the dumpsites. In fact, stainless steel is completely recyclable so it can be reused several times in different applications. Suffice it to say that after having lost those properties that make it suitable for supporting weights and for the construction of various types of structures, it can be reused up to 90% in other sectors. In fact, we talk about down-cycling, that is, recycling through use in lower level applications.2) Cardboard. Recycled and recyclable.

Short Summary

Frankly speaking, this campaign is an experiment. All raised funds I'll donate to Syrian refugees. Perhaps, to this Syrian father caring sleeping daughter selling pens to survive. 


The campaign goals are: 

1) to learn how involving viral strories (mentioning Syrian father + potato salad) may effect the success of campaign.

2) to know how Indiegogo works (this is my first campaign).

3) to help Syrian refugees by using some creativity and fun.


So, let's make it happen!
Donate! Spread the word! Share!

story:
What is BLACK ACE®?

The BLACK ACE® is a new generation underwater propulsion system designed and developed by Opcon Pte Ltd.

It was designed with the combat diver in mind, employing the use of cutting edge lightweight composite materials to increase stealth and operational range of combat dive operations. To that end, BLACK ACE® has met and exceeded the MIL-STD-810G military standards as laid out by the U.S. Department of Defense.

With an uncompromising focus on performance, reliability, and ease of operation at every stage of the design and manufacturing process, the BLACK ACE® has been sold and demonstrated to military and law enforcement units around the world.

The BLACK ACE® has been featured in the following media:

MAGAZINES

  • Asian Diver
  • Naval Forces
  • Wehr Technik
  • HIS Jane
TELEVISION
  • Channel NewsAsia
  • Channel 8
We have been studying ways to develop a simplified, cost-effective version of the BLACK ACE® to bring our product to you. After countless nights spent looking at ways to simplify the  design, we are now ready to take the next step forward in turning this vision into a reality.

The result, is the BLACK ACE® Sport.

Discover the Next Generation of Underwater Propulsion


The BLACK ACE® Sport will allow you to dive further and longer than ever before. By taking away the exertion required to fin yourself through the water, your breathing can be maintained at a lower rate, extending the amount of air available for your dive.


How does it work?


We have designed the BLACK ACE® Sport to be as simple to use as possible. 


The dual tank-mounted thrusters brings the thrust directly in line with your body's centre of mass. This means that all you need to do is to tilt your body in your intended direction, and off you go!

Unlike underwater scooters, our hands free design means that your hands are free to check on gauges and operate other equipment. Perfect for photographers and videographers alike. It also helps in avoiding fatigue from gripping on to the underwater scooter for prolonged periods.

Our ergonomic digital throttle control mounted on a pistol grip allows you to comfortably control your speed - cruise alongside your friends at finning speed, or ramp up the throttle to 2.5 knots and leave them behind. The BLACK ACE® Sport is even powerful enough for you to tow another diver along!


Our specially designed power cells allow more power to be delivered to the thrusters without sacrificing endurance.  However, if you do run out of power mid-dive, the BLACK ACE® Sport has been designed easy replacement even while you are underwater.

Discover the next generation of underwater propulsion.


What's Included


The basic BLACK ACE® Sport package comes with:

Systems Housing. The housing that contains the electronics and is able to withstand water pressure at a depth of up to 60m.
  • Thrusters. The BLACK ACE® Sport is designed to work with two thrusters, providing symmetrical thrust to push you effortlessly through the water.

  • Hand Controller. A four speed hand controller housed in an ergonomic pistol grip.
  • Battery Pack (144Wh). One rechargeable battery pack to power the BLACK ACE® Sport with up to 30 minutes run time. 

  • Battery Charger.  A UL-certified battery charger to charge your battery pack.

  • Cables. Cables to connect the systems housing with the thrusters and hand controller.

Optional Items


A wheeled carrying case to carry your BLACK ACE® Sport is available for purchase at $120.


You may also purchase additional battery packs to extend your dive time:

  • Standard Battery Pack (144Wh). $1,000. The standard battery pack that come with your Black Ace Sport. Up to 30 minutes of run time. Suitable for bringing on board airplanes under FAA regulations.

  • Large Battery Pack (360 Wh). $1,300. A larger battery pack that has a longer run time of up to 75 minutes. NOT suited for carrying on board airplanes.

About Edwin Yeo



Mr Edwin Yeo graduated in Mechatronics engineering, specializing in electro-mechanical applications. He is also a NAUI Specialty Diving Instructor, actively logged over 10,640+ dives to date. With over 19 years of extensive diving skills and robotics engineering knowledge, Edwin Yeo setup OPCON PTE LTD in 2008. Having knowledge in engineering and underwater knowledge, he began research in underwater propulsion. After several years of hard work, he finally found a way to stabilize weight-to-thrust ratio, bringing "stabilize-high-thrust" using small propeller to propel human load underwater. After achieving several military and safety certifications globally, he demonstrated the capability of BLACK ACE® Military to the global's forces, in which the BLACK ACE® is capable to carry fully loaded combat diver and its companion.

Now he is bring this same technology to the recreational divers.


So What's Next?


We need your help to turn our goal into a reality. We need $350,000 to purchase the equipment such as injection molds to move our designs into the production phase. All we need is your help to translate our existing mil-spec design into a more simplified consumer-friendly version.
With the funds and equipment, we will be able to begin full-scale production. The first units will be shipped out in Aug 2016.

Frequently Asked Questions


What's the difference between the military and sport version of the BLACK ACE®?

Compared to the military version, the Sport has been redesigned to be lighter and more user-friendly to operate, It also comes at a lower price, at a small tradeoff to operating speed and endurance.

How deep can the BLACK ACE® Sport go?

The military version of the BLACK ACE® has been certified to operate at depths of up to 100m. The BLACK ACE® Sport will be able to operate at up to 60m.

How long do the batteries last?

The BLACK ACE® Sport can operate at up to 30 minutes on the standard-sized battery pack, and 75 minutes on the large-sized battery pack.


Will I be able to bring the BLACK ACE® Sport on board airplanes?


Yes, the BLACK ACE® Sport has been designed with FAA regulations in mind. The standard-sized battery pack is safe to be carried on board airplanes as carry-on baggage.


I'm interested in the military version of the BLACK ACE®. Is it also available for purchase?


Certainly! Do drop us an email at enquiry@opcon.com.sg to find out more, or visit out website at http://www.opcon.com.sg


What are the certifications and patents registered for the military version of the BLACK ACE®?


The military version of the BLACK ACE® has the following:

Intellectual Properties:

PCT Patent: #W02011119110
Singapore Patented: #182839
USA Patent-Pending #13579320
European Patent-Pending #11759806
Malaysia Patent-Pending #PI2012003574
Trademark Registered for “ BLACK ACE ” #T1301609F

Certifications:

Compliance to MIL-STD-810G by MET Lab, Baltimore HQ, USA.
CE Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC, TUV-NORD, Taiwan.
Pressured rated to 10 bars, Setsco Singapore.
Singapore Maritime Distinguished Award 2015

What certifications will the BLACK ACE® Sport come with?

The BLACK ACE® Sport will be sent for CE certification under the CE Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and Setsco Singapore for pressure rating.

story:
Short Summary

 I am Ajay Girotra, based in New Delhi India. I am 51 years of age and have been working for last 30 years as CEO of various companies in India in verticals like Hotels, Tourism, IT & ITES, Banking, Automobiles, White Goods, Telecom, Media, Sports, BFSI, Medical, Science & Technology. Over the last 30 years, been a part and parcel of various technology platforms & always wanted that I come across a path breaking technology which changes the planet earth and the environment. In India, water pollution, sewage disposal and sold waste disposal.....it is such a humongous problem because of which multiple problems are arising.....

  • Drinking water is in short supply
  • No water available for the farmers and they are committing suicides as crops are failing and severe drought is there in parts of India
  • Shortage of power supply, which effects the farming and the industry sector as well as the life's of the people
  • Sewage and solid wastes are contaminating the ground water and making it poisonous
  • Sewage falls into rivers and the toxic waste present pollutes the rivers making water unusable.
  • Fumes originating out of sewage and solid waste dumps pollute the air around making the life of people living in the vicinity - miserable.
We have found a new technology in USA & by having a joint venture with this Oregon based company, we are setting up a pilot project which will use 7 Million litres ( MLD ) of Sewage everyday and produce :
  • 40 MW of green power - which is adequate to  power 11,500 houses 
  • 3.5 million litres ( MLD ) of water per day  which will cater to 11,500 houses
  • zero emission into the sky - only hot air at 34˚C
  • No residues
Time taken to setup the plant and the production to start is : 12 months

What We Need & What You Get

The cost of the plant is USD $50million. We have arranged for 96% of the funding and see the support of the international community for the 4% i.e USD $2million.  This is a self generating project as  the surplus from the revenues from this plant will provide funding for the other plants as we plan to install over 100 plants in India. Therefore, your contribution is like a catalyst for the chain of plants which will help 1.15 million houses get water and power . 
You may say that if we have 96% funding then why are we not able to generate the 4% or why approach the International Community for the 4%. The reason for this is that we need the participation of the people as we are building a community based project and and we want the contributing  people to feel that they have done something for a large deprived community which does not have access to basic thing like water and power. The sense of fulfillment and ownership need to come in the people and we plan to acknowledge it by :  
  • sending an individual thank you note to each and every contributor irrespective of the amount he/she contributes
  • we plan to publish a coffee table book on this project and would include the names of the contributors and send a copy of the same to each and everyone.
In case of we do not reach the desired USD $2 million mark, we will approach the corporate companies to contribute the balance under their Community Social Responsibility ( CSR ) program. This program will happen and we are ready for it.

The Impact

Their are millions of children and adults dying because of the nuisances of the pollution which is being generated....water contamination, air contamination, food contamination, food shortage, water shortage, power shortage. You contribution is like tip of the iceberg.....and it is always the tip or the icing which matters. You contribution will start a new revolution in this part of the country and help millions from suffering, starving.

Risks & Challenges

Till the time the life is there...people are there....industries are there....sewage and garbage will always be produced and in our case this is the fodder for the plant. Raw material will never be in short supply and the challenge is to cover the entire country as fast as possible so that we can reach out to people ASAP. More the contribution, faster are the next plants which will come into action.

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you feel that you are not in a position to contribute or contribute less, we would request you to kindly share this project with your friends, relatives, colleagues and help us our to start this movement...which will turn Sewage into Green and make the rivers blue again.

story:
Many blind people such as myself face challenges when working out. Unfortunately, many don’t even get the chance to enhance their physical fitness because of these issues. Unlabeled or hard to find buttons on machines, visual displays with important data, and the inability to find someone to go with them to assist with workouts are just a few of the challenges blind people face. With my background in accessibility testing, passion for equality and team of inventing professionals, it is my hope to bridge these gaps and break down barriers to make a more inclusive solution for all.

What is this solution? The answer is quite simple. How about a treadmill which can raise and lower to accommodate all heights and age ranges, as well as raised, clearly labeled buttons and text to speech to read the info on the display. This way, people of all ages and visual abilities can enjoy a walk/run without anyone assisting them or having to worry about labeling and other subsequent challenges.

As with anything, there will be bumps along the way. The cost of making this happen is great, even with a team of people alongside me. Our first step is to brand and patent the product to ensure that the idea is unique and nothing about it is owned by anyone else. Once that is completed, we need to worry about manufacturing costs, but one step at a time. Our first goal is that of one thousand dollars for research, branding and patenting. When/if that goal is reached, we will go on to manufacturing etc.

It is with your help that this can be made possible. Please consider supporting an accessible treadmill and destroy the boundaries which currently make for a sedentary lifestyle among the blind. Your help is greatly appreciated and will change the lives of others when the project is completed successfully!
story_txt:
Many blind people such as myself face challenges when working out. Unfortunately, many don’t even get the chance to enhance their physical fitness because of these issues. Unlabeled or hard to find buttons on machines, visual displays with important data, and the inability to find someone to go with them to assist with workouts are just a few of the challenges blind people face. With my background in accessibility testing, passion for equality and team of inventing professionals, it is my hope to bridge these gaps and break down barriers to make a more inclusive solution for all.
What is this solution? The answer is quite simple. How about a treadmill which can raise and lower to accommodate all heights and age ranges, as well as raised, clearly labeled buttons and text to speech to read the info on the display. This way, people of all ages and visual abilities can enjoy a walk/run without anyone assisting them or having to worry about labeling and other subsequent challenges.
As with anything, there will be bumps along the way. The cost of making this happen is great, even with a team of people alongside me. Our first step is to brand and patent the product to ensure that the idea is unique and nothing about it is owned by anyone else. Once that is completed, we need to worry about manufacturing costs, but one step at a time. Our first goal is that of one thousand dollars for research, branding and patenting. When/if that goal is reached, we will go on to manufacturing etc.
It is with your help that this can be made possible. Please consider supporting an accessible treadmill and destroy the boundaries which currently make for a sedentary lifestyle among the blind. Your help is greatly appreciated and will change the lives of others when the project is completed successfully!

story:
the t'latte project

A new way to make tea, using the steam nozzle on your cappuccino machine: the t'latte infuser lets you add flavour to liquids you heat with steam.

Thanks to the contributors of our previous indiegogo campaign, the t'latte project, mirth manufacturing concern was able to deliver t'latte infuser factory production samples and fulfill contributor perks in 2014.  Here's a picture of our factory production samples:

Now, the factory is ready for the next step in production, but we need your help to make it happen...

We want to build on the momentum we started last year, and you can help! Reaching our goal gets us one step closer to production: $1500 USD covers the tooling costs for the mass-production moulds.

After some real-world testing, we've increased the top opening size, so it's less likely you'll have to trim the funnel to stretch it over your cappuccino machine's steam nozzle, we're also making it easier to fit the ball inside the funnel.


What We Need & What You Get

We need pre-orders, contributions and consumer awareness to make our first mass-production of t'latte infusers happen.  You'll get a t'latte infuser, eventually, a delicious new way of making tea, and the good vibes inherent in helping with the concern's first official project. 

All of the money raised will go directly to cover our tooling costs in preparation for our first production run.  Once we've reached our goal, we'll get the tooling underway and ask for an expansion goal aimed at covering the unit production, packaging and shipping costs of our first production run (estimated at $25,000 USD).  Meanwhile, creator Garth Whelen continues to finance the intellectual property work through his own bootstrapping efforts, in the hopes to make commercial licensing of the t'latte process into the concern's first long-term fundraiser.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Baby Blanket

This is Baby Blanket - Do not let the name trick you!

 It is a Blanket made for children and adults, to help you fall asleep easily and keep you or your baby calm through the night.

With a technology similar to the Vibrator motor use on mobile phones BB embrace your body, covering you normally, with the detail that he can have a slight vibration, which can be with less or more intense depending on your choice.

Again, all same a Mobile Phone, you will be able to charge his battery, with a nomal charger. You will can do it with the general chargers used now day for phones like a Samsung or LG.  

Baby Blanket can be controlled by a App, that you can easily download into your phone, allowing you to check the Battery status, How Long do you want it to Bounce you and in which Intensity. A very simple Application, with simple bottoms, in different languages so via Bluetooth will can just adjust the Settings of your BB.

We already had done some tests, but we still looking for the perfect system which makes the blanket lighter is possible, without keep an nice body temperature, as well can be washed in an easy way. All to maximize the quality, without elevate the prices. So that everyone who wishes, can actually own a Baby Blanket.

We plan not to stop here, so the idea is to create Blankets to winter for now, but we can really want to expand it. That`s why on the perks you will find BB Sets, So then on we also want to make Bed sheets which comes with the same technology.

So you will be able to have BB not just on the cold nights but in a fresh Spring night too,


Summary

We are a coulple of younger lovers, who likes to share every great momment of our lives together.

Although our relationship is full of adventure, we have many ups and downs when comes to our Financial situation. That's because Bruna is Brazilian, living with me at my homeland Croatia and isn't easy to find legal jobs to her and what I make, with my parents help as well is enough to have a normal living.

But not that is not enough! But we have many dreams and ideas. And with all fear and a bit of shame we decided to go forward with one of our ideas and ask for help, so then we can make at least this dream come true.

For me Ante, life was completely different and careless when I met Bruna. She's just so passionate about life, help others in a different magnitude than mine. She brought my good side to a much better, making me understand that when we are happy, stable and secure we can help other people to have a much better life.

Bruna has very bad sleep habits, but everyday when she's on my arms from the beggining till now I always've bounce her like a little babe ( we are blush to reveal that, but it is true) and she does the same to me as well. Some of our friends don't understand, but OK.

From our troubles to sleep and a way to confort each other, we started to remember how good was to be held and be bounced till fail asleep or stop crying. Bruna is always cold and finding hard to sleep, so I call myself Baby Blanket.

     What We Need & What You Get

We really don't have anything even to start with or even where to do it, since we live with Ante's parents.

Our Goal is 28,500 USD wich will be used to:

  • 1 Fabric Printer
  • 1 Industrial Sewing Machine
  • 1 Ovelock Machine
  • 3 tables with minimum 2 meters lenght
  • Babe Blanket Technology wich will make possible to make the blanket bounce and be countroled by Bluetooth using an APP ( this is the expensiver one, cause we need another company to produce for us)
  • Fabrics and Other Resources to make the blankets
  • And get the rights and the company registration

The Impact

We could use the money to just hire a big company and pay them to do all of the work. Instead, we believe that if we got a great idea and with that we can make a diffence in peoples lives we should first help our community.

Baby Blanket for starter will be runned by us two, cause of costs of course and a few more employees from our community. That's because Croatia besides the tourism and food production, doens't have many job opportunities out of Summer Seasons. This way we could make other projects arise there.

Not just with Baby Blanket, but also customized Bed Sets ,we want to give unique experiences, share beautiful moments and that you can be part of our team history. Making easy million lives of workers who comes home tired with difficults to sleep, mothers that for different motives can not being holding and bouncing your babies all night long.

Risks & Challenges

Right now besides raise enough money, our biggest challenge is overcome in whole new market. Actually are not many competitors, which make our work harder to make the right product, touch new costumers and make our buyers happier than ever.

Bruna has Fashion Design education, as well sewing and some Business qualification which is helping us a lot to make the right decisions. Added to Ante entrepreneur passion hard work and knowledge in electrical systems and Technology,  we will make the best Baby Blanket . For any age, singles or couples have that nice feeling of being Bounced.

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides the cash donation, if anyone can help us by donate the machinary, furniture, fabrics or even a empty space that we can use (in Croatia); for sure that we will be really happy and greatfull!!!!!

story:
THIS IS MY OLD CAMPAIGN. 

NEW CAMPAIGN IS THERE -> igg.me/at/careformishaa


I'm Misha, 5 years old.

I have Infantile Cerebral Palsy in born, which is expressed by speech disorder and weakness of four limbs.  I can't move and work with my hands on my own. My parents work with me a lot, for me to be able to train both my muscles and speech. In order to undergo an efficient medical treatment and reabilitation therapies, I need to leave for another countryI have to undergo a medical treatment, for which I need a great amount of money. 

If you can, please, help me live a healthy and happy life, by making a money transfer.

Меня зовут Миша, мне 5 лет.

У меня детский церебральный паралич, которая выражается расстройством речи и слабости четырех конечностей.  Из за этого я не могу сомостоятельно ходить, трудно говорю. 

Мои родители много работают со мной,  что бы я смог сам ходить, тренеровал мышцы и смог легче говорить. Для того, чтобы пройти эффективную лечебно-реабилитационную терапию, мне нужно уехать в другую страну. Если вы можете, пожалуйста, помогите мне жить здоровой и счастливой жизню, сделав денежный перевод.

Ես Միշան եմ, 5 տարեկան։

Ի ծնե ունեմ մանկական ուղեղային կաթված, որն արտահայտվում է խոսքի և չորս վերջույթների թուլությամբ։ Չեմ կարողանում ինքնուրույն քայլել, ձեռքով աշխատանք անել, խոսում եմ դժվարությամբ։ Մայրիկս և հայրիկս շատ են աշխատում ինձ հետ, որպեսզի ես կարողանամ մարզել թե մկաններս, թե խոսքս։  Ինձ արդյունավետ բուժման և վերականգնողական թերապիաների համար անհրաժեշտ է տեղափոխվել այլ երկիր։ Քանի որ արտասահմանում բուժման համար անհրաժեշտ են մեծ գումարներ, ես դիմում եմ ձեր օգնությանը բարի մարդիկ, որպեսզի դուք օգնեք ինձ ապրել առողջ ու երջանիկ կյանքով։


Էպիկրիզը հայերեն

Эпикриз на русском

Epicrisis in English
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Mother's facebook profile - facebook.com/gohar.torosyan.714
Email address - gohar.torosyan.1983@mail.ru
Mobile

+37494965013 (Mother)

+37494541017 (Father)

Մանուկների օգնության ֆոնդ

Բարեգործություն երեխաներին

Նվիրատվություն երեխաներին

Օգնություն հաշմանդամ երեխաներին

Օգնություն երեխաներին

Միացյալ հայկական ֆոնդ

Հայաստանի երեխաներ ֆոնդ

Միացյալ հայերի ֆոնդ

Օգնություն հայ ընտանիքներին

Օգնություն մանկական ուղեղային կաթվածով երեխաներին

story:
Hi, This is Dr. Bupp, Pepex Medical Director

I have been working with a group of scientists, engineers and doctors for the last 12 years to bring to market a technology that will revolutionize diabetic testing. Some of these individuals helped develop the first meters that were available to the general public.

Pepex is introducing an all-in-one mTrio® blood glucose meter that requires no test strips, is blood droplet free, can fit comfortably in your pocket, and is capable of providing your doctor and caregivers the ability to monitor your results in real-time via Pepex's advanced internet cloud infrastructure.

Pepex is moving toward manufacturing and expects FDA approval in the very near future.

That is where you come in. According to the World Health Organization, 347 million people worldwide have diabetes. Help us change and improve the lives of all diabetics to live longer, happier, and healthier lives, by raising $200,000 to help launch mTrio® in the U.S.

Please visit  http://www.pepex.com/ for more information or visit our facebook page at facebook.

Hi, This is Dr. Bupp, Pepex Medical Director
I have been working with a group of scientists, engineers and doctors for the last 12 years to bring to market a technology that will revolutionize diabetic testing. Some of these individuals helped develop the first meters that were available to the general public.
Pepex is introducing an all-in-one mTrio® blood glucose meter that requires no test strips, is blood droplet free, can fit comfortably in your pocket, and is capable of providing your doctor and caregivers the ability to monitor your results in real-time via Pepex's advanced internet cloud infrastructure.
 mTrio® - Blood Free Glucose Testing




Pepex is moving toward manufacturing and expects FDA approval in the very near future. 
That is where you come in. According to the World Health Organization, 347 million people worldwide have diabetes. Help us change and improve the lives of all diabetics to live longer, happier, and healthier lives, by raising $200,000 to help launch mTrio® in the U.S.
Please visit  http://www.pepex.com/ for more information or visit our facebook page at facebook.

story:
“Weather Live” is a IoT Device shows interactive holograms which
reflects real-time weather condition at small cube.



Hologram Movie



The song of birds opening the morning,  fresh start of a day,
For your dreams and hopes, Emotional Project.

"Hologram Weather Clock"



Since this device is connected  and synchronized to your smartphone(iPhone, Android Phone), you can check weather in other locations as well as your location and music/outfit recommendation service to the weather will be also added.

UhBee factory has done everything including hologram implementation, creating contents, designing product, to create the best UX for the users. You could feel the scent of the woods by white birch and feel even more emotions by watching holograms with warm lights. 



We, UhBee Factory, have a number of product development and research, from Hardware to Software. From Device manufacture to Software Service. We are trying to connect everything together, such as IoT, wearable devices and hologram, do our best to make the best fusion product.




UhBee Factory will work on to find more relaxed life with full of emotions rather than finding just a convenient &dry life.

story:
We are a group of individuals with a decade's experiance working with special needs children encompassing all specialties , therapists , physical therapists , Physical Education Instructors, all specialized with working with special needs children.

Seeing there is no haven in Cyprus for those children so over looked in society , and amidst the crisis plagueing our country , we took it upon ourselves to undertake the task of providing a center for the mobility impaired and special needs children , providing also much needed job openings for experts of this sort, ourselves included, along with providing the much needed facilities for disabled children.

Through great personal effort , and indepting ourselves with personal bank loans we have reached 70% completion of our project and still The Health Center remains unfinished and many essentials we still lack due to depleted funds.

This project has been a lifelong dream for my self and my wife and we have come together with several like-minded people and pooled our resourses as well as our finances and went forth and began building a place which will greately benefit all special needs children , strengthen the community , raise social awearness regarding those overlooked in our society , children that suffer from a variety of issues , ranging from A.D.D. , to all mobility impaired children , including special needs.

Your support will ensure we have the means to complete our lifes work and provide the first of its kind Health Center in Cyprus , procuring a much needed haven for those who trully needed. 

The Funds we are raising are for the construction of an indoor heated pool , to complete our gymnasium (which is merely lacking the specialized equipment for mobility impaired children) ,construction of a group therapy hall , construction of specialized tennis courts for disabled children and construction of equine assisted therapy arena.

Our group consists of individuals who have been working with disabled kids for the past decade , in various programms in Cyprus, Greece and Bulgaria, working with mentally challenged , mobility impaired , as well as children suffering from A.D.D. and similar dissorders.

Our Project includes creating a specialized soccer field for mobily impaired children, gymnastics programm, specialized swimming pool, skill learning and working towards social incorporation for those sorely overlooked , this kids are entitled to have an equal chance in life and the opportunity to thrive in a society that has been ever ignoring those less fortunate.

We have , in addition to our heart and soul , poured all we have in materializing our Dream , personally, collectively, financially . We are a mear 30% away from completing our lifes work , through many hurdles we have reached 70% completion of The Health Center , failure is NOT an option , we have all invested all our time , effort and money and  divoted our lives to provide the kids we have been working for , for the past 10 years place a place where they can be incorporated into society and have an equal opportunity in life as everyone else.

Be part of our joint venture , by making your contribution , however small, and make a difference in the lives of so many children , offering them an equal chance in life , happiness , and productivity. Even if you cannot render financial aid, you can always further this noble cause by helping spread the word in any way you can (Facebook, twitter, Instragram etc)
