story:
Short Summary

Hi, My name is Fiona.  This is part of my story and my purpose…..

I started in the healing field several years ago in a variety of capacities using a variety of modalities, including Reiki, Tong Ren, Law of Attraction Life Coaching to name a few, I have over the last 7 years also been studying the teachings of Peruvian Shamanic and Native American traditions.  It has been my pleasure to work with many dozens of individuals and help them achieve greater levels of wellness, clarity, and joy in their lives. 

I had always felt that healing the human mind, body & spirit in one therapy is what people need today, so, I began my search for a modality that was more immersive and effective in the short term.   This is when I came across the Harmonic Egg.

When I became aware of the Hamonic Egg, I knew this was what I had been looking for and we needed one locally for our population that is currently hurting on many levels.

Currently, 24 Harmonic Eggs are operational throughout the United States, with 30 more to be delivered and operational in 2021, including in the  Netherlands, the UK, Thailand, Peru, New Zealand, and Australia.  Tens of thousands of people have reached new levels of wellness as a result of sessions in the Harmonic Egg.

This innovative technology provides us with an important and effective tool to provide energy therapy for clients, which will enable them to repair, de-stress and relax the body.  The egg-shaped resonant chamber focuses the energy of sound, light, and color as restorative bio-healing therapy. This environment provides a consistent, repeatable experience promoting a sense of internal balance and well-being.

By installing a Harmonic Egg locally, many people on their healing journey will now have access to this amazing technology, and thereby accelerate their healing.

About the Inventor Gail Lynn.

Gail Lynn is the inventor and creator of the Harmonic Egg. As a 37-year-old woman, she was diagnosed with severe cardiovascular stress stemming from the pressure of a competitive career and more than one broken relationship. She had depleted physical, emotional, and psychological reserves. Searching for a natural therapy that might help her, she stumbled across light and sound therapy.

The healing she experienced from a single session of this therapy, while not immediate, seemed almost miraculous to her. She was intrigued, and she reserved a few more sessions.

Gail has a wide-ranging background in creative endeavors, as a business owner and in the field of engineering. She knew that the light and sound therapy she had experienced could be improved, and she was excited to realize that she possessed the exact gifts needed to do that.

In 2010 she opened her first light and sound therapy center in Denver, Colorado using the older technology she had first experienced. Over the next few years, she studied bio resonant frequencies, Nikola Tesla’s theories of 3,6, and 9, sacred geometry, heliotherapy, chromotherapy, and much more. She pondered how to create a chamber with the perfect combination of size ratios, materials, and shapes to enhance resonance. She enlisted the expertise of professional musicians to create some proprietary music specifically designed to utilize the acoustics of the egg shape to help the body heal itself. Gail also collaborates with professional light and sound engineers on the Harmonic Egg team. In 2020 she was approved for a patent for her invention, the Harmonic Egg, just 4 years after applying. 

Now Gail has turned her attention to bringing the Harmonic Egg to more communities throughout the US and the world. In addition to making the Harmonic Egg available for sale to other holistic practitioners, she generously shares her knowledge. She is passionate about helping people transform their health and achieve mental and emotional well-being by energizing the healing power within them.

What We Need 

We are seeking $100,000 to cover the cost and installation of the Harmonic Egg($70k) plus the cost of renovations for space where the Egg will be located.  Our future plan is to install additional Harmonic Eggs in the nearby towns of Banff/Canmore as well to meet the increasing demand for wellness tourism.

The Impact

By contributing to the purchase and installation of the Harmonic Egg, you are supporting the healing and wellness of many (In the 8-9 years Gail Lynn, the inventor, had her center she saw 13000 clients, each of them multiple times! ).  It's these healed individuals that then go out into the world and heal others.

I have successfully worked with many dozens of clients to find more purpose and meaning in their lives through intensive healing programs.  When I discovered the Harmonic Egg, I realized that I could fast-track a lot of the healing I had been doing by using the Harmonic Egg to give a “boost “ to my clients.  Evidence shows that a regular practice of using the Harmonic Egg can have a profound and positive change on those that incorporate it into their lives.

I'm a single mother who has personally struggled with anxiety and depression throughout my life and I have spent much of it searching for the most effective and holistic, methods to address this in myself, my family, and others.  Although I incorporate and practice several methods to support healing in myself and my clients, it wasn't until I discovered the Hamonic Egg that I realized that this incorporates much of what I had been doing into one intensive delivery method.  When researching it and connecting with the inventor and Canadian distributor, It was clear that thousands had already benefited in profound ways.  It was time to bring this local!

It is my dream to help everyone who is open to improving their own wellbeing and have their mind, body, and spirit all working as one in harmony so that they can bring into reality the best that they can be and fulfill their own purpose.

 

Risks & Challenges

Competition. One other group is purchasing and installing a Harmonic Egg in Calgary, Alberta which is the largest city closest to our location in Cochrane, Alberta. Both Gail Lynn the inventor of the Harmonic Egg, and Paige Clarke the Canadian distributor are deeply committed to the success of each Egg owner's business, so the location of each Egg is assessed individually on population and location of the nearest Harmonic Egg.

Harmonic Egg owners are like family, we support each other with insights and experiences, we all want each other to succeed in our mission to help people feel better and are able to live happier, stress free, pain free lives.

We have also secured the locations of Canmore and Banff, Alberta.

We are currently seeking adequate space in Cochrane to house the business and we want to ensure such space is fully accessible to all.

There is a risk that should we not raise all the money needed, we will need to seek debt and there is no guarantee that we would be successful in securing the debt.  In this case, we would be seeking funds from other sources including friends and family.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry if you can't contribute but love the sounds of this!  You can become a champion and ambassador.  We will provide you one free access to the Harmonic Egg ($135 value) for every new client you send our way.

Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Cochrane Location will be number 3 in Canada

story:
My name is Dr. Daniel Stewart PT, DPT. I am a physical therapist who has ten years of experience working with patients of all ages and diagnoses in the field of Physical Therapy. I received my Doctor of Physical Therapy degree from Rocky Mountain University of Health Professions and a Bachelor of Science degree from the University of Utah in Kinesiology and Exercise Physiology.

I invented the ElectroCup with the hope that it will allow me, healthcare providers, and our patients find the relief and healing they need through Electro-Myofacsial Decompression Therapy.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding Goal: $35000

The Electro-Cup is an innovative creation that combines traditional cupping and transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation to enhance your experience and results. Designed by doctors, this next generation in cupping aims at providing comfortable, lasting relief to sore parts of the body.

The Electro-Cup is constructed from durable, transparent polymers allowing for static and dynamic cupping and to monitor the decompression while in progress. The visibility also helps keep the cups be sanitized between uses.

Each Electro-Cup features inlaid metal strips that connects to a standard TENS Unit, allowing you to stimulate tissue throughout the use of the devices without compromising the vacuum seal. Regardless of age or experience level, anyone with body soreness or tension can learn to use the device in just a few minutes.

We have 4 different cups in 3 different sizes designed to fit and work on different parts of the body. The large works well on bigger areas like the back and legs, whereas the small works best on the feet and hands.

The Electro-Cup is capable of many different variations. You can use the 1 large 4 lead cup to have 2 seperate, crossing electrical currents within the field of the cup. You can also hook 2-4 of the Electro-Cups together to create larger areas of TENS stimulation. The positions and configurations are endless!

The Electro-Cup gives professionals a powerful tool to combat tension and discomfort- adding important value to their practice.

The Electro-Cup is versatile enough to be operated by one or two people in a home or gym environment, providing avid athletes, working parents, and those recovering from surgery an on-demand resource for relief.

The Electro-Cup is a finished product, already being used by people with great results. However the limitations of 3D printing prevent mass manufacturing. With the funding we receive, we will be able to purchase the expensive steel molds needed for injection molding. This will allow us to bring this great product to people in need throughout the world. 

The Impact

Cupping and TENS have been used for thousands of years to help people with the tight and painful areas of the body. This patent pending innovation combines the 2 technologies to enhance their effects. There are millions of people all over the world that would benefit this product. Your Contribution = Lives Changed. What better reason does one need to be apart of something bigger than themselves? 

Risks & Challenges

This may be our first Indiegogo project, but we have an experienced team who has spent their whole careers in manufacturing, design, and business management. Transparency, Communication, and Responsibility are cornerstones of our vision and we can guarantee that you will be informed and your feedback heard throughout this whole process.

Other Ways You Can Help

If donating financially just isn't the the cards right now, there are still ways you can help!

1. Join our exclusive Facebook group for a chance to win free kits and to find someone in your area that is using the Electro-Cup. https://www.facebook.com/groups/324880755629434

2. Indiegogo share tools to help bring as many people to the cause that we can.

story:
Short Summary

Belle de Jour มุ่งมั่นค้นหาผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อสุขภาพและมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดจากทั่วโลก เพื่อให้ได้มาซึ่งเครื่องสำอางคุณภาพสูงที่สุด

ในที่สุด  Belle de Jour ได้ค้นพบผลิตภัณฑ์ออยล์​บำรุงผิวหน้า ที่มีประสิทธิภาพ​สูงที่สุดในด้านการต่อต้านริ้วรอยแห่งวัย จากประเทศ​โมร็อกโก​ ชื่อว่า "Prickly Pear Cactus Seed Oil" หรือชื่ิออื่นๆคือ Barbary Fig Oil, Prickly Pear Oil และ Cactus Seed Oil.

Prickly Pear Cactus Seed Oil หรือสามารถเรียกสั้นๆว่า Prickly Pear Oil เป็นน้ำมันสกัดบริสุทธิ์​ 100% จากเมล็ดของผลต้นกระบองเพชร Opuntia Ficus Indica ซึ่งมีคุณสมบัติในการต่อต้านริ้วรอย 

ในการที่จะผลิตน้ำมันบริสุทธิ์เพียงแค่ 1 ลิตร นั้น จำเป็นต้องใช้ผลต้นกระบองเพชรมากกว่า 1,000 กิโลกรัม เพื่อให้ได้เมล็ดพันธุ์เพียงพอ และนี่คือสาเหตุ​ที่ทำให้ Prickly Pear Oil เป็นหนึ่งในน้ำมันที่แพงที่สุดในโลก

Belle de Jour aims to search the Healthiest and most Efficient produces from around the World for its high quality cosmetic products.

Today, Belle de Jour has discovered and selected its Absolute Best Anti Aging Oil in Morocco : 

The Prickly Pear Cactus Seed Oil is also known as Barbary Fig, Prickly Pear Oil or Cactus Seed Oil.

These are all names for the oil that is pressed from the seeds of the Opuntia Ficus Indica cactus. An oil that is prized for its anti-aging properties.

It takes over 1000 kg of cactus fruit to produce enough seeds to make just one litre / 34 fl oz of genuine, pure, cactus seed oil.
This is what makes it one of the most expensive oil in the world.

6 เหตุผลหลักที่คุณควรใช้ผลิตภัณฑ์ออยล์​บำรุงผิวหน้า (The Pure Prickly Pear Seed Oil)​ จาก Belle de Jour

1) อุดม​ไปด้วยวิตามินต่างๆ

คุณรู้หรือไม่ว่า Prickly pear oil มี Vitamin E มากกว่า Argan oil ถึง 150% เนื่องจาก Vitamin E เป็นหนึ่งในสารต้านอนุมูลอิสระ ซึ่งช่วยกระตุ้นปฏิบัติการ​ซ่อมแซม​ผิว ลดเลือนริ้วรอยแห่งวัย กักเก็บความชุ่มชื้น นอกจากนี้ยังอุดมไปด้วย Vitamin K ที่ช่วยในการลดความแห้งกร้านและความหมองคล้ำอีกด้วย

2) มีกรดไขมันไม่อิ่มตัวสูง

กรดไขมันเหล่านี้จะถูกดูดซึมเข้าสู่ผิวของคุณได้อย่างง่ายดายโดยไม่ทิ้งคราบเหนียวเหนอะหนะ นอกจากนี้ยังให้ช่วยเพิ่มความชุ่มชื้นและความยืดหยุ่น เพิ่มคอลลาเจน​ให้ผิว ช่วยบำรุงให้ผิวเรียบเนียน กระชับรูขุมขน ทำให้ผิวดูละเอียดยิ่งขึ้น แถมยังช่วยลดความมันส่วนเกินบนใบหน้าได้อีกด้วย

3) อุดมไปด้วยสารต้านอนุมูลอิสระ

นอกจาก Vitamin E และ K แล้ว Prickly pear oil ยังเต็มไปด้วยสารต้านอนุมูลอิสระอื่นๆ ที่ช่วยต้านอนุมูล​อิสระ​ กระตุ้นปฏิบัติ​การซ่อมแซมผิว ทำให้เราสามารถต่อสู้กับสภาพแวดล้อม มลภาวะ ความเครียด​และอนุมูล​อิสระ​ต่างๆได้ ช่วยลดความแห้งกร้านและความหมองคล้ำ ริ้วรอยต่างๆลดลงอย่างเห็นได้ชัด​​ 

4) Non-comedogenic

คำว่า "น้ำมัน" อาจทำให้คุณเครียด แต่ไม่ต้องกังวล เนื่องจาก Prickly​ pear oil เป็น Non-comedogenic ซึ่งหมายความว่า เนื้อออยล์​มีความบางเบา ไม่อุดตันรูขุมขน สามารถดูดซึมสู่ผิวได้ง่าย ไม่เหนียวเหนอะหนะ สามารถใช้บำรุงได้ทั้งกลางวันและก่อนนอน

5) เหมาะสำหรับทุกสภาพผิว

Prickly​ Pear​ Oil เป็น​สารสกัด​บริสุทธิ์​ 100% จากธรรมชาติ​แท้ๆ และเป็นแบบออร์แกนิค เหมาะสำหรับผิวทุกประเภ​ทไม่ว่าคุณจะมีผิวแห้ง ผิวผสม ผิวมัน หรือผิวบอบบางแพ้ง่าย อีกทั้งยังเป็​นออยล์​เอนกประสงค์​ที่บำรุงได้ทั้ง ผิว ผม และเล็บ

6) ช่วยลดการอักเสบ

เหมาะสำหรับผิวเป็นสิว และยังมีประโยชน์ในการช่วยสมานบาดแผล หรือรอยไหม้อีกด้วย

6 Main Reasons You Need to Get Belle De Jour Prickly Pear Seed Oil on Your Face ASAP

 

1) Prickly pear oil is chock-full of vitamins

Did you know that prickly pear oil has 150% more vitamin E than argan oil? It’s true. Since vitamin E is an antioxidant, prickly pear oil fights free radicals and increases cell renewal. This is great news for your skin since all this action prevents wrinkles. It also has vitamin K, which can lighten your undereye circles.

 

2) It has a high percentage of unsaturated fatty acids

These fatty acids absorb easily into your skin—without leaving that nasty, greasy residue behind. Plus, the fatty acids moisturize the collagen in your skin and tighten your pores. This leads to more elastic, younger-looking skin.

 

3) So many antioxidants = so many skin benefits

In addition to vitamins E and K, prickly pear seed oil has other antioxidants that do some serious work for your skin. These antioxidants increase cell turnover, restore elasticity, brighten your complexion, and reduce redness and dryness.

 

4) Prickly pear seed oil is non-comedogenic

The word “oil” might stress you out—but don’t worry. It’s non-comedogenic, which means that prickly pear oil can deeply penetrate your skin without clogging pores or causing breakouts.

 

5) It works for all skin types

Whether you have dry skin, sensitive skin, or mature skin, look out for skincare products that include prickly pear oil. You can’t go wrong.

 

6) Prickly pear oil has antiviral and anti-inflammatory properties

Bonus benefit! This makes it handy to have around for healing mild wounds, cuts, and burns.

What Are the Benefits & Uses Of Prickly Pear Oil

In Morocco we use Prickly Pear Oil because it is so good for skin.
The main benefits of Prickly Pear Oil for skin are:

  • Intensive anti aging effects on wrinkles on the face
  • Works well at Reducing dark circles under the eyes
  • Contains Vitamin K known to reduce spider veins and “dark circles”
  • Is the ultimate Rich Moisturiser for Dry Skin
  • Calms inflamed, red or blotchy skin and is great for Skin Conditions like Acne, Eczema or Psoriasis
  • Gently Reduces dark skin pigmentation and marks to even out complexion
  • Restores skin elasticity and firms skin
  • Can also be used to Repair heat damaged hair tips and split ends
  • These benefits come from the unique, rich  blend of bio-active nutrients.
  • Cactus seed oil has 150% as much anti-oxidants as Argan Oil, plus minerals, vitamin-K, plant sterols, fatty acids, β-carotene and betalains.

All of which have properties that help with many skin problems where other treatments may fail.

What Is Prickly Pear Seed Oil ?

Prickly Pear ( Barbary Fig ) Seed Oil is a natural oil extracted from the seeds of the fruit of the Opuntia ficus indica cactus. This cactus will grow up to 2 meters in height and needs little water.

They thrive in hot, arid areas of the world – like Morocco. The Opuntia Ficus Indica cacti produce beautiful bright yellow and pink flowers in the spring which produce fruit by the end of summer.

Cactus seed oil is a rich, fatty oil suitable for most skin types including those with sensitive skin. Perfect for deep hydration and protection of the face and hair in any environment.

In Morocco cactus seed oil is also popular for use on acne prone skin. Regular use on the face appears to reduce breakouts and help toward the lightening and healing of marks.

How Is Cactus Seed Oil Made ?

To make cactus seed oil farmers harvest the ripe cactus fruit around the end of July. When ripe, the ovoid cactus fruit is slightly soft, 5 to 8 cm in length and has a green to reddish purple colour.

It is the cactus fruit that contains a reddish, greenish, yellowish sweet pulp full of black seeds.
The seeds are separated from the fruit and dried. Our Barbary Fig Oil is cold pressed from these seeds.

Prickly pear cactus seeds are hard and woody and contain less than 5% oil.
This is why 1000 kilos of fruit yields just 30 Kilos of seeds!
Each 30 kilos of cactus seeds makes just one litre of pure oil

However, as interest in cactus seed oil spreads so do the number of lower quality cactus oils for sale.
Cactus/vegetable oil blends are often advertised as pure cactus seed oil. To make cheaper “cactus oils” they press the cactus fruit – not just the seeds.

You should also be aware that cactus seed oil are sometimes offered as a “macerate” which the sellers don’t make clear. A “macerate” is where an ingredient, like a flower or in this case cactus seeds, will be steeped in a vegetable carrier oil with the idea the properties may ( or may not! ) be carried into the oil.

As discussed the only correct and traditional way of making a pure cactus seed oil is by pressing the seeds only.
This is why our Belle de Jour Moroccan cactus seed oils contain only pure, cold-pressed prickly pear cactus seed oil from the Opuntia Ficus Indica cactus.

How To Use Cactus Seed Oil 

How to apply Cactus Oil on Skin

Barbary Cactus seed oil is applied to wet or dry skin after cleansing.
Put a drop or two on your fingertips and gently massage it into any areas that need treatment. The oil will leave skin feeling soft and smooth.
Use on facial areas that need extra care at once a day. Around the eyes, lips and any areas with wrinkles. The ideal time to apply is before going to bed to allow the seed oil to work overnight.

How to use Cactus Seed Oil for Hair

For dry, chemical or heat damaged hair put the oil into the palm, warm and work the oil through your hair. Wrap the hair in hot towels and leave for 30 minutes. Try to keep the hair hot during the 30 minutes changing the towels if necessary. Wash and rinse if necessary with a cleansing – non-chemical – shampoo.

Where the ends of the hair shaft are split, damaged or where it is frizzy work a few drops into the hair using your fingertips.

Medicinal Uses Of Opuntia Ficus Indica Oil

Traditional Moroccan medicine also uses whole prickly pear fruits for their hypoglycemic and hypolipidemic actions. Opuntia ficus-indica is used in other regions as laxative, anti-inflammatory, or against diarrhoea. Prickly Pear Seed Oil reviews also reveal it is also an antacid, astringent, antidermatosic, emollient, antiseptic, vulnerary, analgesic, expectorant, antiviral, sedative and antioxidant.

Prickly Pear Oil Nutrient Facts

Campesterol 1.66 g/kg

a-Tocopherol 0.056 g/kg

b-Tocopherol 0.012 g/kg

g-Tocopherol 0.330 g/kg

d-Tocopherol 0.005 g/kg

Total vitamin E 0.403 g/kg

Stigmasterol 0.30 g/kg

b-Sitosterol 6.75 g/kg

b-Carotene 0.047 g/kg

Vitamin K1 0.525 g/kg

Short Summary

Belle de Jour มุ่งมั่นค้นหาผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อสุขภาพและมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดจากทั่วโลก เพื่อให้ได้มาซึ่งเครื่องสำอางคุณภาพสูงที่สุด
ในที่สุด  Belle de Jour ได้ค้นพบผลิตภัณฑ์ออยล์​บำรุงผิวหน้า ที่มีประสิทธิภาพ​สูงที่สุดในด้านการต่อต้านริ้วรอยแห่งวัย จากประเทศ​โมร็อกโก​ ชื่อว่า "Prickly Pear Cactus Seed Oil" หรือชื่ิออื่นๆคือ Barbary Fig Oil, Prickly Pear Oil และ Cactus Seed Oil.

ในการที่จะผลิตน้ำมันบริสุทธิ์เพียงแค่ 1 ลิตร นั้น จำเป็นต้องใช้ผลต้นกระบองเพชรมากกว่า 1,000 กิโลกรัม เพื่อให้ได้เมล็ดพันธุ์เพียงพอ และนี่คือสาเหตุ​ที่ทำให้ Prickly Pear Oil เป็นหนึ่งในน้ำมันที่แพงที่สุดในโลก
Belle de Jour aims to search the Healthiest and most Efficient produces from around the World for its high quality cosmetic products.
Today, Belle de Jour has discovered and selected its Absolute Best Anti Aging Oil in Morocco : 
The Prickly Pear Cactus Seed Oil is also known as Barbary Fig, Prickly Pear Oil or Cactus Seed Oil.
These are all names for the oil that is pressed from the seeds of the Opuntia Ficus Indica cactus. An oil that is prized for its anti-aging properties.
It takes over 1000 kg of cactus fruit to produce enough seeds to make just one litre / 34 fl oz of genuine, pure, cactus seed oil.This is what makes it one of the most expensive oil in the world.

story:
Baschi The Quick Slimming Capsules
description
Baschi quick slimming capsule in pink metal box is a brand-new weight loss supplement which is very effective in weight reduction and weight management. This product is easy to use by taking only one capsule per day but the result is much more effective and faster than other products.Take 1 capsule about 30 minutes before first meal of the day.
– Drink water during the day, at At least 8 cups to 10 cups per day.
– Get plenty of rest for better results.
– Consume 1 capsule per day continuously at least 1 month for best results.
– Reduce intake of carbohydrates and fatty food. Replace it with more vegetables for better results.
key features
Increase Metabolism
Control Appetite
Features Metabolism-Boosting Multivitamins
Burns Belly Fat and Shrink Fat Cells
specification

Product Line:Shopify Emporia

story:
Take a deep breath

Our patented wristband contains several sensors that monitor pulse, movement, respiratory rate, and other physiological data in real-time. Algorithms detect personal snoring with an accuracy of 98% and trigger a vibration in the wristband. 

The vibration is activated at a low intensity that changes according to your reactions while constantly learning a machine. Improving your sleep every night!

 

The Nexense AI SmartSync Wristband 

A gentle vibration does not wake you up and does not impair the quality of sleep. It causes posture to change and opens the airway obstruction.

Over a short amount of time, your brain and body use bio-feedback to teach itself proper breathing technique on its own, leading to improved night breathing over time.
You’ll soon forget you ever had trouble.

 

The Nexense APP turns any smartphone into a snore tracking device and services as a control panel for your new DreamIT X3. 

By tracking your sleep patterns, the app uses machine learning to adapt the treatment and recommendations for improving sleep habits. 


 

Using the app you can easily access historical data and statistic analysis stored in the cloud.

Sleep your way to better breathing and breathe your way to better sleep.

The company’s technology is protected by patents in order to provide a strong IP protection, one of the Company's most important assets. Its technology, applications and products, both in the medical and nonmedical fields, are protected by the laws of the United States and other jurisdictions worldwide. The Company's measurement technology utilizes a technique that measures a range of physical parameters as a function of time to a level of accuracy previously unattainable.

 

Our patents portfolio includes:

  • SYSTEMS AND METODS FOR SNORING DETECTION AND PREVENTION

 

  • HIGH-SENSITIVITY SENSORS FOR SENSING VARIOUS PHYSIOLOGICAL PHENOMENA, PARTICULARLYUSEFUL IN ANTI-SNORING APPARATUS AND METHODS

 

  • APPARATUS FOR USE IN CONTROLLING SNORING AND SENSOR UNIT PARTICULARLYUSEFUL THEREN

 

  • APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DIAGNOSING SLEEP QUALITY

 

  • ESTIMATION OF SLEEPQUALITY PARAMETERS FROM WHOLE NIGHT AUDIO ANALYSIS

 

  • APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DIGNOSING OBSTRUCTIVE SLEEP APNEA

 

 

Snoring isn’t just noisy,

it’s unhealthy.

​​It shouldn’t be surprising that restricted breathing can lead to a variety of health issues.

 

Studies have found snoring to be a direct cause of:

  • Exhaustion & fatigue
  • ​​Lack of concentration
  • ​Memory problems
  • ​​Increased long-term risk for a stroke
  • ​​Higher risk of heart disease and complications
  • ​​Chronic headache
  • Decreased sexual satisfaction​​
  • High blood pressure
  • ​Low oxygen levels in the blood
  • ​​Obesity
  • ​​Higher risk of mental health issues

 

The Time Line

2001 - Nexense Ltd. Funding  – dedicated on R&D sensor technologies and IP portfolio building. A short video from the past

2010 - GE Healthcare investment 3.5M$ for developed the Night Watch – The first generation of the product. A last short video from the past .

The Night Watch Sold to 1,000 satisfied customers who sleep with it to this day!

 

2015 - A spin-off of the field of sleep to Nexense Technologies USA Inc.

2016 - Dream 1st Geniration Prototype building

2018 - Dream X3 developed

2019 - Dream X3 App validation

2020 - BGU Department of Biomedical - License technology agriment, IndieGoGo launch

2020 - Start a mass production after IndieGoGo Successful completion

 

ITERATIONS

We devoted all our time and effort developing  over the years. Thanks to our devoted team members, we were able to create a number of prototype iterations, conduct extensive product testing, and refine every aspect of the design to ensure comfort, style, and functionality.

Read more about our unique technology

Take a look at the Breathing Sleep Blog

Read Our research and publications

 

Risks and challenges

COVID-19 updating

Of course there are always risks and challenges with a new product and its production, but we believe we have got the biggest and most important parts under control, here is why:

1. Production --> We are working with top-notch suppliers and we have padded our timeline to make sure we can hit the time frames we have laid out.

2. QA Team --> Besides having full trust in our partners, we also have a QA team that is on site and who will check the full production process and will check the production batches on possible quality issues.

3. Delivery Time --> We have set a good margin in our delivery time mentioned on this page, this is therefore the final deadline for delivery of the DreamIT.

Overall we are very confident that every backer will receive a DreamIT bracelet of the highest quality within the estimated delivery period.

Meet our team

We will not rest until this is the case for every single backer.

Learn about accountability on IndieGOGO

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ
